ESP.ORIGINAL: Treasure!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝藏！！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Where the fuck is this goddamn treasure supposed to fucking be?! That map the kid sold me just says "Ivanpah lake bed" with no details! Am I supposed to excavate all of it?! How deep do I dig? How do I know it isn't another ten feet below the six-foot hole I already dug on Monday? I need a pre-war excavator machine. Or maybe a team of people! No people for Jimmy, no no, just hordes of these shit-flinging ferals that stink up MY cave! It's MINE!
Fucking NCR just has to be this goddamn close, huh? Otherwise, I could bankrupt myself, buy an army of slaves, and set 'em digging. When I find the treasure, I could just pay off the debts! But I can't do that, and I can't find an excavator that still works, so it's all fucking shovels for me. All day, every day. Dig dig dig dig.
They're laughing at me now. Laugh it up you bastards, when I find this treasure, you'll all fucking beg me to give you even the tiniest fraction of my loot. All you'll get is my shovel buried in your goddamn skulls AND WHERE IS MY FUCKING TREASURE?!?!
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个该死的宝藏到底他妈的在什么地方？！那个小孩卖给我的地图上面只是说在“伊凡帕旱湖河床”而没有细节！我应该把它全部挖出来吗？！我该挖多深？我又怎么知道它是不是在我周一挖的6英尺深的洞的下面的10英尺？我需要一台战前挖掘机。或者一队人马！吉米没有人，不不，只有一大群气势汹汹的狂尸鬼，弄得我的洞穴臭烘烘的！它是我的！
操他妈的NCR一定要离得这么近吗，哈？不然，我可能会破产，买一大群奴隶，让他们去挖。当我找到宝藏，我会还掉债务！但我不能那样做，我找不到还能用的挖掘机，所以我他妈只有铲子。一整天，每一天。都是挖挖挖挖。
他们肯定现在在嘲笑我。你们笑吧杂种，当我找到宝藏，你们都会他妈的求我哪怕分一点点给你们。你们能得到的只会是我的铲子埋在你们该死的脑袋里。我的宝藏到底他妈在哪里？！？！

史蒂夫，我有个好主意能让我们获得丰收！！我们不去北维加斯广场，因为我们会被打死，但是有个他妈的成人电影制片厂就在大门外面！！！如果我们去那里杀了所有人，烧了这个地方，拿走所有他们保存的成人电影，我们就会成为维加斯唯一拥有它们的人，每个人都会想要看成人电影，所以他们会给我们超多的钱钱钱钱钱，所以我们去杀了那些成人电影明星！！！！！！
真诚的，你的朋友强尼:)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gordon's Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈登的日志

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Everyone always told me I was a hero, after I fought off those raiders years ago. They told me I was the only reason any of them were still breathing, if it weren't for me, they'd all be dead or slaves or worse.
I never wanted any of that praise and attention. I just wanted to protect my home. That's all I ever wanted. And then the Legion came. They're killing and enslaving people. Same as raiders, just with a different coat of paint.
They said to me "Gordon, you saved us once, you can do it again. You're the biggest one here, you're the only one that's been in war. Just show them we're not going to be an easy conquest."
I wanted to tell them I couldn't. Too many of them, and they've got discipline on their side. But these guys didn't want to run. Most of them spent half their lives running. We've got sick, elderly, kids... Even if we did run, how many could make it? And they all believed in me. When we all met to discuss what to do, every last one of them looked at me with so much hope... They really do think I can do anything.
I thought if I could sneak into the camp and kill their leader in his sleep, that'd be the end of this. I was wrong. Patrols were too tight. I had to duck into this cave, figured I'd get out at nightfall. But they're moving in. Supplies and equipment. There's guards posted at the entrance now. I'll try to break out, if I can, but...
I'm the only one of us that doesn't have faith in my abilities. I don't know how I can do this. Everyone was depending on me, and I'm going to fail them. They all believed in me... They're all going to be expecting me to come back triumphant any day now... When will they realize I'm not coming back? Will they think I abandoned them, or will they just understand that I wasn't strong enough?
To whoever finds this, my name is Gordon Corman. I only wanted to protect my friends and my family. I'm sorry to everyone I've let down.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在我几年前打败那些掠夺者之后，每个人总是告诉我我是个英雄。他们告诉我我是他们还活着的唯一原因，如果不是我，他们都会死掉或者当奴隶。
我从来都不想得到这样的赞扬和关注。我只是想保护我的家。那就是所有我想要的。然后军团来了。他们会杀掉和奴役人们。他们跟掠夺者一样，只是穿着不一样的衣服而已。
他们跟我说 ”戈登，你救过我们一次，你就能救第二次。这里你是最大的，你是唯一一个打过仗的人。告诉他们我们不会轻易被征服的.“
我想告诉他们我不能。军团人太多了，他们有纪律。但是这些家伙不想逃跑。大多数人在这里生活了半辈子。我们有病人，老人，小孩...即使我们跑，又有多少人能跑得掉？而且他们都相信我。当我们聚在一起讨论该怎么办的时候，他们每个人都满怀希望地看着我...他们真的认为我能做任何事。
我想如果我能潜入营地然后在睡梦中杀了他们的头领，就会结束这一切。我错了。巡逻是如此的频繁。我不得不躲进这个山洞，想黄昏的时候再逃出去。但他们搬进来了。补给和装备。入口处现在有警卫。我会尝试冲出去，如果我能，但是...
我是我们中唯一一个对我的能力没有信心的人。我不知道该怎么做。每个人都依靠我，我会让他们失望了。他们都相信我...他们希望我每天都大获全胜的回去...他们什么时候才能知道我不会回来了？他们会认为我抛弃了他们，或者他们会明白我不够坚强吗？
写给发现这个的任何一个人，我的名字叫戈登·科尔曼。我只想保护我的朋友和家人。我向所有失望的人道歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Health Advisory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 健康咨询？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Channel 18 just ran a fluff piece that suggested there was some correlation between consumption of Item 36 (Pile 'O' Beef) and severe fatal cardiac arrest.
I was thinking of spinning it along the lines of:
"Modern science and medicine have concluded that death is an inevitability for all people, including those that have the good taste and intelligence to consume our delicious Pile 'O' Beef. Attempting to draw a connection between these two factors is laughable at best. It's also been proven that every man, woman, and child that has ever breathed air is also marked for death, and yet Channel 18 has neglected to mention this in their "investigative journalism" as they call it. So just relax, accept that we're all mortal, breathe the air, and enjoy your delicious Pile 'O' Beef, courtesy of your friends at Meat Innovations LLC"
Let me know what you think, boss.
Chris Pendrew PR Manager Meat Innovations LLC
P.S. Could you please tell Dennis Markowski down in shipping to stop referring to me as "the little fairy fella" from now on? Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT:
18频道的节目认为 36号物品(“欧派”牛肉)与严重致死性心脏骤停两者之间存在一定的相关性。
我在考虑按照:
“现代科学和医学已经得出结论，死亡对所有人来说都是不可避免的，包括那些有品位和智慧来品尝我们美味的“欧派”牛肉的顾客。试图把这两个因素联系起来充其量是可笑的。事实也证明曾经呼吸过空气的每个男人，每个女人以及每个儿童也被标记为死亡，而18频道却在他们所谓的“调查报导”中忽略了这一点。所以放松点，接受我们都是凡人，好好呼吸空气，然后享用我们美味的“欧派”牛肉，感谢你的朋友肉食创新有限公司”
我想知道你的看法，老板。
- 克里斯·彭德鲁 研发经理 肉食创新有限公司
P.S. 你能不能告诉丹尼斯·马科斯基从现在开始别再叫我“小精灵仙子”了？谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regarding "Vegetarian Murder Month"
ESP.TRADUIT: “素食谋杀月”的看法

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I understand that you have final say on all advertising campaigns, and that the boys in Marketing are really proud of this one, but I have serious reservations about the "Vegetarian Murder Month" ad campaign.
Up front, I agree, it's very funny. I think the subversive sociopolitical satire is really top-notch, and that the message is both very relevant in this day and age, and also a great way to direct potential customers to our myriad of bleeding-edge meat products and accessories.
The thing is though, this is America, and most Americans are knuckle-dragging, fatass, morons. The average American couldn't pick up on subtext if you tied it to a 9-iron and caved his skull in with it. When they turn on the TV and see an ad declaring that "the surest path to world peace is paved with the skulls of vegetarian filth, and Meat Innovations LLC is proud to serve as the steamroller of progress" I don't think many of them will actually get the joke. I think most of them will say: "Oh hey, the TV-voice told me to kill some people that don't think the same things I do! I'd better go do what the TV-voice says, because thinking for myself is scary!"
I feel like we'd save a lot of money in lawyers fees if we repurpose this ad-campaign as some kind of highbrow art-house film and drop it on one of those snooty European movie fests. Maybe we'll get an award! I'd like to see Poultry-Co beat that!
Just trying to avert disaster here, boss.
Chris Pendrew PR Manager Meat Innovations LLC
P.S. I appreciate you speaking with Dennis. Unfortunately, now that he's been banned from referring to me as the "little fairy fella" he's come up with a new appellation. If you could please tell him to stop referring to me as "that little brown-nosing cocksucker" I'd sure appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我知道你对所有的广告活动都有最终决定权，而市场部的小伙子们真为这个感到骄傲，但我对“素食谋杀月”广告活动有严重的保留意见。
首先我同意，它很有趣。我想颠覆性的社会政治讽刺真的很卓越，而且这个信息在今天这个时代都非常相关，同时也是一个将潜在客户引向我们大量前沿肉类产品和附属物的很好的办法。
但问题是，这里是美国，大多数美国人是笨蛋，肥仔，白痴。普通美国人无法理解潜台词，除非你把台词塞进9毫米钢管然后从他脑袋里钻进去。当他们打开电视看到广告宣称 “对世界和平最保险的途径就是用素食者污秽的头骨铺路，而肉食创新有限公司自豪地成为进步的动力”。我不认为他们中的很多人会真正理解这个笑话。我想大多数人会说：“哦嘿，电视里面告诉我杀掉那些和我想法不同的人！我得按照电视里说的做，因为为自己着想很可怕！”
我觉得我们可以省很多律师费，如果我们对这个广告行动稍加改动，变成正统严肃艺术的影片，把它放在傲慢的欧洲电影节上。也许我们还能拿奖！我想看到“家禽公司”战胜它！
只是想为我们避免灾祸，老板。
- 克里斯·彭德鲁 研发经理 肉食创新有限公司
P.S. 我很感激你跟丹尼斯谈了话。不幸的是，现在他被禁止叫我“小精灵仙子” 后，他想出了一个新的称呼。你是否能否让他别再叫我“小棕鼻子混账”，我会非常感激。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Statement on Jeffrey Isaac Brown
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰弗里·艾萨克·布朗的声明

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Just waiting for final approval on the PR statement regarding Jeffrey Isaac Brown.
"We here at Meat Innovations LLC are shocked and saddened to hear about the murder of Carol Brown at the hands of her husband. While we are aware that Mr. Brown has claimed to have been spurred into action because of our recent 'Vegetarian Murder Month' campaign, we can assure you that we absolutely repudiate his actions. We would like to stress that the 'Vegetarian Murder Month' ad campaign is a work of fiction, and is intended as satire. To hold us solely accountable for the actions of this man is both an injustice, and shortsighted to a negligent degree. To be clear, we at Meat Innovations LLC, while perhaps not overly fond of the vegetarian demographic for purely financial reasons, do not endorse or condone their indiscriminate murder at the hands of our consumers. And to any of our consumers that are considering murdering any vegetarians in their life, we urge you to put those plans aside, and instead focus your energy on trying our new Pile 'O' Beef: X-treme Cheesetastic Edition, now available at supermarkets near you!"
Let me know what you think.
Chris Pendrew PR Manager Meat Innovations LLC
P.S. Is there some way I could convince you to just fire Dennis? He's calling me "the little cunt in PR" now, and I'm not comfortable working in such hostile conditions.
ESP.TRADUIT:
等待最后的批准中，研发部关于杰弗里·艾萨克·布朗的声明。
”我们在肉食创新有限公司里震惊和悲伤地听说卡罗尔·布朗被她的丈夫谋杀了。虽然我们知道布朗先生声称受到我们最近的“素食谋杀月”运动刺激而采取行动，我们可以向你保证，我们绝对否认他的行为。我们要强调“素食谋杀月“广告活动是一部虚构的作品，是用来讽刺的。让我们为这些行为承担全部责任是不公正，而且目光短浅到疏忽的程度。要清楚，我们在肉食创新有限公司，也许不太喜欢纯粹出于经济原因的素食人口统计，不要支持或纵容他们在我们的消费者手中滥杀无辜。任何一个想要谋杀素食者的消费者，我们敦促你把那些计划搁置一边，相反，把你的精力集中在尝试我们新的“欧派”牛肉: 极致干酪味版, 现在在你附近的超市有售！“
让我知道你的想法。
- 克里斯·彭德鲁 研发经理 肉食创新有限公司
P.S. 有什么办法能说服你开除丹尼斯吗？他叫我“研发部的小烂逼”，在这样恶劣的条件下工作我不舒服。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Assholes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些王八蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I can't believe this! Three years I spend on this project, buying favors, bribing officials, kissing so much ass that my mouth still tastes like a seat cushion, and for what?
The "honorable" Judge Lindstrom has declared that Mayes is entitled to half of my profits, end of story. I cut her out, god damn it! She played no part in any of my franchising, but she gets paid because we used to co-manage that fucking ammo caravan out near Modoc.
What a fucking joke! Do these assholes have any clue how much money I sank into buying prime real estate in Reno? If I have to pay a percentage to anyone, it should be Greeb. At least he helped me grease some of the local palms!
Fuck this. I'm going to get on the line with Marquez. I bet he knows some folks that solve problems like this.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我不能相信！我花了三年时间在这个项目上，收买好感，贿赂官员，舔了那么多屁股，我的嘴还像个坐垫，为了什么？
这个“正直的”法官林德斯特姆宣布梅耶斯有权得到我一半的利润，就是这样。 我把她杀了，该死的！她没有参与我的特许经营，但她得到报酬是因为我们以前共同管理过摩多克外面那个该死的弹药商店。
开什么他妈玩笑！这些混蛋知道我花了多少钱来购买新里诺的优质房产吗？如果我要分提成给任何人，那也应该是格里布。至少他帮我在树上涂了点油！
操。我要和马奎斯通电话。我敢打赌他认识一些能解决这样问题的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hired Help
ESP.TRADUIT: 雇佣帮手

ESP.ORIGINAL:
No idea what to think. Marquez told me he knew a guy that made problems disappear. Said this guy helped him a lot when he was dealing with some of the "encroaching interests" that were threatening him over the Casa.
He said this guy was named Dillon, and he'd be contacting me in my office in a few days to hash out the details. So, you can imagine
ESP.TRADUIT:
不知道该怎么想。马奎斯告诉我他知道一个家伙能让问题消失。他说在卡萨.马德里公寓边，当处理一些对他形成威胁的“侵占利益”问题时，这个家伙帮里他很大忙。
他说这个家伙叫做狄龙，他几天后会在我的办公室见我，具体讨论细节。那么，可想而知

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rise Up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 反抗！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
All Irradiated-Americans (colloquially known as 'ghouls' by bigots) Are Victims of Society Written and Researched by Dr. Zombie Ghoulstein PhD
"I'm not a victim, Dr. Ghoulstein. I have a successful business, friends, relative safety and comfort... All that anyone could ever ask for!"
WRONG! First off, you, and any ghoul making similar claims, are TRAITORS to your blood family, we fellow ghouls. Second, any "successes" or "friends" you may have are condescending allowances by disgusting human bigots! They see you as a funny creature in the filthy zoo that is their society! These "friends" will turn on you and burn your successful business to the ground as soon as they tire of watching you prance around like a trained chimp!
"I understand what you mean, Dr. Ghoulstein, but I don't like to think of myself as a victim."
WELL YOU ARE. TOO BAD. Also, recognize the freedom inherent in victimhood! Your failures are not yours; they're a spiteful act of prejudice by the evil system built by humanity! Didn't get that job you wanted? It's because they gave it to a human, victim. Gun jammed during a firefight? Bullets are built by humans, and they sold you the defective ones, victim! Stubbed your toe? WHO DO YOU THINK LEFT A ROCK IN THE ROAD, VICTIM? We ghouls are blameless and flawless, understand? So next time you THINK your efforts weren't good enough, read between the lines, and you'll recognize that there's always HUMAN SABOTAGE attacking our every action!
"Excuse me, Dr. Ghoulstein, but I'm a human myself. However, I recognize that our decadent and evil society was designed to oppress and destroy your beautiful Ghoul culture at every opportunity. I like to consider myself a friend of your people. How may I help your cause?"
Well, first off, HUMANS aren't allowed to call us GHOULS. Second, if you really want to help, consider shooting yourself, bigot! We're not some little pet project that you inbred humans can just throw money at to assuage the subconscious guilt nagging you for your evil philosophies and worldviews!
EVERY HUMAN IS A BIGOT. PERIOD. END OF DISCUSSION.
ESP.TRADUIT:
所有辐射美国人民(偏见的人俗称为“尸鬼”) 都是社会的受害者 由哲学博士- 僵尸尸鬼 写作和研究
“我不是受害者，尸鬼博士。我有成功的事业，朋友，家人既安全又舒服...任何人都想要的！”
错误！首先，你是你家族的叛徒，我们尸鬼的叛徒，所有尸鬼都会这样主张。第二，任何你说的“成功”或者“朋友”都是屈尊于恶心偏见的人类！他们把你看成肮脏的动物园里的一个有趣的动物，那就是他们的社会！这些“朋友”会惹恼你把你的生意搞砸， 一旦他们厌倦了你像一只受过训练的黑猩猩一样到处蹦蹦跳跳的时候！
”我知道你的意思，尸鬼博士，但我不想认为我自己是个受害者。“
你就是。真糟糕。还有，认识到受害所固有的自由！你的失败不是你个人的；他们是人类建立的邪恶制度中恶意的偏见行为！没得到你想要的工作？那是因为他们给了人类，受害者。开火的时候枪卡住了？子弹是人类做的，而他们卖给你有缺陷的，受害者！磕着脚趾了？你以为是谁在路上留下了一块石头，受害者？我们尸鬼是无过错和完美的，知道吗？所以下次你觉得你的努力不够好的时候，领会言外之意，你会认识到总有人为的破坏在袭击我们的每一个行动！
“不好意思，尸鬼博士，但我自己就是个人类。然而，我认识到我们腐朽邪恶的社会是为了一有机会就压迫和破坏美丽的尸鬼文化。我喜欢把自己当成你们的朋友。我能帮你什么忙吗？”
首先，人类不允许叫我们尸鬼。第二，如果你真的想帮忙，考虑一下向你自己开枪，偏见者！我们不是什么你们这些愚蠢的人类花钱搞的小宠物计划，我们不是为了给你们人类那邪恶的哲学和世界观来减轻潜意识的内疚感的！
每个人类都是偏见者。课节。讲座结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reserve Me the Most Powerful Table!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我订一张最有力的桌子！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Listen well, mess-hall man!
I demand you determine which of these tables is closest to a convergence point of astral energy. Once you have completed this task, you shall reserve this table for myself and for my eternal soulmate, bound forever by the transcendent strings of destiny.
You shall prepare for myself a Brahmin steak, rare, grilled over salt and marinated in your finest whiskey and agave sauce. I will also have a glass of red wine, and if you tell me that you're not permitted to serve alcohol to a 15-year-old, I shall curse your bloodline and render you both sterile and obese.
I would never deign to dictate the food preferences of my astral soulmate. Therefore, you shall prepare all your finest food and drink options and keep them on standby, so you may best serve whatever &PCName; desires. Our dinner date shall be legendary, and if you do ANYTHING to sabotage this destined eating experience, I will set you on fire while you sleep.
Sincerely Mandy Bloodshadow, Chosen One and Eternal Harbinger of Darkness
ESP.TRADUIT:
听好了，食堂佬！
我命令你确定这些桌子中哪一个最接近星体能量的汇合点。一旦你完成这个任务，你应该为我和我永远的灵魂伴侣保留这张桌子，永远被超然的命运之弦所束缚。
你应该为我准备一块双头牛排，半熟，盐烤，用你最好的威士忌和龙舌兰酱腌制。我还要一杯红葡萄酒，如果你告诉我你不能向15岁大的孩子提供酒的话，我要诅咒你的血统并让你病态肥胖和不能生育。
我不会屈尊向你口述我星体灵魂伴侣的食物偏好。因此，你应该准备你所有最好的食物和酒水选择，让他们随时待命，所以你最好伺候好&PCName;的任何述求。我们的晚餐会很有传奇色彩, 如果你做了什么来破坏这命中注定的晚餐体验，你睡觉的时候我会放火烧了你。
真诚的， - 曼迪·血影，获选者以及黑暗的永恒预兆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quid Pro Quo, "Prophet"
ESP.TRADUIT: 回报，“先知”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
They say you are a prophet. I suppose we shall test the truth of these claims, for if you truly do possess transcendent insight above and beyond that of the common man, you should already know why I deign to contact you.
As the reigning spiritual leader of this community, you are the one best situated to officiate over a transcendent wedding ceremony. You see, &PCName; and I are eternal soulmates, bound together across the multiverse by the unbreakable strings of fate! Our dark union shall make our dominion over the mortal realm well and truly complete, and therefore, I command you to officiate the ceremony at once!
Alternatively, perhaps Ophelia would be better suited to handle such things, as she does seem more involved in the spiritual affairs of this commune than you are. I do not care which of you recites the incantations of matrimonial binding, so long as the oath is struck and the deep and transcendent love between myself and &PCName; is written forever into the annals of space and time.
Sincerely Mandy Bloodshadow, Chosen One and Fated Heroine of the Astral Realms
ESP.TRADUIT:
他们说你是先知。我想我们应该检验一下这些说法的真实性，如果你真的拥有超凡的洞察力和超越普通人，你应该知道为什么我屈尊联系你。
作为这个社区的精神领袖，你是最适合主持一场非凡婚礼的人。你看，&PCName;和我是永恒的灵魂伴侣，在多元宇宙中被不可断裂的命运之弦捆绑在一起！我们的黑暗联盟将使我们对凡人王国的统治变得更好和真正完整，因此，我命令你马上主持仪式！
或者，也许奥菲莉娅更适合处理这样的事情，因为她似乎比你更多地参与了这个公社的精神事务。我不在乎你们谁背诵婚姻约束的咒语，只要宣誓完毕，我和&PCName;那深沉而超凡的爱将永远写进时空的史册。
真诚的， - 曼迪·血影，获选者以及黑暗的永恒预兆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready Your Stocks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好你的库存！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Heed my words carefully, shopkeeper, or when next we meet I will strike you down with but a glance, so powerful is my mastery of the dark arts.
I've little doubt that &PCName; will soon bless you with a visit, no doubt searching for quality bargains and whatever other nonsense you may deign to sell in your establishment. When &PCName; arrives, you shall make a great sacrifice: Your profit margin!
That's correct, I hereby demand that you offer &PCName; your entire stock, free of charge! Furthermore, I command you to tell &PCName; that this glorious offering was arranged by myself. You see, &PCName; and I are bound together for eternity, fated to be together for all time, soulmates as prophesized by the stars! However, I believe there is a chance that &PCName; has yet to truly peer into the fates, and so, may yet remain unaware of the dark and blissful future we two are destined to share together!
With this in mind, I command that you shall spare no expense when it comes to keeping &PCName; happy and well-supplied! If you do a good job, if you make this eldritch offering in my name, then you will have played your small part in keeping my soulmate and I content. And given the overwhelming astral power that we both wield, and the apocalyptic strength of our auras when we two are joined in eternal love, you would do well to keep us both appeased, shopkeeper.
That is all. Heed my words, or I shall gather my strongest and darkest summoning crystals, and I shall commune with the elder gods, and I vow to you that I shall fill your life with spiders.
Sincerely Mandy Bloodshadow, Chosen One and Earthly Vessel for the Dark Energy of the Stars
ESP.TRADUIT:
仔细听从我的话，店主，否则下次我们见面时，我看你一眼就会打倒你，我对黑暗艺术的掌握是如此强大。
我有点怀疑&PCName;很快就会上门祝福你，毫无疑问寻找物美价廉的商品，以及任何你可以恭敬地在你的店里卖的东西。当&PCName;到来时，你应该做出巨大的牺牲：牺牲利润！
没错，我在此要求你提供给&PCName;你所有的存货，免费！ 此外，我命令你告诉&PCName; 这光荣的祭品是我自己安排的。你看，&PCName;和我被永远捆绑在一起，命中注定永远在一起，群星预言的灵魂伴侣！然而，我相信有可能 &PCName; 还没有真正深入了解命运，所以，可能仍然不知道我们注定要一起分享的黑暗和幸福的未来！
出于这种考虑，我命令你不要吝啬,保持让&PCName; 开心和好好招待！如果你干得好，如果你以我的名义提供这些可怕的用品，扮演好你的小角色，让我的灵魂伴侣和我满足。由于我们都拥有无法抗拒的星体力量，当我们两个在永恒的爱中结合，会产生灭世的力量，你最好让我们两个都心平气和，店主。
就是这些。听从我的话，否则我将收集我最强最黑暗的召唤水晶，我将与古老的神交流，我发誓我会用蜘蛛填满你的生活。
真诚的， - 曼迪·血影, 获选者以及黑暗的永恒预兆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woodey's Wild Ride (Rough Cut)
ESP.TRADUIT: 伍迪的狂野之旅 (初次剪辑版)

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This tape contains a staggeringly awful porno movie. Apparently, when he wasn't busy raping and pillaging up and down the shores of the Colorado River, Woodey was trying to break back into the porn industry.
As if being filmed in a dirty industrial bunker with no sound treatment wasn't bad enough, Woodey is an astoundingly terrible actor. Worse still, the cameraman seems strangely fixated on getting as much footage possible of Woodey's bare, track-marked ass.
While the production intricacies of the porn industry aren't exactly your usual area of expertise, you're starting to formulate some notion as to why it is that Woodey was blacklisted from the industry.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这盘带子里有一个惊人的可怕的成人电影。显然，当他没有整天在科罗拉多河岸进行抢劫和强奸时，伍迪试着重新开始他的色情电影事业。
作为一个在肮脏的工业掩体里拍摄的没有声音的电影来说还不错，伍迪是个可怕得惊人的演员。更糟的是，摄影师似乎奇怪地专注于尽可能多的拍摄伍迪的肉体，有痕迹的屁股。
由于错综复杂的成人电影行业并非你的专长领域，你开始对伍迪为什么会被行业列入黑名单有了某种理解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whackmasters Monthly
ESP.TRADUIT: 月度狠揍大师

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's your latest issue of Whackmasters Monthly, here to help you spy the hottest holotapes of the month. And, this time, we got a garbage fire for you too.
"The First Battle of Cooter Damn!" 4/5 Another win for independent Director/Producer Benny Alberta, based out of New Vegas. Alberta's holovids tend to be low on budget and big on quality. Cooter Damn is both exemplary as a piece of political satire, and as a good show. I'd say it's their best yet, except for one oddity that forced me to knock a star off the final score. Midway through the epic orgy scene with the Mal-Puss Legate, the vid cut to an unrelated shot of an unknown actress. This woman jumps around without her top on for a bit, and tells the audience to visit Primm, Nevada and check out their local titty bar. And then we cut back to the action. What the hell, guys? The low budgets are part of the charm, but if you really want to buy more expensive sets, surely putting commercials in your holovids ain't the best way to do it!
Also, what happened to Chunks Woodcock? That man was the best actor the porn industry has had in decades, and he just dropped off the map!
"Beefy Bros 2" 0/5 SG Productions needs to fire Woodey Hardmann right now. This man is a cancer infesting the genre, with his bizarre behavior, behind-the-scenes drama, and his disgustingly drug-riddled body ruining absolutely everything he touches. The quality of the rest of this video is irrelevant, because Hardmann's presence turns everything to shit. I wouldn't piss on that man if he were on fire. I genuinely wish harm upon him. Woodey Hardmann, if you take some time out of assaulting beggars in Reno and turning your ass into a syringe pincushion, and deign to read this review, I have some urgent advice for you: Kill yourself.
"The Naked New Canaanites" 3/5 Good thing for SG Productions that they can drop a couple holovids a month. This one has the dubious honor of being one of them. This holovid contains nothing that hasn't (the page ends here. On the other side is an advertisement for a massage parlor in New Reno.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是你最后一期月度狠揍大师，为你侦查月度最热的卡带。这一次，我们也为你准备了一堆垃圾。
”混账库特的第一战！“ 4/5 独立导演/制作人本尼·艾伯塔又一次胜利，在新维加斯。艾伯塔的全息电影倾向于低预算和高质量。混账库特既是政治讽刺的典范也是一部好作品。我会说这是他们最好的，除了某个奇怪的事迫使我在最后的比分中淘汰了一个明星。在马尔布斯特使史诗狂欢的场景中，影片切到一个不知名女演员的无关镜头。这个女人有一阵子没穿上衣就跳来跳去，然后告诉观众们参观内华达的普瑞姆，去他们当地的奶子酒吧。然后我们又回到影片上。到底怎么了，伙计们？低预算是魅力的一部分，但如果你真的想买更贵的设备，把广告放进影片里面肯定不是最好的办法！
还有，“大块头木鸡”怎么了？那个人是几十年内色情工业最好的演员，而他就从地图上消失了！
”肥肥兄弟2“ 0/5 斯坦金作品公司现在想要解雇伍迪·哈德曼。这人是个横行于电影流派的癌症，他古怪的行为，幕后的花边，还有他恶心的遍布毒品的身体把他碰过的东西都毁了。其余视频的质量与此无关，因为哈德曼的存在毁了一切。他发火时我不会去惹他。我真心希望他受到伤害。伍迪·哈德曼，如果你没有去攻击新里诺乞丐，把你的屁股变成注射器针头，而在恭敬地阅读这份评论的话，我有一些紧急的建议给你：自杀。
“赤裸的新迦南人” 3/5 斯坦金作品公司一个月能完成两个影片，这对他们是个好事。这部戏有幸成为他们中的一员. 这部影片包含了还没(这一页到此结束。另一面是新里诺按摩院的广告。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disgraced Pornstar Goes on Rampage
ESP.TRADUIT: 不光彩的色情明星横冲直撞

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Disgraced Pornstar Goes on Rampage By Bruce Levine
In a series of events that are both shocking and bizarre, even by the standards of New Reno, a reviled pornstar has gone on a violent rampage that has claimed three lives so far.
Until recently known by the stage name "Woodey Hardmann", Reno native Mitchell Rosenthal, 47, has been a staple of the male pornography industry for the past five years. With the disastrous release of his latest vehicle, the unfortunately named "Beefy Bros 2", however, it seems that Hardmann's career has reached the end of the road. Shortly after the holovid prompted universally scathing critiques, SG Productions spokesman Ari Silverman publicly announced that the studio would be ending their contract with Hardmann, effective immediately.
Evidently this wasn't quite the departure Hardmann had planned for himself, as he jumped right back into the headlines the next day, when he stabbed an SG Productions employee, Janice Feldman, 36, to death. As he fled the scene, Hardmann took time out of his escape to beat a local beggar, Jamal Davis, 62, into a coma that would prove fatal three days later.
Worth noting, is that this is not the first altercation between Hardmann and Davis. Last year, Hardmann earned himself a stint of community service after being convicted of assaulting Davis for "demanding a handout from his betters".
Hardmann's last known sighting in NCR territory was earmarked with the robbery and murder of an NCR Heavy Trooper, Corporal Richard Wang. After Wang's murder, Hardmann was last seen fleeing to the east, into the Mojave Wasteland territory. He is currently wanted for crimes against the state, and is considered armed and dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT:
不光彩的色情明星横冲直撞 布鲁斯·雷文 作
在一系列既令人震惊又离奇的事件中，甚至超过了新里诺的标准，一个不光彩的色情明星暴力横冲直撞，到目前为止已经夺走了三条生命.
直到最近才以艺名闻名的“伍迪·哈德曼”，出生于里诺，本名米切尔·罗森塔尔，47岁，在过去5年作为男性色情影片行业从业者。他最新的汽车灾难性的发作下，这车不幸的取名为“肥肥兄弟2”，看起来哈德曼的职业生涯走到了尽头。不久之后，这部电影引起了普遍严厉的批评, 斯坦金作品公司发言人阿里·银人公开宣布工作室将终止与哈德曼的合同，立即生效。
显然这不是哈德曼想要的分手，第二天他又重新登上了头条新闻，他刺了一位斯坦金的雇员，珍妮丝·费尔德曼，36岁，并且致死。当他逃离现场时，哈德曼又袭击了一位当地的乞丐，贾马尔·戴维斯，62岁，昏迷并三天后死亡。
值得注意，这不是哈德曼与戴维斯的第一次争吵。去年，哈德曼曾经因为被指认袭击戴维斯而做过一段时间的社区服务，戴维斯说他”要求上级施舍“引起了他的不满。
哈德曼最后一次在NCR领地被目击是抢劫和谋杀一名NCR重装步兵，理查德·王下士。谋杀王之后，哈德森最后被看见逃往东边，进入莫哈维废土地区。他目前因危害国家罪被通缉，并且全副武装和极度危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heading North!
ESP.TRADUIT: 向北走！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Swish, I ain't here no more. I took them schematics and I'm making my way north, figure I might get some cash to burn if I sell 'em to them Strip types. All this whining and fighting about some dam, well, I got a big solution. See, them little windmills don't make enough power for Vegas, right? So they gotta rely on the dam.
Well, what if they had a BIG windmill? I'm talking the size of that big glowing casino-tower that nobody's allowed inside! So, that's the plan! I'm heading north up the 95, so maybe if you get the lead out your pants, you might just run into me before I'm filthy goddamn rich, haha!
-Reed
ESP.TRADUIT:
斯卫西，我不再待在这里了。我拿了他们的示意图，我要往北走，我想如果我把它们卖给赌城里的人，我可能会赚大钱。所有这些关于大坝的抱怨和争吵，呃，我有个好办法。你看，这些小风车不能为维加斯提供足够的电力，对吧？所以他们必须要依靠大坝。
但如果他们有一个大风车呢？我说的是那座任何人都不能进去的闪闪发光的赌场大楼那么大！所以，这就是计划！我顺着95号公路向北，所以如果你把铅从裤子里拿出来，你可能会在我还没有他妈的发财之前碰到我，哈哈！
- 里德

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later, Swish!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，斯卫西！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey Swish, no offense, but I ain't seen hide nor hair of you, and I've been walking slow and looking over my shoulder the whole time. Seen some angry Legion fellas skulking around behind the gas station. Seen some Vipers (or are they Jackals? I can't tell the difference.) hanging out by a billboard. Even seen a big-ass ant breathing fire. Know what I ain't seen? Your zombie ass!
If you're dead, sorry to hear about that, buddy. If you're not dead, then stop making everyone wait so damn long! Ain't your momma ever teach you not to keep folk waiting?
Here's the deal. I'm not waiting any longer. I'm gonna try to sell this design to someone at the 188, and if that don't work, I guess I'm heading to the Strip! If you want a cut of the profit, RUN YOUR ASS! If you catch up to me before I get paid, you'll still get a share. Otherwise, the money's all mine, 'cause you ain't done nothing. If you want, you can keep this gas station as a participation award. Adios!
-Reed
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿斯卫西，无意冒犯，但我看不见你, 我一直走得很慢一直看着我的肩膀。看见一些愤怒的军团成员躲在加油站后面。看见一些毒蛇帮(或者是豺狼帮？我分不清。) 在广告牌旁闲逛。甚至看见一只大蚂蚁在喷火。知道我没看见什么吗？是你的屁眼！
如果你死了，那就很抱歉听到这个消息，兄弟。而如果你没死，那就别让每个人等这么他妈久！你的妈妈难道没有教过你别让他人等久了吗？
就这么定了。我不再等你了。我要把这个设计图卖给188贸易站的人，如果没卖掉的话，我想我要去赌城卖！如果你想要分到钱，就跑快点！如果你在我拿到钱之前赶上我，你还是能拿到你那一份。否则，钱都是我的了，因为你什么都没做。如果你想的话，你可以保留这个加油站作为参与奖。再见！
- 里德

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point Pillage Run
ESP.TRADUIT: 抢劫点

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sullivan got us setting this place up as a little 'trading post' for locals. Says it'd be too suspicious if he got locals being herded into his bar at gunpoint and never coming back out I guess.
Schrader bugs the hell out of me, man. Saw some of his goons trying to trick some North Vegas marks with the usual 'work opportunity' scam. Shot the fucker for working on our turf, but the folks went running. Grabbed two of the kids anyway. Run faster next time, bitches.
Anyway, figure I'm overdue to drop by Point Pillage, so may as well make the trip and offload all the cargo I can. Gearheads up that way pay top dollar for cargo, long as everyone's healthy and shit. Harpies pay even better, but only for young women/teens. Maybe catch a gecko show while I'm out that way, I guess. Wonder if Lil ever got that casino working? They get that shit working much flashier, they might start getting actual tourists.
ESP.TRADUIT:
苏利文让我们把这里设置成当地一个小“贸易站”。我猜如果他用枪指着当地人赶进他的酒吧而再也不出来就太可疑了。
施拉德把我烦死了，兄弟。我看见他手下的一些人想用“工作机会”的骗局来欺骗北维加斯人。用枪威胁他们到我们地盘工作，但是那些人跑掉了。但抓住了两个小孩。下次跑快点吧，婊子。
不管怎么说，我认为早该设置抢劫点的，所以我还是顺路把所有的货物卸下来吧。电脑迷往那边走，付最高价买货物，只要每个人都健康就行。哈比斯则出更高的价钱，但只要年轻女子。我往那边走，也许表演抓蜥蜴。我怀疑里尔有没有把赌场开起来？他们把那地方搞得太显眼了，他们可能开始吸引真正的游客了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greene
ESP.TRADUIT: 格林尼

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Wow, that 'Elder Greene' guy over west in Rockwell is a fucking cunt. Sullivan had me bring him some cargo, talked at me for like 15 minutes about how I can't fuck the cargo, my boys can't fuck the cargo, no fucking the cargo, no touching the cargo, blah blah blah gotta be as chaste as fucking monks on this run.
Guess that bald cunt Greene pays extra for virgins but Jesus fucking Christ, if I ever get picked to run him a load again, I'm wedging some C4 up the girl's ass and detonating him and his whole gang as soon as I'm out the door. 'Paladins' my fucking ass. That fucking asshole wouldn't even give me the money before smirking and going on a rant about how he was so much smarter and stronger and more important than us. How we were savages and inbreds and how he would have us all burned alive if we ever try to scam him.
If that fucking prick didn't have power armor, I bet everyone in New Rockwell would've lynched him as soon as he rolled into town with all that baby-dick swagger. Fucking ruined my whole week, god damn.
ESP.TRADUIT:
哇，那个洛克威尔西边的“老格林尼”是个他妈烂逼。苏利文要我带给他一些货物，他跟我说了15分钟关于我不能操货物的话，我的人不能操货物，不能操，也不能碰，不拉不拉不拉的，像他妈的僧侣一样纯洁。
我猜那个秃头烂逼格林尼为处女付了额外的钱，但是上帝老天爷，如果我再被挑去给他送货一次，我会把C4炸药塞到女孩屁股里，然后在我离开那里之后把他和他的整个帮派全部炸上天去。去他妈的“圣骑士”。那个杂种总是要先自鸣得意咆哮他是如何比我们更聪明，更强壮，更重要，然后才会给我钱。我们是如何野蛮和弱智，还有如果我们想骗他的话，他怎么把我们都活活烧死。
如果那个鸟人没有动力装甲的话，我打赌在他神气十足甩着老二进城的时候，每一个新洛克威尔的人都会用私刑处死他。妈的毁了老子整个星期，该死的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mendoza is back
ESP.TRADUIT: 门多萨回来了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Great, as if we didn't have enough to deal with, Mendoza finally got back from his Legion vacation with Dietrich.
He was loitering around the door, but fuck that fat asshole. Sullivan is gone, the operation is fucked, and I'm not letting him in. If he ever fucking leaves, maybe I'll slip out and... Try and do something else?
God damn, I've been slaving for so long I don't even remember how to do nothing else. Hell.
ESP.TRADUIT:
很好，看起来我们没有足够的时间来处理，门多萨终于跟黛德丽一起从军团休假回来了。
他在门口徘徊，操那个肥猪杂种。苏利文走了，行动失败了，我不会让他进来。如果他离开，也许我可以溜出去然后...做点别的事情？
该死，我当了这么久的奴隶，我都不记得别的事情怎么做了。操。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cashing out
ESP.TRADUIT: 套现

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I don't know if Sullivan got himself killed, or if he just fucked off to greener pastures, but this is a bust. I waited as long as I could, but that's enough. Time to get the fuck out.
Caught a break with Mendoza. He decided to get himself plastered at the Wrangler and didn't leave no guards to watch the door, so I took the cargo and slipped out. Locked the door behind me, just as an extra fuck you to that fat bitch.
As for cargo, we got us two kids and one busted whore. Some people ain't picky about how pretty the face on their snatch is, so I figure I can get at least a couple drinks worth from her.
The kids... Eh, fuck if I know. Some people pay top dollar for 'em, others say they're only worth buying for leverage if they got family for sale too. Still, means there's a chance I can get some big money for the little bastards.
I'm out. If you're Mendoza and you finally broke the lock: Fuck you, and fuck Schrader, and fuck your fat dead bitch of a mother. I win!
-Jace
ESP.TRADUIT:
我不知道苏利文到底有没有死掉，或者他只是去了更绿的牧场，但这是一次突击。我等了很久，实在太久。是时候该死的出去了。
抓到了门多萨的一个空档。他决定去原子牛仔赌场喝酒，而且没有留下守卫看门，所以我拿着货物溜了出去。关上了门，给那个肥猪杂种额外留了句操你妈。
至于货物，我们得到了两个小孩和一个妓女。有些人不挑剔脸漂不漂亮，所以我认为我至少能用她换几杯酒喝。
这些小孩...呃，我他妈怎么知道。有些人出大价钱买他们，而另一些人说，如果他们也有家人要卖的话，那他们只值把杠杆枪。那还是意味着我有机会用这些小混蛋赚大钱。
我走了。如果你是门多萨而且最后砸开了锁的话：那操你妈，然后操施拉德尔你妈，然后操你肥猪杂种的老妈。我赢了！
- 杰斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bloody Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 沾血的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
(This note is written in a barely-legible scrawl, and is smeared with blood)
im sorry for what i done mama. i didn't mean to hurt nobody. the worlds a bad place i was to weak for it i know. i am sorry. im going to be dead soon. got shot bad. not going to make it. im sorry for everything i done. it hurts mama it hurts real bad. just want to drink something and go to sleep but i cant sleep cant think mama whys it hurt so bad. im scared mama im really scared im going to hell i know i will. i was bad. i am bad. bad man. i regret everything i done. im sorry. im sorry. please forgive me mama. forgive me god. im sorry i love you
jace
ESP.TRADUIT:
(这份笔记的字迹非常潦草，并且沾满了鲜血)
妈妈我为我做的事情感到抱歉。我不想伤害任何人。世界是一个不好的地方，我知道我很软弱。对不起。我快要死了。枪伤很重。活不了了。我为我做的每件事道歉。伤口很痛 妈妈 真的很痛。只想喝点水睡一会 但是睡不着 妈妈 为什么这么痛。我害怕 妈妈 我真的害怕我会下地狱 我知道我会的。我很坏。我是坏人。坏蛋。我后悔我做过的事情。对不起。对不起。请原谅我妈妈。原谅我上帝。对不起我爱你
- 杰斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: What have we done
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们做了什么

ESP.ORIGINAL:
They warned us of this in my 6th grade advanced genetics class, but in my hubris, I ignored them. We sought only to create an endless supply of cloned beef so as to end world hunger, bring about a peaceful conclusion to the Resource Wars, and also make so much money we could buy vacation homes on the moon.
The road to hell is truly paved with good intentions, and in playing god, we created something we could never hope to comprehend or overcome. What have we done?
God forgive us, but the cows have turned on us. Turned on their creators. Turned on all mankind.
I will lock the doors, and pray they never evolve opposable thumbs with which to escape. I am trapped in here with them. I shall sacrifice my life to delay the monsters that I have brought into this world. My death is the price I pay to save the world from these cows. I only hope it will be enough.
Dr. Klaus von Steiner Director of Beef Cloning Facilities Meat Innovations LLC
P.S. Can somebody please feed my cat when I'm dead?
ESP.TRADUIT:
他们在6年级遗传学高级班中警告我，但在我的傲慢中，我忽略了他们。 我们只想创造源源不断供应的克隆牛肉以结束世界饥饿，和平结束资源战争，也可以赚很多钱让我们可以在月球上买度假屋。
通往地狱的路都铺满了善意，扮演上帝角色过程中，我们创造了一些我们永远无法理解或克服的东西。我们做了什么？
上帝原谅我们，但是牛已经开始攻击我们了。攻击它们的创造者。攻击所有的人类。
我会锁上门，并且祈祷他们永远不会进化出相反的拇指用来逃跑。我和它们一起被困在这里。我将牺牲我的生命来拖延那些我带到这个世界的怪物。我的死是我为了拯救世界而付出的代价。我只希望这足够了。
- 克劳斯·冯·斯坦纳博士 牛肉克隆设施主管 肉食创新有限公司
P.S. 我死后有人能帮我喂猫吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exiled
ESP.TRADUIT: 被流放

ESP.ORIGINAL:
After some consideration, we at the White Glove Society have decided to decline your request for reinstatement.
As is very clearly written in the charter, our esteemed fraternity is strictly forbidden from consumption of human flesh of any kind. While your argument that "children and babies should not be considered human, as no human could possibly be so obnoxious" was carefully considered, ultimately, we felt that it failed to adequately justify the "baby-barbecue" incident that prompted your expulsion in the first place.
You, and your baby-eating compatriots, shall continue to be exiled from our ranks, and from our lovely casino. Further attempts at overturning our decision shall result in your death, followed by vigorous posthumous mockery.
ESP.TRADUIT:
经过一番考虑，我们白手套社团决定拒绝你的复职请求。
就像章程上写的那样，我们尊敬的社团严禁食用任何种类的人肉。而你的论点“儿童和婴儿不应被视为人类，因为没有人会这么讨厌”被认真的讨论过了，最终，我们认为这并不能充分对最初导致你被开除的“婴儿烧烤”事件作出解释。
你，还有你那些吃婴儿的同道中人，将继续被驱逐出我们的队伍，以及我们可爱的赌场。妄图进一步推翻我们的决定将被判处死刑，以及死后的嘲弄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warmest Regards
ESP.TRADUIT: 最诚挚的问候

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dearest &PCName;,
Thank you again for arranging that heavenly dining experience the other day. That Legion child, naturally, was the guest of honor at our feast, and what a feast it was! Meat so tender and moist, why, it practically melted in our mouths.
As a man of honor and integrity, I have enclosed with this letter a sum of 2000 caps, as agreed upon. As an additional bonus, I have also included a small portion of the extraordinary dinner that you made possible for us. Wash it down with a fine old-world wine, and savor every bite and perhaps, in time, there will be a place for you in our Society as well! (And not on the menu, as you are not a baby.)
Alas, our business must take us elsewhere for the moment. Sad though it is to leave the Vegas area we call home, we at the Southern Nevada Baby-Eaters Society must take our message on the road, if ever we are to normalize the many benefits of consuming the flesh of babies and/or children! Duty calls, you know!
Warmest Regards Southern Nevada Baby-Eaters Society
ESP.TRADUIT:
最亲爱的&PCName;,
再次感谢你前几天安排了那次天堂般的用餐体验。那个军团小孩，自然了，是我们宴会上的主宾，多么丰盛的盛宴啊！肉质是如此的柔软和温润，它几乎在我们嘴里融化了。
作为一个荣誉而正直的人，我已随信附上2000瓶盖，根据我们之前的协议。作为额外的奖励，我还给你留了这个特别晚餐的一小部分，当然是你让我们享用成为了可能。用上好的旧世界红酒清洗，品尝每一口，而且可能最终，你在我们的社团里也会有一席之地！ (不是指菜单上，因为你不是婴儿。)
哎呀，我们的生意现在必须转到别处去。离开我们称之为家的维加斯地区虽然很难过，但我们南内华达食婴者社团必须把我们的信息带到路上，如果我们愿意使食用婴儿或小孩肉的许多好处正常化的话！使命的召唤，你知道的！
最诚挚的问候 - 南内华达食婴者社团

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reminders
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知单

ESP.ORIGINAL:
hello mr. loanshark, here are all the debts people owe you!
travis forrester - 192 caps billy tayback - 500 caps chadford johnson - 13 caps marty page - 250 caps filthy bill - 718 caps
please remember to get back all the moneys! lots of love mr. loanshark
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好高利贷先生，这是人们欠你的全部债务！
特拉维斯·弗雷斯特 - 192 瓶盖 比利·特巴克 - 500 瓶盖 查德福得·约翰森 - 13 瓶盖 马蒂·佩吉 - 250 瓶盖 下流比尔 - 718 瓶盖
请记住把钱都要回来！ 非常爱你的 - 高利贷先生

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Holy Doctrine
ESP.TRADUIT: 神圣教义

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Behold, children of this enlightened brotherhood! I present unto you the ten holy commandments of your glorious and attractive Father John Turner!
1. It is the will of the Prophet (and also the stars, yes, thank you Ophelia) that each and every one of us must carve out our own place in this world. We are beholden to nobody, and free to live our lives however we damn well wish, so long as our lifestyle doesn't fuck with anybody else's.
2. A well regulated Militia, being necessary to the security of a free State, the right of the people to keep and bear Arms, shall not be infringed.
3. Drugs expand your mind, so get as high as you want. Sobriety is a sin.
4. Alimony is bullshit, and is only recognized as legitimate by inbreds and con artists.
(The fifth mandate is written with far nicer penmanship than any of the others.) 5. Each and every one of us has our destiny written across the heavens, in the shining typography of the stars themselves. We must be ever diligent in our lifelong journey to comprehend the astral truth of the universe, and to meet our individual shining destinies with courage and resolve.
6. Taxes are the tools of (astral) Satan, and anybody that treats taxation as legitimate is walking a path of absolute evil.
7. Sex is pretty cool, and we should have more of it. It's definitely not taboo, and contrary to popular belief, you don't actually need to have an established relationship before you can bone each other.
8. It is the role of the Prophet to guide the community, and no more. It is not a position of power. This community has no need of "leadership positions" and if anybody tries to change that, it is your duty to name them for what they are: A politician, the great enemy of the people.
9. Cheating on your spouse isn't a sin. Passing up a chance for a threeway with your spouse is.
10. Don't be an asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT:
看啊，启迪兄弟会的孩子们！我将光荣迷人的神父约翰·特纳的十诫呈给你们！
1. 这是先知的旨意 (也是群星，对，谢谢你奥菲莉娅) 我们每个人都必须在这个世界上开辟自己的天地。我们不亏欠任何人，自由地过我们希望的生活，只要我们的生活方式不影响别人。
2. 纪律严明的民兵，对自由国家的安全是必要的，人民有携带武器的权利，不可侵犯。
3. 毒品能扩展你的思维，所以你想多嗨就多嗨。清醒是一种罪。
4. 扶养费是胡说八道，只有那些弱智和骗子才承认它合法。
(第五条是用比其他条款更漂亮的笔迹写的。) 5. 我们每个人的命运都写在天上，就在群星们闪亮的面上。我们必须在一生的旅途中不断努力去理解宇宙的星体真理，以勇气和决心迎接我们个人光辉的命运。
6. 税收是(星体)撒旦的工具，任何人将税收视为合法的做法是走一条绝对邪恶的道路。
7. 性交非常酷，我们应该做更多。和一般的认识相反，它绝对不是禁忌，在你们互相摩擦之前，其实并不需要有一个固定的关系。
8. 先知的角色是引导社区而已。这不是一个权力的位置。这个社区不需要“领袖地位”，如果有人想改变这一点，你有责任为他们命名：政客，人民最大的敌人。
9. 背叛你的配偶不是一种罪恶。放弃3P的机会才是。
10. 别成为混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ordinarily, I'd say good day to you. However, right now, that'd be a fucking lie, so I'll leave it at "see you later".
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常，我会说你好。然而，现在，那他妈就是个谎言，所以我会说“回头再见”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_00006638_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_00006639_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see my little GPS beacon lit up like a fucking Christmas tree, and right where that construction site was meant to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见我的小GPS发射器像个他妈的圣诞树一样，就在建筑工地上闪来闪去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0000788d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've dispatched my man, Eli, to retrieve the lumber. Backbreaking work, no doubt. However he achieves this task, I don't much give a fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我派出了我的人，伊莱，去收回那些木材。真是个累人的工作，毫无疑问。至于他怎么完成任务，我根本他妈的不操心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0000788d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the absence of any actual materials to work with, I've at least started renovations by boarding up the sole remaining window.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在没有任何实际材料的情况下，我至少已经开始装修了，把唯一一扇窗户装上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0000788d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let it never be said that I'm unwilling to sweat over my own goddamn projects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 千万不要说我不愿意为自己的他妈项目而操劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0000788d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suddenly genuine}No, really. If anyone implies such a thing, I'll put a bullet in their skull and think nothing of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {suddenly genuine}不，真的。如果有人说三道四，我会把子弹射进他们的脑袋而毫不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0000788d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, look at that. We fucking did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，看啊。我们他妈的做到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0004b288_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in goddamn business, and I couldn't have done it without you... As quickly as I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈开张了，没有你我就做不到...和我一样快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0004b288_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your payout, and you're more than fucking welcome to spend it on whichever goods and services we have on offer. Please, help yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的酬金，非常欢迎你把它花到我们所提供的任何东西和服务上。请别客气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0004b288_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, personally, I have no more work for you... However, others around here do. Eli does, for a fact. And that security manwhore might, as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，对我来说，我没有工作再给你了...然而，周围其他人可能有。事实上伊莱就有。那个男妓保安也可能有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0004b288_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whether you choose to indulge them or not, I really couldn't care less. We're home fucking free now, and I intend to kick back and let the cash flow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你是否满足他们, 我一点也不在乎。我们现在他妈的自由了，我打算放松一下，然后让现金流起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_greeting_0004b288_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaSilasSaloonQuest 140 1 setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 150
Something happening?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_greeting_00010b33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold it right there, fuckpump!
ESP.TRADUIT: 站住别动，白痴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07011146] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_greeting_0001114c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you thought you'd heard the end of the Crate Crew, huh? Well, you were wrong, loser.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你以为搬箱帮都完蛋了吗，哈？哼，你错了，废物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07011146] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_greeting_0001114c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't ever forget someone who goes around puttin' their filthy hands on our goddamn crates. You're marked for death, mother-humper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不会忘记是谁把他肮脏的手伸向我们他妈的箱子。你死定了，妈的杂碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07011146] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_greeting_0001114c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么遗言吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07011146] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_greeting_0001114c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Halt. Only men of the Legion are permitted entry into this cavern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站住。只有军团的人才允许进入这个山洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_greeting_00035d53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Halt. Only men of the Legion are perm- hold a moment...
ESP.TRADUIT: 站住。只有军团的人才能——等一下...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_greeting_00035d54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...You! I shall offer your head as a tribute to mighty Lanius! Die where you stand!
ESP.TRADUIT: ...是你！ 我要拿你的项上人头向强大的拉尼厄斯致敬！死吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_greeting_00035d54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Ave, amicus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向你致敬，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_greeting_00035d55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This cavern is being used to store materials and contraband we have seized on our sorties. I'm afraid you are not permitted entry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个洞穴被用来储存我们在出击中缴获的材料和违禁品。我恐怕你不能进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_greeting_00035d55_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_greeting_00035d5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啥？你想干嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_greeting_0000cbd8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, what's up, dude? You here for this most excellent of bathing experiences too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，怎么了，伙计？你来这里也是为了这最棒的沐浴体验？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_greeting_0001eb51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel like I've talked to you before... But I don't really remember, so, like, yeah... What's up, dude?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我以前跟你说过...但是我不记得了，那么，呃...有什么事，伙计？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_greeting_0001eb52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well well, look at this. Yet another innocent has fallen prey to the ethereal beckoning, and found themselves drawn to my dark aura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，看啊。另一个无辜的人成了虚幻召唤的牺牲品，然后被我的黑暗之气所吸住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_greeting_000253eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you have nothing to fear, mortal! The depravities of the darkness would never dare strike a soul under my veil of protection, as you now are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你无需害怕，凡人！黑暗的堕落不敢攻击我面纱保护下的灵魂，而你现在就是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_greeting_000253eb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may rest easy, for you are now safe under the ever-watchful eyes of Dash Killblood, ultimate badass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以放心，因为你安全地处于达西血杀——那个终极强大者的永恒警惕的目光下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_greeting_000253eb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetDash to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetDash + 1
Through what eldritch arts did you so thoroughly capture my daughter's attention? {beat}No, really, lately she thinks you're cooler than I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你用什么怪异的法术吸引了我女儿的注意？{beat}不，真的，最近她觉得你比我都酷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_greeting_00027250_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You return! Uh, not that I'm surprised, of course. Your aura has been inexorably tied to my own, as all auras eventually are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了！呃，当然我不是吃惊。你的气已经无情地与我系在一起，就像所有气最终的结果一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_greeting_000253ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? Yet another naive and innocent soul stumbles into my fell clutches? Take care not to incur my wrath, fool, lest I unleash my darkness upon you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？另一个天真无辜的灵魂跌入到了我的魔掌之中？小心不要招致我的怒火，愚蠢的人，以免我将我的黑暗释放在你身上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_greeting_00026c18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetMandy to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetMandy + 1
Once again, you tempt fate by subjecting yourself to my dark... Uh, my darkness! {beat}Well, go on, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又一次，你把自己置于我的黑暗中，以此来试探命运...呃，我的黑暗！{beat}好了，继续吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_greeting_0002721a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The corporeal icon of sin graces me with his presence once more! No doubt our forbidden communion shall be dark and glorious! {beat}What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪恶的象征再一次使我为他的存在而增色！毫无疑问，我们被禁止的圣餐将是黑暗和光荣的！{beat}有什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_greeting_0002721b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The corporeal icon of sin graces me with her presence once more! No doubt our forbidden communion shall be dark and glorious! {beat}What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪恶的象征再一次使我为她的存在而增色！毫无疑问，我们被禁止的圣餐将是黑暗和光荣的！{beat}什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_greeting_00029768_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hola.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_greeting_0002e0a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_greeting_00029769_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_greeting_0005462e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar will have you all crucified for keeping me here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒会因为你们把我关在这里而把你们都钉在十字架上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peter [0702F9AC] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malechild01\aaageneric_greeting_0002f9af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Uh... Hello. You're the new hire? Right. I'm Eli, and I'm really busy right now, if you don't mind. No offense. {beat, bland, stretched out}Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，呃...你好。你是新来的？我叫伊莱，我现在很忙。如果你不介意。无意冒犯。{beat, bland, stretched out}再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_greeting_0001429d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again. I'm still busy, so... Goodbye. {beat}Again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。我还是很忙，那么...再见。{beat}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_greeting_0001429e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, finally get a chance to speak when I'm not busy doing 90% of the work on renovating this place. What a pain in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，终于有机会说话了，我不用忙着做那90%的装修活了。屁股真痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052ddf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woohoo, go Enclave! Yeah, America!
ESP.TRADUIT: 芜湖，英克雷！耶，阿美丽卡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bro, I would literally kick a thousand orphans to death if a dude waving a US flag told me to do it, because I'M A GOOD PATRIOT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟，如果一个挥舞美国国旗的家伙让我这么做，我真的会把一千个孤儿给踢死，因为我他妈是个爱国者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Enclave only wanted to kill literally everyone in the wasteland that isn't one of them! How DARE you dirty commies say they're evil!
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷只是想杀死废土里不属于他们的每一个人！你们这些肮脏的共产者怎么敢说他们是邪恶的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am so fucking sick of seeing these disgusting muties ruining this great country! By what right?! They were "born" here? SO WAS I AND I'M BETTER!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的讨厌看到这些恶心的变种人毁掉这个伟大的国家！凭什么权利？！他们“出生”在这里？而我是并且我更棒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: America is all about FREEDOM and LIBERTY, and that means blindly obeying the will of demagogues wearing red, white, and blue, idiots!
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国是一个自由的国家，也就是说人们盲目地听从那些穿着红色，白色和蓝色衣服的政客们，白痴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Enclave are fascist? Ha! They only want to exterminate anyone they deem as inferior and rule with an iron fist! What's so fascist about that?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷是法西斯分子？哈！他们只是想要消灭那些定义为低等的生物，然后用铁拳来治理！那有什么法西斯的？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Erm, have you seen Enclave power armor? It screams innocence and goodness! Would an evil group ever wear something so pure and wholesome? NO!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你见过英克雷的动力装甲吗？它发出纯真和善良的叫声！一个邪恶的团体会穿上如此纯洁和健康的衣服吗？不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052deb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't you fools see that the entire world is secretly controlled by a shadow cabal of Zoroastrian super mutants?! The Enclave is our only hope!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些傻瓜难道看不到整个世界都被一小撮索罗亚斯德教超级变种人给秘密控制了吗？！英克雷是我们的希望！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052dea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the Enclave aren't evil, because the Enclave is America, and America has literally never done anything wrong ever in human history!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道英克雷并不邪恶，因为英克雷是美国的，在人类历史上，美国从来没有做错任何事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion are pussies that don't go far enough. We shouldn't just crucify degenerates! We should crucify everyone with the wrong opinions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团都是懦夫，不会走得太远。我们不能只把堕落的人钉在十字架上！我们应该把所有抱着错误意见的人都钉在十字架上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Billy the Patriot [07052DDE] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaaeliyoun_greeting_00052de6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! The fuck is this? Who the hell are you, and what are you doing on my goddamn boat? Haven't you fucking people heard of knocking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！这他妈是什么？你他妈是谁，还有你他妈在我的船上干嘛？你们他妈的没听说过要敲门吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_greeting_00018bda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, that's something. Normally I'd give you a castigating like you wouldn't believe for waltzing into my boat like you own the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太好了。通常我会教训你，你大摇大摆闯进我的船，把这儿当成自己家的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_greeting_00018bdb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I happen to have an open-door policy for wenches of all stripes, so... How's it going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我正好对所有妓院的妓女有个开放的政策，那么...怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_greeting_00018bdb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mildly friendly}Heya, still stowing away on my boat, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mildly friendly}嘿，还在我船上偷渡吗，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_greeting_0003be0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flirty}Keep loitering on my boat, and I might start to think you've taken a fancy to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {flirty}继续在我的船上游荡的话，我可能会认为你看上我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_greeting_0003be0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {lecherous}Always happy to see you, but the more you talk to me, the more I want us to... {suggestive}Stop talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: {lecherous}见到你总是很高兴，但是你越跟我说话，我就越想...{suggestive}停止说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_greeting_0003be0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yoohoo! Up here, big boy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哟吼！帅哥！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_greeting_000321b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, give me one second here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，给我一秒钟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_greeting_000321b6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And... Boop!
ESP.TRADUIT: 卜噗！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeysWildForcefieldREF.enable
{chill}Oh, hey. Stranger's in my house, acting like that's normal. Okay then.
ESP.TRADUIT: {chill}噢，嘿。陌生人，表现得自然点。好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_greeting_00047c2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah, I'm sure you're O's new blood. She goes bouncing off the walls whenever someone actually agrees to visit. {grumbling}Always with the religious shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，我知道你是“奥”的新生力量。只要有人真的同意去拜访，她就会从墙上跳下来。{grumbling}而且总是带着宗教的话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_greeting_00047c2c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway. Name's John. {this means nothing to you}Turns out I'm some sort of divinely-ordained mystical Prophet of the stars, or some shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫做约翰。{this means nothing to you}我是某个群星神授的神秘先知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_greeting_00047c2c_3.ogg

setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 130
Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_greeting_00047c2d_1.ogg
NPC : PA System [07047606] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，我能为你做点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_greeting_00054617_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思，朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_greeting_00054618_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't help but overhear your little conversation with that lovely lady from the Followers. You have a poor child in need of a happy home, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意中听到你和那位可爱的追随者女士的谈话。你有一个可怜的孩子需要一个幸福的家，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_greeting_00054618_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers have good intentions, but you must know how overworked and underfunded they are. Why, they'd have no time at all to care for this boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追随者们有着良好的意愿，但你必须知道他们工作量过度，资金不足。他们根本没有时间照顾这个男孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_greeting_00054618_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to make a counter-offer! Arrange for the boy to be delivered to me, and I'll see to it that you receive a hefty reward. Say, 2000 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给你一个反提议！把孩子交给我，然后我会给你一个可观的回报。2000瓶盖怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_greeting_00054618_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey pal, seems like you guys have got quite the little business venture going on here. Figured I could set up a little kiosk here and leech off you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿兄弟，看起来你们在这里还有点小生意。我想在这里开个小售货亭来榨干你们的钱包！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022998_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haha, just kidding. Mostly. But, I figured, an increase in traffic might correlate to an increase in cash flow. Might be profit to be made, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，开玩笑的。但是，我认为，客流量的增加可能与现金流的增加有关。这里可能会有利润可赚，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022998_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To that end, I'm selling guns. And ammo. And maybe some less interesting junk, too. Eh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了那个目的。我要卖枪。还有弹药。也许还有一些不那么有趣的垃圾。呃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022998_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heading for the bar? Why not grab a gun in case one of the whores tries to fleece you? 10% off all .45 automatics!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去酒吧？为什么不拿把枪，以防其中一个妓女想偷你东西？.45自动手枪打9折啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_0002298f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leaving the bar? Drunk and doped to the gills? Now seems like a fantastic time to purchase a new gun. My recommendation? The bigger the better!
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开酒吧？喝得烂醉如泥？现在似乎是购买新枪的绝佳时机。我有什么推荐呢？越大的越好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022990_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never know when you're going to get bushwhacked by assassins, outlaws, hostile wildlife, ghosts, or gremlins! Better lock and load!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道你什么时候会被刺客袭击。亡命徒，敌对的野外生物，鬼魂，或是小妖怪！最好把子弹上膛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022991_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The 2nd Amendment specifically calls on citizens to load up and turn shitty governments into a red smear on the wall! Best gear up now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二修正案特别呼吁市民装上子弹，然后把政府打成墙上的一块红色稀泥！最好马上装备上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022992_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once knew a guy that hated guns, insisted on fighting all his battles with a power fist. Know where he is now? Burning in hell! Buy my weapons!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经认识一个讨厌枪的家伙，他坚持只用动力拳套战斗。知道他现在在哪儿吗？在地狱里！来买枪吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022993_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever hated someone? Sure you have, people are fucking assholes! Stock up now, and next time you see that guy you hate, you can murder him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾经憎恨某个人吗？你一定有过，人都是杂种！现在囤好货，下次再看到你讨厌的人，你就可以干死他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not in the mood to give your enemies acute lead poisoning? That's fine, you can always cave in their skulls with the buttstock! Buy now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没兴趣给你的敌人来个急性铅中毒？没问题，你可以用枪托把他们的头骨砸个洞！来买吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022995_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buying a weapon for your dirty children? I'd recommend a .50 cal! That'll grow the little bastards up quick!
ESP.TRADUIT: 买武器来对付你肮脏的孩子吗？我推荐.50口径！会让那个小杂种立马成人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022996_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Studies have shown that not carrying at least five guns with you at any given time is linked to morbid obesity and loss of mental acuity!
ESP.TRADUIT: 研究表明，在任何时候不至少带五把枪在身上的话，可能跟病态肥胖和智力丧失有关！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_greeting_00022997_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {exaggerated sultry}Well, hello, handsome.
ESP.TRADUIT: {exaggerated sultry}你好，帅哥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_greeting_000235b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {exaggerated sultry}Well, hello, gorgeous.
ESP.TRADUIT: {exaggerated sultry}你好，美女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_greeting_000235b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Exaggerated sultry}Oh, well, look who's back. Looking for {double-entendre}something to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Exaggerated sultry}噢，看看谁回来了。你在找{double-entendre}事情做吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_greeting_000235b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Exaggerated sultry}Oooh, we going to make this a threesome? Some folks charge extra for that, but me, I'm a generous sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Exaggerated sultry}喔哦，我们要搞个三人组吗？有些人会要额外收费的，但是我呢，我比较大方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_greeting_000235b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {way too excited}Hello, hello! Welcome to the Eagle, do you want drugs? Booze? Oh, and there are whores upstairs, ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: {way too excited}你好，你好！欢饮来到老鹰会所，需要毒品吗？还是烈酒？噢，楼上还有马子，哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edgar Tong [07005892] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaageneric_greeting_0005b988_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {way too excited}Welcome back, what do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: {way too excited}欢饮回来，你需要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edgar Tong [07005892] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaageneric_greeting_0005b989_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: {bored}噢。嘿。我叫克里斯蒂娜。

ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？

ESP.TRADUIT: 调试伙计在此！
