ESP.ORIGINAL: {preaching}Yes, greetings and salutations to any and all truth-seekers and children of the stars! I stand before you to share tidings of joy!
ESP.TRADUIT: {preaching}是的，向所有真相追寻者和群星之子致以问候和敬礼！我站在你面前分享喜悦的消息！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0003d035_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The astral truth of the universe lies before you, and yet unless your eyes are opened to the wisdom of the stars, this truth shall ever elude you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 宇宙的星体真相就在你的面前，然而，除非你睁开眼睛仰望群星的智慧，否则真相就会从你身边溜走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0003d035_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But do not give in to despair, brave wanderers! All you need to do is take my hand as I journey back to the waiting family of astral enlightenment!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但不要向绝望屈服，勇敢的游荡者！你只要牵着我的手，回到等待着我们的星体启迪的家庭中！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0003d035_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {noticing a specific audience member}Oh my! You there, your aura shines and glitters like a star that has touched down on the earthly plane! Come here, friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: {noticing a specific audience member}天啊！你，你的气像星星一样闪闪发光降临到地球上！过来，朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0003d035_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {preaching}Each and every one of us has our destiny written across the heavens, in the shining typography of the stars themselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: {preaching}我们每个人的命运都写在天上，在群星自己闪亮的面上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_00043de7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salutations, astral brother! It's my pleasure to welcome you to our community of celestial truth-seekers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 向你致意，星体兄弟！很高兴欢迎您来到我们的天体真相追寻者社区！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_00043dea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt you're eager to explore this refuge, but I would recommend you make your first stop at the home of our Prophet and introduce yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问你很想探索这个庇护所，但我建议你先去我们先知的家，然后向他介绍你自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_00043dea_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 120
Salutations, astral sister! It's my pleasure to welcome you to our community of celestial truth-seekers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 向你致意，星体姐妹! 很高兴欢迎您来到我们的天体真相追寻者社区！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_00043deb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt you're eager to explore this refuge, but I would recommend you make your first stop at the home of our Prophet and introduce yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问你很想探索这个庇护所，但我建议你先去我们先知的家，然后向他介绍你自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_00043deb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 120
I don't know about you, but I'm always happy to get out of that desert... And less happy about shoveling sand out of my pockets, but such is life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你，但我总是很高兴走出沙漠...而且不太乐意从口袋里铲沙子，但这就是命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f6d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the more important thing is that you've successfully expanded your mind to allow the light and wisdom of the stars to shine into your head!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但更重要的是，你已经成功地扩展了你的思想，让群星的光芒和智慧照进你的大脑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f6d6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! You're now one large step closer to reaching the astral peak of enlightenment! {quiet, kind of lame}Yay!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝贺你！你现在离到达启迪者的星界高峰又近了一大步！{quiet, kind of lame}耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f6d6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Uh, enjoy it, I guess. {beat, awkward}We... don't really have, like... Cool members-only jackets or tattoos or anything like that. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...呃，请享用吧。{beat, awkward}我们...真的没有，什么...炫酷的会员夹克或者刺青还是别的什么的。不好意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f6d6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest 80 1
setstage aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest 90
Astral greetings, friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 群星问候你，朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_00044b5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crazy how all of this fits inside your skull, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脑袋里怎么会有这么多东西，你不认为吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Terminal [0704E362] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004e364_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest 50
Hey, don't look at me. I'm just a computer in outer space. You're the one who got us into this mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，别看我。窝只是外天空的一台电脑。是你把我们弄得一团糟的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Terminal [0704E362] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f095_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {chill}Oh, hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: {chill}噢，嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_0004f0a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, here we are, no worse for wear. I hope. {beat, cheerful}Anyway, are you ready to undertake the ritual?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我们到了，没有筋疲力尽吧。我希望。{beat, cheerful}你准备好接受仪式了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f0bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've prepared a glass of the mind-opening ceremonial... stuff. {under your breath}Which is desperately in need of a proper name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备了一杯思想开启仪式的...物质。{under your breath}它还差一个合适的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f0bc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you need to do now is drink, and close your eyes. {beat}Or you can have a snack first. Up to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在只需要喝下它，然后闭上眼睛。{beat}或者你可以先小睡一下。由你决定！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f0bc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, excellent. You're awake and not obviously deranged. {cheerful}That's always ideal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太好了。你醒了，而且没有明显的精神错乱。{cheerful}总是这么理想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f0bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would be wildly inappropriate of me to pry into whatever astral wisdom you may have gleaned on your journey, so I won't be doing that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太合适窥探任何你可能在旅途中有所收获的星体智慧，所以我不会那么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f0bd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful}So, in lieu of astral secrets, instead I'll ask if you saw anything else that was interesting!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}那么，除了群星的秘密，我想问你有没有看到其他有趣的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_greeting_0004f0bd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doing the right thing... What does that mean? Making people happy? The ones doing wrong... Are they happy? Are they {emph}wrong? Who decides that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 做正确的事情...那是什么意思？让人们开心？做了错事的人...他们开心吗？他们{emph}错了吗？谁决定的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hallucination [070333CA] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_00058ed6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The people that you help... Are they your friends? Is that why you help them? I wonder... Do they consider you a friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮助的那些人...是你的朋友吗？那就是你帮助他们的原因吗？我怀疑...他们把你当做朋友吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hallucination [070333CA] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_00058ed7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could make everybody happy, but you could never have it for yourself... I wonder, would that be a good life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能让每个人都开心，但你自己从来没有开心过...我怀疑，那会是个好的生活吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hallucination [070333CA] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_00058ed8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you gave up whatever makes you you, what would be left? What would it look like? Who are you, really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你放弃了使你成为你的一切，还有什么能剩下？它会是什么样子？你又到底是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hallucination [070333CA] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_00058ed9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder... The choices you've made... Were they right? Did you ever really have a choice in the first place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑...你做的选择...是对的吗？你从一开始真的有选择吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hallucination [070333CA] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_00058edb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you look like? Not your face... A person is more than their face... Aren't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的外表是怎样的？不是指你的脸...一个人并不只有脸...不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hallucination [070333CA] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_00058edd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could force everyone to be happy... Would that be right? ...Would it even be real happiness?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能强迫每个人都快乐...那是对的吗？...那是真正的快乐吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hallucination [070333CA] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_00058edc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you ever wonder if you're a good person? The people you kill... Do {emph}they ever wonder if they're good people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是否怀疑过自己不是个好人？你杀的那些人...{emph}他们是否怀疑过自己其实是好人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hallucination [070333CA] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_greeting_00058ed5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, hey! Who are you? You cain't just come barging into a man's house all uninvited! Go on, get!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，嘿！你是谁？你不能在没有邀请的情况下闯进一个人的房子！出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_greeting_0003696c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you to get out! Goddamn it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你滚出去！该死的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_greeting_0003696d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
...Why are you still here? You can go now. {beat}No, really, get the fuck out. Thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你怎么还在这？你现在可以走了。{beat}不，真的，滚出去。谢谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_greeting_00036980_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey man, want to buy a bucket? {sing song}Lightly used!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，想买个大桶吗？{sing song}轻微使用过的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_greeting_00050f92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyone want to buy a bucket? No holes in it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人想买桶吗？完好的桶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_greeting_00050f93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How dare you address me, peasant. Begone, I have no charity for your sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么敢跟我说话，农民。滚开，我对你们这种人没有好感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_greeting_00051ba1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, my favorite person is still here. Hello, favorite person. Please don't hurt me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我最喜欢的人还在这里啊。你好，最爱的人。请不要伤害我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_greeting_00051bae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_greeting_00051bba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well hey baby, what can I do fo- {disappointed/annoyed}Oh. You're not one of the workers. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿宝贝，我能为——{disappointed/annoyed}哦。你不是工作者。你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_greeting_000387b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heya baby, looking for... {mildly confused}Wait, who're you supposed to be? {beat}Eh, new worker, traveler, whatever. I'm sure your money spends the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀宝贝，想找...{mildly confused}等一下，你到底是谁？{beat}呃，新工作者，旅行者，随便。我相信你也是花钱干一样的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_greeting_000387b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {casual}Heya, anything happening?
ESP.TRADUIT: {casual}嘿，有什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_greeting_000387b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I said, I'll head for Primm once you guys actually have a business running. Until then, I'll just be hanging out behind this dusty shack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说的，一旦你们生意开张了我就会去普瑞姆的。在那之前，我还会在这个棚屋后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_greeting_000387b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, this place ain't as bad I was expecting, meaning... Your job offer wasn't total bullshit. Nice change of pace, I'll tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方没我想象的那么糟，也就是说...你提供的工作并不是胡说的。我会说这是个不错的变化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_greeting_000387b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if it isn't my favorite sub-contracted pimp. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，这不是我最喜欢的分包商皮条客吗。怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_greeting_000387b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, why, hello there. You must be the one helping Silas with all the tedious minutiae of establishing a business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你好啊。你一定是那个帮助塞格拉斯处理所有繁琐事情建立企业的人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_greeting_00036f83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance. Please, call me Molly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴认识你。请叫我莫莉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_greeting_00036f83_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请问你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_greeting_00036f84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe some gratitude is in order, and I do hope Silas has been compensating you appropriately. This business already seems quite promising, no?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想表达一些感激之情，我希望塞格拉斯一定给了你适当的补偿。这项生意似乎已经很有前途了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_greeting_00036f85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been making money hand over fist, and while I understand you were working on commission, I feel it wouldn't be untoward to give you a bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经赚到了大钱，而我知道你只是在拿佣金，我觉得给你奖金也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_greeting_00036f85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider it a gift from the management, if we pretend the management isn't a cantankerous drunkard with a short temper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它看作是管理层的礼物，我们姑且假装管理层不是个脾气暴躁古怪的酒鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_greeting_00036f85_3.ogg

A pleasure to see you again. Is there anything I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴再次见到你。我能为你做点什么吗？

ESP.TRADUIT: {suspicious, you don't like strangers}你到底要干吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hey, there you are. Wasn't sure I'd see you again. Well, looks like I managed to drag our asses out here after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，嘿，你在这里。我不确定还能再见到你。看来我成功把我们都带到这里来了。

ESP.TRADUIT: {arrogant}呃，听着菜鸟，这里的人都叫我浮油，从现在起你要听我的。工作努力点，我可能会给你说点好话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've come to Primm in the hope of establishing a den of vice and debauchery, with the end goal of rolling in the fucking profits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来普瑞姆是想建立一个邪恶又淫乱的会所，最终目标是让财富都滚滚而来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebho_0000663d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My arrival was ill-timed, what with those convict cunts running roughshod over the citizenry. But, they've been dispatched, and life can resume anew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来得不是时候，正好碰上那群王八蛋罪犯欺压市民们。但很快他们就被干掉了，生活终于可以重新继续了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebho_0000663d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose for a start, I'll need to start rounding my people up. Whores, chem suppliers, an ocean of liquor... It's always something, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要开始了，我得开始召集我的人了。妓女，毒品，还有海量的酒...我想这些东西任何时候总是有需求的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebho_0000663d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hospitality?
ESP.TRADUIT: 酒店？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebBackground
For brevity's sake, I'll skip the ponderous details, and I'll take your blank expression as silent gratitude for my consideration of your time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了简洁起见，我会略去那些乏味的细节，而我就把你现在的面无表情当做对我节约时间考虑的默认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebba_00006656_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent a few years working as a mercenary, which was unfulfilling, and not particularly profitable. When that work brought me here, I quit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当过几年雇佣兵，这行既不让人称心也不是特别有利可图。当我因工作来到这里时，我就辞职不干了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebba_00006656_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I rolled into Primm the fucking week before those slack-jawed cocksuckers at the prison saw fit to hand out explosives to their prisoners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进入普瑞姆的时候，刚好是那些监狱里的王八蛋把炸弹分发给他们的囚犯的前一周。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebba_00006656_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, that's been cleanly resolved, as near as I can tell, so enough grousing about the bullshit of the past. It's the future that interests me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但，尽我所知那事已经完全解决了，抱怨过去的屁话也不说了。我现在只对将来感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebba_00006656_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的故事是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebWhyPrimm
Why the fuck not? The fact that you feel it necessary to ask that gives me comfort and confidence that I won't be suffering competition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他妈的不能？就凭你觉得有必要问这个问题，反而让我很有信心不会遭遇任何的竞争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebwh_00006658_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Vegas proper is flooded with chems, liquor, and whores. To throw my hat in the ring would be financially suicidal. I want a fucking monopoly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯里面到处都是毒品，酒和马子。把我的帽子扔进拳击场从经济上来看等于是自杀。我要的是他妈的垄断的生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebwh_00006658_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Primm allows for some small bit of gambling and food options, but where are all the facilities where men of low character have their vices satiated?
ESP.TRADUIT: 普瑞姆允许一些赌博和食物的经营，那品行低劣的人到哪里去满足他们的邪欲呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebwh_00006658_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If anyone in the vicinity yearns for booze, drugs, or a rendezvous with an accommodating set of tits, they'll have no choice but to turn to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果附近的人渴望酒精，毒品，或者想打一炮, 他们只能找我，没别的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebwh_00006658_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, you'll note Primm's proximity to the Mojave Outpost; the pearly fucking gates out of the Republic, and into this rich and untamed frontier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，你会注意到普瑞姆临近莫哈维前哨站，共和国通过那宝贵的大门，进入这片富饶而未驯服的边境。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebwh_00006658_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meaning: I'll fleece the cocksuckers as they traipse to Vegas from their stifling pissant nation, and then again on their dejected journey back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 意味着：当那些人从他们那令人窒息又无足重轻的共和国去往维加斯的路上，我可以好好地敲他们一竹杠，而在他们垂头丧气回家时我还能敲他们一笔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebwh_00006658_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, if I do a good enough job the first time around, they may not even wish to head further north than my establishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，如果我第一次来就把工作做得足够好的话，他们甚至可能到了这都不再想往北去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebwh_00006658_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you want to set up some kind of brothel? Why in Primm, of all places?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你想要开个妓院？为什么偏偏要在普瑞姆开？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebCynicism
Sir, I'm attempting to establish a profitable fucking business in a post-apocalyptic war zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先生，我可是在这个末日般的战区里面，想经营一个他妈的赚钱的生意啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebcy_0000665a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That being the case, I think a degree of cynicism is not only warranted, I'd go so far as to say it's a goddamn necessity in this line of work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然这样，我想一点程度的见利忘义并不只是恰当而已，在这一行里，我他妈的觉得更应该是必要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebcy_0000665a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a pretty cynical way of looking at things, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可真是一个见利忘义的看法，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma'am, I'm attempting to establish a profitable fucking business in a post-apocalyptic war zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士，我可是在这个末日般的战区里面，想经营一个他妈的赚钱的生意啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebcy_0000665b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That being the case, I think a degree of cynicism is not only warranted, I'd go so far as to say it's a goddamn necessity in this line of work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然这样，我想一点程度的见利忘义并不只是恰当而已，在这一行里，我他妈的觉得更应该是必要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebcy_0000665b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a pretty cynical way of looking at things, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可真是一个见利忘义的看法，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebCynicism2
At the risk of patting myself on the back so hard that I strain my fucking wrist, yes. Yes, I'm rather proud of my little business venture here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我冒着把自己手腕扭断的风险来拍自己的背。是的，我对在这里的风险创业相当的自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebcy_0000665d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, at least proud of the fucking idea, lacking a functioning business to my name at this particular moment in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，至少为这他妈的主意自豪，在这个特殊的时刻，我名义上缺乏一个有效的业务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebcy_0000665d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like a good plan. It seems like you've put a lot of thought into this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不错啊。看起来你真是经过了深思熟虑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrateCrewBark
Ay! That muhfucker's tryin' tamper with our fuckin' crate! Crate Crew, time to play!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！那个狗娘养的想动他妈我们的箱子！搬箱帮，我们上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07007272] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_aaacratecrewbar_00007275_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStartQuest
I suppose you could come in handy. The more assistance the better, I say. Assuming the assistance isn't fucking inbred, which I trust you're not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你能派的上用处。我想援助越多越好。假设援助并不是天上掉下来的，我相信你也不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000727c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to be renovating one of Primm's unseemlier ruined storefronts, but before that can happen, I need building materials.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要翻修普瑞姆一个被毁坏的商店门面，但在做之前，我需要建筑材料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000727c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard tell of an old-world construction site, up the road from Novac, that may well have the materials I require. I'll have you check it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经听说一个战前的建筑工地，就沿着去诺瓦克的公路上，那里应该有相当多我需要的材料。我想让你去看一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000727c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go there, see if there's anything useful. If my source is correct, there should be a big shipping crate, full of lumber, just sitting out in the open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去那里，看看有什么有用的东西。如果我的消息准确的话，那里应该有个很大的集装箱，全是木材，就放在外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000727c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's true, slap this beacon on it, and I'll send my associate, Eli, to retrieve it for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果没错的话，把这个发射器放到它上面，我就会派出我的助手，伊莱，来帮我拿回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000727c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much obliged, {cheery}now please get the fucking lead out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是不胜感激，{cheery}现在请快他妈的滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000727c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 10
Could I help with anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮上什么忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebNoGambling
Eh, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First off, gambling is the one vice that Primm already enables. Competition breeds resentment, and a full-scale casino would be a great deal of work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，普瑞姆已经有赌场营业了。竞争会产生怨恨，而且一座完善的赌场实在需要太多的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, I harbor an acute loathing of those cheating grifters that run that filthy operation. Smug little shits, the fucking lot of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我十分厌恶那些作弊的骗子做的那些肮脏的动作。他们很多人都是些自命不凡的逼货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I played, that smirking cunt flipping the cards pulled a 21 on me the very first fucking hand. And then the second. Third. Fucking forth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后玩牌的那次，那个自鸣得意的人渣第一手牌就翻出一个21点。然后第二次。第三次。又他妈的第四次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On his fifth consecutive "perfect hand" I surpassed my tolerance for bullshit, and so I introduced his dick to a .44 slug. Cheating cocksucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他第五手连续拿到“一手好牌”时，我忍无可忍，给他的老二来了一发.44子弹。作弊的烂逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whores, chems, and liquor... What about gambling? Seems like a proven money-maker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女，毒品，酒...那赌博呢？那可是个来钱的好路子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebNoGambling2
{dry amusement}I disagree. If anything, I believe I was quite lenient with that smirking fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dry amusement}我不同意。正好相反，我觉得我太便宜那个人渣了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, across the entirety of the wasteland, it's generally accepted that the proper response to robbery is to kill the thief where he stands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，纵观整个废土，通常被接受的做法是，看到抢劫犯就直接打死他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That motherfucker was running a rigged game at my fucking expense. Letting him off with just a castration is an act of mercy, I say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个狗逼操纵牌局想坑我的钱。要我说，只让他变成太监都算是仁慈的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That seems a little... Excessive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那看起来有点...过分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebNoGambling3
Well, all that tells me is that the pair of us have a strong sense of fucking justice and righteousness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这说明我俩都具有他妈的公平和正义之心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_00008aa9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough. I can't say I wouldn't do something similar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有道理。要是我的话也可能会这样做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebNoGambleLuck
A fine idea, and I'll drink to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好主意，我要为它干一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_0000a3e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem whiskey 1
Uh, for the sake of my genitalia, let's agree to never play cards together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，看在我老二的份上，我们以后千万别一起玩牌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Learn to mark your fucking cards, you can be just as "lucky" as that cockless jackass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 学会给你的牌做好记号，你就会像那个太监一样的“幸运”了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebno_0000a3ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I was that lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我有那么幸运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickBackground
Was. Not anymore. I deserted, ran away, like a coward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经是的。但现在不是了。我当了逃兵，像个懦夫一样逃跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_0000cbda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was trying to book a caravan to take me to New Canaan. Ran into John before that could happen. He convinced me to come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来尝试预约一个篷车商队带我去新迦南。结果去之前碰到了约翰。他说服我来了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_0000cbda_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said "country" is just a concept that wasn't worth anybody's lives. I don't know if that's true or not. I just want to forget the past, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说“国家”只不过是一个概念，不值得任何人为之牺牲。我不知道这是真的还是假的。我只不过是想忘记过去，没别的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_0000cbda_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like you're an NCR soldier. What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像个NCR士兵。你在这里做什么

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickBackground2
The war. All of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争。所有的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_0000cbdc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed people, almost died myself, seen my friends get butchered... For what? The Mojave? We have our own home, we don't need another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了很多人，自己差点死了，也看见我的朋友们被屠杀...这都是为了什么？为了莫哈维吗？我们有自己的家园，我们不需要再多一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_0000cbdc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you trying to forget?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想忘记什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebPersonalQuestions
Answering questions is thirsty work, friend, and seeing as how I'm stone-fucking-sober at the moment, I don't have the constitution to speak further.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回答问题是个让人口渴的事情，朋友，所以我在这一直都他妈清醒得一逼，我可没有体力再讲更多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebpe_0000f6c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you some questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你些问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not overly fond of the sound of my own voice, but seeing as how I've surrounded myself with enough liquor to drown a Deathclaw... fine. Ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不十分喜欢我自己的声音，但看在我周围的酒都能把死亡爪灌倒的份上...好吧。问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebpe_0000f6c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you some questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你些问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQWhereFrom
New Reno, born and bred. Not {emph in}inbred, mind you; I harbor no affiliation with the Wright family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新里诺，我从小在那里长大。并不是{emph in}寄养的，提醒你一下。我和怀特家族并没有附属关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqw_0000f6cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent my childhood days doing bitchwork for the Bishop family. Delivering messages, keeping an ear ever to the ground, that sort of thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的童年时光都在帮比希家族干烂活。传递消息，随时留意风吹草动等，诸如此类的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqw_0000f6cb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was sufficient money for someone my age, but I had no interest in truly joining their family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我那个年纪的人来说，这些钱足够花了, 但我没兴趣真的要加入他们家族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqw_0000f6cb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swaggering around in a suit and acting untouchable is appealing to men of small intellect and smaller johnsons, but I don't like answering to anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿着西装大摇大摆，不可冒犯的感觉只能吸引那些头脑简单的人，但我可不想听任何人的命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqw_0000f6cb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was 24, I reached the limits of my patience, and so I booked passage into Oregon to work as a mercenary, and never looked back. Fuck Reno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我24岁时，我的忍耐达到了极限，我找到一条路子到俄勒冈州当一名雇佣兵，再也没回过头。去他妈的新里诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqw_0000f6cb_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQMerc
Correcto, amigo. Up in Oregon, or what was Oregon back when such distinctions mattered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，朋友。是想好了去俄勒冈州做的，跟随便干干是有区别的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0000f6cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mercenary work up there was rather different than the patchwork soldiers-of-fucking-fortune you see slithering around the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里做的佣兵工作，可是跟莫哈维那些怀着狗屁使命的士兵干的针线活完全不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0000f6cd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I worked NCR territory that had long since been pacified. We'd run into the occasional pack of ferals, hostile tribals, and handfuls of highwaymen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在NCR的地盘工作，那里早就被镇压平息过了。我们偶尔会碰到一群狂尸鬼，敌对的部落还有少量的拦路强盗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0000f6cd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mostly our work consisted of clearing out old ruins, caves, and even a few bunkers if we were having an {sarcasm}exciting day. Nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们大多数的工作包括清理旧废墟、洞穴，甚至可能还会有一些地堡，前提是我们有个{sarcasm}令人兴奋的一天。其他就没了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0000f6cd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The pay was acceptable, and one of my comrades-in-arms had herself a fine rack and a remarkable libido, both of which I tested quite thoroughly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 薪水还算过得去，而且我的一个战友还给她自己买了一个不错支架和非常棒的阳具，那两样东西我都非常彻底地试用过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0000f6cd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it wasn't fulfilling, and worse, it didn't pay enough to justify the pain-in-the-ass of hauling around all that equipment every fucking day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是它没法让人满足，甚至更烂，每天他妈的都要把那个设备拖来拖去弄得屁眼生痛，根本没有充分的理由这么干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0000f6cd_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw, and experienced, how the majority of our funds ended up in the coffers of barkeeps, chem-pushers, and two-bit pimps after a hard day's work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看过，也经历过，在一天辛苦的工作后，我们大量的钱流进酒吧老板，毒品贩子，还有皮条客的腰包。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0000f6cd_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so, I decided that I would make more money with less hassle, if I were to simply step into those roles myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我决定要花最小的力气赚更多的钱，是不是我只要自己当那些角色就可以了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0000f6cd_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you were a mercenary at one point?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你曾经干过一段时间的雇佣兵？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepTwo
Now that's a fine attitude to take. The next step is to build up eager anticipation for the eventual grand opening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个态度还不错。下一步就是建立公众对最后盛大开业的热切期待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000f6d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already gone about formulating a quick and dirty two-step plan that you'll be facilitating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经制定了一个快速而简略的两步计划方案，来使你方便实施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000f6d1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step one, accrue good will by performing a service for the greater Mojave community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一步，通过为莫哈维社区提供服务来积累良好的口碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000f6d1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step two, enlist an unbiased third party to spread word of the soon-to-be-thriving business right here in good old goddamn Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二步，争取让一个公正的第三方来传播信息，说这个马上会火起来的生意就要在可爱的普瑞姆开业了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000f6d1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，接下来干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepTwoAlt
{flat}Do you see a fucking house of titties and liquor suddenly open for business here? Of course we're not fucking done yet. Good lord.
ESP.TRADUIT: {flat}你看见一个满是马子和酒的房子突然他妈开业了吗？我们当然还他妈没做完呢。老天爷啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000f6d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already gone about formulating a quick and dirty two-step plan that you'll be facilitating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经制定了一个快速而简略的两步计划方案，来使你方便实施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000f6d0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step one, accrue good will by performing a service for the greater Mojave community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一步，通过为莫哈维社区提供服务来积累良好的口碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000f6d0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step two, enlist an unbiased third party to spread word of the soon-to-be-thriving business right here in good old goddamn Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二步，争取让一个公正的第三方来传播信息，说这个马上会火起来的生意就要在可爱的普瑞姆开业了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0000f6d0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Are we done, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...我们都完成了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQPrimmLaw
While not yet, strictly speaking, part of the NCR, Primm is nonetheless treated as one of their far-flung frontier towns. Thanks to you, apparently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然还没，但严格来讲，一部分是因为NCR, 普瑞姆还是被NCR作为他们遥远边疆的一个城镇来对待。这显然得感谢你的功劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't much care for the NCR. I don't need anybody dictating how I live my life, and demanding a share of my fucking earnings in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太在乎NCR。我不需要别人来决定我该怎么生活，而且还要从我他妈的收入里面拿走一部分上交。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suddenly cheerful}And I couldn't be happier that you handed this town to them, silver fucking platter and all.
ESP.TRADUIT: {suddenly cheerful}你能把这个镇交给他们来管，我再高兴不过了，全部都他妈举手奉上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any idea how much extra business I receive from those poor troopers, so cruelly deprived of booze and pussy by their commanders?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我从那些可怜的士兵身上收获了多少额外的生意吗？他们的长官如此残酷地剥夺了他们对酒和女人的渴求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they manage to win the Dam, I do expect they'll assfuck my chemistry business, but... The added revenue may well make up for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们赢得了大坝，我想他们会操了我的毒品生意，但...增加的收入很可能会弥补这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, I could try and emulate my old employers in the Bishop family, and see if I can't work out some shady, under-the-table deal to grant me immunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，我可以尝试模仿我的老东家比希家族，看看能不能通过一些暗中的贿赂来获得赦免权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either I win, or... I win. {beat}My favorite odds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我除了赢...还是赢。{beat}这是我最喜欢的赔率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how's Primm treating you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，普瑞姆对你怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the most part, quite well. Oh, and I understand that the law in this town was your doing? You being one who gave Sheriff Meyers his badge, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数情况下非常好。哦，我了解到这个镇的法律是你制定的？是你把警徽授予了迈耶斯，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Sheriff Meyers... He's the one fucking caveat to my previous statement of Primm mostly treating me well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，迈耶斯警长...我之前声明普瑞姆对我很好，但他相对这个就是个他妈的警告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a cocksucking pain in the fucking ass. Whose idea was it to bring a fucking hardass frontier-justice type here? {blistering sarcasm}Oh, right, yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就是个屁眼被操烂的逼货。是谁的主意，把这里搞得跟争勇斗狠的“边疆正义”一样？{blistering sarcasm}噢，对了，是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's fortunate, for your continued employment, that you only granted him the position before signing on with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，你在跟我签约前只给了他这个职位，这才能使你能继续工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next time that sanctimonious shitheel comes in here, demanding to know that we're all keeping our noses clean, you can negotiate with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一次那个道貌岸然的恶棍再来这里，问询我们是否清白的时候，你可以和他谈判谈判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how's Primm treating you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，普瑞姆对你怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine and fucking dandy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错真他妈的好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That robot-sheriff you conceived of was a mild irritation, at first. {incredulous}Wanted to know if I had fucking building permits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个你设想出来的机器人警长一开始有点轻度受刺激。{incredulous}我想知道我他妈能不能拿到建筑许可。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I paid a techno-fetishist associate to conjure up a little robot-wizardry, and mysteriously, Primm Slimm now believes I have diplomatic immunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我付钱给一个技术控合伙人变了个小机器人戏法，难以理解的是，那个普瑞姆傻瓜现在竟然相信我有外交豁免权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If, for some reason, you choose to conversate with that walking toaster, and the subject of my bar comes up... Please refer to it as "The Embassy."
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果因为某种原因，你要跟那个行走的面包机交谈的话，一旦聊到我的酒吧...请把它称为“大使馆”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqp_0001052d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how's Primm treating you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，普瑞姆对你怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepTwoCont
For the act of benevolence we'll be gifting the community, I've set my sights upon a murderous zombie lurking between Primm and the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了行善，我们给社区送点礼物，我目标对准了一个潜伏在普瑞姆和莫哈维前哨站之间的杀人僵尸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00010b32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As near as I can tell, what with the dearth of information surrounding this ghoulish fuck, his name is Jimmy, and he's about 80% feral already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我所知，目前对这个尸鬼王八蛋的有限情报来看，他叫做吉米，并且已经80%狂尸化了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00010b32_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He mostly holes up in a cave, some yards away from that rest stop down the road. When he emerges, he does so with axe in hand, flanked by ferals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他基本上都缩在洞穴里，就在离那个休息站几码远的路边。当他现身时，他手里拿着斧子，身旁都是狂尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00010b32_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cutting his head off, and asking for nothing in return, could only serve to ingratiate the prospective clientele, surely. So, that's what we'll do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 砍了他的头，并且不求回报，一定会讨好潜在客户。所以，那就是我们要做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00010b32_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the second part, I've put together a little propaganda package, and I need you to deliver it to a traveling merchant named Jameson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于第二部分，我准备了一个小的宣传包, 我需要你把它交给一个叫詹姆森的旅行商人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00010b32_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He owes me a favor, and he's rather nomadic, meaning, he can spread word of my business far and wide. So, kill the ghoul, then deliver this to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他欠我一个人情，他一直到处漂泊，那就意味着，他可以把我的生意传播到更广更远的地方去。所以，杀了尸鬼，然后把这个交给他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00010b32_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He should be at the Mojave Outpost, so it won't even be much of a trek to reach him once you've killed that fucking zombie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他应该在莫哈维前哨站，所以你杀了尸鬼之后不用跑多远的路就能找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00010b32_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, adios, and I'll be busy counting your payment for when you make your speedy and triumphant return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，再见，当你迅速而胜利地回来时，我还得忙着给你数你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00010b32_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 30
What, exactly, do you have in mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，到底有什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJamesonDeliveryTime
Oh yeah, was wondering when I was going to get this. Hope he don't want me to say anything too goofy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好的，我还在想这东西什么时候能送来。希望他别让我到处说太多蠢话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesondeliv_00010b36_1.ogg
NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, this isn't bad. Alright. I'm heading up towards the Irontown, but I ain't taking the quick route. Going to make as many detours as I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，很不错，好吧。我正要去铁镇，但我不走捷径。我要尽可能多地绕道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesondeliv_00010b36_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figure I can stop, sell some wares, buy some essentials, and now, gossip about this fancy new Primm saloon. Easy enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可以停下来，卖些商品，买些必需品，然后可以散布一些关于这个漂亮的新普瑞姆会所的消息。易如反掌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesondeliv_00010b36_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaGreebMcGuffinNote 1
setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 50
You Jameson? I have a package for you, from Silas Greeb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是詹姆森？我这有个你的包裹，是塞拉斯 格里布给的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJamesonAboutSilas
Well, he's an old friend to some of them Bishop folk, back west 'round Reno. And the Bishops, well, they're tight with the bureaucrats back in Shady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，他是我在比希手下时的一个老朋友，在新里诺的西边。而比希家族的人，他们和沙荫市的官僚们关系密切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonabout_00010b39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basically, his buddies spoke to their buddies who spoke to {emph}their buddies, and it all ended with me getting some choice prices on goods from the Hub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上呢，他的哥们告诉了他哥们的哥们，又告诉了{emph}他们的哥们的哥们，最后使我在哈勃城得到了一些商品的挑选价格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonabout_00010b39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lotta crap that won't do no good 'round civilized parts, but those brave fools on the frontier will pay an arm and a leg to grab it up. Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多的垃圾对文明的地区都没有用处，但那些边境上的勇敢的蠢货们会付出一只胳膊和一条腿的代价去捡起来。哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonabout_00010b39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Silas says you owed him this favor. What's the story there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞拉斯说你欠他一个人情。有什么故事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJamesonTarForeshadowing
Huh? Oh, independent township, a bit to the west, and a lot to the north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？哦，一个独立的城镇，往西走一点，再往北走一大段路能到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesontarfo_00010b38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I hear it, place is full of ore mines and old world factories. Lot of untapped old resources for enterprising folks, y'know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说，这个地方到处都是矿山和战前的工厂。为那些创业者提供了大量未开发的原始资源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesontarfo_00010b38_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word is, a bunch of NCR folks set up shop, working the mines and repairing the foundries. Struck by iron fever, the lot of 'em, I say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说，一群NCR的人开了个商店，开始挖矿和修理铸造厂。那里有很多的人都是被炼钢热潮吸引过去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesontarfo_00010b38_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, there ain't no law to speak of up there, and they ain't got any ground fit for crops or livestock. They need food; Jameson got food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，那边没有法律可言，而且他们没有适合种植庄稼或饲养牲畜的土地。他们需要食物，而詹姆森有食物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesontarfo_00010b38_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might not be some starry-eyed fool wetting {hisself}himself over old world metal, but it don't take no genius to see that place'll make a smart man rich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也许不是那种被战前的铁水浇得满身都是的{hisself}空想的傻瓜，然而不需要是个天才都能看出那地方会使聪明人发大财。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesontarfo_00010b38_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's Irontown?
ESP.TRADUIT: 铁镇是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJamesonIvanpahTreasure
Listen, son. I been around a while, and I ain't never once heard of nobody pulling a fortune out of the dirt. That's all foolishness, believe you me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着孩子。我来了一段时间了，而我从来没听说过有人在土里挖到宝。都是些蠢话，信不信由你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonivanp_00010b3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to get rich without putting in no work, best say a few prayers and step up to the tables in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想不辛苦工作就发财的话，最好是好好祈祷然后去维加斯的赌桌上碰碰运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonivanp_00010b3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There've been stories of buried treasure for as long as people've had shovels. On the rare occasion they find something, it's old world trash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早在人们拥有铲子的时候就有埋藏宝藏的故事了。在罕见的情况下，他们发现了一些东西，都是些战前的垃圾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonivanp_00010b3b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, you're better off not listening to that ignorant nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，你最好别听那些无知的废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonivanp_00010b3b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear anything about this supposed Treasure of Ivanpah Lake?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过所谓的伊凡帕旱湖宝藏吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, ma'am. I been around a while, and I ain't never heard of nobody pulling a fortune out of the dirt. It's all foolishness, believe you me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起女士。我来了一段时间了，而我从来没听说过有人在土里挖到宝。都是些蠢话，信不信由你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonivanp_00010b3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to get rich without putting in no work, best say a few prayers and step up to the tables in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想不辛苦工作就发财的话，最好是好好祈祷然后去维加斯的赌桌上碰碰运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonivanp_00010b3c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There've been stories of buried treasure for as long as people've had shovels. On the rare occasion they find something, it's old world trash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早在人们拥有铲子的时候就有埋藏宝藏的故事了。在罕见的情况下，他们发现了一些东西，都是些战前的垃圾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonivanp_00010b3c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, you're better off not listening to that ignorant nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，你最好别听那些无知的废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jameson [07010B2F] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaasilassa_aaajamesonivanp_00010b3c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear anything about this supposed Treasure of Ivanpah Lake?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过所谓的伊凡帕旱湖宝藏吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrateThugWildWasteland
How DARE you?! There ain't nothing in the world stupider than the Crate Crew! C'mon boys, kill this hyperbolic son-of-a-bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好大的胆子？世界上没有任何一个帮派敢说比我们搬箱帮更蠢！来吧兄弟们，给我干掉这个浮夸的杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07011146] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_aaacratethugwil_0001114e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaaCrateCrewAmbushFaction PlayerFaction
I wish I could say you morons are the dumbest raider gang I've ever dealt with. Top five, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说你们这些蠢货是我遇到过的最白痴的掠夺者帮派。至少也是前五。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrateThugTerrifyTime
Oh shit, I don't love crates that much! G-guys, save me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦该死，我不太喜欢箱子！兄弟们，救我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07011146] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_aaacratethugter_00011150_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrateCrewRevengeManREF.AddScriptPackage VTerrifyingPresencePackage SetEnemy aaaCrateCrewAmbushFaction PlayerFaction startcombat player
Good thing you like crates, because you'll need a water-tight one for your remains when I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸好你喜欢箱子，因为当我完事时你们剩下的人会需要一个防水款的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrateThugWhiney
First you defile our crate with your filthy touch, and now you suggest that it ain't even a big deal?! You disgust me. Boys, kill 'em all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先你肮脏的触碰玷污了我们的箱子，现在你还说这没什么大不了的？！你他妈真让我恶心。兄弟们，杀了他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07011146] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_aaacratethugwhi_00011152_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaaCrateCrewAmbushFaction PlayerFaction
C'mon, you're seriously going to try and kill me over a crate? Let's calm down, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别，你真的想为个箱子杀了我？冷静一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrateThugFuckYou
Fuck y- Uh... Dammit, don't steal my goddamn lines! Fuck it, just... Just kill this asshole, guys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你母...该死，别他妈抢我的台词！操，干...干掉这个傻逼，兄弟们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crate Crew Boss [07011146] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaasilassa_aaacratethugfuc_00011154_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaaCrateCrewAmbushFaction PlayerFaction
Fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepThree
Brilliant. And while you were away, dealing with uncouth corpses that lack the common fucking courtesy to die when they start rotting, Eli returned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好。当你去处理那些正在腐烂而又缺乏他妈安葬的尸体的时候，伊莱回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0001296e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See? We're already getting to work on making this ruin into something resembling an actual habitable building. How fucking nice for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到了吗？我们已经开始着手把这片废墟变成真正适合居住的建筑。我们真他妈的牛逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0001296e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, as you may've gleaned from your dialogue with Jameson, he'll be off delivering unrealistic praise of my joint to all who will listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，正如你从和詹姆森的对话中所了解到的，他会很夸张地给听众们赞扬我的会所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0001296e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, he won't be in the state of New California to sing my praises. And California is where whales are drifting, so to speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，他不会到新加州去赞扬我。新加州是大佬们盘踞的地方，可以说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0001296e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need advertising that'll really appeal to the masses back West, and flowery text-on-paper simply won't do to hold their attention. {under your breath}Mouth-breathers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要真正吸引西方大众的广告，而华而不实的纸面宣传并不能引起他们的注意。{under your breath}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0001296e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I need a commercial, and I need it to be seen by a wide audience of exactly the sorts of lonely degenerates that will pay to play with titties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我需要一个广告，而且我需要它能被广泛地看到，尤其是那些孤独堕落到愿意付钱来找马子的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0001296e_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, don't give me that fucking look. I won't be needing you to be doing anything in front of a camera. I've already got everything filmed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，别他妈那样看着我。我不需要你在镜头前做任何事。我已经把所有东西都录好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0001296e_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500
I killed that ghoul, and delivered your message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了那个尸鬼，然后送达了你的消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepThreeCont
Were this commercial an epic that would make Shakespeare weep up in heaven, uhh, assuming he's a movie fan, I would gladly cast you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这个广告经典到能让莎士比亚从棺材板里跳出来，呃，假设他是个电影爱好者的话，我会很乐意拍你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, this commercial is just fifteen seconds of a topless hooker telling everybody to head to Primm and give me their cash. Nothing fancy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，这个广告只不过是一个妓女露出上半身15秒钟的镜头，用来告诉每个人到普瑞姆来花钱找乐子。没什么特别的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012970_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to suggest I won't be gleefully sticking "film director" onto my resume, because I absolutely fucking will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是说我不高兴地把“电影导演”的标签贴在我的简历上，因为我真他妈的会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012970_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure you can't give me at least a cameo role?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定你不能给我哪怕一个客串的角色吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahh, see, I think you lack a certain appeal that is of paramount importance for anyone with aspirations of flailing in front of a camera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，看看，我觉得你缺乏一种渴望在镜头前随意扭动的感染力，这对任何人都是至关重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012971_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Specifically, you're... How to put this delicately... Ugly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 特别是，你...怎么说好点呢...太丑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012971_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yours is a visage that would make babies weep in their mothers arms. Men would gouge their eyes out in terror if ever your face cursed their sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脸会把妈妈怀里的婴儿吓哭。如果目光接触到你的脸，人们会恐惧得把自己的眼珠给挖出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012971_3.ogg
