ESP.ORIGINAL: This commercial needs to inspire people to drink at my establishment. Your face would make them want to drink whatever they keep under their sink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个广告需要鼓励人们到我的会所喝酒。你的脸会让他们宁愿喝水槽里的任何东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012971_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, this commercial is just fifteen seconds of a topless hooker telling people to come to Primm so they can give me their money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，这个广告只不过是一个妓女露出上半身15秒钟的镜头，用来告诉每个人到普瑞姆来花钱找乐子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012971_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Maybe would've been more sensitive to leave it at that...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...也许就保持这样会感觉更好...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012971_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {beat, cheery}Oh well, you'll get over it!
ESP.TRADUIT: {beat, cheery}哦好吧，你会平复过去的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012971_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you please give me a role? No need to audition, I promise I'll give a good performance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能让我演一个角色吗？不需要试演，我保证我演技很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepThreeContCont
Well... See, I don't want to pay for distribution rights. I'd rather this lovely little advertisement simply find its way to the eyes of my audience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...你看，我不想为发行权而掏钱。我宁愿这则可爱的小广告能简单地吸引观众的眼球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If my film were to simply... Fall into the middle of someone else's pre-cut, pre-edited footage...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我的影片能简单地...掉进某人的预剪辑和预编辑片段里面...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012973_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if there already happens to be a studio here in the Mojave that primarily distributes to California... And if... Uh, wait... Hmm...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果莫哈维正好有个主要分布在加州的制片厂...而且如果...呃，等等...嗯...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012973_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, fuck it. Vague euphemism isn't how I fucking speak. Look, there's a porno studio near North Vegas Square.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，操，我他妈说得这么含蓄模糊干嘛。你看，在北维加斯广场附近有个成人制片厂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012973_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go there, find something they're about to distribute, and stick this holotape somewhere in the middle. Easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你到那里，找到他们将要发行的东西，然后把这个卡带塞到里面去。就这么简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012973_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One caveat, though. Right now, we're being fraudulent cheapskates. When our act of espionage is discovered... Nobody will care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但有一个警告。目前，我们还只是招摇撞骗的穷逼。等到我们的间谍行为被发现那时...没人会在乎的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012973_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They would care if our commercial came with a body count. So, please avoid murdering the studio's security people. If you do, I'm docking your pay!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会关心我们植入广告的过程中杀了多少人。所以，请一定要避免杀掉制片厂的守卫。如果你杀了他们，我就扣掉你的报酬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012973_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, so, here's the footage. Don't lose it, if you'd be so kind. Off you go now. Remember - don't kill any of the guards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那么，这是片段卡带。劳驾别丢了。现在去吧。记住——别杀任何守卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_00012973_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 60
So, what do you want me to do, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你想要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebFinishedStealth
Good for you. Risking life and limb all for a chance at forcing advertising onto an unwilling public... Why, the old world would be so proud of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真行。冒着生命危险只为了能把广告强加给公众...啊，整个旧世界也要为我们骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebfi_000160cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, in a shocking turn that would horrify and enrage those old corporate ghosts, I reiterate that I don't want innocent blood spilt for profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，这个惊人转折势必将吓坏和激怒那些老公司的鬼魂。我反复重申过不希望粘上无辜人的血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebfi_000160cf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That in mind, you didn't happen to murder any of the studio security, did you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到这一点，你没有杀掉任何制片厂的守卫，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebfi_000160cf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I infiltrated the porn studio and stuck your ad in with the rest of the footage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我溜进成人制片厂然后把你的广告贴进其他的片段里了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebSecurityBodycount
Excellent. While I've no doubt that the warm, fuzzy feeling of not hurting anyone is surely reward enough, here's some payment all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常漂亮。毫无疑问这种没有伤到任何人的酸爽的感觉应该好好奖励一下，这是给你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2000
I didn't kill any of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没杀任何人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, can't sleep at night unless you've killed at least one person that didn't really have it coming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，不杀掉一个无辜的人就睡不着吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe it's just the sheer fucking thrill of disobeying instructions that gets you off, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这只是不遵从指令的纯粹刺激让你断片了，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, congratulations, I'm slashing your payment the way you slash innocent throats. Half your payout? Down the drain, friendo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，祝贺你，那我就像你怎么砍掉无辜人的脖子一样砍掉你的报酬。你一半的报酬？泡汤了，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 1000
I killed one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了一个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you, some kinda fucking blood fetishist? Do I need to keep you away from my fucking carotid artery, lest you lose control? Again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么东西，嗜血怪物吗？我是不是得让你离我的颈动脉远点，以防你再一次失去控制？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well then, since you ignored 80% of my fucking directions, I'm ignoring 80% of your allotted pay. Here you go; enjoy the fucking pittance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧那，既然你无视了我他妈80%的指令，我也无视掉你80%的报酬。拿去，享受你那点讨饭钱吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 100
I might've killed a couple of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能杀了两个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, did you now? Well congratulations! You officially qualify as a serial killer! {venomous}Good for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是吗？那祝贺你！你正式成为连环杀手了！{venomous}你真行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your reward! It's nothing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的报酬！只有空气！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, what? You figured you could ignore my directions and fuck up my operation, and I'd still pay you? Tough shit. Go home and cry about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，什么？你以为你可以无视我的指令搞砸我的行动，而我还会给你钱？真是他妈的。回去自己哭去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed three guards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了三个守卫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? What the fuck is wrong with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 认真的吗？你他妈的到底怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And why'd you leave one alive, eh? Were you too stupid to notice the last one, or was this some: "Tell your friends what I did here today" type deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你怎么还留一个活口，嗯？你是不是蠢到连最后一个人都没发现，还是说你想让他“告诉你的朋友们今天都是我干的”？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, don't worry, the penalty is that I won't pay you- Oh, wait. That was the penalty if you killed three of them. But you couldn't resist, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，别担心，惩罚就是我不会付你钱——噢，等下。那是你杀了三个人的时候的惩罚。但你没法拒绝，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's not like I can pay you less than nothing, right? Oh, wait, yes I can. You owe me 1,000 caps, which I'll be taking from your salary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我没法比不给钱惩罚得更多是吧？噢，等一下，我有办法。你现在欠我1000瓶盖，我会从你的薪水里面扣除掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say goodbye to future paychecks, cocksucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟以后的薪水说再见吧，人渣！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaSilasSaloonQuest.aaaOweSilasDebt to aaaSilasSaloonQuest.aaaOweSilasDebt + 1
I killed four of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了四个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of them. Huh. Had I known you were such a bloodthirsty, idiotic fucking cunt, I would never have hired you in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全部吗。哈。我早该看出你是个如此的嗜血，白痴的蠢蛋，我一开始就不该雇佣你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's so rare for me to so poorly judge a person on my first meeting. I'll flagellate myself in shame as soon as I've finished chewing you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说，第一次见面就对一个人做出如此糟糕的评价是很罕见的。在我一把你赶出去之后我要好好地自责一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, as to your reward... Your reward is that I don't shoot you. And make no mistake, that's your only reward from here on out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，至于你的报酬...你的报酬就是我不射死你。别搞错了，从现在起这是你唯一的奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You understanding me? Based on your inability to follow my instructions, I've got you pegged as being completely retarded, so I'll spell this out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听明白了吗？鉴于你不能听从我的指示，我认为你完全是个弱智，所以我要说清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're fucking fired, I have no future jobs for you, I don't ever want to see your drooling halfwit face ever again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈被解雇了，我没有工作给你了，我再也不想看见你那流着哈喇子的逼脸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't like it? Too bad! Hit the fucking bricks, pal. I don't like that my fucking advertisement came with a pile of severed fucking heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不喜欢？太遭了！撞墙去吧，伙计。我可不喜欢我他妈的广告上面挂着一堆人头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 255 showmessage aaaSilasGreebFuckYouMessage
I don't leave survivors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没留活口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebSecurityBodycountLie
Now, why do you think I would trust you to dictate your own job performance? Let's stop pretending like I don't already know the answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你认为我会相信你自己评价的工作表现？别装作我不知道你干了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebse_000160d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <LIE> None.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepFour
Getting the equipment necessary to keep a steady stream of liquor a-flowing the direction of my happy little enterprise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 取得必要的设备，来保持酒精在我可爱的小会所里面稳定地流淌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_000160da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To make a long story charmingly brief, there once lived a talented moonshiner in the little shantytown of Cottonwood Cove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长话短说，在棉花丛湾的小棚户区曾经住过一个有才华的私酿酒商。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_000160da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alas, when a gaggle of murderous men-in-skirts descended upon the region, my associate was forced to leave his equipment behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉，当一群凶残的穿裙子的人来到这个地区时, 我的同事被迫留下了他的设备离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_000160da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have it on good authority that those faux-Roman fucks broke it all down into base components and tossed it into a box in a storage cavern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从可靠处得知，那些模仿罗马的杂种们把设备分解成基本组件然后扔进补给洞穴的一个的盒子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_000160da_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, find the cave, find the box, bring it right on back to me, and we'll be that much closer to living the financially stable fucking dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，找到那个洞穴以及盒子，把它给我带回来，然后我们离实现经济稳定的梦想就相当接近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_000160da_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes, and recall how I didn't want you murdering those innocent security guards at the porn studio?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，对了，还记得我之前不让你杀掉成人制片厂的无辜守卫吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_000160da_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the Legion are a crew of raping, pillaging, slaving, mindless marauders, and I don't give a good goddamn if you kill every last one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，军团是一群强奸犯，抢劫犯，奴隶贩子和毫无顾忌的强盗，我他妈才不在乎你是不是要把他们一个个地杀掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_000160da_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Happy motherfucking hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好好他妈地享受猎杀的感觉吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_000160da_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 80
So, what's the next step in this project?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这个项目的下一步要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebBabbyCry
{totally deadpan}Oh no. You'd deprive me of the chance to say my business relied upon the services of a moronic murdering lunatic to get off the ground? You fiend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {totally deadpan}噢不。这话应该我先说，我的生意能指望靠一个低能的谋杀疯子来兴旺发达？你这个魔鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebba_000166dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such a crying fucking shame. Well, I suppose you'll have to fill your newly freed schedule with kicking puppies and burning orphanages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈的可耻。哼，我想你得用踢小狗和烧孤儿院来填满你新腾出的日程表了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebba_000166dc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe you prefer sticking forks into electrical outlets? I confess, I'm not especially informed as to the hobbies of stupid murderers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者也许你更喜欢把叉子插进电源插座里？我承认，我对愚蠢的杀人犯的嗜好不是特别了解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebba_000166dc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, kindly get the fuck out of my sight, you self-pitying cocksucker. Go find a nice bridge to hurl yourself off of, won't you? Bye-bye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，劳驾滚出我的视线，你这个可怜的狗杂种。去找座好点的桥把你自己扔下去，好吗？再见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebba_000166dc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 255 showmessage aaaSilasGreebFuckYouMessage
If you're not going to pay me, I'm not doing any more work for you. I quit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不打算付给我钱，我就不再为你做任何事情。我退出！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyIntroduce
Oh come on. I'm in charge, as indicated by my swanky eyepatch and my extremely official maritime title. Cap'n Lizzy, that's me! Who else could I be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 得了吧。我就是负责人，就像我华美的眼罩和非常正式的航海头衔所表现的那样。我是利姿船长！我还能是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00018bdd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The name's &PCName;. I'm supposed to speak with whoever's in charge here. Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫做 &PCName;. 我想跟这里的负责人说话。你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyIntroduce2
Oh, I bet I do. Somewhere. {dirty chuckle}
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我敢说我有。在其他地方。{dirty chuckle}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00018bdf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you said you wanted to speak to the one in charge. What the fuck about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，你刚说你要跟这里的负责人说话。是他妈的什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00018bdf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would have guessed Captain Redbeard, but it doesn't seem like you have the follicles for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早就猜到是红胡子船长，但是你看起来并没有毛囊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzySparedWoodey
{blunt}Wait, what? {beat, emph}Really? Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: {blunt}等一下，什么？ {beat, emph}真的吗？为什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyspa_00018be1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That isn't me being whiney that you didn't follow my precise orders, mind you. I just don't get why you'd let that maniac walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在对你没有执行我之前的命令发牢骚。我只是不明白你为什么放那个疯子走掉。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyspa_00018be1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know he's a compulsive raping torturer, yeah? I mentioned that? {to yourself}I must've mentioned that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他是个难以控制的强奸虐待者，不是吗？我提到过吧？{to yourself}我一定提到过...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyspa_00018be1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dunno, I've just never got my head wrapped around this "nonviolence is always inherently preferable to icing motherfuckers" philosophy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我只是没想到我满脑子会环绕着“不使用暴力总是比干掉那些混蛋更可取“这种人生哲学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyspa_00018be1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of people in the world, you know. Way too many for me to ever buy into this "all life is precious" scam. Gotta work on that bloodlust, mate!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个世界上的很多人，你知道。对我来说太多人相信这个”所有的生命都是宝贵的“的骗人话。得开始对你的杀戮欲做点什么，兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyspa_00018be1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't kill Woodey, but I convinced him to leave the area. Problem solved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有杀伍迪，但是我说服他离开了。问题解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's goddamn good enough for me! {laugh}Wish I could've seen his face. Oh well, fuck him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那他妈的对我来就就足够了！{laugh}真希望我能看到他的脸。好吧，操他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyspa_00049450_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, an extra something, just 'cause I like it when I demand someone dies, and it happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，一点额外的报酬，只是因为我喜欢宣布某人的死期，而他就得死的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyspa_00049450_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 300
He didn't cry or beg that I saw, but he's definitely not breathing anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我倒没看到他哭着求饶，但他肯定是不能再出气了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzy
Oh-ho! Please, darling, at least let me drop trou before you break out all the lascivious bedroom talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢吼！拜托，亲爱的，至少先让我把裤子脱了你再说那些私房里的骚话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzycyc_000191e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know I do enjoy my blunt personal insults, sweetness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我真的非常享受粗鲁的人身攻击，多么让人愉悦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzycyc_000191e3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you just skip the run-around and tell me what you need, you cyclops freak?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能别提那些借口直接告诉我你要什么，你这独眼怪胎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh-ho, cheeky jab, you barb-tongued scallywag! Directly referencing my extremely obvious physical deformity?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢吼，好一句阴阳怪气，你这舌头能钩死人！真就拿我瞎眼来开涮吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzycyc_000191e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best be careful you don't accidentally hurt someone with that cutting wit of yours, you subtle, clever bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这么说话迟早要被打死，自作聪明的狗崽子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzycyc_000191e4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {fake whispering}I'm being sarcastic, I actually think that was super weak and low-effort.
ESP.TRADUIT: {fake whispering}现在换我来嘲讽，我真的觉得你太弱太低能了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzycyc_000191e4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DID YOU GET THAT?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你明白吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzycyc_000191e4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you just skip the run-around and tell me what you need, you cyclops freak?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能别提那些借口直接告诉我你要什么，你这独眼怪胎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadWhoYou
I'm Chadford, the king of... Sleeping and, like, being rad. {beat}Meaning radical, not radioactive, which is a total bummer, dude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫查德福得，睡觉...之王，射底的。{beat}意思是彻底的而不是放射的，让你失望了，老兄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadwhoyo_0001eb54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadWhatDo
Uhh... I... I'm in charge of, like, watching the springs, dude. Like, a lifeguard, or something. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我...我负责，看管泉水，伙计。就像，保镖之类的。是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadwhatd_0001eb56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, sometimes, these guys are like: "Chadford, get off your ass and help us do a thing!" So, I do... The things. It's kind of a total haul, dude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，有时候，这些人喜欢说“查德福得，快点起来帮我们做点事” 于是，我就做...事。都是些拖运东西的活，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadwhatd_0001eb56_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But then I'm like: "Okay dudes, is there anything else your good buddy, Chadford, can do?" And they're all like: "No way, dude."
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是后来我说“好了伙计们，还有什么事情，你们的好伙计查德福得能做的呢？” 然后他们都说“不用，伙计。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadwhatd_0001eb56_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then I'm like: "Righteous" and I come here and just {stretch it out}chill in the spring. {beat}I also get really high.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我就“义愤”地来到这里，{stretch it out}在泉水里冷静一下。{beat}我实在太过兴奋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadwhatd_0001eb56_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadBackground
Well, like, my folks got totally enslaved by the Legion, which was a mega-downer. But I ran, so they didn't get me! Outsmarted by the Chadford, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我的亲戚全都被军团抓了当奴隶，真是令人非常悲哀。但我逃跑了，他们没有抓到我！被我查德福得占了上风，宝贝！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadbackg_0001eb58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I went to Freeside, and I was getting lots of drugs, so that was cool. But then I kinda ran out of cash, right? Total bummer, I tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我去了自由之城，我吸了很多毒品，真他妈的酷。但是后来我没钱了，我跟你说，那相当的让人不愉快对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadbackg_0001eb58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And my dealer was all like: "You owe me big-time, Chadford" and he wanted me to, like, work off the debt by renting my bodacious bum to hobos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后毒贩子就说“你欠我一大笔钱，查德福得”，然后他把我的大屁股租给流浪汉来抵债。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadbackg_0001eb58_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I ran into the desert. But I kinda forgot my supplies and stuff, so I passed out. When I came to, I was in this house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是我逃进了沙漠。但是我忘记了带补给和用品，所以我晕倒了。当我醒过来的时候，发现自己在这个房间里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadbackg_0001eb58_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess Ophelia found me lying in the sand, and dragged me here. And then I met the Prophet, and I decided he was, like, real wise and stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜是奥菲莉娅发现我躺在沙里，然后把我拖回来的。然后我遇到了先知，我觉得他是真的很有智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadbackg_0001eb58_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I joined the happy family, and stuff. They let me do lots of drugs, and I get to chill in this cave all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我加入了这个快乐的家庭。他们让我做了大量的毒品，我得整天待在这个山洞里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadbackg_0001eb58_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They never invite me to the weekly orgies though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是他们从来没有邀请过我参加每周一次的狂欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadbackg_0001eb58_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how'd you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你是怎么来到这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetStartQuestOne
Excuse me? You want a fucking job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起？你想要他妈的工作？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the prophet for the world's new foremost religion, not the goddamn hiring manager at your little shantytown's local coffee joint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这个世界上最著名的新宗教的先知，不是当地贫民区咖啡馆的他妈的人力资源经理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll tell you their secret ingredient is love, but guess what, it's actually piss. Welcome to the real world, amigo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会告诉你他们的秘方是爱，你猜怎么样，其实他妈的是尿。欢迎回到现实，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {totally calm now}No, really, wasteland coffee is made with piss.
ESP.TRADUIT: {totally calm now}不，真的，废土的咖啡都是尿做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was I saying? {beat}Oh, right, you wanted work. Of course I have work for you. A stable economy is of paramount theological importance and shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚才说什么？{beat}哦，对了，你想要工作。当然我有工作给你。稳定的经济对于神学至关重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Here's the thing. There're some... conflicts of personality scattered throughout our little family here. Nothing good, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...是这样。我们这个小家庭里到处都有...性格冲突。这没什么好处，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, I know that in a family setting, personality conflicts are like incest: It's going to fucking happen no matter what you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，我知道在家庭环境中，性格冲突就像乱伦：不管你做什么它都可能他妈的会发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, as the holy father of this family, I won't be allowing us to fracture because of petty infighting, so I'm going to hammer that shit out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，作为这个家庭的圣父，我不会允许我们因为琐碎的争斗而决裂。所以我要把这破事解决掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except... Actually, no I'm not, 'cause you're going to do it. See what happens when you ask for work? You get to do work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是...事实上，我没有做到，因为你将要做这件事。知道你问我有没有工作会发生什么吗？你就得去工作！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First up is that lunatic Dash. He wants me to tell his daughter to hug him more often, or something. Go make him happy, and I'll give you... Money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先就是那个疯子达西。他想要我告诉他的女儿平时更多地抱抱他什么的。去让他开心点，我会给你...钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_000214ae_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 10
Do you have any work for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么工作需要我做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetHolyBooks
What? The fuck is this bullshit? New Canaan doesn't know dick about matters of grave evangelical spirituality mumbo-jumbo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？这是什么屁话？那些什么福音的精神的胡言乱语连新迦南自己都搞不清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetholyb_000214b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, books are just words that some mortal asshole slapped down onto a piece of paper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，书只是那些狗屁凡人随意画在纸上的文字而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetholyb_000214b0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just 'cause a book says it's an authority don't necessarily make it fucking so. That's what we in the industry call a tautological fallacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一本书说自己是权威是不能让它就成为他妈的权威的。这在行业里叫做重言谬误.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetholyb_000214b0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want a real holy book? Here, read this shit and be enlightened. Only goddamn scripture I need in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要本真的圣经吗？给，读读它会受到启发。我一生只需要一本该死的圣经。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetholyb_000214b0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem BookSkillGuns 1
You're a prophet? Weird. This holy book I got from the New Canaanites doesn't mention you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个先知？奇怪。我从新迦南得到的这本圣经上并没有提到过你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyAboutBoat
Damn right! This here's the HMS Amity, and she's the sweetest girl on the water. Well, unless we're firing on you. Then she's a mean old bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈的正确！这就是皇家海军和睦号，她可是水面上最甜的妹子。呃，除非我们向你开火。那时她就会像个卑鄙的老婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0002237c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if you're calling yourself a captain, I can assume this is your boat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果你称自己为船长，我是否可以假设这就是你的船？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyHMSCheck
Eh? The fuck are you on about, fucking British navy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃？你他妈说什么，什么他妈的英国海军？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyhms_0002237e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm from Maine, so... Not goddamn English. {beat}As far as I know. Jeez, there's a scary thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自缅因州，所以...不是他妈的英国人{beat}据我所知。天哪，这有个可怕的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... You know HMS refers to the British Navy, yes? What, are you claiming to be British now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...你知道皇家海军是指英国海军对吧？怎么，你现在声明你成英国人了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzySeaworthy
{genuinely offended}Excuse me?
ESP.TRADUIT: {genuinely offended}什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysea_00022380_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, mainlander dumbass, guess where good ol' Cap'n Lizzy is from. Go on, take a wild guess!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，白痴大陆人，猜猜可爱的利姿船长来自哪里。来吧，使劲猜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysea_00022380_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you a hint: A fucking island off the goddamn East Coast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你个提示：在该死的东海岸的一座他妈的小岛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysea_00022380_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And how do you think that I got from the island all the way down here to Nevada, hmm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我是怎么从那个小岛一路来到内华达的，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysea_00022380_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {grumbling to self}The goddamn nerve of these fucking mainlanders. {mocking, to self}"I don't think the boat that you've been captaining your whole life is seaworthy, hurp hurp."
ESP.TRADUIT: {grumbling to self}这些他妈的大陆的神经病。 {mocking, to self} “我不认为你这辈子指挥的船还可以航海，呵呵。“
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysea_00022380_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {still mocking}"Why, excuse me Mr. Astronaut, I think I know a thing or two more about aerospace engineering than you, and I say your rocket sucks, hurp hurp!"
ESP.TRADUIT: {still mocking}”啊，不好意思宇航员先生，我想我比你更了解航空航天工程，而且我觉得你的火箭真是糟透了，呵呵！“
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysea_00022380_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this boat even safe to be on? I doubt a tub this old is even still seaworthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这艘船真的安全吗？我怀疑这么旧的浴缸是否还适合航海。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPrimmGunGhoulBuy
Might as well buy in bulk, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不多买点，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_aaaprimmgunghou_0002299a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Let me see what you've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你有什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPrimmGunGhoulBackground
Why the hell not? As far as I know, ain't nobody else in Primm stocking high-powered ordnance! Means I get a monopoly and can gouge prices, haha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不行？据我所知，威力强大的军用器械普瑞姆还没人有货！这样我就可以垄断这门生意并且抬高价格，哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_aaaprimmgunghou_0002299c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm joking. Probably. Anyway, the more cash I get, the more of a hedonistic wastrel I can be, and that sounds like a pretty great life to me, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开玩笑的。也许。反正，我得到的钱越多，我就越能成为肆意享乐的花花公子，那对我来说才是超棒的生活，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_aaaprimmgunghou_0002299c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, gotta pay off my debts somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，还得还清我的债务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_aaaprimmgunghou_0002299c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what, you came to Primm just to hawk weapons to travelers stopping by the saloon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，什么，你来普瑞姆就是为了把武器卖给停留在会所的旅行者？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPrimmGunGhoulDebt
Oh yeah, serious debt. The kind that'll hang over your head for literal centuries and bankrupt your grandkids. Been trying to pay it off forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢是的，一大笔钱。是那种能把你脑袋吊上几个世纪，让你孙子辈都破产的债务。一辈子都得努力还的债。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_aaaprimmgunghou_0002299e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {somber}See, way back before the war...
ESP.TRADUIT: {somber}那要从战前说起...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_aaaprimmgunghou_0002299e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went to college for three months.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在大学读了三个月。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [07022982] (mod) Quest : ([0702298E]aaaPrimmGunGhoulDialogue) 0702298E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaprimmgu_aaaprimmgunghou_0002299e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in debt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你欠别人钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesWhoYou
{exaggerated sultry}Aw, you see, poor little Eli wasn't packing enough heat by his lonesome.
ESP.TRADUIT: {exaggerated sultry}啊，你看，可怜的小伊莱在他寂寞的时候没有足够的热情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {post-coital chuckle}See, I came calling after I found an ad saying that this place was looking for {double entendre}positions to be filled. Figured I'd be a hot commodity.
ESP.TRADUIT: {post-coital chuckle}我看到一个广告说这里{double entendre}需要人。我想我会是个热门商品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But Mr. Greeb said that the demand for man-ass wasn't high enough for him to bother buying up a supply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是格里布先生说目前对牛郎的需求远不及他对购买补给品的需求高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {you think you're fucking hilarious}Well, I told him, maybe what he really needs is someone that can fire hot loads into naughty customers faces... Direct from a submachine gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: {you think you're fucking hilarious}呃，我告诉他，也许他最需要的是有人能给淘气的客人脸上来上一梭子...直接用冲锋枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {weirdly excited}And when there aren't any customers that need to be sent screaming right down to hell, {chill and sultry again}maybe I could make some cash on the side.
ESP.TRADUIT: {weirdly excited}而当这里没有哪个顾客我得把他尖叫着扔下地狱的时候，{chill and sultry again}也许我可以顺便赚些钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mr. Greeb agreed, so long as I pay him a percentage of my earnings. That... works for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格里布先生同意了，只要我从收入里面给他提成。这...对我来说就可以了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b5_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 介绍一下你自己？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMiles
{teasing}You trying to make me cry?
ESP.TRADUIT: {teasing}你想让我哭吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just another orphan, crawling through the dirt in the slum of New Vegas, back before House decided he didn't like the city being one big dump.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是个孤儿，在新维加斯的贫民窟里挣扎生存，但豪斯先生认为他不喜欢把这个城市变成一个大垃圾场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did what I had to do to survive. And when I saw how many of my peers ended up bleeding out in the gutters or fitted with slave collars...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尽一切努力生存下来。当我看见很多同龄人不是死在阴沟里，就是被套上奴隶项圈...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let's just say I don't regret my choices. Street-whoring, robbery, and general thuggery were all fun while they lasted. {post-coital chuckle}
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，我只能说我一点也不后悔自己的决定。卖淫，抢劫，谋财害命，一直在干这些。 {post-coital chuckle}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're... a hired gun that doubles as a whore? Seems like a niche market. How'd that happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...又当保镖又当牛郎？看起来还真是个细分市场。这是怎么发生的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesHire
{post-coital chuckle}It takes a paltry deposit of 100 caps, and a tacit understanding that I'm in charge, however things play out.
ESP.TRADUIT: {post-coital chuckle}只要付小小的100瓶盖定金，并且咱们心照不宣地由我来主导，不管怎么个玩法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I say? I play rough, and you don't get to dictate how I operate. That's your only complimentary warning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能说什么呢？我好粗鲁的，而你别指使我怎么弄。这是唯一的免费提醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235b9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what does it take to hire you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，点你钟需要什么条件？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesFucktime
{exaggerated sultry}What, not even 100 caps? Why, I'd whip you into repentance, but Mr. Greeb doesn't like me to have fun with customers for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: {exaggerated sultry}什么，100块都不给我？我本来想打到你求饶，但是格里布先生不喜欢我免费给客人找乐子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you really need some cash in a hurry, might I recommend prostituting yourself on the street? {suggestive}Worked out alright for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的急着用钱，为什么不到街上去卖呢？{suggestive}对我来说还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235bb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like we're in business. {seductive}Don't feel shy about letting out any bloodcurdling screams of agony. Helps set the mood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 貌似我们成交了。 {seductive}等下感到痛苦的时候别害羞，大声的叫出来。这样有助于营造气氛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000235bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 100
applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell player.Say Hit
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {seductive}Oh good, let's you and I find somewhere secluded where I can introduce you to my friend, Mr. Riding Crop.
ESP.TRADUIT: {seductive}噢好的，让我们去个清净的地方，然后把你介绍给我的朋友，马鞭先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_00023bbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 100
applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell player.Say Hit
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you weren't expecting to be on top, darling. {dirty chuckle}
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你根本没想到自己会是在上面，亲爱的。 {dirty chuckle}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000241c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 100
applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell player.Say Hit
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paying to ride a dick? {dirty chuckle}Seems the lady knows what she wants. Who am I to disappoint?
ESP.TRADUIT: 花钱找老二骑？ {dirty chuckle}这位女士真的知道自己想要什么呢。我要让谁失望呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000241c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 100
applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell player.Say Hit
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesLunatic
{post-coital chuckle}Because my official "position" here is as security. Whoring is well and good so long as I give Greeb a percentage, but it's not my real job here.
ESP.TRADUIT: {post-coital chuckle}因为我的正式”岗位“是保安。只要交给格里布提成，当牛郎也是不错的工作，但那不是我的正式工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000241c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {smug}And if the fucking-for-cash gig is just personal side-business, it means I can dictate the rules however I damn well please.
ESP.TRADUIT: {smug}但如果这份卖淫的工作只是我个人的副业的话，那就意味着我可以自主支配那些我玩得很溜的活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000241c4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, as it happens, it pleases me to be cruel, capricious, and tyrannically controlling when the lights go out and the trousers drop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能实现的话，当灭灯脱掉裤子时，我就会很享受地变得残忍，多变和专横。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000241c4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {condescending}Baby Miles had to follow orders and degrade himself to survive on the streets. Now the shoe is on the other foot, and {orgasmic}I love it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {condescending}以前的迈尔斯不得不服从命令，为了在街上生存而贬低自己。但是现在情况已经完全不同了，{orgasmic}我太喜欢那种感觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000241c4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hell? What ever happened to keeping your customers happy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么鬼？为了让你的顾客开心到底发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesCheap
{exaggerated sultry}True. The number of customers that are actually willing to pay to ride a dick are few and far between. There'd be even less if I charged very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: {exaggerated sultry}没错。愿意花钱来骑老二的客人真的是极其少见。如果我收费高的话就更少了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000241c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, {double entendre}if you love what you do, it can hardly be considered work, right? And it's not like I'm the one straining myself when the lights go out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说，{double entendre}如果你喜欢你做的事，又怎么能只当做是工作来看呢？当灯熄灭的时候，我又不是那个紧张的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000241c6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only 100 caps? That's surprisingly cheap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要100瓶盖？那真是惊人的便宜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesGetQuest
{suggestive}Ooh, I think there actually is, in fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: {suggestive}唔，我想的确是有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {post-coital chuckle}Y'see, there was this nasty piece of work in here just the other day. I overheard him say some real naughty things to his friends, just over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {post-coital chuckle}前几天这里发生了一件很糟糕的事情。我无意中听到他对朋友们说了一些很下流的话，就在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were discussing how much they'd {suggestive}love to slip some nice, tight collars onto the necks of every lady working up the stairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在议论自己有多 {suggestive}喜欢把项圈紧紧套在每个在楼上工作的女人的脖子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {exaggerated sultry}Playing slaves with collars can be a good time, to be sure, but I didn't get the impression that these nice folks meant it in the kinky-fun way.
ESP.TRADUIT: {exaggerated sultry}固然扮演用项圈套奴隶可能还不错，但我没想到的是这群吊毛打算用性变态的玩法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247da_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their ringleader was some fat bastard named Mendoza. They all slipped off north to Freeside before I could{weirdly excited} slaughter them all like dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的头目是一个叫做门多萨的肥猪。他们都向北溜到了自由之城，我还没来得及{weirdly excited} 把他们像狗一样杀掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247da_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose the {suggestive, weirdly excited}pleasure of cutting them all down, one by one, ending all their wretched lives... Will have to be yours. {exaggerated sultry}Happy hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想 {suggestive, weirdly excited}把他们全部砍死，一个一个地了结他们那可怜的狗命，这个乐趣...只能交给你了。 {exaggerated sultry}祝你猎杀愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247da_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaManwhoreMilesQuest 10
So, any security concerns I should be aware of?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，有任何我应该注意的安全问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesKilledMendoza
{Orgasmic}Oh yes... I'm so {emph}thrilled to hear that, I really am.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Orgasmic}哦好...我{emph}真是太激动了，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he scream? Maybe beg a little bit? Ooh, were there any tears? {suggestive}Mmm, I'm just having a blast here thinking about how things played out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他尖叫了吗？乞求饶命没？唔，他们哭了吗？ {suggestive}嗯，我只是忍不住使劲地想象他们是怎么完蛋的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247dc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suggestive}Well, I suppose I ought to reward you for your... services. Here you go. {conspiratorial whisper}You can spend that reward right here with me.{slowly} Five times over.
ESP.TRADUIT: {suggestive}呃，我想我应该为你做的事情给你...酬劳。给你。{conspiratorial whisper}你现在就可以把这钱用在我身上{slowly} 能干五次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247dc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaManwhoreMilesQuest 20 1 setstage aaaManwhoreMilesQuest 30 player.additem caps001 500
I killed that Mendoza guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我干掉了门多萨那个家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesWhyMendoza
{sigh}Oh, alright. You caught me. {suggestive}I give up!
ESP.TRADUIT: {sigh}哦，是的，。被你发现了。{suggestive}好吧我告诉你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {genuine}I was a street orphan way back in the day. All of us growing up back then knew to go to ground when Mendoza rolled through town.
ESP.TRADUIT: {genuine}那时候我是个流浪街头的孤儿。我们所有在那里长大的人都知道，当门多萨经过镇子时要躲起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247de_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {calmly furious}He made a habit of rounding us street kids up and selling us to passing slave-traders. Some of them were the closest thing to family I ever had.
ESP.TRADUIT: {calmly furious}他习惯把街上的小孩赶到一起，然后卖给经过的奴隶贩子。他们中的一些是最接近成为我家人的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247de_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard he was back in town... Well, I couldn't just walk out on my job and exact bloody vengeance, but you presented me with an opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说他回到镇上来了...呃，我不能就离开我的工作去实施血淋淋的复仇，但你的出现给了我复仇的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247de_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, maybe he wasn't really planning to enslave anyone working here, I concede. But he was a slaver cunt, and he deserved to die screaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我承认也许他并没有真的想奴役这里的妓女。但是他曾经是个奴隶贩人渣，尖叫着死去是他应得的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247de_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now that it's done, I feel all warm and fuzzy inside. {suggestive}Let me know if you ever want me to spread that feeling around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而现在都结束了。我感到内心的温暖和轻松。{suggestive}如果你想让我把这种感觉传播出去，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_000247de_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, Mendoza said he's never even been to Primm. Why'd you send me after him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说说，门多萨说他根本没到普瑞姆来过。为什么你要让我去找他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesGoodbye
{suggestive}Not much later, I hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: {suggestive}我希望别太晚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to you later, Miles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚点再找你，迈尔斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMendozaPrimm
Primm? I ain't never been to Primm, asshole. Get your goddamn facts straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 普瑞姆？我从来没去过普瑞姆，混蛋。说清楚你他妈到底有什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mendoza [070247CB] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleold01\aaamanwhor_aaamanwhoremend_000247e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, you know what? Fuck it, stay ignorant and uninformed for all I care. I'm tired of looking at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，知道吗？操他妈，我不管你有多他妈的愚昧无知。老子就是看不顺你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mendoza [070247CB] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleold01\aaamanwhor_aaamanwhoremend_000247e3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaManwhoreMilesQuest.aaaSpokeWithMendoza to aaaManwhoreMilesQuest.aaaSpokeWithMendoza + 1 startcombat player
I heard you've been causing some trouble around Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你在普瑞姆惹了些麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMendozaGoodbye
Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚蛋吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mendoza [070247CB] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleold01\aaamanwhor_aaamanwhoremend_000247e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordWhat
Oh, uh, basically, I'm really cool, and I'm, like, protecting your spirit from ghosts and demons and shit. Don't worry about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，呃，大体上，我很好，我在保护你的精神不被鬼魂，恶魔和其他东西干扰。别担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, what's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...What?
aaaDashEdgelordName
True! My parents were mere mortals, unaware that on the night of my conception, the planets had aligned and the demons wept with fear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错！我父母不过是凡人，他们不知道母亲肚子里怀着我的那天晚上，行星排列成一条直线，恶魔在恐怖地哭泣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The appellation they bestowed upon me was the sort of appellation best reserved for, y'know, regular people. An honest mistake!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们赐予给我的称呼不过是适合普通人的称呼。是个无心之过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I had come into my own as an ethereal entity of demonic anguish, I granted myself a name that would better suit my transcendent nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我作为一个恶魔般痛苦的超凡体进入我自己的世界，我要给自己起一个更适合我超凡本性的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253f0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the blackest night, the darkness whispers the name of the prophesized hero, chosen by fate to deliver humanity from evil itself... DASH KILLBLOOD!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那最黑暗的夜晚，黑暗低语着预言里英雄的名字，那个命中注定要把人类从邪恶中解救出来的人...达西·血杀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253f0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... There's no way your parents named you Dash Killblood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...你的父母不可能给你取达西·血杀这个名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordWhatdo
I... Tread a dark and lonely path, a path too perilous and ponderous for consideration by any but the most battle-hardened of souls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...踏着一条黑暗而孤独的路，一条太危险，太沉重，让人无法思考的路，只有那些最千锤百炼的灵魂才能通过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right! While most souls are content to walk paths of safety and security, I chose to study the dark arts and walk the path... of mycology!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错！大多数灵魂都满足于走安全的道路，而我却选择研究黑暗艺术，走真菌学的道路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... What do you do around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgleordMycology
Ah-ha! An understanding of the sesquipedalian arts! I see now why your aura was drawn to my own! We two know secrets the world must never know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈！一个对多音节艺术的理解！我明白了为什么你的气能够与我相互吸引！我们俩都知道这个世界永远未知的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgleord_000253f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truly, it was a path I was forged from birth to walk. Much like the psychedelic shrooms that I study, I too am unshackled from the anchor of reality!
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，这是一条我从出生到行走就铺好的道路。特别像我研究的这些致幻蘑菇，我同样也不被现实所束缚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgleord_000253f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, indeed, like these very mushrooms, I grant greater knowledge and insight to those that can brave the darkness in which I grow and spread!
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确，就像这些蘑菇，我对那些能勇敢面对我培养和散发出的黑暗的人，授予了更多的知识和洞察力！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgleord_000253f4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mycology? So, you research fungi, is that it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真菌学？所以你研究真菌，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worry not, mortal! Only those lucky souls granted a tether to the ephemeral realms could ever hope to comprehend secrets such as I delve into.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，凡人！只有那些幸运的灵魂才可能在我探究的领域里，抓住那一瞬即逝的通往奥秘之处的绳索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgleord_000253f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, my child, mycology is the darkest of studies. Forbidden to all but the hardiest of souls. It... is the study... Of fungi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你瞧，我的孩子，真菌学是最黑暗的学科。只有那些最坚强的灵魂才能触及。它...就是...研究真菌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgleord_000253f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much like myself, these mushrooms allow one to see beyond the confines of reality, to reach out and touch the astral plane, if only for a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很像我自己，这些蘑菇允许一个人超越现实的局限，无需太久就能达到和触及精神位面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgleord_000253f5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And like these reality-warping mushrooms, I too, am destined to spend my life enveloped in the comforting veil of eternal darkness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像这些能转换现实的蘑菇一样，我也注定将自己的一生包裹于永恒的黑暗那令人宽慰的面纱之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgleord_000253f5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's a mycology?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么是真菌学？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordGoodbye
Aww. Alright, then. Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊。那好吧，再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... I'm gonna go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是...我现在要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordEatShit
Hey man, why do you gotta be like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿伙计，你为什么要这样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And also like a mushroom, you subsist on bullshit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那和蘑菇一样，你也靠吃屎养活？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelord
What? No, no, these are for the whole community. How would we be expected to transcend reality together if I'm the only one consuming the truth?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，不，这是为了整个社区。如果我是唯一一个理解真相的人，那我们要怎样才能一起超越现实呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides... The spirits have already granted me the blessing of transcendent vision. Reality is an illusion, and I have trained my mind to ignore it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外...神灵已经赐予我超凡视野的祝福。现实皆是幻觉，我已经训练了我的思想去忽略它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253fb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... You just hang out in a basement all day and do shrooms?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...你就整天待在地下室里面种蘑菇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordDaughter
Amanda! My progeny! My spawn! The generational descendent of both my spiritual aura, and my illustrious bloodline!
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿曼达！我的爱女！我的幼子！同时拥有我的精神特质和显赫血统的后代！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chosen at birth to carry on my legacy in the unlikely event that I am felled by the forces of darkness that are ever at my heels!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在出生时就被选中继承我的遗产，以防我在不太可能的情况下被紧随身后的黑暗力量给击倒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253fe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More likely, my destined partner in the eternal spiritual battlefield of good and evil! Blessed with ancient knowledge the world must never know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在善与恶之间永恒的精神战场上，更有可能是我命中注定的同伴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253fe_3.ogg
