ESP.ORIGINAL: Though we two are both cursed with the powers of eternal darkness inhabiting our bloodline, we are destined to deliver humanity from evil!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管永恒的黑暗力量诅咒我们两人，寄宿在我们的血脉中，我们仍然命中注定要拯救人类于邪恶之中！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253fe_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This... is the fate of us destined heroes. And only through the metaphysical trials of this commune may we harden our spirits for the battle to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...是我们作为英雄所注定的命运。而只有通过这个公社的玄学审判，我们的精神才能为即将到来的战斗而强大起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253fe_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that Mandy girl related to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个叫曼迪的女孩是你的亲人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordGotLaid
Well, you don't have to say it like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你不必那样说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, uh, yes! As a matter of fact, I'm highly desirable to the opposite sex!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，呃，是的！确切地说，我非常的渴望异性！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253ff_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blessed with both an uncommon constitution and a pecker that just won't quit, I would be considered a coital partner of considerable renown!
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于我被祝福拥有罕见的体质和一根永不停息的打桩机，我会被认为是一个相当有名的性伴侣！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253ff_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's not even factoring into the equation that any offspring borne of my loins are guaranteed a bright future as children of destiny!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这还不包括用我的阳物所繁衍生育下的后代，都会被作为命运之子而赐予光明的未来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253ff_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt this community would be overrun with little chosen ones if the Prophet hadn't ordained that birth control is mandatory for communal orgies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，如果先知没有规定集体狂欢必须进行节育的话，这个社区将会充斥着小获选者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_000253ff_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, Mandy is your daughter? You mean someone actually had sex with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，曼迪是你的女儿？你的意思是真的有人跟你滚过床单？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordAboutCommune
Most certainly! Listen well, and you may count yourself as my pupil in the forbidden arts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定啦！听好了，你可以把自己当作我在禁忌学术方面的学生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026614_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While we are, of course, ever menaced by dark forces hiding behind the fell shroud of human perception, otherwise, this place is... Safe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们被人类感知遮蔽下的黑暗力量所威胁着，除此之外，这个地方...很安全！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026614_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raiders, slavers, and other such petty mortal threats have no hold here! This valley is both well-hidden, and eminently defensible!
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者，奴隶贩子，以及其他小股凡人的威胁都不存在！这个山谷既能隐藏，又非常易于防守！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026614_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beyond that, we chosen few are free to ponder the higher mysteries of our place in the universe, through mind-opening substances and rituals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，我们选出一些人，通过思想开放的物质和仪式，自由地参悟宇宙更高的奥秘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026614_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when not dabbling in astral enigmas, our minds shackled to the firmament, we engage in other secret acts of leisure and human comfort!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当不涉猎精神世界之谜的时候，我们的思想被束缚在天空上，我们从事其他一些秘密的休闲和人类舒适行为！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026614_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me anything about the community here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我任何有关这里的社会情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordAboutProphet
A man of impressive wisdom! No doubt it took much focus and discipline to achieve such wisdom, for it does not come easily to mortal men!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个智慧令人赞叹的人！毫无疑问一定需要大量的专注和训导才能达到这样的智慧，因为这对于凡人来讲一点也不容易！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026616_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After countless peregrinations of the soul, he delivered unto the world a document of surpassing brilliance!
ESP.TRADUIT: 经过无数的灵魂旅行后，他向全世界发表了一篇卓越的文献！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026616_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His words whispered to the darkness of my tortured soul, and so I decided to join his community of truth-seekers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的话于黑暗之中向我受尽折磨的灵魂低语，所以我觉定加入他的真相追寻者社团！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026616_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though my own third eye has always been open to the astral secrets, I felt it was my solemn duty to assist the Prophet in spreading his wisdom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我自己的第三只眼一直对群星世界的秘密敞开，但我觉得协助先知传播他的智慧是我庄严的职责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026616_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, what kind of prophesized hero would I be if I refused a chance to help mere mortals in their eternal search for the truth of the universe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，如果我拒绝帮助凡人们进行他们对宇宙真相永恒的探索的话，我还算什么预言中的英雄？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00026616_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am delighted that Ophelia, brave astral visionary, has at last been elevated to the leadership position she so dearly deserves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴奥菲莉娅——勇敢的精神神示者，终于被提升到领导地位了，她实在是当之无愧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00054001_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While the old Prophet's words of drugs and debauchery were great fun, I feel that Ophelia's spiritual guidance will lead us to a new golden age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老先知关于毒品和淫荡的训话虽然非常有趣，但我觉得奥菲莉娅的精神指引能带领我们走向一个全新辉煌的时代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00054001_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, it was her who initially converted me to this bold theology. Her, not the last Prophet. I came here to seek my destiny, not drugs and sex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，是她一开始就使我归附了这个大胆的神学。是她，而不是上一个先知。我来这里是要寻求我的命运，而不是毒品和性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00054001_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if her words contain enough raw astral power to sway the heart of a true chosen one, just think of how it could shape the common world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然她的语言所包含的原始精神能量足够到能说服我这个真正的获选者，那么想想这会对普世大众造成多大的影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00054001_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, soon, a new age of enlightenment shall envelop this world, as foretold by me - Dash Killblood - legendary badass extraordinaire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，很快，一个启迪的崭新时代将会包围整个世界，由我，传奇而他妈的非凡的——达西·血杀——所预言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00054001_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordWhatPolite
I would expect nothing less from an unenlightened peasant like you! Well, count yourself blessed, for I shall open your third eye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你这样一个无知的乡巴佬我也没什么期望！啊，算你有福了，我将会打开你的第三只眼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002721e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bear the awesome and terrible honor of speaking with Mandy Bloodshadow, wielder of the forbidden and dark arts of, uh... Darkness!
ESP.TRADUIT: 背负着极妙而又可怕的荣誉，你将与曼迪·血影对话，她掌管和使用着禁忌与黑暗...的黑暗艺术！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002721e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, say whatever it is you're here to say, and make it quick, or else I'll set your house on fire... with my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，说出你来此要说的话，简短一些，否则我将...用我的念力烧了你的房子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002721e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have absolutely no idea what you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不明白你到底在说什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordWhatProfane
You would dare speak such forbidden profanity in the face of what you foolishly believe to be an innocent child?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愚蠢地认为我只是个天真无邪的小孩，所以胆敢说出如此禁忌亵渎的诅咒？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002721f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, such audacity is completely beyond the abilities of any ordinary, unenlightened pillock! So that means...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这种胆大妄为是任何普通人都无法做到的，愚昧的蠢材！那也就是说...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002721f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That means that you must recognize the almighty darkness of Mandy Bloodshadow that dwells within this frail vessel! Finally!
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是说你一定认出了曼迪·血影容纳在这脆弱的容器里的全能的黑暗力量！终于！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002721f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, since it would seem your third eye is at least slightly open to the forbidden astral secrets, I suppose I'll humor you. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，既然你微微睁开第三只眼窥见了禁忌的精神奥秘，我想我就满足你。你有什么需要？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002721f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...What the fuck are you talking about, kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你他妈到底在说什么，小孩？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordName
Yes, well... My father says that I've not yet completed enough dark deeds to earn the honor of replacing my entire earthly name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，呃...我父亲说我还没有完成足够的黑暗契约，暂时不能获得替换我全部世俗名字的荣誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027221_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He also said the surname was a freebie, so I could go crazy with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还说这个姓氏是个赠品，所以我疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027221_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does he not see that bearing such an earthly appellation only serves to keep my dark powers tethered to the firmament?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道他没有看见背负一个如此世俗的称号，只会让我的黑暗力量被禁锢天空上？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027221_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mandy... Bloodshadow? What, you only felt like being ridiculous with the surname?
ESP.TRADUIT: 曼迪...血影？什么，你不觉得这个姓氏很荒谬吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordFather
Indeed! Dash Killblood, my dark progenitor! Born under a cursed... {making this up on the fly}a cursed blood moon, destined to wield only the darkest of darkness!
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确是的！达西·血杀，我黑暗的先祖！诞生于诅...{making this up on the fly}诅咒的血月下，注定要操纵那最黑的黑暗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027223_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stand before the chosen one, heir to eldritch bloodline of my ancestors, fated to surpass them all in both power, and glory eternal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 此刻站在你面前的正是获选者，可畏的祖先血统的继承人，并且命中注定要永恒超越他们的力量和荣耀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027223_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting the strange sense that you might know that Dash guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有种奇怪的感觉你应该认识那个叫达西的家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordChillOut
Who are you to command me? I'm the chosen one! You think your darkness is darker than my darkness? I bet you haven't even killed anyone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁竟敢命令我？我是获选者！你以为你的黑暗会比我的黑暗更黑？我敢打赌你连人都没杀过！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027225_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to chill out, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要放轻松，小孩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordKillPeople
Oh yeah? Well guess what! I don't believe you, loser!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦是吗？你猜怎么着！我才不相信你，废物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027227_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... What I mean is... My third eye is open to the deceits of mortal men! You cannot hope to fool one who is so attuned to the forbidden truths!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我的意思是...我的第三只眼面对凡人的欺骗而敞开！你无法欺骗一个如此熟悉禁忌真理的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027227_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Begone from me, vile wench! Begone from my astral sight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶快滚开，恶心的婆娘！滚出我的精神视线！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027227_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed plenty of people, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀过很多很多的人，小孩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordNoKill
Well, you'd be wrong, which is exactly what I'd expect from one who isn't chosen by the stars! Which I am!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你错了，对于你这并非群星所选中的人来说，我早就料到了！我就是这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027229_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed people! I've killed hundreds... Of thousands! In fact... I'm killing people right this second! ...With my {emph}mind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀过人！我杀过成百上千...中的几百人！事实上...我现在就在杀人...用我的{emph}念力！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027229_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now do you begin to comprehend the dark powers that I so firmly grasp in my exalted bloodline? {really ham it up}I am a GOD compared to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你开始领悟在我如此高贵的血统里紧紧掌握着的黑暗力量了吗？{really ham it up}对你来说，我就是神！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00027229_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not implying you've killed anyone, are you? Because that's just not even remotely true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是在暗示你杀过人吧，是吗？因为那根本不是真的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordGoodbye
{Disappointed}Aw, really? Uh, I mean... I didn't give you permission, but I understand why you may wish to avert your eyes from my glory! Flee, then!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Disappointed}啊，真的吗？呃，我是说...你还没得到我的允许，但我理解可能是你无法直视我的光芒！退下吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002722b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事，我走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordLordDeath
{star-struck}Wow... Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: {star-struck}哇...真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002722d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I be your dark apprentice? You can tell me all your forbidden techniques and I can give you my astral energy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能不能做你的黑暗学徒？你可以传授我你所有的禁忌技能，而我可以给你我的精神能量！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002722d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and I'll have to build a ritual altar so I can sacrifice radroaches and Powder Gangers in your name. I'll definitely want some black candles...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，而且我还要建一个祭坛，以你的名义献祭辐射蟑螂和炸药帮。我一定得要一些黑色蜡炬...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002722d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, this is awesome, I finally communed with a dark entity! I knew my summoning crystals would work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢伙计，这真是太帅了，我终于和一个黑暗的实体进行交流了！我就知道我的召唤水晶会管用！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002722d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDImpressedMandy to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDImpressedMandy + 1
aaaEdgelordShrineTriggerREF.enable
Are you kidding me? I'm Lord Death, and if I stopped to tally all my kills, we'd be here all day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在逗我吗？我是死亡领主，如果要专门计算我的能力数量，那都得耗上一整天！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordProphet
Pfft. {derisive, you don't buy this nonsense}Prophet. Really now, I have more claim on that title than anyone, don't I? I am the chosen one, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噗。 {derisive, you don't buy this nonsense}先知。说真的，我对先知这个头衔的要求比任何人都高，对吧？毕竟，我是获选者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what do you think of the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你觉得先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not believe that either Prophet knows the first thing about the dark destiny of this world. The shadows whisper, but they do not hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不清楚先知是否知道有关这个世界的黑暗宿命的首要事情。阴影在低语，但他们却听不见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00054002_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could anyone not chosen by fate ever claim to see the hidden truths of the universe? They don't even recognize my astral greatness, the fools!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些没有被命运选中的人怎么能声称自己知道宇宙隐藏的真理呢？他们甚至根本都没有知晓我精神力的伟大，一群愚人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00054002_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what do you think of the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你觉得先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordProphetDissent
Many of these simple people came here of their own accord, drawn by the promises of the Prophet like unenlightened moths to a flame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些普通人中的许多人是自愿来到这里的，就像无脑的飞蛾扑火一样被先知吸引了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're predisposed to support him, or else they wouldn't have agreed to bind themselves to the spot he chose for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们被洗脑而支持他，否则他们不会同意把自己束缚在先知为自己挑选的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never decided to follow him at all. Father said: "Chosen one or not, you're only twelve, and that means we two are bound to the same earthly home."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我根本就没决定跟随他。父亲说：“选还是不选不重要，你只有12岁，这意味着我们两个注定约束在同一个尘世家园。”.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, father also said that, aeons ago, in this hallowed land of "Nevada", a person was considered a proper adult once they reached the age of 16.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，父亲还说，很久很久以前，在这个神圣的“内华达”土地上，只有年龄到了16岁才能被视作一个正常的成年人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was three years back when he entrusted me with these arcane secrets. Meaning...
ESP.TRADUIT: 距离他告知我这个神秘的秘密已经过去三年了。也就是说...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...With but one more earthly rotation, I shall at long last be unbound, free to to begin my fated peregrinations of this blighted earth!
ESP.TRADUIT: ...只要地球再多自转一轮，我将终于能被解放，并自由开始在这个被破坏的地球上开始我宿命的旅程！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5e_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Father and I have already come to an accord on this. A pact, bound in unholy blood, to at last grant me freedom to leave on the day of my majority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 父亲和我在这件事上已经达成了协议。一纸条约，被邪恶的血液束缚着，用来在我成年的时候授予我自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5e_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, I get to change my name. I'm thinking about "Astoria Bloodshadow". {beat}Uh, the etymological root being "astrology", of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我还要更改我的名字。我在考虑“阿斯托利亚(Astoria)·血影 ”这个名字。{beat}唔，这个词源来自“占星术（astrology）”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a5e_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? Everyone else here seems to love him. Why don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？这里其他的人看起来都很爱戴他。为什么你不呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordWhatThen
The next chapter of my destiny is, as of yet, {emph}unwritten. I shall go wherever the stars guide me until I achieve true transcendent power!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宿命的下一章节，目前为止还{emph}未谱写。我将去向任何群星指引我的地方，知道我获得真正伟大的力量！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anywhere in particular you're planning to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有任何你计划要去的地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... You know... Wherever my dark destiny takes me. Perhaps... fate has decreed I shall be forever bound to another chosen soul...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢...你知道...去任何我的黑暗宿命带我去的地方。也许...命运裁定我会永远被另一个获选的灵魂所绑定...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dreamy}And maybe they could teach me all their forbidden dark arts, and we'd be forever tied by the strings of fate, chosen for all eternity by the stars...
ESP.TRADUIT: {dreamy}也许他们可以传授我所有的禁忌黑暗技巧，然后我们将永远被缚在命运之环上，被群星选中而达到永恒...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00028a61_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anywhere in particular you're planning to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有任何你计划要去的地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordAboutShrooms
Magic? Don't be ridiculous! We're not simple-minded lunatics down here; magic is but an imaginary concept held in esteem by children and babies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 魔法？真是荒谬！我们可不是头脑简单的疯子。魔术只是小孩子们所推崇的一个虚构的概念！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00028a63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The proper terminology is fell sorcery!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恰当的术语是堕落的巫术！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00028a63_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As to your original query, there is a great deal to these mushrooms! Truly, aside from the wisdom of our Prophet, they are the core of this commune!
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你最开始的问题，这些蘑菇用处真是太大了！真的，除了我们先知的智慧之外，它们是我们这个公社的核心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00028a63_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, are these magic mushrooms, or what? What's the deal with them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这些就是魔法蘑菇，还是什么东东？它们怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed! I see the fates have whispered their mycological secrets to you, as well! You and I bear this secret truth, forbidden from the common man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确！我看到命运在悄悄地告诉你他们的真菌学秘密！你我都承担着这个秘密的真相，对一般人来说是禁止的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00028a64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The darkness of the void has whispered to me that these mushrooms are a new species, a mutated offshoot of common pre-war hallucinogenic fungi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虚无的黑暗向我低语，这些蘑菇是一种新品种，是通常战前真菌的一个变异分枝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00028a64_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, uh... the spirits have not been so magnanimous as to gift me a proper research facility, so precise taxonomy is a bit beyond me at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，呃...神灵们没有这么宽宏大量能赐给我适当的研究设施，所以精确的分类法目前我还不太懂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00028a64_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless! These blessed mushrooms serve as one of the two mighty pillars of our community, matched in importance only by the Prophet's words!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管它！这些被祝福的蘑菇是我们社区的两大强力支柱之一，只有先知的语言才能与之相提并论！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00028a64_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These mushrooms don't look like psilocybin. But they are hallucinogenic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些蘑菇看起来并不像是裸盖菇。但是它们能够致幻？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordShroomDetails
Uh... Not to imply that the Prophet's wisdom isn't eternal and ever applicable, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...并不是说先知的智慧不能永恒和持续适用，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00029067_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, without the transcendent visions these sacred mushrooms allow, the Prophet's doctrines would mostly be instructions to get high and bang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，没有这些神圣的蘑菇提供的杰出幻象，先知的教义可能最多只能指示人们如何吸毒和打炮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00029067_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truly, a life well lived, but not really the sort of thing that tends to spawn an organized theology. You don't see anyone worshipping the Gomorrah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确，一个美好的生活，不一定能产生一个有组织的神学。就像没人崇拜蛾摩拉一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00029067_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the rituals these mushrooms allow us to undertake, that is what grants us our ethereal wisdom and higher transcendent vision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这些蘑菇能保证我们施行仪式，从而赐予我们超凡的智慧和更杰出的视野。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00029067_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ophelia, the high priest of our flock of truth-seekers, mistress of the ritual rites, is the one responsible for the opening of third eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥菲莉娅，作为我们真相探索者信众中的高阶祭司，仪式的女祭司，负责打开第三只眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00029067_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is through her chemical prowess that the hallucinogens buried deep within the souls of these mushrooms is extracted and concentrated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过她的化学造诣，使包含在这些蘑菇灵魂深处的致幻能力得到提炼和浓缩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00029067_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ingesting the mushrooms raw will poke and prod at your third eye, but the concentrate is what will truly grant you the coveted celestial insight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生吃这些蘑菇会戳钻你的第三只眼，但是浓缩物能给予你令人向往的天体的洞察力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00029067_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To experience this ritual is to cross the threshold of bitter reality, and to reinvent yourself as a member of our enlightened brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 体验这个仪式就是跨过痛苦现实的门槛，并且把你改造成我们启迪兄弟会的一员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00029067_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are these mushrooms so vital to the commune here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这些蘑菇对公社如此重要？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordMandyMom
{cheerful}No! No, she was not!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}不！不，她没有！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002907f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She told me that she would be ever by my side... To prevent our fated progeny from taking after me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 她告诉我她会永远在我身边...来防止我们宿命的后代步我后尘！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002907f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that cosmic joke's on her, for the blood of destiny runs through my veins, and, whether Mary liked it or not, through my daughter's veins too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，冥冥之中生活对她开了个玩笑，因为命运的血液流淌在我血管里，不管玛丽喜不喜欢，也流淌在我女儿的血管里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002907f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Amanda's first word was "darkness", Mary announced she was washing her hands of the whole affair, and she packed her bags!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当阿曼达讲出的第一个词是“黑暗”时，玛丽宣布她洗手不干了，然后收拾好了她的行李！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002907f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just as well, for now I have all the freedom in the multiverse to raise Amanda with the full knowledge of her chosen destiny!
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸好，我现在在多元宇宙中拥有全部自由来抚养阿曼达，凭着我对所有她被选中的宿命的了解！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002907f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, where's Mandy's mom, anyway? Was she not cool with all your... theatrics?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，曼迪的母亲在哪里？她是不是不太喜欢你所有的...表演效果？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffWhatDo
I run the store. Wanna buy something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经营这个商店。想买点东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffw_0002976b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetGenStoreJeff to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetGenStoreJeff + 1
What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffInventory
Groovy, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是好货，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffi_0002976d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Let me see what you have in stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来看看你都有些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffAboutCommune
Nice place, isn't it? Safe, nobody here is a total dick, getting stoned is community mandate, and the weekly orgies are always a highlight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是个好地方，不是吗？安全，没有烂人，社区授权可以吸毒，还有每周的狂欢一直是个亮点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffa_0002976f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the commune?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于公社的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffAboutProphet
He's cool. His manifesto has some good bits in there. "Drugs expand your mind, so get as high as you want. Sobriety is a sin." Is pretty choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很棒。他的宣言有一些好的地方。“毒品能拓展你的思维，所以有多嗨就抽多嗨。清醒是一种罪过。”真是不错的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffa_00029771_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My favorite passage, though, is the fourth mandate. "Alimony is bullshit, and is only recognized as legitimate by inbreds and con artists."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最爱的部分是第四条。“抚养费都是扯蛋，只有近亲繁殖的人和骗子才承认它合法。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffa_00029771_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Righteous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公平而又合理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffa_00029771_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh... Ophelia... She's fine, I guess. {shrug}I liked John's wise prophecy stuff more, but whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔...奥菲莉娅...她人是不错。{shrug}但不管怎样我更喜欢约翰的智慧的预言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffa_0005460c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffSupplies
We synthesize our own happy-stuff. The Prophet is friends with some crazy smuggler chick, so she brings in some goods in exchange for extra chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们自己合成毒品。先知跟某个疯狂的走私贩婊子是朋友。她会带一些货物来交换额外的毒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffs_0002a3ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And we got some truth seekers going out on wild desert pilgrimages, they bring back some interesting bits and pieces, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有一些真相探索者去野外的沙漠朝圣，他们也会带一些有趣的零碎东西回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffs_0002a3ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do you get all your supplies from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的货物都是从哪里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffNarcolepticAsshole
I power-nap when I don't have any customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当没有顾客的时候我会打个小盹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffn_0002c21e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Don't you ever sleep?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...你从来不睡觉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordStalker
Just... part of my dark metaphysical studies. {shifty, blatant lies}I'm simply cataloging various auras and such, nothing to do with you, specifically.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是...我黑暗玄学研究的一部分。{shifty, blatant lies}我只是在记载各种不同的光能，很明确这与你无关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002ce94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly, totally sincere}Why? Did you want me to follow you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly, totally sincere}怎么了？你想让我跟着你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0002ce94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, Mandy...? Why are you following me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，曼迪...？为什么你跟着我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffMessHallGuy
Yeah, I work here, too, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我也在这里工作，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffm_0002e0a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a second, did I just see you working at the mess hall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，我刚刚不是看到你在食堂工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffMessHallCont
Why not? I just head over there when I see someone's looking for food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不？我只是看到有人在找食物就过去了啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffm_0002e0a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... run two businesses, from two different locations, at the same time? That doesn't make sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...在同一个时间，而在不同的两个地方，分别经营两个生意？那说不过去啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneJeffMessHallEnd
Mama always said I was quick on my feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈总是说我脚下很快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [07029764] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaacommunejeffm_0002e0a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your shops are across the lake from each other, how do you make it there before customers do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的两个商店隔着一个湖，你如何在顾客之前到达那里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMessHallJeffWhatDo
I run the grill. Hungry, man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经营烧烤。你饿了吗，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaamesshalljeff_0002e0a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetMessHallJeff to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetMessHallJeff + 1
What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMessHallJeffInventory
Sure thing, compadre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaamesshalljeff_0002e0ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Let me see what's on the menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看菜单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMessHallJeffSupplies
Crops come from right here, locally grown and all that. Same with the water, straight out of the pond and purified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谷物就是这里本地长的。水也是一样，直接从池塘里净化而来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaamesshalljeff_0002e0ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meat comes from outside traders. We got quality drugs, plus plenty of produce and water. Everybody wants fresh water, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肉类是从外面的商人那买来的。我们有优质的毒品，再加上大量的农产品和水。每个人都需要干净的水，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaamesshalljeff_0002e0ad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where does your food come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的食物是从哪里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMessHallJeffNarcoleptic
Actually, I was power-napping right before you came in, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，就在你进来之前我刚好在打盹，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaamesshalljeff_0002e0af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Don't you ever sleep?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...你从来不睡觉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMessHallJeffGenStore1
Oh sure, can't run a general store out of the mess hall, though. Wouldn't be sanitary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，可是不能在餐厅外面开杂货店。那样不卫生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaamesshalljeff_0002e0b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, I thought you ran the general store.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，我以为你经营的是杂货店。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMessHallJeffGenStore2
Like, if I see somebody in need of supplies, I head to the general store. Makes sense to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我看到有人需要买东西，我就去杂货店。这很合理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaamesshalljeff_0002e0b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... run two businesses, from two different locations, at the same time? That doesn't make sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...在同一个时间，而在不同的两个地方，分别经营两个生意？那说不过去啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMessHallJeffGenStore3
My pa always said I was quieter than I looked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爸爸总是说我比我看起来更安静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff [0702DA9C] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneshopkeepvoice\aaageneric_aaamesshalljeff_0002e0b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your shops are across the lake from each other, how do you make it there before customers do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的两个商店隔着一个湖，你如何在顾客之前到达那里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordCharismaCheck
Ha-ha! A common misconception, oft repeated by those who feel they've been forsaken by fate! Abandoned to the cruel whims of an uncaring world!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！那些觉得自己被命运抛弃的人经常会重复这一个常识错误！他们都是些被残忍而冷漠的世界所抛弃的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worry not, though! I would be a poor astral wanderer if I hoarded the transcendent wisdom that I have so carefully acquired over my many years!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，别担心！如果把我多年来一直在小心翼翼学习的超凡的智慧给藏起来的话，我就会成为一个可怜的精神流浪者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will gladly share this forbidden secret, whispered to me by the stars themselves whilst I was honing my dark powers, long ago!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会很高兴分享这个禁忌的秘密，很早之前，当我在磨练我的黑暗力量时，群星就在向我低语！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Throughout the many aeons our species has endured, there have been many people of great distinction, mortals chosen by the stars for some great task!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们物种经历过的漫长岁月中，有许多杰出的人物，他们是被群星选中去完成伟大的任务的凡人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, not a one of them ever reached their prophesized potential by waiting for a transcendent handout!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，他们中没有一个人通过等待超凡的施舍来达到预言中的潜力！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bb_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must seize your own destiny, and dedicate each and every day to becoming the chosen one the fates have promised to you! There is no other way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须把握你自己的命运，投入每一天来努力成为命运承诺的获选者！除此之外没有别的办法！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bb_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... You know all of this "destined chosen one" stuff is bullshit, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...你知道这个“命中注定的获选者”都是扯蛋，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {who cares}And what if I am?
ESP.TRADUIT: {who cares}但如果我是对的呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I was not destined for greatness, then I only see two choices before me! To strive for greatness on my own terms, or to wallow in futility!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不是命中注定的伟大，那我只能有两个选择！以我自己的方式为伟大而奋斗，或者沉溺于徒劳之中！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the stars have not set me on a destined path to astral greatness, than it's up to me to find that path on my own terms and take the first step!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果群星没有让我踏上通往精神伟大的必经之路，那么我将决定按我自己的方式走，迈出第一步！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if I live each day, believing with every fiber of my dark being, that I am chosen by fate, behaving as a destined hero ought to behave...
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我活着，相信我黑暗存在的每一根纤维都是被命运选中的，我会做一个注定要成为英雄的人应该做的事...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then that just sounds like I made my own place in the world, and lived a life of self-improvement and universal contemplation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，听起来好像我在世界上找到了自己的位置，而且生活在自我提升和普遍沉思之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bc_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And somehow, that sounds like a pretty decent way to live, chosen one or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知怎么的，无论选不选择，这听起来都是一种相当体面的生活方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0002e6bc_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, all this "chosen by fate" stuff you preach... What if, hypothetically, you were wrong about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，所有在你布道中提到的“命运的选择“...万一，假设，你是错的呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLegionPeteWhoYou
aaaMandyEdgelordAboutPete
{repulsed}Oh god, him. I hate Peter.
ESP.TRADUIT: {repulsed}哦天啊，他啊。我恨彼得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Er, excuse me, allow me a moment to rephrase that, for I spoke without taking heed of the gravitas required in the words of a chosen one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不好意思，请允许我重新表述一下，因为我刚刚说话的时候没有注意保持获选者应该有的严肃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly clear throat}Verily, I have been cursed with the misfortune of having met that odious little asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly clear throat}说实在的，遇到那个令人作呕的小混蛋是厄运对我的诅咒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't see many other kids here. Are you friends with Peter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里没看到过别的小孩。你和彼得是朋友吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaWindmills
Self-sufficiency is of paramount importance to us. The search for transcendent enlightenment requires forsaking earthly attachments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自给自足对我们至关重要。在探寻伟大启迪的过程中需要抛弃对尘世的依恋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030614_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to imply we're strictly isolationist, shunning the outside world or anything silly like that, of course. We trade and explore as it suits us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不是说我们是绝对的孤立分子，当然也不是为了避开外面的世界或诸如此类的傻事。当适合的时候，我们也进行贸易和探索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030614_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if we locked the gate and ceased all trade, we'd need to be able to survive. We have plentiful water and crops here, no worries on that front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们关闭大门，停止贸易，我们还是需要生存下去。我们有足够的水和作物，在这方面不用担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030614_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for power... Well, no doubt you've seen the solar panels? They do most of the heavy-lifting when it comes to providing us with electricity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于电力...呃，毫无疑问你已经看过太阳能板了？它承担了最困难的工作，为我们提供电力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030614_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, we're surrounded on all sides by sheer cliffs. Defensible, yes. But there are periods of the day where very little direct sunlight can reach us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我们四面都是陡峭的悬崖。防御性很好，是的。但只能在一天中的某些时段，才有一点点阳光能直射进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030614_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we cobbled together some wind turbines. It was meant to be sort of an improvised backup generator, but at this elevation, they're always active.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们拼凑了一些风力涡轮机。它本来是一种临时的备用发电机，但由于处于这个海拔高度，他们总是在起作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030614_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let Vegas have their silly old-world dam. Who needs centuries-old machines when we have astral wisdom?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就让维加斯用那个旧世界的破大坝吧。当我们拥有群星的智慧时，谁还需要那些老掉牙的机器？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030614_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't rely on outsiders? How does that work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不依赖外人？那怎么行呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaTheology
{excited, this is your favorite topic}I'd be delighted! The core of our belief system is freeing the mind from petty physical limitations!
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited, this is your favorite topic}非常高兴为你解答！我们信仰的核心是将思想从琐碎的物理限制中释放出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030616_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {conspiratorial}You see, the stars shining above are not merely a gift for the eyes. They spell out the secrets of the universe to those who know to look for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {conspiratorial}你看，天上闪烁的星星不仅仅是送给眼睛的礼物。它们向寻找它的人们传播着宇宙的奥秘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030616_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the planet has provided us with the tools required to transcend our earthly tethers and seek this greater astral wisdom written in the stars!
ESP.TRADUIT: 行星为我们提供了超越尘世束缚的工具，来让我们寻求写在群星上的更伟大的星体智慧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030616_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their celestial secrets are beyond the comprehension of the human mind in its base form. We must open ourselves to possibilities from beyond.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们的天国秘密是人类以其基本形式无法理解的。我们必须向超越的可能性敞开心扉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030616_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is only through the ritual imbibement of carefully crafted essences of the earth itself that we may open our true eyes to the astral secrets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有通过精心制作的来自地球本质的仪式，才能打开我们的天眼，看到群星的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030616_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so we live in perfect harmony with nature, partaking in its gifts and giving back in turn. This is the path to enlightenment, you see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们与自然和谐相处，分享它的礼物，然后进行回馈。你看，这就是启迪之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030616_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are no delusions of factionalism here. We are all one people. A family of dreamers, sailing the stars in search of astral truths.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里没有派系主义的谬见。我们就是一体。一个梦想者的家庭，在群星中遨游追寻星体的真理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030616_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me what this commune believes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我这个公社的信仰是什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaFactionalism
A blight on human culture. When two people each hold conflicting viewpoints, there is opportunity. All ideas should be harshly challenged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类天性带来的危害。当两个人拥有互相冲突的意见时，就会有可能发生。所有的想法都应该被严厉地挑战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030618_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ideas, like people, are strengthened by the challenges they overcome. Reasoned debate and discourse are where good ideas are made great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人的想法，会被他们克服的挑战所强化。理性的辩论和讨论是好主意产生的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030618_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if a notion falters and dies when challenged, well, it doesn't sound like it was a very good idea in the first place, does it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一个观念在受到质疑时动摇和消亡，那么，就说明这个想法在产生时就不是一个好的想法，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030618_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instead, so many people cling to their ideas as a{pointed} substitute for having a personality. When their ideas are challenged, they cry and run and cower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 取而代之的是，很多人坚持自己的观点并将这{pointed}视为自己的个性。当他们的想法被挑战时，他们哭着逃跑和退缩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030618_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instead of seizing the opportunity to strengthen their ideals, they simply see anyone with opposing views as an enemy to be crushed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人不抓住机会强化自己的想法，却只是把持相反观点的人看作是要镇压的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030618_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ostracize anyone who dares to challenge common thought, all you're left with is some ridiculous echo chamber.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你排斥任何胆敢挑战通常思想的人，那你只会剩下一个可笑的传声筒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030618_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Engaging in echo chambers is equivalent to fucking your own siblings. It's philosophical inbreeding, and we have no place for it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用传声筒就相当于在操你自己的兄弟姐妹。这是哲学上的近亲繁殖，而我们这里没有它生存的土壤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030618_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean by factionalism?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说派系主义是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaChallengeIdeas
I'm the primary recruiter for our family. The vast majority of people that I attempt to convert refuse me with... unflattering reasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是我们家庭的主要招聘人员。我试图改变的绝大多数人都用一些不光彩的理由...来拒绝我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030c43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Occasionally, someone will actually engage in discussion. Sometimes they refuse to join us for reasons that make sense. They ask good questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 偶尔，有人会参与讨论。有时他们也有合理的理由拒绝加入我们。他们的问题问得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030c43_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so, I allow my mind to transcend, and I consult the stars until I can answer these questions. {beat, blunt}So, yes, my ideas are challenged. Constantly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我允许我的思想进行超越，在我回答这些问题之前，我会向群星请教。{beat, blunt}然后，是的，我的想法被挑战了。一直是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030c43_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, each new member of our flock brings their own perspectives and ideas into our family. All ideas are welcome here. {shrug}Some endure, some do not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，信众里的新成员会把他们自己的观点和想法带进我们的家庭。我们很欢迎提出意见。{shrug}有的能持续，有的不能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030c43_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For instance, Dash brought us new and efficient ways to tend our crop of mushrooms. Or Chadford! {really thinking}He... uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 例如，达西就带给我们最新最有效率的蘑菇培养方法。还有查德福得！ {really thinking}他...呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Well, I'm sure he brought something worthwhile into our community, but I can't imagine what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...呃，我肯定他给我们的社区带来了一些有价值的东西，但我想象不出它是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00030c43_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you certainly have lots of ideas. What is a commune if not an echo chamber, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你果然有很多想法。如果不是传声筒，那公社又是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetAboutTheology
It's simple, really. Open thine motherfucker ears, and be enlightened!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单，真的。打开你他妈的耳朵，然后被启迪和唤醒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_00031246_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fact: Every goddamn millisecond of your life, they dump their shit in your ears. "Buy into the system. The system cannot be changed. Play your role."
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实是：你生命中该死的每一秒，都在往你耳朵里面倒屎。“接受这个体系。这个体系不能被改变。做好你自己。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Don't pursue happiness on your terms. Pursue it on ours. There's a plan, and if you follow it in the way we say, you may find fulfillment. Maybe."
ESP.TRADUIT: “不要按你自己的主张去追求幸福。要按我们主张。有一个办法，如果你按照我们说的遵循它，你会得到满足的。也许。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together

ESP.ORIGINAL: {furious}Lies, all of it!
ESP.TRADUIT: {furious}胡说，都是放屁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_00031246_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can be happy and fulfilled any goddamn way you want, as long as your way doesn't shit on someone else's way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以以你任何他妈的方式来得到快乐和满足，只要你的方式没有挡住别人的道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_00031246_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So fuck it! Drink crazy-ass magic mushroom juice and trip balls so hard you go on wild adventures in your own mind! You'll speak with fucking stars!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以去他妈的！喝下超疯狂的魔法蘑菇汁，在你自己的脑海中进行疯狂的冒险吧！你会跟他妈的群星进行交谈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_00031246_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drop trou and bang three pretty girls at the same time! Consort with celestial bodies! Share a jug of moonshine with your kids! Own your life!
ESP.TRADUIT: 脱掉裤子，同时干三个妹子！跟天体结合！跟你的孩子们一起喝一瓶私酿酒！拥有你自己的生活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_00031246_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See? Simple fucking theology, no doubt about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到了吗？这就是简单的他妈的宗教信仰，毫无疑问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_00031246_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this is a "serious" religion, what exactly do you believe in? And don't say "astral wisdom."
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是个“严肃”的宗教，那你们到底信仰什么？别说是“群星的智慧。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderStartCombat
Well, we've got some missiles pointed your way already, but okey-dokey, if you wanna fight this, I'll oblige you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我们的导弹已经瞄准你了，但是好吧，如果你想挑战，我可以替你效劳！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_000321fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaaButtPirateCrewFaction PlayerFaction
<Attack> Enough talk, I'm here to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 说够了，我是来杀你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderProceed1
Oh, nothing much, just a fancy lil' force field that'll stop you from getting any silly ideas about running back out the way you came in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，没什么，只是一个小小的力场盾，为了防止你愚蠢地想要从来时的路上逃回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_000321fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you've got no way back, and no way forward that doesn't involve my boys raining rockets down on you, so by my reckoning, you're fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你没有回头路了，而且在我的导弹雨下你也不能前进半分，依我看，你他妈完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_000321fe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, usually I reserve these missiles for sending boats to the bottom of the river. It's been a while since anyone stumbled into our HQ!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，这些导弹一般我是用来把船给轰到湖底去的。已经很久没有人跌跌撞撞地闯进我们的基地来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_000321fe_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderTerrify
T-that's... You're bluffing. Right boys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...那是虚张声势。对吧兄弟们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032686_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: W-wait, where are you losers going? Hey! Come back here and shoot this fucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你们这些废物要去哪儿？嘿！赶紧回来射死这个烂逼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032686_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine! I'll take you on by myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧！我要亲自干掉你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032686_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaWoodeyRaiderTeamREF.disable showmessage aaaWoodeyCrewEscapeMessage
Those launchers could be loaded with ICBMs, and it wouldn't stop me from coming up there and eviscerating every last one of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算那些发射筒里面装的是洲际导弹，也没法阻挡我上来把你们一个个切碎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderBetraySpeech1
[SUCCEEDED] ...Now you stop saying silly things like that right this second, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] ...你别再说这种傻话了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032698_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My men don't need to die for me, because we have you dead to rights. Same way that we have every other victim dead to rights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的人不需要死，因为我们有让你死的权利。就像我们有让其他牺牲品死的权利一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032698_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This lifestyle is making us all goddamn rich, so why should any of us worry about bounties? Besides, we all have prices on our heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种生活方式能让我们他妈的发财，所以我们为什么要担心悬赏的事情？再说，我们每个人的头上都挂着悬赏赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032698_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 10
I'm amazed that your crew here is willing to die for you, considering how high your bounty is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很惊奇你的手下居然愿意替你卖命，考虑到你的悬赏金额那么高。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Oh, you think so, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 噢，你是这么想的，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_0003269b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let's test that theory! Open fire, boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们来检验一下这个理论！开火，兄弟们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_0003269b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaaButtPirateCrewFaction PlayerFaction
Your crew should really just kill you for the price on your head. Better odds than fighting me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的手下真应该杀了你去领赏。总比跟我战斗要好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderBetraySpeech2
[SUCCEEDED] W-wait just a minute! That's not true! {realizing your men are turning on you}G-guys? You don't believe this shit, right? ...Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 等一下！那不是真的！{realizing your men are turning on you}兄，兄弟们？你们不会相信那个鬼话的，对吧？...是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_0003269a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {throwing a tantrum}Stan Gold is a fucking lying fucking piece of shit! E-even if you guys did kill me for him, he'd stab you in the back!
ESP.TRADUIT: {throwing a tantrum}斯坦·戈尔德就是个他妈的骗人的畜生！即使你们杀了我，他也会在背后捅你们一刀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_0003269a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... You backstabbing greedy bunch of fucking cowards! I'll gut each and every last one of you fucking traitors! You're all dead! All of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们...你们这帮他妈的贪婪的懦夫！我要把你们每个叛徒的肠子都给扯出来！你们都死定了！你们所有人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_0003269a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 20
startcombat player SetEnemy aaaButtPirateCrewFaction FiendFriendFaction
Their bounties aren't worth shit compared to yours. Last I checked, your head is worth ten grand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的赏金可比不上你的赏金。我最近一次看到，你的头可值1万呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {incredulous}That's not how bounties work, you pillock!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {incredulous}赏金可不是这么玩的，你这笨蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_0003269c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a fun idea! Let's all shoot you into itty bitty cunty pieces, and then we can {mocking}"cancel our bounties" with your pocketbook! How's that sound?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个有趣的主意！我们把你打成一小块一小块的渣滓，然后我们就可以{mocking}用你的钱包来“取消我们的赏金”了！怎么样？
