ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_0003269c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open fire, boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 开火，兄弟们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_0003269c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaaButtPirateCrewFaction PlayerFaction
Please, if your crew killed you, they could use the reward money to cancel their own bounties!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，如果你的手下杀了你，他们就可以用你的赏金来取消掉自己头上的赏金！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderProceed2
Why, yes I am!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you're a headhunter, then. If you were a fan, you'd know that I'm not legally allowed to call myself "Woodey Hardmann" anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你是个赏金猎人吧。如果你是我的粉丝的话，应该知道我不再让别人叫我“伍迪·哈德曼”这个名字了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, I'd feel a little guilty turning one of my fans into a smear on the floor, so this works out just fine for me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，如果把我的粉丝变成地板上污渍会让我有一点点罪恶感的，所以这对我来说很好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you, uh, Woodey Hardmann?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是，呃，伍迪·哈德曼吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderProceed3
{petulant}Because that's a fucking stage name! Nobody would pay to watch "Mitchell Rosenthal" getting his rocks off for two-and-a-half hours!
ESP.TRADUIT: {petulant}因为那他妈是个艺名！没人会对“米切尔·罗森塔尔”感兴趣，愿意花钱去看两个半小时！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to get myself a proper stage name when I signed up at SG Productions, but part of the contract is that they own the rights to the name!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我签约斯坦·戈尔德公司的时候，我得给自己取个合适的艺名，但合同的一部分是他们拥有这个名字的权利！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't good enough for that rat-bastard to fire me, no! He had to get me blacklisted from the industry, and steal my whole name!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个耗子精解雇了我还不够！他还把我加入了行业的黑名单，而且偷走了我全部的名字！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's nothing compared to the last part. When I tried starting my own studio, {furious}he put a fucking price on my fucking head!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但和最后一部分相比，这算不了什么。当我尝试创办自己的工作室时，{furious}他给我他妈的头上悬赏了他妈的赏金！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, fuck him! Woodey by itself isn't copyrighted, and once my boys here make enough cash raiding, I'll hunt him down and cut off his head!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的！伍迪名字本身是不受版权保护的，一旦我的兄弟们在这里赚到足够的钱，我会找到他然后割下他的头！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why aren't you allowed to call yourself Woodey Hardmann anymore?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你不让别人叫你伍迪·哈德曼了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderProceed4
{trying not to sound petty}N-no! He just... jump-started my raider career, is all. This... this was always the life for me, yes sir!
ESP.TRADUIT: {trying not to sound petty}不！他只是...开启了我的掠夺者生涯而已。这...这就是我的生活，是的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly changing the subject}Why are we even discussing my work history? You're just some punk that'll be dead soon, anyway!
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly changing the subject}为什么要讨论我的工作经历？你不过是个马上要死的小混混而已！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, Stan Gold, his whole fucking production company, all of them! You'll all die, so hurry up and spew our your stupid last words already!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，斯坦·戈尔德, 还有他的整个操蛋的公司，这一切！你们都去死，所以赶快说出你最后愚蠢的遗言吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... The whole reason you went raider is because you're pissed at your last boss?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你当掠夺者的原因就是因为你不爽前老板？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderStanGold
Wait... Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等...真的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you kinda stole my revenge from me, but geez, killing that prick made the world a much better place, and I don't really want to kill you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你把我复仇的机会偷走了，天啊，杀了那个鸟人这个世界好多了，我现在真的不想杀你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... You didn't kill him as a favor to me, and if he's dead, the price on my head is probably void... So... Why'd you come here, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...你并不是因为帮我忙才杀的他，如果他已经死了的话，我头上的赏金应该没有了...那么...你为什么要来这里呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cb9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stan Gold was your boss? Sorry to disappoint you, but I already killed that asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯坦·戈尔德曾经是你的老板？抱歉让你失望了，我已经杀掉那个杂种了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderSurrender1
Oh, that. That... That's probably pretty reasonable, yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那个啊。这...这很合理，是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh... Okay, look, I'm not going to pretend that I didn't have a ton of fun being a raider. Because I did. It was a great time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...好吧，你看，我不想掩饰自己做个掠夺者有多快乐。因为我确实很快乐，真是段美妙的日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I did pick it up in the first place because Gold wanted to have me killed when I tried starting my own freelance porno-biz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我之所以干掠夺者，是因为我试图建立自己的自由成人娱乐工作室时，斯塔金想要杀了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's gone, I can get back to work on my passion projects full-time. No more raiding, raping, rampages, and/or rockets from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他死了，我就能回去继续专心干我的激情项目了。从现在开始再也不用掠夺，强奸，横冲直撞，也不玩导弹了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does that deal work for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个协议对你有用吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbb_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fired rockets at a boat that was trying to pass through here, and the captain is pissed off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你向路过这里的船只发射火箭，船长很生气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWoodeyRaiderSurrender2
Deal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 成交！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okey-doo, let me just unlock that door again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我再打开那扇门...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, there! You're free to go, and if you don't mind, me and the boys have some serious pre-production to do! No time like the present!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了！你可以走了，如果你不介意的话，我和兄弟们还有很重要的制作工作要做！得把握时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully, you'll be seeing me again real soon, in a top-selling holotape!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望，你很快就能在卡带销量冠军的位置上看到我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Toodle-oo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见咯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodey Hardmann [0700EA83] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaalizzypi_aaawoodeyraider_00032cbd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaLizzyPirateQuest 30 set aaaLizzyPirateQuest.aaaWoodeyCrewSurrender to aaaLizzyPirateQuest.aaaWoodeyCrewSurrender + 2 showmessage aaaWoodeyAlsoEscapeMessage aaaWoodeyHardmannREF.disable aaaWoodeyRaiderTeamREF.disable
Fine, if you leave people alone from now on, you can go free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，如果你不再骚扰他人，你可以自由行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordProphetQuest1
The Prophet's wisdom knows no bounds, for I do indeed find myself struggling with an interpersonal conundrum!
ESP.TRADUIT: 先知的智慧是无限的，我确实发现自己在与一个人际难题作斗争！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0003392b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is a matter of the gravest concern, for it centers around my daughter. You see, I sense an ethereal cloud of malicious intent hovering over her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个最严重的问题, 它围绕着我的女儿。我感觉到她身上笼罩着一团虚无恶毒的阴云。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0003392b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of late, where once we conferred as equals in our hunt for astral knowledge, she now stands reticent and unwillingly to speak to me at length.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近，我们曾经平等地讨论我们对精神世界知识的追求，而她现在却沉默寡言，不愿意跟我讲太多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0003392b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I place absolute faith in the strength of her soul, but still I find myself fearing that, mayhaps, she's delved into the darker mysteries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我对她灵魂的强大有足够的信心，但是我仍然很害怕，也许，她钻研了更为黑暗的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0003392b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would be unbecoming for a destined hero, such as myself, to allow my daughter to be tempted by the evils of this blighted world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于一个注定要成为像我一样的英雄的人来说，这是不合适的，它会使我的女儿被这个被毁灭的世界的邪恶所诱惑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0003392b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet, she refuses to speak earnestly to me, and I would never dare to pry where I am unwanted. What's a chosen one to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，她拒绝和我认真地谈话, 但我又不敢过多的窥探。一个获选者该怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0003392b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so, I give unto you the sacred responsibility of speaking to her and doing what you can to banish this pall of darkness! I believe in you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我给予你这个神圣的使命，跟我的女儿谈话，尽你所能驱赶走她身上的黑暗！我相信你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_0003392b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 20
The Prophet told me to help you with some personal issue. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先知叫我来帮你处理一些私人事务。怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordProphetQuest1
That is no business of yours, fool! The inner machinations of my mind are too dark and powerful for you to comprehend. Begone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你无关，傻瓜！我头脑里的阴谋诡计太黑暗和强大了，你根本没法理解。闪开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0003392d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless... Perhaps I would permit you a glimpse into my dark and forbidden psyche... If you make an appropriate ritual sacrifice, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非...也许我可以允许你看一眼我黑暗而禁忌的灵魂...当然要在你做了适当的祭祀之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0003392d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... Bring me a whetstone with which I may hone my legendary blade... {beat}Also, I want a soda. One of the glowy white ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...给我一块磨刀石，让我可以磨砺那传奇之刃...{beat}还有，我需要一瓶苏达水。又白又发光的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0003392d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think they sell them at the mess hall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在食堂应该有卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0003392d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 25
Your dad is concerned that you've been distant lately. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你爸爸担心你最近和他疏远了。怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... Want to know what sorts of astral secrets are locked within my mind? I... have no objections. {beat}Let me know if you see anything you like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...想要知道我的思想里面封锁住的是什么样的星体奥秘吗？我...不反对。{beat}如果看到喜欢的就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_0003392e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your dad is concerned that you've been distant lately. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你爸爸担心你最近和他疏远了。怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordBribe
Well... Good. {beat}Of course you did! I foresaw your success aeons ago! {beat}Hand it over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊...很好。{beat}当然你做到了！我在很久之前就预示到了你的成功！{beat}交出来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00033930_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, what did you want again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，你之前是想要什么来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00033930_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem NVNukaColaQuartz 1 player.RemoveItem WhetStone01 1
Got your soda and whetstone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿来了你要的苏打水和磨刀石。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMandyEdgelordFatherIssues
It's nothing personal. He's done nothing to earn my scorn. I simply... Lack an identity. Am I just a pale reflection of my father, and no more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不关私人恩怨。他并没有做什么让我看不起的事。我只是...缺乏一个身份。我只是我父亲的一个贫弱的表象吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, the blood of the chosen one runs through my veins. But from whence does this blood truly hail? From him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，获选者的血液的确在我血管里流淌。但这些血液真正是从哪里来的呢？是从他身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00033932_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why am I here, lingering in this foolish mortal commune, when the stars call out for me to make my own mark upon this world?
ESP.TRADUIT: 群星在向我呼唤，在这个世界上留下我自己的印记，而我为什么还要在这里，徘徊在这个愚蠢的凡间公社？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00033932_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I'm 15, and father says that I've yet to reach an age wherein I would be permitted to make my own place in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我才15岁，父亲说我还没达到那个年龄，才可以被允许在这个世界上建立自己的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00033932_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must become my own person, and the first step of that is to stop leeching my personality off that of my father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须成为我自己，而第一步就是停止将我的人格依附于我父亲身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00033932_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still care for my father. I do. But it's far past time for me to read my own fate in the stars, and become a chosen one on my own terms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仍然关心我的父亲。是的。但现在我到了在群星中解读自己命运的时候了，我将以自己的方式成为获选者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mandy Bloodshadow [07000DF9] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommunemandyvoicetype\aaageneric_aaamandyedgelor_00033932_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 30
So, why are you avoiding your dad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，为什么你要避开你的父亲？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDashEdgelordProphetQuestCont

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once, I recall telling her that when my body fails and my soul slips beyond the firmament, I would watch over her from beyond the stars forever more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾经，我记得告诉过她当我的身体衰弱，灵魂滑过天空时，我将永远从群星的另一端守护着她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00033934_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the day that she arrived, her aura shone so bright, for a moment I thought the stars had fallen down to earth to share with me their secrets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当她来到世上的那一天，她的特质是那么的光芒，一时间我以为是群星来到了地球上，将它们的秘密分享给了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00033934_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't be prouder of her, truly. But still, I confess that a part of me took satisfaction from watching her follow so closely in my footsteps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我实在太为她骄傲了，真的。但是，我也承认我非常欣慰地看到她如此紧跟我的脚步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00033934_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps I have been overzealous in my role as her astral mentor. She's destined for greater things than I could ever hope to comprehend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我对作为她的精神导师的角色过于热心了。她注定要成为我无法理解的更伟大的存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00033934_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if the only thing I ever truly accomplish in my life is granting her the foundations to be the best chosen one she can, I'm well satisfied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假使我一生中有唯一一件真正完成的事情的话，就是让她成为最佳的获选者，我非常的满足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00033934_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... I'm sure the Prophet has yet more quests for you to undertake, and it seems I must speak with my daughter to assuage her troubled mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在...我想先知一定还有更多的任务要你去完成，而且看起来我必须跟我的女儿谈一谈，来安抚她不安的情绪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00033934_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it is here we part ways! {beat}...For now. Come back and chat anytime!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么姑且暂时{beat}...告辞！欢迎随时回来聊天！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dash Killblood [070253EA] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaadashedgelord_00033934_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 40
Mandy thinks she's too much like you, and she's trying to be her own person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曼迪觉得她自己太像你了，她想要成为她自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQLegionOpinion
{irritated sigh}Why the fuck does everybody act as though the question of the Legion is somehow complicated and layered? It's not. It's fucking simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: {irritated sigh}为什么每个人都以为关于军团的问题会很复杂繁琐呢？根本不。就他妈的很简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebql_0003574f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I live in the Mojave. The Legion want to conquer the Mojave. I don't like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我住在莫哈维。军团想要征服莫哈维。而我不喜欢那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebql_0003574f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that both rape and slavery are unforgivable atrocities. The Legion deems them to be sacrosanct national institutions. I don't like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为强奸和奴役都是不可原谅的暴行。军团认为他们是神圣不容置疑的国家机构。而我不喜欢那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see great fucking humanitarian benefits to learning from historical precedent. The Legion would like us to all forget history. I don't like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为从历史的先例中学习是他妈很大的人道主义福利。但军团要让我们全都忘记历史。而我不喜欢那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebql_0003574f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need I fucking go on? The only "logical" reason anybody has for admiring the Legion is that "Oh, well, there's no crime in Caesar's lands."
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我他妈的继续吗？欣赏军团唯一“有逻辑”的理由是“噢，在凯撒的领土内没有犯罪。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebql_0003574f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Conveniently forgetting that their entire fucking repulsive cunt society is built upon a sturdy fucking foundation of crimes against humanity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常忘记了他们那令人恶心的操蛋社会是建立在反人类罪行的基础之上的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebql_0003574f_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion is an authoritarian fascist anachronism conjured up by a megalomaniacal sociopath lunatic, and they need to fucking drop dead already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团是一个独裁法西斯的时代错误，它源自于一个夸大狂的社会人格障碍疯子的想象。他们都他妈需要去死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebql_0003574f_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...And I swear to god, if you pipe in with some shit about Arizona's mythical safe roads, I'm going to pistol-whip you in the teeth. Fair warning.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我向上帝发誓，如果你想灌输那些狗屁的亚利桑那神话的安全之路，我就用枪崩掉你的牙齿。郑重警告你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebql_0003574f_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion on the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对军团有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLegionGuardShowMark
An impressive accomplishment, but my orders are absolute. You may not enter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 令人印象深刻的成就，但我得到的命令是不能改变的。你不能进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_aaalegionguards_00035d57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bear the Mark of Caesar, allow me entry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有凯撒的印记，让我进去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLegionGuardSpeechCheck
[SUCCEEDED] An odd task to grant one such as you, but it is not my place to question a Centurion's commands. I'll retrieve the contraband.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 怎么给你这样的人一个这么奇怪的任务，但是我无权质疑百夫长的命令。我去取回违禁品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_aaalegionguards_00035d59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, dispose of it as Centurion Aurelius wishes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，按照百夫长奥勒留斯的意愿把它处理掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_aaalegionguards_00035d59_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 5
player.additem aaaLegionMcGuffinBox 1 aaaLegionCaveMcGuffinREF.disable
You have equipment for creating alcohol in there. I've been ordered to retrieve and destroy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这里有酿酒的设备。我奉命取回并销毁它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Your ignorance is an embarrassment. Be gone from my sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你的无知真让人尴尬。从我面前滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Legion Sentry [07035D52] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaasilassa_aaalegionguards_00035d5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's cool, I'm here to grab some moonshine equipment for your Centurion. We're gonna party tonight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真棒，我来替百夫长拿酿私酒的设备。我们今晚有聚会！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGhoulSwishWhoYou
{off topic}Oh, well, most folks just call me Swish. Nice to meet- hold on a second! This ain't no meet-and-greet, and you still best get your butt out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: {off topic}噢，啊，大多数人叫我斯卫西。很高兴见——等一下！这又不是什么见面会，你最好还是离开这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishwh_00036973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGhoulSwishNotHouse
Yeah, well! {beat}It's not anymore! Now I live here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊！{beat}它不再是了！现在我住在这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishno_00036972_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now why the hell are you in {emph}my house, and why shouldn't I just shoot you in the face until you stop speakin' words at me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你到底为什么要闯进{emph}我的房子，为什么我不能一枪打烂你的脸，好让你说不出话来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishno_00036972_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, bigger badasses than you have waved guns in my face and gotten killed for their trouble, and this is a gas station, not a house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，比你更厉害的家伙也曾经在我面前挥舞着枪，结果自找麻烦死掉，再说这里是加油站，可不是间房子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGhoulSwishMurderTime
I bet you won't! {beat, under your breath}Ugh. Need to work on my pithy one-liners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你不会的！{beat, under your breath}呃。我得想一句简短的俏皮话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishmu_00036971_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
<Attack> Nothing personal, but I'm just going to save us both some time and kill you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 并非私人恩怨，我只是想给我们俩省点时间，现在就杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGhoulSwishInterrogateNice
Reed? Why'n the hell are you tryin' to catch up to that deal-breaking dickhead? {beat}Oh, he ripped you off, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里德？为什么你要找那个不讲信用的混蛋？{beat}噢，他也骗了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishin_00036978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't know. I suppose I could probably point you his direction, if'n there's something in it for me. I'm thinking... 700 caps'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧我不知道。但我想我可以告诉你他的去向，如果有我的好处的话。我想...700瓶盖就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishin_00036978_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is some pretty juicy intel, y'know. Lotta people willin' to pay out the ass for this privileged info. You ain't special!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一些非常有趣的情报, 知道嘛。很多人都愿意买这条特别的情报。你也不例外！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishin_00036978_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for someone named Reed, he left a note saying he might be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫里德的人，他留下的笔记说他可能在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGhoulSwishInterrogateDick
Windmill schem...? What in Baby Jesus's name are you goddamn talking about, you ugly home-invading crazy-ass sumbitch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 风车原理...？你他妈到底在说什么鸡巴玩意，你这个丑陋的闯入者？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishin_00036977_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, to hell with this, I don't need to sit here tryin' to make sense outta the dumb shit some lunatic trespasser is spewin' at me. Get dead, bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，去他妈的，我才不要坐在这里听一个非法闯入的疯子对我神神叨叨。去死吧，婊子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishin_00036977_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
If you don't tell me where the windmill schematics are right now, we're going to have a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你现在不告诉我风车的原理图在哪, 我们就会有麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGhoulSwishBribe
...Are you fucking kidding me?!
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你他妈开什么玩笑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishbr_0003697e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't even have 700 caps on you? ...I know what you are! You ain't no home-invader! You're so much worse than that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你连700个瓶盖都没有？...我知道你是什么了！你才不是闯入者！你他妈比那个更糟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishbr_0003697e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... Are a hobo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...是个流浪汉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishbr_0003697e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be damned if I let some dirty hobo try to set terms with me! You're done, bum!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我跟某个肮脏的流浪汉做生意就糟了！你完蛋了，要饭的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishbr_0003697e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Uh... I'm a little short on caps right now. Can I come back in a bit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔...我现在有点缺钱。我能晚点再来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, how generous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，真大方！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishbr_0003697f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reed said he was heading north to the 188. See? He wrote it right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里德说他向北去188贸易站了。你看？他在这里写下来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishbr_0003697f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, pleasure doing business with you, and all that. {drag this out awkwardly}So, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，很高兴跟你做生意。{drag this out awkwardly}那，呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishbr_0003697f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, get the hell out of my house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，滚出我的房子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishbr_0003697f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 700 aaaWindmillSwishREF.additem caps001 700
setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 30 player.additem aaaWindmillFlavorNote2 1
Fine, here's your money. Where's Reed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给你钱。里德在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGhoulSwishTerrify
Uhh... Zero. I'm gonna go with zero. Yeah. Zero amputations for Swish, yessir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...零个。我猜是零个。零个对斯卫西来说就够了，是的先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishte_0003697c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reed's headed to the 188, he said right in this here note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里德去188贸易站了，他就在这张纸条上写的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishte_0003697c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, you have what you wanted, so... Goodbye! {beat, terrified}Please leave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，你得到你想要的了，那么...再见！{beat, terrified}请赶紧离开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishte_0003697c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 30 player.additem aaaWindmillFlavorNote2 1
Let's play a guessing game! How many fingers do I cut off before you tell me what I want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来做个猜谜游戏吧！你说我要切掉你多少根手指头，你才会告诉我想要知道的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGhoulSwishSeduce
H-handsome? You think so? Well, I suppose I am quite the catch, if I do say so myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帅——帅哥？你真这么想？好吧，假如是我的话，我觉得有点猫腻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishse_0003697d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, deal. Reed told me he was headin' north to 188. Says so right here in this note, see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，成交。里德告诉我他向北边去188贸易站了。这个笔记上是这样说的，看到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishse_0003697d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, now that I've been so nice by doin' you a favor and all that shit, hopefully I'll be seeing you again soon. {beat}Without clothes on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，既然我人这么好帮了你这么大个忙，希望能很快再见到你。{beat}脱光的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Swish [0703696A] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaophelia_aaaghoulswishse_0003697d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 30 player.additem aaaWindmillFlavorNote2 1
Don't tell me a handsome man like you needs to resort to extortion. Call it a favor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别告诉我像你这样的帅哥还要敲诈别人。帮个忙吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaFinishedWindmills
Oh? You did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？你找到了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did! Astral blessings upon you, friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的找到了！愿群星祝福你，我的朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {reading}Hmm, let us see what the stars have shared with us... {you can't read it}today...
ESP.TRADUIT: {reading}嗯，让我们看看群星跟我们分享了什么...{you can't read it}今天...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {failing to decipher it}Uhh... This... Appears to be... {giving up}Portuguese?
ESP.TRADUIT: {failing to decipher it}呃...这...似乎是...{giving up}葡萄牙语？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... don't know how to read this. Uh, well, I'll just... Keep this in the closet for now. Maybe someday a linguist will join us. {beat}Or a Brazilian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...不知道怎么读这个。呃，我只是...暂时先把这个放在壁橱里吧。也许有一天会有一位语言学家加入我们。{beat}或者一个巴西人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh, moving on... {cheerful}As is customary, those who perform noble tasks for the betterment of our family are rewarded for their service!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，呃，继续...{cheerful}按惯例，对那些为改善我们家庭而执行崇高任务的人，要对他们的服务进行奖赏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps this? It was the cherished heirloom of one of our early members. It was passed from father to son for generations, until finally it was his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这个？这是我们一位早期成员珍贵的传家宝。它代代相传，直到他的手上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said he was going to pass it to his own firstborn son, but he got drunk and tried to fistfight a Deathclaw, and I think he may've died a virgin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他要把它传给自己的长子，但是他后来喝多了第一次去挑战死亡爪，而我想他死的时候还是个处男。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go. {beat}Do try and avoid cutting yourself, this one is quite a bit sharper than the cheap swords they sell at curio stands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。{beat}小心别割到你自己，这东西可比古董店里面卖的那些剑要锋利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00037598_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AddFormToFormList NVAllWeapons aaaUniqueWeebSword AddFormToFormList WeaponListMeleeALL aaaUniqueWeebSword AddFormToFormList VPoisonWeapons aaaUniqueWeebSword
player.additem aaaUniqueWeebSword 1 SetObjectiveCompleted aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 70 1 setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 80
I finally got those windmill schematics you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我终于得到了你想要的风车原理图。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinWhoYou
My role is quite simple, really. I manage, well, I will manage the services of the escorts working here, once construction is completed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的角色很简单，真的。我负责管理，呃，一旦施工完成，我会管理在这里工作的妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinw_0003819c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a touch more experience in the sex trade than Silas, you see. Plus, it's not unwise for him to employ me as something of a buffer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在色情生意方面比塞格拉斯有更多的经验。再加上，他把我当作缓冲的人来雇用不是不明智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinw_0003819c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's something of a tendency for people to look askance at alcoholic middle-aged men running prostitution rings. Folks love to assume the worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人喜欢带着怀疑的目光来看待那些经营卖淫团伙的酒鬼中年男人。人们喜欢做最坏的打算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinw_0003819c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I've known Silas long enough now that I'm convinced he wouldn't exploit his employees, but how many people are in my position, hmm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就个人意见来说，我认识塞格拉斯很久了，我确信他不会剥削他的员工，但又有多少人处在我的位置呢，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinw_0003819c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's your deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你是什么情况？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinBackground
I'm not sure whether you know this or not, but in his younger days, Silas was... I suppose you'd call it an enforcer, for the Bishop family in Reno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定你是否知道，但是在他年轻时候，塞格拉斯曾是...我想该称之为执行者，他为新里诺的彼希家族做事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinb_0003819e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Myself, I also worked under their auspices, in a somewhat less well-regarded profession. Silas was a regular customer in my place of business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自己呢，我也在他们的支持下工作，做一个不太受人尊敬的职业。塞格拉斯是我工作地方的一个常客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinb_0003819e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, it struck me that judicious use of his talents could only ever drum up success in my industry, and so we began working together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来，我突然觉得明智地运用他的才能可以使我在行业里取得成功，于是我们开始一起合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinb_0003819e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neither of us much fancied spending our lives in Reno, and we parted company for many years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们两个都不想在新里诺生活，而且我们已经分手很多年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinb_0003819e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, my time working in a brothel has left me with some notion of how to properly keep the operations running smoothly and cleanly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我在妓院的工作经验使我能理解如何让生意更顺畅和平滑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinb_0003819e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, when Silas decided to open his own business, I was rather well-suited to manage the various employees he would need to acquire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，当塞格拉斯决定开启他的新生意时，我非常适合管理他招募来的各种人员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinb_0003819e_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know Silas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么认识塞拉斯的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinStartQuest
Oh, absolutely. I have a job I think you'd be well suited for... If for no other reason than how ill-dressed I am for traipsing about the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，肯定有啊。有个事我想你很适合去做...要不是我不好穿成这样走在沙漠里面的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartins_000381a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're to run a successful venture here, we need a wider variety of professionals, to cater to any possible desires our customers may possess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们要在这里经营一个成功的企业，我们需要更多的专业人员，来满足客户的任何可能的需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartins_000381a0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, if in the process of hiring these new employees, we happen to undercut local competition, why, who could possibly object?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，如果在雇佣这些新员工的过程中，我们正好也打击了本地的竞争的话，谁又会拒绝呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartins_000381a0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To that end, I'd very much appreciate it if you could make a trip to Sloan. It's come to my attention that a young woman has recently moved in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了那个目的，如果你能去趟斯罗恩，我将非常感激。我注意到一位年轻女子最近搬了进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartins_000381a0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a clever move, as she's the only local accommodation that those poor quarry workers have to turn to. No doubt she's making a healthy profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个聪明的做法，因为她是那些可怜的采石场工人在本地唯一可去的光顾点。毫无疑问她肯定生意很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartins_000381a0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Myself, I'd prefer that those gentlemen take the extra effort of coming here when they have an urge, and paying us for the pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我呢，我更希望那些男士们在饥渴的时候来我这里花钱买乐子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartins_000381a0_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if we can acquire the services of a clever escort to pad out our own roster, all the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而如果我们能把一个机灵的妓女收入我们的花名册，那就太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartins_000381a0_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To that end, I've drafted terms that anyone with sense should find agreeable. Please, deliver them to the escort in Sloan. {under your breath}And hope she's literate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了那个目的，我起草了一些条款，任何有理智的人都会觉得合意。请把它带给斯罗恩的那个妓女{under your breath}，希望她能识字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartins_000381a0_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMollysHookerQuest 10 player.additem aaaMollyMagicMcGuffin 1
Can I help you with anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinCompetition
{mildly irritated}Wouldn't it be nice if that were the case?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mildly irritated}如果真是这样不是很好？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinc_000381a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll freely admit that I'm something of a perfectionist, and the notion of any possible competition irks me somewhat, so keep that in mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认我是个完美主义者，任何可能的竞争都会让我恼怒，所以记住这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinc_000381a4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, as it happens, there's a little outlaw haven by the name of New Rockwell that isn't overly far from Primm or the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，恰好，有一个叫新洛克威尔的非法避风港，离普瑞姆和莫哈维前哨站都不太远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinc_000381a4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have it on good authority that those hellions have their own brothel. Not to suggest that they're the sort of clientele I'd like to cultivate...
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，那些恶棍有自己的妓院。他们并不是我想培养的那种客户...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinc_000381a4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...But, competition is competition, and I've no doubt that Silas and/or Eli can keep any customers well-behaved.{beat} Oh well. It is what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但是，竞争就是竞争，而且毫无疑问塞格拉斯和伊莱能让所有的客人保持良好的举止。{beat} 哦好吧。就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinc_000381a4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this girl in Sloan the only competition we have to worry about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个斯罗恩的女孩是我们唯一担心的竞争吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinNewRockwell
Oh? Well, that's good to know. It sounds as if they scarcely qualify as competition, if that's the case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？幸好知道了这件事。听起来他们几乎没有资格竞争，如果是那样的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinn_000381a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it wouldn't hurt our profits overmuch to let those dirt-covered criminals keep their little hillbilly bunny ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想那不会太影响我们的收益，就让那些蓬头垢面的罪犯们保留他们乡巴佬的欢乐农场吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinn_000381a6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for letting me know, here's something for the thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你让我知道这些，这里还有一些要考虑的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinn_000381a6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 100
Actually, I've been to New Rockwell. Their "brothel" only has one working girl, and no pimp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我去过新洛克威尔。他们的“妓院”只有一个女孩，连皮条客都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKateHookerBackground
Is... that a serious question? I'm really not remotely interesting. Grew up dirt poor, parents liked to slap me around, ran away at 14, usual stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...是个认真的问题吗？真的没什么有趣的。在贫苦的家庭长大，父母经常打我，14岁就离家出走，很平常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerba_000387b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got into, uh, {making this word up on the spot}hooker-ing once I realized that was mostly easy money, and I didn't need any training.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入到，呃，{making this word up on the spot}卖淫这一行，我认识到这个钱赚得很容易，而且不需要任何的训练。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerba_000387b9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, I found Sloan. Good ol' Sloan, where almost every resident is an overworked, stressed-out dude looking for... uh, {sarcastic}love.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，我发现了斯罗恩。可爱的斯罗恩，这里的居民基本都是辛苦的工人，工作的压力使他们需要寻找...呃，{sarcastic}爱情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerba_000387b9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's my story. Whole thing. {smarmy}Did you like it? Should I get to work on an autobiography?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我的故事。就这些。{smarmy}你喜欢吗？我是不是要写个自传？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerba_000387b9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKateHookerHireSloan
100 caps {smarmy}and a verbal agreement that you're not some lunatic that stabs hookers to appease the voices in your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 100瓶盖{smarmy}以及承诺你不是那种喜欢靠刺戳别人，来抚慰你脑子里的声音的疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerhi_000387bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what does it take to hire you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，点你钟需要什么条件？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confused} ...Really? Uh, okay then. Sure. 100 caps and I'll do... whatever you want me to do, I guess? Within reason?
ESP.TRADUIT: {confused}...真的吗？呃，那好吧。100瓶盖，我会做...你要我做的任何事？合情合理吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerhi_000387bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Can't say I've ever had any female clientele before, but so long as your money's good, I can go along with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我之前从来没服务过女顾客，但既然你给的价钱还不错，我可以同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerhi_000387bb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what does it take to hire you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，点你钟需要什么条件？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinPersonalQuestions
It's flattering that you're interested, but darling, please. I'm putting on a comfortable face, but this seat is terrible and it's too hot to think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你感兴趣，但是亲爱的，拜托。我虽然看起来舒服，但是这个座位可不好坐，而且这里太热了没法让人思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinp_00038dbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely your questions will keep until we're safely inside and air-conditioned, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们安全地搬进去吹着空调，再来回答你的问题，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinp_00038dbf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you some personal questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你一些私人问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure I have no valuable answers to give, but I'd be happy to chat if you'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我肯定我没有什么有价值的回答，但如果你愿意的话我可以聊聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinp_00038dc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you some personal questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你一些私人问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinQLegion
{that's an incredibly stupid question}My opinion on... Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: {that's an incredibly stupid question}我的看法...真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right off the bat, somebody being crass could accurately refer to my profession as one indulging in hedonism and vice. Prostitution, gambling, drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一开始，某些愚蠢的人会把我的职业说成是沉溺于享乐主义和堕落。卖淫，赌博，毒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My understanding is that these sorts of "degenerate behaviors" are, in Caesar's opinion, deserving of a torturous execution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的理解是这类“堕落的行为”按凯撒意思应该受到痛苦的处决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Further, while managing the services of my escorts, you'll note that I treat them as human beings and valued employees. Not as objects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进一步来说，在管理妓女时，你看见我是把她们当做人和有价值的员工来看待的。而不是物品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, hopefully, you can infer my likely opinion on the Legion's fondness for rape and slavery. I'll give you a hint: It's not positive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我希望，你能推断出我对军团嗜好强奸和奴役是什么意见。我给你个提示：不乐观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, for the sake of argument, let's assume I'm a sociopath with absolutely no ethical considerations, and I'm only in it for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，为了辩论起见，假设我是一个完全没有道德考虑的反社会者，我只是为了我自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were that the case, I'd likely find them to be- {mock surprise}Oh, wait! I just noticed - I'm a woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样的话，我可能会发现他们——{mock surprise}噢，等一下！我刚刚才注意到——我是女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meaning that, in the Legion's view, I'm not really a person, and my only purpose for existing is to reproduce until my body gives out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就意味着，在军团的眼中，我根本就不是人，而我存在的唯一目的就是繁殖，直到我身体被掏空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, alas, even if I {emph}were a completely self-serving monster with no ethics whatsoever... I'd {emph}still be inclined to see the Legion as evil incarnate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，哎，即使我{emph}是个自私自利毫无道德的畜生...我{emph}仍然倾向于把军团看作邪恶的化身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, there's my shocking and divisive opinion on Caesar's Legion. {blistering sarcasm}No doubt I'm the only free woman in the Mojave to hold it, surely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这就是我对凯撒的军团那令人震惊和分裂的观点。{blistering sarcasm}毫无疑问，我是莫哈维唯一一个持有这一点的自由女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_00038dc2_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion on Caesar's Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对凯撒的军团有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKateHookerFucktimeSloan
Oh, jeez, well, I can't give you a freebie, but maybe I can let you in on a little money-making secret. I know what it's like to be broke!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，天啊，我没法给你免费，但也许我可以告诉你一个赚钱的小秘密。我知道破产是什么感觉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerfu_000399c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {as loud as possible without actually yelling}GET A JOB!
ESP.TRADUIT: {as loud as possible without actually yelling}去找份工作！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerfu_000399c7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... I don't have 100 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我没有100瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alrighty, one open-air fuck on a 200-year-old-mattress, coming up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，在200年前的床垫上来场露天的性爱，来罗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerfu_000399c8_1.ogg

Here's 100 caps, let's have some fun.

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKateHookerRecruit
Assuming a cheap quarry hooker knows how to read? Bold assumption.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们猜想一个采石场的妓女会识字？真是个大胆的猜测。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Granted, in my case it happens to be true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错，你们恰好猜对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see... {reading off paper}A room is part of the deal, always good. Discount on liquor and drugs, not bad.... On my own for food, looks like. No surprises there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来看看... {reading off paper}交易里包含了住房，很好。酒水和毒品打折，不错...看起来吃饭得自理。这不奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, look, this sounds right up my alley, so I'd say we've got a deal... {ominous}Except...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，这听起来很合我的口味，所以我觉得我们可以达成协议...{ominous}除了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My pimp would never allow me to run off to Primm and work in livable conditions. Maybe I'd be free to take this offer if someone... Persuaded him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的皮条客不会允许我跑到普瑞姆在舒服的条件下工作。也许我要接受这份工作就得有人...说服他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, if you can just splatter a wall with his brains, I'd be happy to work at this joint in Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，如果你能把他的脑袋在墙上砸个开花，我会很高兴去普瑞姆的会所工作的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He usually hides out in this bunker up north a ways, full of security robots and high-end mercenaries, so bring your big guns and badass friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他通常躲在北边的地堡里面，里面全是保卫机器人和高级雇佣兵，所以一定要带上你的大枪还有厉害的朋友去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me mark it on your map there, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我在你的地图上面标注出来，然后...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {laugh}Nah, I'm fucking with you. I don't have a pimp. Sure, I'll head to Primm to work out the details with this Molly lady...
ESP.TRADUIT: {laugh}哈，我是逗你的。我没有皮条客。是的，我会去普瑞姆跟这个莫莉女士谈谈细节...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Once you guys finish construction. Until then, I'll just be here. Thanks for the job offer, hope you guys aren't secret cannibals.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...一旦你们完成建设。我就会过去。感谢你提供的工作机会，希望你们这帮人不是什么秘密的食人族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerre_000399ca_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaMollyMagicMcGuffin 1
setstage aaaMollysHookerQuest 20
There's a job opening for you in a brothel in Primm. The terms are in this letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 普瑞姆的妓院有个工作职位向你开放。条款在这封信里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKateHookerHirePrimm
Sure thing. 500 caps, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。500个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerhi_000399cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm interested in your services.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你提供服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKateHookerPriceChange
Well, now, I don't know if you noticed, but back in Sloan, I was working on an ancient mattress, behind a shack, a few yards from the outhouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，现在，不知道你注意到没有，在斯罗恩我是在棚屋后面一个老旧的床垫上，在屋外面几码远的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerpr_000399ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now, in addition to paying for my wonderful company, there's also an extra fee for clean sheets. {beat}And a roof.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在，要为我漂亮的公司买单，而且还要付出额外的床单清洁费。{beat}而且这里还有屋顶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerpr_000399ce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 500? You used to be 100, why the price change?
ESP.TRADUIT: 500？你以前才收100，为什么价格变了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKateHookerFucktimePrimm
You don't have- {genuinely confused}What? Are... Are these guys not paying you, or something? How do you not have 500 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有——{genuinely confused}什么？这...这些人没有给你报酬或什么的吗？你怎么连500瓶盖都没有？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerfu_000399d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have 500 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我没有500瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, it's your money. Far be it from me to tell you I'm not worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这是你的钱。我绝不会想告诉你我不值这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerfu_000399d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 500 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
Alright, 500 caps, let's have some fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，500瓶盖，我们来嗨皮一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKateHookerHowsLife
Just swell. I've had a couple regulars from the quarry hike up here, but for the most part, it's all new clientele with bigger pocketbooks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还行。我有两个常客从采石场到这里来，但在很大程度上，新来的顾客钱包更鼓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerho_000399d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, I can't complain. {beat}Well, I can, but nobody wants to hear it. So I'll keep it to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，我没什么抱怨。{beat}呃，即使有，也没有人愿意听。所以我把它留在自己心里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kate [0700F6C6] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaamollysh_aaakatehookerho_000399d3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's business in Primm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在普瑞姆的生意怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyFuckTime
{cheerful/lecherous}Thought you'd never ask! {beat, to self}Lord knows subtlety ain't my strong suit...
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful/lecherous}我还以为你不会问了呢！{beat, to self}老天知道敏锐不是我的强项...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfuc_00039fd6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful/lecherous}Whatever! Pants off, captain's orders!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful/lecherous}随便吧！裤子脱掉，这是船长的命令！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfuc_00039fd6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDBangedLizzy to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDBangedLizzy + 1
applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
Hey captain, either make a move on me, or cut it out with the flirting. Talk is cheap, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿船长，要么跟我搞一搞，要么就别再调情了。光说没有用，你知道的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful/lecherous}Literally always!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful/lecherous}一直都是这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfuc_0003a5e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suddenly serious}No really, I think I might got that "hypersexuality disorder" thing. {beat}Also I drink too much. And something called BPD, too. {beat, cheerful/lecherous}Anyways! Pants off!
ESP.TRADUIT: {suddenly serious}不，真的吗, 我想我得了“性欲过强疾病”。{beat}而且我喝酒太多。还有点边缘型人格障碍。{beat, cheerful/lecherous}管他的！脱裤子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfuc_0003a5e4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
Hey captain, wanna go "below deck" with me? ...That euphemism was terrible. I apologize.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿船长，想要跟我去“下层甲板”吗？...这含蓄的说法太可怕了。我道歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful/lecherous}'Course I am, but I expect you to use my extremely official maritime title from now on! Especially in bed!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful/lecherous}当然有，但是我希望你从现在起使用我非常正式的海军头衔！尤其是在床上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfuc_0003a5e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
Hey Lizzy, I got some spare time if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿利姿，如果你有兴趣的话，我正好有空。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyIntroduceRude
Ooh, great detective work, needle-dick. Just one little problem with that theory, though. I'll give you a hint: It's the fucking boat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，出色的侦探工作，小鸡巴。这个说法有一个小问题。我给你一个提示：就是他妈的船。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00039fd8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raiders don't have boats. If they did have boats, they'd be pirates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者没有船。如果他们有的话，那就是海盗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00039fd8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which I am. So, best spill your reason for being on my boat, mainlander, before I beat you to death with the plank. {beat, sing-song} I'm waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我就是。那么，最好赶快说出你到我船上来的目的，大陆人，否则我就用板条抽死你。{beat, sing-song} 我在等着呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00039fd8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I can't tell the difference between you raider morons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我分不清楚你们这些掠夺者傻逼的区别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disappointed/irritated}Aw, well, at least you're easy on the eye. They can't all be brain surgeons, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disappointed/irritated}啊，呃，至少你长得还蛮顺眼的。我猜他们起码不可能都是脑外科医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00039fd9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, {extremely condescending}my poor little brainless mainlander flower, I'm not a raider. {as if explaining to a child}A raider with a boat is what we in the industry refer to as a pirate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，{extremely condescending}我可怜又愚蠢的大陆小花朵，我不是掠夺者。{as if explaining to a child}一个有船的掠夺者在我们这行里面一般叫做海盗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00039fd9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, uh, if there's any chance to grab that career title up for myself, well god damn, what kinda sea dog would I be if I didn't dive in head first?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，呃，如果有机会为我自己争取那个职业头衔，好吧该死，如果我不先把头扎进去，我又能成为什么样的水手呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00039fd9_3.ogg
