ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you got a reason for stepping foot on my boat, or did you just come to keep my cot warm for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，你踏上我的船有什么理由吗，还是说你只是进来给我暖床的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00039fd9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I can't tell the difference between you raider morons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我分不清楚你们这些掠夺者傻逼的区别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyIntroduce3
Ah, now that makes sense. {mocking the prophet}It wouldn't do for the all-seeing Prophet to get off his ass and do his own dirty work, huh? 'Course not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，那就说得过去了。{mocking the prophet}那个全知全能的先知抬抬他的屁股，做他自己的肮脏活是不可能的，哈？当然不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyint_00039fdb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, "Prophet" John told me to come here and help you with whatever problem you've been having.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，“先知”约翰让我过来帮你解决你任何的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyBackground
{malicious}What, you making a movie or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: {malicious}什么，你在拍电影吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fdd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Neutral}No, but really, I'm not really big into talking about myself, so... Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Neutral}不，但是真的，我不太喜欢谈论我自己，所以...是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fdd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mocking/flirty}Aw, darling, you don't need to butter me up with pointless small talk. If you want in my pants, just say so!
ESP.TRADUIT: {mocking/flirty}啊，亲爱的，你不必用毫无意义的闲聊来讨好我。如果你想穿我的裤子，说就是了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Neutral}No, but really, I'm not really big into talking about myself, so... Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Neutral}不，但是真的，我不太喜欢谈论我自己，所以...是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fde_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyBackground2
Oh all right, fine. {lessee}Let's see...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，好的。{lessee}让我想想...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was born way up to the north-east, on an island off the coast of Maine. I probably got my sea-legs before I was even walking on land.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出生在东北边，在缅因州海滨的一座小岛上。我还没学会走就学会游泳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty enough place if you're in the mood for post-nuclear-holocaust sightseeing, but I'd advise against visiting. Not very hospitable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有心情在核毁灭后观光的话，那是个很美的地方，但是我建议不要去。那里不太好客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got real tired of island living pretty early on. So, when I was way too goddamn young for it, I, uh, {you stole it}commandeered the Amity and went on my merry way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于我很早就厌倦了岛上的生活。于是，当我还太年轻的时候，我，呃，{you stole it}征用了和睦号，继续起我的快乐生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kinda just meandered south along the coast, hoping to find something interesting. That was a bust, so I figured, fuck it, I'll head west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我沿着海岸向南边漫游，希望发现些有趣的事情。结果都不怎么样，于是我想，操，我要去西边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Along the way, I made a habit of raiding raiders, which makes me a goddamn pirate by all the laws of the sea. So that's pretty cool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一路上，我习惯了袭击掠夺者，按照所有的海洋法，我就是个该死的海盗。那真是酷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {struggling to think of anything interesting}And... Uh... Oh! There've been lots and lots of wenches along the way!
ESP.TRADUIT: {struggling to think of anything interesting}还有...呃...噢！一路上还有有很多很多的妹子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... That's my story! {cheerful}It's not very interesting when I recount it, but I seem to recall enjoying most of it at the time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...这就是我的故事！{cheerful}我讲述起来不太有趣，但是我好像还记得当时大部分时间都很享受！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {afterthought}'Course, I was pretty well hammered most of the time. {beat}Still am, come to think of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {afterthought}当然，我大部分时间都喝得烂醉。{beat}突然想起来，我现在还是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzybac_00039fe2_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really though, I'm interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过真的，我有兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyNevermind
{Cheerful}Forgotten!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cheerful}那就算了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzynev_00039fe1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事，算了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyPanamaCanal
What, you ain't ever heard of rivers? {beat}Or canals? There's more water than land out there, if you know where to look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你难道没有听说过河流吗？{beat}或者是运河？如果你知道去哪里找的话，那里的水比陆地还多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzypan_0003abea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sailed this tub from the East Coast? Aren't there a few continents in the way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你开着这个浴盆从东海岸过来？一路上不是要跨过几个大陆吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyFiendCrew
{cheerful}Probably 'cause they are!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}也许他们就是！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfie_0003abec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {devious chuckle}Local raiders always make up my crew. They're good at following orders at gunpoint, don't balk at a bit of pillaging, and they're easy to replace.
ESP.TRADUIT: {devious chuckle}我的团队总是由当地掠夺者组成。他们在枪口下很擅长执行命令。抢劫时一点也不退缩, 而且他们很容易被替换。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfie_0003abec_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any time I lose one of the bastards, I just head to shore, find where the gangs tend to hang out, and head there to share a drink with 'em!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这些混蛋死了一个，我随时只要驶向岸边，找出帮派的活动地点，去那里和他们喝一杯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfie_0003abec_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {devious}'Course, Cap'n Lizzy's special homemade moonshine comes with some extra ingredients I wouldn't advise you swallow, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: {devious}当然，利姿船长的特酿是由一些特别的成分酿造的，我可不建议你一口闷，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfie_0003abec_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they come-to, well whaddaya know, we're on the open water with nowhere to run off! And there's usually a shotgun aimed at 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他们上来后，你知道吗，我们在广阔的水面上，根本没有地方可以逃跑！而且通常会有一把霰弹枪指着他们的脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfie_0003abec_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Usually an easy choice at that point. Only difference between a pirate crew and a raider crew is the pirates gotta learn to stop getting seasick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这一点上通常选择是很简单的。海盗船员跟掠夺者成员唯一的区别就是得学会不晕船。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfie_0003abec_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your crew looks like Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的船员看起来像是恶魔帮的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyRaiderSlaver
{offended}Whoa, hey now, there's no slavery on the Amity. {beat}Forced servitude, maybe. Slavery? No fucking way.
ESP.TRADUIT: {offended}哇哦，听着，在和睦号上没有奴役。{beat}也许强制劳动是有的。奴役？没门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyrai_0003abee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First off, I don't buy or sell people. Maybe these folks didn't agree to work for me, but they're still people, not things. No bomb-collars here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我不买卖人口。也许这里有些家伙并不同意为我工作，但他们仍然是人，而不是东西。这里没有会爆炸的奴隶项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyrai_0003abee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secondly, like I said, they're raiders. Y'know, bad folks, big fans of murder and torture and rape... Plenty of 'em actually were proper slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二，就像我说的，他们是掠夺者。坏人，喜欢谋杀，折磨和强奸...相当多的人实际上是真正的奴隶贩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyrai_0003abee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raiders are free game. When I ain't {shang-high-ing}shanghaiing raiders, I'm pillaging them. My crew does mean raider shit to other mean raider shits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者是个自由的游戏。当我不{shang-high-ing}诱拐掠夺者时，我就抢劫他们。我的船员对其他的掠夺者来说是真正的掠夺者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyrai_0003abee_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful}And if you tell me that you don't do awful things to raiders, I'll call you a goddamn liar, and I'll be correct as can be.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}如果你告诉我你没有对掠夺者做过可怕的事，我会说你是个该死的骗子，而我毫无疑问是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyrai_0003abee_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, so your crew are basically just slaves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，所以你的船员基本都是奴隶？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyEastCoast
{shrug}Eh, pretty boring for the most part.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}呃，大部分都相当无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyeas_0003abf0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never really went very far inland, but based on the little bits I could spy from the coast... Eh. Lot of ruins and raiders. Not a whole lot else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有深入内陆，但是基于我从海岸边看到的一点情况来说...呃。到处是废墟和掠夺者。不是全部也有不少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyeas_0003abf0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I'm way more interested in what's going on down in this part of the country.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我个人来说，我对这个地方发生了什么更感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyeas_0003abf0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was the East Coast like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 东海岸怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyStartQuest
Oh, yeah, right. Y'know, for a man with a raging stiffy over the second amendment, the good ol' Prophet sure is reluctant to help in person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是的，对。有个人的老二对第二修正案产生了强烈的勃起，可爱的先知并不情愿亲自来帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, yes, granted, if I had 24/7 access to Ophelia's "celestial body", I probably wouldn't get a whole hell of a lot of work done, myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，是的，如果我一天24小时都能进入奥菲莉娅的“神仙之体”，我可能自己也做不了那么多工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the goddamn same, they'd be fucked without the Amity. You can't move big drums of magic-juice by foot, not if you wanna actually sell the stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 都他妈的一样，如果没有和睦号他们就完蛋了。他们没法靠脚来运送那些装满魔法药剂的大桶，尤其是他们确实需要卖掉这些货物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7f7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But oh, "Cap'n Lizzy is in trouble, can't get up the Colorado? Fuck it, that's her problem! Time for a big drug orgy without her around, hurp hurp!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，噢，“利姿船长有麻烦了，在科罗拉多爬不起来了？操，那是她的问题！是时候在她不在的情况下狂欢了，呵 呵！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7f7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {just ranting at this point}How's about this, eh? Maybe I'll pop a fucking silly-straw in their barrels of trippy-drug-juice, and I'll drink every goddamn drop for myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: {just ranting at this point}这个怎么样，嗯？也许我该在他们装致幻药水的大桶里面插根吸管，然后把它喝得一滴不剩！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7f7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be flying high for... I dunno, probably a couple years, at least... While the "Prophet" will be sitting there scratching his fucking bald spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会飞得很高...我不知道，也许两年，至少...让“先知”坐在那挠他自己的秃头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7f7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: John told me to come here and help you with... something. Care to elaborate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰叫我到这里来帮助你...做事。能详细说明一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyStartQuest2
Uh...Back on topic... Wait, the fuck were we talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...回到主题...等一下，我们之前说的是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, fascinating as this is, is there any way I could convince you to get back on topic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，那真是迷人，有什么办法能让你回到主题上来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyStartQuest3
Oh. Yeah. Right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢。是的。对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I was just going about my merry fucking way, sailing up the Colorado with all this cargo... When we run into trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我他妈正在以我愉快的方式，带着这些货物在科罗拉多河上航行...然后我们遇到了麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some fucking crew of cocksuckers with rocket launchers were waiting on both shores, and they opened fire as soon as they had good sightlines on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些他妈带着火箭筒的龟孙子已经在河岸两边等着了，我们一进入射程他们就发射了火箭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucky for all of us, {proud}I happen to be the finest goddamn captain and helmsman in the world, so I pulled us around no worse for wear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都很幸运，{proud}我碰巧是他妈世界上最好的船长和舵手，在没有太多受损的情况下把船带了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I sent a couple guys in skiffs to scout the area out the next day, and, uh... Yeah, they got blown to little pieces. {shrug}Whoops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我第二天派了两个手下坐小船去侦察这片区域，然后，呃...是的，他们被轰成了渣滓。{shrug}哎呀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fb_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The "problem" is that cunt with the rocket launcher, and I need you to "fix" it by replacing every molecule in his body with hot fucking lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: “问题”就是那帮拿着火箭筒的王八蛋，然后我要你去“解决”他，用滚烫的铅来换掉他身上的每一个部位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fb_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What. Is. The. Problem. You. Need. Me. To. Fix?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你 想 要 我 解 决 什 么 问 题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyStartQuest4
As a matter of fact, I happen to know precisely who he is, because he got his dumb ass in the news. {handing a paper over}Check this out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确切地说，我恰好知道他是谁，因为这蠢货上了新闻。{handing a paper over}看看这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A former pornstar turned raider psychopath, terrorizing the waterways. I wouldn't believe this shit if I didn't see it with my own goddamn eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个前色情明星变成精神病掠夺者，威胁着水路的安全。我要不是自己他妈的亲眼所见，都不敢相信这是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the man has no goddamn restraint. The NCR wants him dead, the Legion wants him dead, Mojave wasters want him dead, I want him fucking dead...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人没有任何的管束。NCR想让他死，军团想让他死，莫哈维的人想他死，我他妈的也想他死...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I guess when he ain't firing rockets at my boat, he entertains himself by raiding folks. Gruesome murders, little torture, lots of rape...
ESP.TRADUIT: 加之，我猜他没用火箭射我的船的时候，他的娱乐方式都是抢劫，谋杀，一点点的折磨拷打，和大量的强奸...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stretch 'basically' out}Basically, he's a fucking depraved lunatic even by raider standards. I don't think he's even doing most of this shit for profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stretch 'basically' out}基本上，就算以掠夺者的标准来看他都是个他妈的道德败坏的疯子。我甚至觉得他做这些事都不全是为了赚钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if not for me and my beautiful boat, you should ice him in honor of all the other random folks he's murdered and raped. {beat, slightly under your breath}Quite a lot of those.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，就算不是为了我和我漂亮的船，你也应该为其他被他杀害和强奸的人而干掉他。{beat, slightly under your breath}很多人都是被他害的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzysta_0003b7fd_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaWoodeyFlavorNote 1
setstage aaaLizzyPirateQuest 20
I'm going to need a bit more to go on here than just "a cunt with a rocket launcher" you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的信息，而不仅仅是什么“一伙带着火箭筒的王八蛋“而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyAboutWoodey
{shrug}Hell if I know. Article I gave you makes it sound like his movies sucked, not in the way porno vids are meant to suck, and he's always been crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}我他妈怎么知道。我给你看的文章听起来像是他的电影完蛋了，不是色情视频里面那种“玩蛋”，然后他一直就疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0003b7ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {under your breath}Not like I'm really the target audience for his particular style of movies, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: {under your breath}我不是他那种电影风格的目标观众，不管怎么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0003b7ff_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other than the amusing career history, he sounds like your typical batshit insane raider asshole. He likes drugs, and murdering and raping folks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了有趣的职业经历，他就是个典型的狗屎疯子掠夺者烂逼。他喜欢毒品，还有谋杀和强奸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0003b7ff_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess it's kinda impressive how he's managed to piss off the Legion and NCR at the same time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他怎么同时惹毛了军团和NCR，这点让我印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0003b7ff_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {just bullshitting at this point}Ooh, maybe they can arrange a cease-fire just to work together and kill him, only to find a grudging respect forming between them.
ESP.TRADUIT: {just bullshitting at this point}唔，也许他们双方可以达成个停火协定然后一起干掉他，结果却发现他们之间还能形成一种勉强的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0003b7ff_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And by the time Woodey is dead, the NCR and Legion will realize they have more in common than they ever thought, and they'll hug it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等伍迪死了之后，NCR和军团会意识到他们比以往任何时候都有更多的共同点，然后他们会以拥抱结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0003b7ff_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you go, I just solved your whole fucking war for you, losers! Thank you, thank you, I'll take my medals in cash and ass, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这下你看，我刚刚替你解决了整个他妈的战争，废物！感谢你，感谢你，我要把我的奖章换成现金和屁股，拜托。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0003b7ff_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else you can tell me about this Woodey guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么关于这个叫伍迪的家伙的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetStartPirateQuest
Perfect, you're hired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完美，你被雇佣了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... Supply issues, sure. I guess I can help out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好...补给问题，好的。我想我能帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetStartPirateQuest2
Good question. You see, there's an incredibly important service that keeps our community running. Basically, drug smuggling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好问题。你看，有一项非常重要的服务可以维持我们社区的正常运转。基本上就是，毒品走私。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We sell our surplus for big money, the chems go out into the wasteland to find happy homes, and we spread our influence a bit. Everyone wins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们把多余的货卖掉挣大钱，这些毒品去到废土里寻找快乐的家园，而且我们也扩大了一些影响力。简直是双赢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Problem is, {emph}the man doesn't like it when people are free and happy, and {emph}the man wants to shut down our shipments. NCR, Legion, all of them fuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，{emph}当人们自由和快乐的时候有人是不喜欢的，而且{emph}那些人想要关闭我们的货物运输。NCR，军团，他们所有的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be04_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, of course, the job of getting the shipments from point A to point B is goddamn vital. You're probably clueing in on the job now, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，当然，把货物从A地运到B地的工作就是必不可少的。你可能已经摸到工作的线索了，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be04_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, thought so. {beat}Right, so get on out there, and help fix our smuggler's boat, or whatever the fuck her problem is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想是这样。{beat}好吧，那么去到那里，帮助修理我们的走私船，或者解决其他任何他妈的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be04_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Hired to do what, exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...雇我到底做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetDeclineQuests
Then fuck off, I have important astral prophet shit to deal with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就他妈滚，我还有重要的精神先知的事情要处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetdecli_0003be06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This doesn't interest me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这个没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetStartPirateQuest3
Yeah, her boat. What, you think we lug giant drums full of chemicals around the desert with our legs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，她的船。什么，你以为我们是用脚在沙漠里搬运这些装满毒品的大桶的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we tried that once, and it led to one of our brothers getting shot in the face, and 50 gallons of our ritual insight shit getting stolen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们试过一次，结果我们的一个兄弟脸上被射了一枪，然后有50加仑的货被偷了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we have an honorary member, with a boat, who smuggles our stuff up and down the Colorado. Problem is... Something. I dunno what it is, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们有一个荣誉会员，她有艘船，在科罗拉多来回走私我们的货。问题是...出了什么事。我也不知道怎么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be08_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's been parked near Camp Golf, sending bitchy messages about "rocket cocksuckers" or something. Fuck if I know. Go find her, see what she wants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她停泊在高尔夫营附近，发来了他妈的什么“火箭王八蛋”的消息。我他妈怎么知道。去找到她，看看她需要什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be08_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, this is vitally important. You take care of this, you might just earn your place among the, uh, astral children, and all that jazz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这是非常重要的。如果你把这件事办好了，你就可以赢得在，呃，群星之子中的位置，还有诸如此类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstart_0003be08_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaLizzyPirateQuest 10
Fix a boat. Are you fucking with me, old man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 修一艘船。你在耍我吗，老头？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetStolenDrugs
Fuck if I know. All I know is we were moving Ophelia's special stuff from our old commune to this nice one here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈怎么知道。我只知道当时我们正在把奥菲莉娅的特殊物品从我们的旧公社运到这里这个新公社。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstole_0003be0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of our members was tasked with getting this big barrel of stuff from there to here. But he was taking his sweet-ass time. Days late, I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们中的一个成员被指派了这个任务，把这个大桶从那里运到这里。但是他一定是边玩边走。我的意思是，晚了几天还没到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstole_0003be0a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, finally, I sent some of my people to see what they could find. They found our brother, dead. Our Brahmin, dead. And our ritual stuff was gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，我派出一些人去看看能找到什么。他们发现了那个兄弟，已经死了。我们的双头牛也死了。而我们的货已经不见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstole_0003be0a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm mostly pissed off about one of our guys getting murdered, but O was real freaked out about the missing drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对我们的人被谋杀的事很生气，但是“奥”真的被失踪的毒品吓坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstole_0003be0a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "That's what we use for our enlightenment rituals!" She says. {disdain}Yeah, whatever. Sure, it'll send you on a crazy-powerful trip, but who gives a fuck?
ESP.TRADUIT: “那是我们用来进行启迪仪式的！”她说。{disdain}是的，随便吧。它能把你送上一个超强的旅程，但他妈谁管他？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstole_0003be0a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you care, ask her. Me, I don't care, so I ain't asking shit. {under your breath}She's annoying when she gets worked up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你关心的话，去问她。我吗，我不在乎，所以什么都不问。{under your breath}她兴奋的时候很烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetstole_0003be0a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDLearnedAboutDrugs to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDLearnedAboutDrugs + 1
Tell me more about these drugs that got stolen from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我更多关于你被偷走的毒品的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebCottonwoodDone
Grand. I'll take that junk off your hands, and put it into the hands of people who know to produce vast quantities of cheap liquor for me to sell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。这东西对你没用，我要把它交到那些知道怎么用它来生产大量廉价酒的人手上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebco_0003c410_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your pay, in the meantime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时，这是你的酬劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebco_0003c410_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaLegionMcGuffinBox 1
player.additem caps001 1000
I got those brewing supplies from Cottonwood Cove for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从棉花丛湾给你拿来了这些酿造用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grand. I'll take that junk off your hands, and put it into the hands of people who know to produce vast quantities of cheap liquor for me to sell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。这东西对你没用，我要把它交到那些知道怎么用它来生产大量廉价酒的人手上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebco_0003c413_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And... I'm not giving you a cent, because you murdered those security folks. Actions have consequences, who the fuck knew!
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且...我不会给你一个子，因为你杀了那些守卫。谁又他妈知道，任何行动都有后果呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebco_0003c413_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaLegionMcGuffinBox 1
I got those brewing supplies from Cottonwood Cove for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从棉花丛湾给你拿来了这些酿造用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepFive
Yes and no. I have some plans in place, but right now, I'd like you to assist the pretty lady sitting nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以说有也可以说没有。我有一些计划，但是现在，我希望你去帮助坐在旁边的那位美丽的女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003c412_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's going to be managing the whores once I have this enterprise off the ground, and before we go any further, I'd like for her to be appeased.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她将会在我会所成立的时候负责管理妓女，而在我们进行下一步之前，我希望能好好地安抚她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003c412_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once that's done, I'll give you the next real job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦完成那个，我就会给你下一个工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003c412_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a new task for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有新的任务给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just so. Now, unless you suffered a traumatic brain injury in the last couple of hours, I've no doubt you recall fetching those liquor supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正是如此。除非你在几个小时前被撞了脑袋，否则我想你一定记得你拿回来的那些酿酒用品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d02e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The reason, of course, being that I don't want to set up a distribution deal with whatever fucking inbred moonshiners we might find around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 理由嘛，当然了，我可不想跟周围那些他妈的白痴私酒商签订分配协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d02e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want us to be able to handle such things by ourselves. More profit, less relying on yokels. Who could fault me in that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要我们自己掌握这些东西。对那些乡巴佬依赖越少，利润就越高。谁能说我错了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d02e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alas, when it comes to brewing chems, I'm afraid we have no choice but to rely on others. Lucky for us, I have somebody in mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎，问题又来到制作毒品了，我恐怕这个我们只能靠别人了。幸运的是，我脑海里已经有人选了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d02e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing you have another job for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你还有别的工作给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepFiveCont
A preacher, of all fucking things, if you can believe that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个传道士，如果你相信所有那些他妈的东西的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d032_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, granted, not a Christian preacher. Some sort of mystical tribal voodoo nonsense, or something to that effect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，不是基督传教士。是某种神秘部落的巫术，或者此类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d032_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, she's apparently a known quantity in several of the Mojave's more... Uh, how to put this delicately? {beat}Destitute shitholes. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，很明显，她在莫哈维的几个地方都是很出名的...呃，怎么说好些呢？{beat}贫民窟。是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d032_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She preaches of some sort of metaphysical salvation, and here's the good bit, the path to her brand of enlightenment is copious amounts of drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她宣扬某种玄学的救赎，这也就是说得好听点，其实她的启迪之路就是大量的毒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d032_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By my understanding, she's currently spreading her notion of the good word up in that Aerotech hobo encampment. No doubt she'd be happy to chat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，她目前正在航空科技办公楼的难民营宣扬神的概念。她肯定会很乐意跟你交谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d032_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 100
So who do you have in mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你想到的人是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebStepFiveKhans
Interesting, if sadly irrelevant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣，但是可悲的是没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d031_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, while I hold no personal animosity towards the Great Khans, involving them would be the furthest fucking thing from lucrative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我对大汗帮没有个人的仇恨，招惹他们会妨碍我们赚大钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d031_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember, I intend to primarily cater to NCR tourists. No doubt they'd have plenty to bitch about if they learned of any Khan involvement here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，我们主要的生意对象是NCR的游客。如果他们知道这里面有大汗帮的介入，毫无疑问会他们会大肆骂街的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d031_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, scuttlebutt suggests the Great Khans are preparing a great exodus from the Mojave in the future. I doubt I could rely on them forever, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，有传言说大汗帮未来准备大批撤离莫哈维。我担心不能长期依靠他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d031_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frankly, I'm surprised they've stayed here as long as they have! Have you seen how they dress? Leather and furs? In the desert?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我很惊讶他们在这里呆了这么久！你见过他们的穿着吗？皮和羽毛？在沙漠里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d031_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they can tolerate that, it does give a certain credence to their infamous resilience. {grumbling aside}Personally, I can barely get by in this fucking suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们这都能够忍受，那确实给他们臭名昭著的适应能力提供了一定的可信度。{grumbling aside}但就我而言，我根本无法忍受穿成那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebst_0003d031_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chem supply? No problem. I'm in the Great Khans, I can work out a deal for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒品供应？没问题。我加入了大汗帮，我能帮你达成协议。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebDepthsCallback
You... Clearly lead a busy life, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...真是有个忙碌的一生啊，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebde_0003d034_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, I'm relatively sure that this preacher is relatively benign, so long as you aren't adversely predisposed towards narcotics and lunacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我比较肯定这个传教士是比较温和的，只要你对毒品和精神病没有什么反对倾向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebde_0003d034_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shrug}Or maybe she eats babies or something. Fuck if I know. I just want a steady supply of chems so I can get fucking wealthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}或者她吃婴儿什么的。我他妈怎么知道。我只是他妈想保证我的毒品有个稳定的供应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebde_0003d034_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A preacher by Aerotech? I've dealt with one of those before, and it ended with a pile of dead kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 航空科技办公楼的传教士？我以前对付过这样的人，最后死了一群小孩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaIntro1
Yes, of course! I'm well-versed in the art of aura-reading, you see. {yes it was}It wasn't the light on your wrist doohickey that I noticed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然！我非常精通占灵术。{yes it was}这不是指你手腕上那个小东西发出的光！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0003d037_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope it isn't terribly presumptuous of me to ask, but... Have you come seeking enlightenment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我这样问不是太冒昧，但是...你是来寻求启迪的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0003d037_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My... aura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的...气？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaIntro2
{cheerful}If you were to sit down beside a blind man, and describe to him the view of Vegas glittering in the night, wouldn't he call you crazy?
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}如果你坐在一个盲人旁边，给他描述维加斯夜晚的辉煌景象，他是不是也会说你是个疯子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0003d039_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world is full of possibilities, friend. However will we discover them all if we bury our heads in the sand, blissfully unaware of what {emph}could be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界充满无限的可能，朋友。如果我们把头埋在沙里，对真理一无所知，又怎么能{emph}发现他们呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0003d039_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope it isn't terribly presumptuous of me, but I'd be remiss if I didn't ask... Would you consider joining our family of truth-seekers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我没有太放肆，但如果我不问就失职了...你想加入我们真理追寻者的家庭吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0003d039_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Another lunatic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太棒了。又一个疯子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanWhoYou
{wary}Don't see how that's your business, {said like a slur}stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: {wary}与你无关，{said like a slur}陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanWhoYouTwo
{cagey}Fine. I'm Danielle. The rest - don't you worry about. I look after 'em, you got that?
ESP.TRADUIT: {cagey}好吧。我叫丹妮尔。其他的——你不用担心。我照顾他们，知道了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And before you ask, no, we ain't going to go pickpocket some mark for you, or nothing like that. {venomous}And none of us are offering a "good time", neither.
ESP.TRADUIT: 千万别问我，不，我们不会去帮你偷东西的，或者其他类似的事情也不会。{venomous}而且我们也没人提供什么“舒服时间”的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, last little bit, {defiant/cold}if you're looking for some poor little urchins to collar, I'll put a bullet in your skull. {genuine/threatening}You wouldn't be my first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一点，{defiant/cold}如果你想把某个可怜的流浪儿抓去当奴隶，我会一枪把你脑袋崩了。{genuine/threatening}你绝对不是第一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't mean any harm, I'd just like to know who I'm speaking with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有恶意，我只想知道我在和谁说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanBackground
{that's a stupid question}The hell do you think? We just like hanging out in some dark alleyway by the dumpsters?
ESP.TRADUIT: {that's a stupid question}你他妈在想什么？我们是垃圾箱旁边的黑暗巷子里面闲逛吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of our parents are dead and gone. Others got themselves separated and never hooked back up. {slightly somber - this one is you}And some just didn't want us no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一些人的父母已经死了。另一些人的失散了，再也没有联系。{slightly somber - this one is you}还有一些根本就不想要我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now we got nobody but each other, so I guess we're all alone together. {blistering sarcasm}At least we live in the goddamn wasteland paradise of New Vegas!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们只有彼此了，所以我想我们都是一体的。{blistering sarcasm}至少我们住在这个该死的废土天堂——新维加斯!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的故事是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanAboutDoor
Y'know, I wish I could tell you to piss off, 'cause I don't know every damn alley in this horrible slum, but... {exasperated}I probably do, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，我本来想叫你滚开，因为我并不知道这个可怕的贫民窟的每一个巷子，但是...{exasperated}我想可能我知道，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for help, depends on what's in it for us. So, which door is this, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然要帮忙，那就要取决于这里面我们有什么好处。那么，这是哪扇门？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a locked door in one of the alleyways here. I need to get in. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的一条小巷里有一扇锁着的门。我需要进去。你能帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanAboutDoor2
{a little nervous}Whoa, that's- that's a bad place, okay? I don't think nobody uses it no more, but... They used to.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little nervous}哇，那是——那是个破地方，好吗？我以为没人再使用它了，但...他们曾经用过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'd take people in, and a lot of times, those folks'd never come back out. Any of us with sense keep away from that place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会把人带进去，很多时候，那些被带进去的人都没出来。任何有理智的人都得离那地方远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hell you want in there for, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你到底要进去干嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcf9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's in the alleyway behind the Old Mormon Fort and across the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在街对面老摩门要塞后面的巷子里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanAboutDoor3
{pleasantly surprised}Killed a sla- really now?
ESP.TRADUIT: {pleasantly surprised}杀了个奴——真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcfc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {thinking}Well, okay then. I suppose I might be willing to help you... If you help us, first. {bitter irony}Nothing's ever free in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinking}呃，那好吧。我想我可能愿意帮你...如果你先帮我们的话。{bitter irony}自由之城里没有什么是免费的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcfc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're not stupid. We can scrape some cash together, do what we gotta do to keep ourselves fed and in water. There's one thing, though, we can't get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不傻。我们可以凑些钱，做我们能做的事情来保证温饱。但是有一件事情我们做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcfc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you, you could, no problem. So, here's the deal, and I ain't haggling: You get me a dozen bottles of whiskey, I get you in that building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你，你可以，没问题。那么，条件是这样，不讲价：你帮我弄来一打威士忌酒，我就帮你进入那个建筑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcfc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed a slaver hanging out over there. I need to make sure that's the end of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在那儿杀了一个奴隶贩子。我要确保事情到此为止。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanWhiskey1
{answering a stupid question}Why does anyone want that much whiskey, you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: {answering a stupid question}为什么有人要那么多威士忌，你想想？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dcfe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? Why do you want that much whiskey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认真的吗？你为什么要那么多威士忌？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanWhiskey2
Yeah, well so does {coldly furious}abandoning us here to beg and starve on the streets, where we have to fend off thieves and rapers and worse just to survive!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，{coldly furious}把我们丢弃在街上要饭和挨饿，为了生存还要避开强盗和强奸犯等等，也是不负责任的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dd00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So unless you'd like to buy us all a nice place to live, with plenty of food and water and education, why don't you jam your sanctimony up your ass?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你能给我们所有人买个更好的地方住，还有足够的食物、水和教育，为什么不把你那份伪善塞进你屁眼里去？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003dd00_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Handing that much booze to a group of kids seems wildly irresponsible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对一群小孩来说拥有那么多酒似乎非常不负责任。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanWhiskey3
Did you not hear me when I said I'm not haggling? That's okay, I'll repeat it for you. {slowly}I am not haggling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你难道没听我刚说过不接受讨价还价吗？好吧，我再重复一次。{slowly}我不讲价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e303_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want in that stupid door, I can get you in. You want me to get you in, you give me what I want. That's the only deal there is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想进那个门，我能帮你进去。如果你想让我帮你进去，你就得给我我要的东西。这就是唯一的条件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e303_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm really not comfortable getting whiskey for you kids. Can't we work out another deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的觉得给你们小孩子弄威士忌不太好。我们不能想个别的办法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanWhiskey4
{pleased}Well alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: {pleased}那就非常好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e305_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 20
Fine, I'll get your whiskey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会给你弄来威士忌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanGiveWhiskeyGood
That's what I like to hear! Let's take a little test, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才是我想要听到的！我们来小小地测试一下，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30d_1.ogg
NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pleasant surprise}Huh, kinda expected you to hand over a dozen bottles full of piss or something
ESP.TRADUIT: {pleasant surprise}呼，你是不是装了一打尿还是什么的过来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you held up your end of the deal, so I sent one of my guys to unlock that door for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你完成了你的那部分协议，那我派一个我们的人去帮你打开那扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me know if you find anything in there, 'cause I'm keeping my people the hell away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在那里发现了什么请告诉我，因为我会让我的人离远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem WhiskeyDixon 12
setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 30
<Give whiskey> Here you go, a dozen bottles of booze.
ESP.TRADUIT: <交出威士忌> 给你，这是一打威士忌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanGiveWhiskeyDixon
That's what I like to hear! Let's take a little test, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才是我想要听到的！我们来小小地测试一下，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30a_1.ogg
NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {coughing, you drank something awful}Aw, geez, what the hell? {accusatory}Goddamnit, is this Dixon's swill?
ESP.TRADUIT: {coughing, you drank something awful}啊，天哪，这是什么？{accusatory}该死的，这是狄克逊的废水吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {accusatory}You cheap bastard. {begrudging respect}That's probably exactly what I'd buy if I was in your shoes. {grumbling to self}Shit tastes like paint thinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: {accusatory}你这个贱人。{begrudging respect}如果我站在你的立场，那我可能也会买。{grumbling to self}这你妈尝起来就像油漆稀释剂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. You held up your end of the deal, {under your breath}barely, so I got one of my guys to crack that lock for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样。你完成了你的那部分协议，{under your breath}那么我让我的人帮你撬开锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me know what you find in there, 'cause I told my guys to stay the hell away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你在那里的发现告诉我，因为我会让我的人离远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem WhiskeyDixon 12
setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 30
<Give Dixon's whiskey> Here you go, a dozen bottles of booze.
ESP.TRADUIT: <交出狄克逊的威士忌> 给你，这是一打烈酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanGiveWhiskeyShit
That's what I like to hear! Let's take a little test, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才是我想要听到的！我们来小小地测试一下，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30b_1.ogg
NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: {violently spitting foul drink}The hell was in that?! Did you find this stuff in someone's septic tank?
ESP.TRADUIT: {violently spitting foul drink}这里面是什么鬼？！你是在化粪池里面找到的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, look, I said I wanted a dozen bottles of whiskey, not a dozen whiskey bottles that are full of... Turpentine, or whatever this shit is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我说的是我要一打威士忌，不是一打用威士忌酒瓶装的...松节油或者什么鬼东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go get me some stuff that humans can actually drink. {beat}And take the rest of this shit back. Go find a toilet to dump it in, or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去给我那些真正人能喝的东西来。{beat}还有把剩下的这些狗屎拿走。去找个厕所把它倒掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003e30b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem IrradiatedWhiskey 12 rewardkarma -100
player.additem IrradiatedWhiskey 11
<Give irradiated whiskey> Here you go, a dozen bottles of booze.
ESP.TRADUIT: <交出辐射威士忌> 给你，这是一打烈酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesStartSecondQuest
{not following}Yeah, and? What's your point, precisely?
ESP.TRADUIT: {not following}是吗，然后呢？那你的意思是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e910_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...What, you think that, by virtue of me directing you to kill the man, I'd also be inclined to know how to open any random door he hung out by?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...什么，你认为我的高尚美德会指引你杀了那个人,我也很想知道怎么打开任意一扇他闲逛经过的门？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e910_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Afraid not. {exaggerated sultry}I was never much of a breaking-and-entering type of guy. I prefer opening legs, not rusty old doors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不行。{exaggerated sultry}我再也不是那种破门而入的家伙了。我宁愿打开腿，也不去打开生锈的旧门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e910_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, there was a locked door that Mendoza was loitering around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，门多萨一直在一扇锁着的门面前闲逛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaManwhoreMilesStartSecondQuest2
Well, it's nice that you care so much, but to be honest... I really don't, myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，你这么关心真的很好，但是老实说...我一点也不关心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e912_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {exasperated sigh}Look, I'm a busy man, but I suppose when I'm not {double entendre}otherwise occupied, I can try and ponder some sort of solution you'd appreciate.
ESP.TRADUIT: {exasperated sigh}你看，我是个大忙人，但如果我没{double entendre}被其他事情占用的时候，我也许可以尝试琢磨出你喜欢的解决办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e912_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But for now, I've got nothing, so, in the meantime... {sultry}Did you want something else? Like, maybe, me taking off my pants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在，我什么想法也没有，那么，现在...{sultry}你还需要别的吗？比如，我脱掉裤子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e912_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaaSullivanCheckMessage
I'd really like to make sure Mendoza wasn't hiding anything behind that door. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很想确定门多萨没有在那扇门后藏任何东西。你能帮我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mildly annoyed}Look, it's a tight urban area. There's bound to be no shortage of doors. I wouldn't worry about it, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: {mildly annoyed}你看，这是一个拥挤的市区。肯定不会缺少门的。我一点也不关心，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e913_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMendozaSecretDoorREF.disable
I'd really like to make sure Mendoza wasn't hiding anything behind that door. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很想确定门多萨没有在那扇门后藏任何东西。你能帮我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose. Speaking from experience, the dirt-smeared street urchins and gutter rats tend to be experts at getting into places they aren't wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜。根据经验来看，脏兮兮的街上流浪儿和地沟里的老鼠们往往是进入某个的地方的专家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e914_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you see if you can find anyone like that in Freeside, and see if you can work out a deal, if you care that much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你那么关心的话，你为什么不试试在自由之城里面找到那样的人，看有没有办法进去呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e914_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 10
I'd really like to make sure Mendoza wasn't hiding anything behind that door. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很想确定门多萨没有在那扇门后藏任何东西。你能帮我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose. Speaking from experience, the dirt-smeared street urchins and gutter rats tend to be experts at getting into places they aren't wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜。根据经验来看，脏兮兮的街上流浪儿和地沟里的老鼠们往往是进入某个的地方的专家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e915_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you see if you can find anyone like that in Freeside, and see if you can work out a deal, if you care that much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你那么关心的话，你为什么不试试在自由之城里面找到那样的人，看有没有办法进去呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miles Starkey [070235A7] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult08\aaageneric_aaamanwhoremile_0003e915_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 10
I'd really like to make sure Mendoza wasn't hiding anything behind that door. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很想确定门多萨没有在那扇门后藏任何东西。你能帮我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanNextStep
{cold fury}I hate goddamn slavers. Most of 'em left Vegas after House took over. Y'know, besides the ones he {emph}hired.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cold fury}我恨该死的奴隶贩子。在豪斯先生接管维加斯之后他们很多都离开了。除了他雇佣的{emph}那一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003ef1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was real little, we always heard scary stories about the slave rackets the Omertas ran, back when they were called Slither Kin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我很小的时候，我们经常听到关于黑手党经营奴隶买卖的可怕的故事，那时他们还叫做斯利瑟家族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003ef1c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course these ones went running before anyone could hunt them down. I like to think I'd kill 'em myself but... Probably just tell the Kings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，这些人在有人追捕他们之前就跑了。我很想自己杀了他们但是...也许只要告诉猫王帮就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003ef1c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they had some hostages, still, huh? Do you know who they worked for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且他们仍然还控制着一些人质，哈？你知道他们其实为谁工作吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003ef1c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I checked that utility area out. Looks like it was used as a holding pen for a few local slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我查过公用区了。看起来像是当地几个奴隶贩子用来关押奴隶的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanNextStep2
Oh. That place. That bouncer they've got probably has the biggest gun in the district. Not a day goes by I don't hear him unloading into some thug.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢。那个地方。他们的那个门卫有把那里最大的枪。我没有一天不会听到他在料理那些恶徒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003ef1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I won't be sad to hear he's gone. But... Long gone, you said? That I don't like as much. Means his goons probably scattered every direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，听到他离开我不会觉得伤心。但是...你说离开了很久？这我不太喜欢。那意味着他的手下可能散布得到处都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003ef1e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... {deep breath, asking for help is hard for you}I need... I need you to try and track them down. For their captives, if nothing else. Please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...{deep breath, asking for help is hard for you}我想...我想让你追踪他们。我是为了被他们囚禁的人，没别的。拜托。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003ef1e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {somber}We have to try and save them. I don't know anything about running the wastes. Don't know nobody that does. Just you. So... Please.
ESP.TRADUIT: {somber}我们要想办法救他们。我对废土一无所知，也不知道谁对废土更了解，只有你。所以...拜托了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003ef1e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A guy named Roy Sullivan. He owned that Sullivan's Den dive bar. He's long gone now, I saw to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫罗伊·苏利文的家伙。他经营着那家叫做苏利文的窝的酒吧。我注意到他走了很久了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanRefuseQuest
{disgusted}Oh, well that's just business as usual then, isn't it? Get the fuck out of here before I put a bullet in your spine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {disgusted}噢，那么就按照平常的生意来做，是吗？在我给你脊椎一枪之前，赶紧给我滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f522_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 255
Nah. I just wanted to make sure the slaver I killed didn't have friends. You're on your own, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。我只是想确认我杀的那个奴隶贩子没有别的朋友。你自己的事自己做，小孩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanAcceptQuest
{relieved}Okay. Okay, good. If he was moving slaves, he'd probably wanna avoid most kinds of authorities. Kings, NCR, whatever else...
ESP.TRADUIT: {relieved}好的。好的，很好。如果他在运送奴隶，他可能会尽量避开当局。猫王帮，NCR，等等...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f523_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he's alone except for his captives, so assuming he's not a complete moron, he'd probably wanna sell them off as soon as he can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了他的奴隶以外他只有一个人，假设他不是彻底的白痴，他应该会尽快地卖掉奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f523_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Legion, then. Wherever the closest Legion encampment is, that'd be my guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...就是军团了。可能是最近的军团营地，这就是我的猜测。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f523_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know the Wasteland better than I do. You'd probably have a better idea of where that'd be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你比我更了解废土。也许你有更好的主意找到那个地方在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f523_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disgusted}Legion of slave-traders... The hell is wrong with these people? World just can't stop giving me things to hate, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: {disgusted}军团奴隶贩子...这些人到底有什么毛病？这个世界总是不停地增加让我憎恨的东西，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f523_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 50
Of course I'm going to try and track them down. Any ideas where I should start?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然我会去追踪他们。我该从哪里开始，有没有什么建议？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanHate
{bitter}I'm just another starveling huddled in some dirty slum back alleyway. I've probably had more hate than food in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {bitter}我只是一个在肮脏的贫民窟巷子里缩成一团的饥饿的人。在我的生活中，仇恨比食物还多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f525_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes the Kings or the Followers can spare a few caps for us, but only if we're lucky. Everyone's just looking out for them and theirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候猫王帮或者追随者会施舍我们一点瓶盖，还得在我们走运的情况下。每个人都在照顾他们和他们的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f525_2.ogg
