ESP.ORIGINAL: The whole time, we get to cower behind House's big trash barricades, hearing all the music and rich asshole parties on the other side, every day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全部时候，我们都得缩在豪斯先生筑起的大垃圾路障后面，听着另一边的音乐和有钱人的节目，每一天都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f525_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we don't get in, {venomous}we're just filthy poors. But hey, {bitter sarcasm}at least now we get a steady stream of tourists from the wealthy NCR traipsing on through!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们没有进去，{venomous}我们只是肮脏的穷人。但是，{bitter sarcasm}至少现在我们有了稳定的游客来源，那些从富有的NCR来的人在这里进进出出！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f525_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're here to win big in Vegas, and go home rich! You know what we get from them? Sometimes they spit in our faces if we bother 'em too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们来维加斯想发大财，然后衣锦还乡！你知道我们从他们那里得到什么了吗？有时候我们打扰到他们时，他们会朝我们脸上吐口水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f525_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the ones who can't afford to get on the Strip? No problem, they can just squat here in our slum, and push us out to die in the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些付不起钱进赌场的人呢？没问题，他们就强占我们的贫民窟，把我们赶到沙漠去等死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f525_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, pardon me for being {emph}dramatic, {emph}stranger, but {emph}hate is all I've got. Hate, and these little kids who're too young to fend for themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我的{emph}激动，{emph}陌生人，但是{emph}我心里只有憎恨。我恨，这些小孩们还太小，无法照顾自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f525_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a bit melodramatic, don't you think? You're just a kid, what do you know about hate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有点耸人听闻，你不觉得吗？你只是个孩子，你知道憎恨是什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanOfferHelp
Maybe later. I've got some ideas. Right now, I just want you to try to help save those captives, and kill the slaver cocksucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚点再说吧。我有主意了。现在，我只想要你帮我解救那些俘虏，然后杀了那个该死的奴隶贩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f527_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I help you guys out of this situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮你们摆脱这个困境吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceGiveWater1
Thank... you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢...你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacegi_0003f545_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem WaterPurified 1 rewardkarma 10
<Give purified water> Here, take this.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给纯净水> 给，拿着这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceGiveWater2
Thank... you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢...你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacegi_0003f546_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem WaterUnpurified 1 rewardkarma 5
<Give dirty water> Here, take this.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给污水> 给，拿着这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceGiveWater3
Thank... you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢...你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacegi_0003f547_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem IrradiatedWaterUnpurified 1 rewardkarma 1
<Give irradiated water> Here, take this.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给辐射水> 给，拿着这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceNoWater1
Wouldn't mind a bullet, then... {cough}
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就不介意一颗子弹了...{cough}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjaceno_0003f548_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't got no water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根本就没有水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceNoWater2
Then just... Fuckin' shoot me, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就...他妈的杀了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjaceno_0003f549_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't share water with slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我不会把水给奴隶贩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceProceed
Ugh... The whore dropped dead yesterday. Might've... Had some disease. Don't know... Didn't ask. Left her for the buzzards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...那个妓女昨天突然死了。也许是...得了病。我不知道...别问我。把她留给秃鹰吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kids... They're gone. Bitch shot me... Walked over, turned off their collars... Walked away with them... Wouldn't... Ugh... Wouldn't give me mercy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 小孩...他们跑了。那婊子开枪打我...走过去，关掉他们的项圈...跟他们一起走了...不用...呃...不用可怜我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knew what she did... Left me gutshot in the dirt... No hope. No... chance. Ugh... {bitter}Guess I got what I had coming... {cough/laugh}
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道她做了什么...让我中枪倒在沙漠里...没有希望。没有...机会。呃...{bitter}我猜我得到了我想要的...{cough/laugh}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to you? Where are the captives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么了？俘虏都去哪儿了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceProceed2
That bitch... Legion isn't far... Hope they caught her... Fuck her bloody... Evil bitch... Knew what she did to me... Let me die slow like this...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个婊子...军团离这里不远...希望他们抓到她...操他妈...恶毒的婊子...你知道她对我做了什么...让我在这里慢慢等死...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shot came outta nowhere... Waited a bit, made sure she really got me... Then came out from behind some rock... Didn't say no words to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道枪从哪里打来的...过了一会，确认她打中我之后...就从岩石后面走出来...没对我说一句话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walked right past me... To the slaves... Turned off their collars... Walked away. I was... Begging, man... Begged her to put me down...
ESP.TRADUIT: 直接走过我身边...到奴隶那里...关掉他们的项圈...然后走了。我...乞求，伙计...乞求她直接杀了我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't say nothing... Just stared at me like I weren't human... Know... I'm not a saint... But I don't let folk suffer like this...
ESP.TRADUIT: 她什么都没有说...只是瞪着我，就像我不是人...知道吗...我不是个圣人...但我从来不这样折磨一个人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After she was gone, thought... Maybe I could make it. Supposed to be doc in Novac... But I can't stand... Tried... Just fell back down and bled more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她走了之后，我想...也许能活下来。也许诺瓦克的医生可以救我...但是我站不起来...很累...然后又摔倒，血流得更多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crawled up here so I can die in the shade... She took my gun, too. Otherwise... I'd just end it already...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爬到这里来就想死在阴凉处...她还拿走了我的枪。否则...我已经把自己了结了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f54d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who was it that shot you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 开枪打你的是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceGunCheck
{'thank you captain obvious'}...No shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: {'thank you captain obvious'}...没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacegu_0003f550_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, looks like you got shot pretty bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，看起来你的枪伤很严重。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably... She had a lever-gun... Didn't bother asking about the make and model...
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是...她有把杠杆枪...不知道品牌和型号...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacegu_0003f551_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smaller caliber wouldn't have left a wound like that. I'm thinking... .44 magnum, maybe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小口径子弹不可能造成那样的伤口。我想...可能是.44马格南子弹？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSlaverJaceProceed3
Fuck if I know... Burning in hell, I hope...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道...下地狱吧，我希望是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f552_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took the slaves... Kids, whatever, no collars on 'em now... All three walked away. Don't know which way... East, I hope. They'd run into Legion...
ESP.TRADUIT: 带走了奴隶...小孩，取下了项圈...三个人都走了。不知道走的哪条路...我希望是东边。他们就会碰上军团...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f552_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh... Please... I don't know nothing... Nothing that would help you find them... And I don't care, neither...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...拜托...我不知道...不知道怎么帮你找他们...而且我也不在乎...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f552_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... please put a bullet in my head... Something... God forgive me... Please... Just let me die quick... Just want... to... sleep now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要...请给我脑袋来一枪...上帝原谅我...拜托...让我快点死吧...只想...要...睡一会...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jace [0703F528] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult07\aaafreesid_aaaslaverjacepr_0003f552_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 70
Do you know where she went?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道她去哪里了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanFinishQuest
Oh... Well... I guess that's... not terrible, then? {hopeful}If she took their collars off, she probably weren't looking to sell them herself, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢...好吧...我猜那...不可怕吧？{hopeful}如果她能把他们的项圈取下来，说明她应该不会想卖掉他们的，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f558_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he was shot, guess he couldn't tell you where they went? {beat, slightly bitter}Anywhere's gotta be better than Freeside...
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然他被枪打了，那他没法告诉你他们去哪了？{beat, slightly bitter}去那里都比自由之城要好...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f558_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but I found the slaver. He said some lady shot him and released his captives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，但是我找到了奴隶贩子。她说有个女士用枪打了他，然后放走了他的俘虏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanGoodbye
{confused}The hell?
ESP.TRADUIT: {confused}什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f55a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just remembered I have to take care of something. Back in a bit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚想起来我要处理一些事情。一会儿就回来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanShowLastWords
{wary}Alright...
ESP.TRADUIT: {wary}好吧...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f55c_1.ogg
NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pissed}Oh, fuck this guy! Fucking coward. "I'm sorry for what I've done" he says, after he's already dying. Where was that when it mattered?
ESP.TRADUIT: {pissed}噢，操他妈的！操他妈的懦夫。他说“我为我做过的事情感到抱歉”，在他死之后。当需要抱歉的时候，它又在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f55c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it's easy to feel sorry for being a piece of shit after it catches up with you. Fuck that guy, I hope you pissed on his corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，当报应来的时候，光说句抱歉是很容易的。操那个混蛋，我希望你在他的尸体上撒泡尿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f55c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This note is all the slaver had on him. Last words, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这张字条是奴隶贩子身上唯一的东西。我猜是遗言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanWhatNow
What's done is done. {beat}And I don't think I can take this anymore. I hate this city. We can't stay here anymore, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该做的都做了。{beat}我再也受不了了，我恨这个城市。我们没法再待在这里了，所以...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f55e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was four or five when House took over. Before then, this whole region belonged to tribes and raiders. And the Great Khans were the toughest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当豪斯先生接管维加斯的时候我大概4、5岁。在那之前，这里属于部落和掠夺者们。而大汗帮是最凶的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f55e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of being weak, and I'm tired of people here hurting my {stopping herself from saying friends}fr- {firmly}My family. We're going to Red Rock Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我厌倦了做个弱者，我厌倦了这里的人捕猎我的{stopping herself from saying friends}朋——{firmly}我的家人。我们要去红岩峡谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f55e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Khans look after their own. All of their own. And that's all I ever wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大汗帮能自己照顾好自己人。所有他们自己人。这就是我想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f55e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's left to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，剩下要还做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanApproveKhans
{proud}Think so? {trying to convince yourself}So do I. I can handle whatever they throw at me. All of us can. We're survivors. We have to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: {proud}你也这么想？{trying to convince yourself}我也是。我能应付他们抛给我的任何东西。我们所有人都能。我们是幸存者。我们必须这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f562_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a good idea. I think you'd fit right in with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这主意不错。我觉得你们跟他们很适合。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanDisaproveKhans
The Followers don't have the room or resources or time to take us on and look after us until we're able to pay them back. And I'm sick of Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追随者没有房间、资源或者时间来收留我们，也没法在我们能回报他们之前照顾我们。而且我讨厌自由之城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f561_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you're right. The Great Khans are a rough group. That's the point. I'm tired of being pushed around. Having everyone look to me for protection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你是对的。大汗帮是个粗野的团体。说到点子上了。我受够了别人的摆布。让每个人都来向我寻求保护。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f561_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think that's a good idea. The Great Khans are a rough group. What about the Followers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不觉得这是个好主意。大汗帮是一个粗野的团体。追随者怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanTimeToGo
Yeah. Thanks. And, uh, I hope things go alright for you, too. Maybe look us up next time you're around Red Rock Canyon. Maybe we'll make it there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。谢谢。呃，我也希望你一切顺利。也许下次你到红岩峡谷的时候再来看望我们。也许我们会在那里再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f565_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again for helping look for those missing kids. I guess... See you later, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你帮忙寻找那些失踪的孩子。我想...下次再见吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f565_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleKhansREF.enable aaaFreesideOrphanRRC1REF.enable aaaFreesideOrphanRRC3REF.enable

SetObjectiveCompleted aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 70 1 setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 80 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX aaaFreesideOrphanSquadREF.disable showmessage aaaFreesideOrphansLeaveMessage
Good luck on your journey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一路顺风。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanTimeToGoCharity
Are... You serious, now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...是认真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f56e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... Might be the first nice thing anyone ever did for us. {beat}Look, I'm not really any good at gratitude stuff, but... Thanks. Really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...恐怕是别人对我们做的第一件好事。{beat}你看，我不是太会表达但是...谢谢你。真心地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f56e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do like you said. I mean it. I didn't much like our odds trekking the wasteland ourselves... I just couldn't keep us here no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会按你说的做。我说真的。我不太喜欢我们自己在荒地上跋涉...我不能再把我们留在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f56e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's supposed to be mercs and their type 'round that {one-eighty-eight}188 place, so that'll be our only detour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在188贸易站应该有一些{one-eighty-eight}佣兵，那是我们唯一要绕道去的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f56e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again. I mean it. You might've saved our dumb asses. If you're around Red Rock, look us up, okay? Thanks, and hopefully we'll meet again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你。我是认真的。你救了我们。如果你经过红岩峡谷，来看看我们，好吗？谢谢，希望我们能再见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0003f56e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 5000 rewardkarma 200 aaaDanielleKhansREF.enable aaaFreesideOrphanRRC1REF.enable aaaFreesideOrphanRRC2REF.enable aaaFreesideOrphanRRC3REF.enable set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDGaveDanielleCash to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDGaveDanielleCash + 1

SetObjectiveCompleted aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 70 1 setstage aaaFreesideMendozaQuest 80 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX aaaFreesideOrphanSquadREF.disable showmessage aaaFreesideOrphansLeaveMessage
Hold on, I can't just let you wander through the wastes. Here's 5000 caps; hire a guard at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，我不能就让你这么去废土游荡。这里是5000瓶盖，至少雇个护卫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugManFinishBar
HIPPITY HOPPITY, WOMEN ARE PROPERTY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蹦蹦又跳跳，女人是财产！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carlos the Debug Buddy [0703FB70] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasConstructionDoorsREF.enable set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDCompletedSaloon to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDCompletedSaloon + 1
Let me in the saloon, and also tell me the Legion's philosophy on equal rights for the fairer sex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我进会所，然后告诉我军团关于平等性爱的信条是什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugManFinishGhoulstore
I LIKE MY HUMOR THE WAY I LIKE MY PRISON STATISTICS: DISPROPORTIONATELY BLACK!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢我的幽默就像我喜欢我的监狱统计数字一样：不成比例的黑色！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carlos the Debug Buddy [0703FB70] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPrimmGunGhoulREF.enable
Open the ghoul gun store, and tell me what the best tone for jokes is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开尸鬼的枪店，然后告诉我开玩笑用什么语调最好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanSuddenKhans
{shrug}Hmm. Maybe. I don't know. It's been an idea I've liked for a couple years now. Get out of the slum, join people that give a shit about each other...
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}嗯。也许。我不知道。这是我两年来一直喜欢的一个主意。离开贫民窟，加入那些能够互相关心的人们...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_00041f88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would've tried it way back then but... {weary}I'm the oldest and the toughest, so it kinda just became my job to look after the others all the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许那时候就该试试但...{weary}我是咱们里面年龄最大和最坚强的，所以随时照顾好其他人就开始成为了我的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_00041f88_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Felt like leading 'em into the desert might not work so well with that duty, but... Better to be buzzard food than slaves, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许带领他们进入沙漠不算是太好地履行了自己的职责，但是...我想宁肯做秃鹰的食物，也不做奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_00041f88_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {rhetorical}I mean, that is what we're seeing, isn't it? That Sullivan guy you mentioned, he was Freeside's resident slave-trading asshole, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: {rhetorical}我是说，这就是我们所看到的，不是吗？你提到的那个叫苏利文的家伙，他是自由之城该死的奴隶贩子，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_00041f88_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feels like a power vacuum to me. And guess who's most vulnerable to wannabe-slavers getting their feet in the door? {bitter}Oh, right, we are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说就像一个权力真空。你猜，那些奴隶贩子们把脚踏进门里后，最容易受伤害？{bitter}噢，对了，是我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_00041f88_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To hell with that. And to hell with eating rats, and scraping in the dirt for spare change, and getting spat on by delusional NCR tourists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的。去他妈的吃老鼠，去他妈的捡垃圾，还有去他妈的被妄想的NCR游客吐口水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_00041f88_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Near as I can tell, it's the Khans or bust. And I'm real tired of busting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我所知，要么去大汗帮，要么就拼命。而我真的厌倦了拼命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703DCE3] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_00041f88_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That seems kind of sudden. Why do you want to join the Great Khans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎有点突然。为什么你想加入大汗帮？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleKhanInitiated
{proud}Heh. Yep. Once we got here, Khans figured we could hang around as long as we don't cause trouble, and once we're older, try their initiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: {proud}呵。是的。我们一到这里，大汗帮就告诉我们只要不惹麻烦就可以待在这里。一旦我们够年龄了，就可以参加他们的入会仪式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said to hell with that, I'm the oldest, I want to take the initiation {emph}now. They said I'm still too young, they'd rather not beat on a little girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说见鬼去吧，我是最大的，我现在就要{emph}入会。他们说还是太小了，他们不想跟一个小女孩打架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {proud}So I told them that they weren't fooling nobody and were just scared of getting their ass beat by a "little girl" in front of everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {proud}于是我告诉他们别糊弄人，他们只不过是害怕在别人面前被一个“小女孩”给打趴下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That pissed 'em off, and they told me to step into the ring. Pfft. Initiation was a joke. I'm used to getting beat on, and I give as good as I get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这激怒他们了，然后他们叫我踏进竞技场。噗。入会仪式就是个笑话。我已经习惯挨揍了，我会尽我所能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plus I got a bit drunk first, too. {amused}Thanks for the liquor, by the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再加上我之前有点喝醉了。{amused}顺便感谢那些酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {proud}Anyway, I earned my way in, and once the others have a bit more experience under their belts, so will they. Think I made an okay impression, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: {proud}不管怎样，我赢得了资格，而且一旦其他人获得更多的经验，他们也能通过。我想我给他们的印象还不错，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice clothes. Looks like the Khans let you in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 衣服不错。看起来大汗帮接纳你们了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleKhanJourney
Could've been better. {beat}Could've been a lot worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不算太好。{beat}也不算太坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly bitter}Lou didn't make it past the fire geckos. Told 'em to stay behind me, but the dumb bastard went running ahead to whack 'em with that bat of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly bitter}卢在跟火蜥蜴的战斗中死了。我叫他们躲在我后面，但那个白痴冲到前面用他的球棒去打它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still. One dead out of four ain't the worst odds in the world, least for a pack of street urchins crawling through the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 四个人死了一个还不算最坏的几率，至少对一群在废土里摸爬的街头流浪儿来说.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shrug}Nothing to be done for it now, I guess. Shit happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}没什么能做的了。发生了就是发生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How was the trek all the way out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你过来的一路上情况怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly sheepish}Don't really like owing people, but... Wouldn't have pulled it off if you didn't throw that money our way back in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly sheepish}我真的不喜欢欠别人钱，但是...如果你在自由之城没有给我那些钱，恐怕我们也没法到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hired a couple mercs from the {one-eighty-eight}188 and had 'em take point. I helped too, I'm not too bad a shot, but the rest of the kids didn't need to do anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从188贸易站雇了几个佣兵{one-eighty-eight}担任前哨。我也帮了忙，我枪法还不赖，但是剩下的孩子不需要做任何事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Thanks for giving us the money. Probably kept at least a few of us alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...感谢你给我们那些钱。至少保证我们几个人还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f8f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How was the trek all the way out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你过来的一路上情况怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleKhanWhatDo
Training. I like my nine, but sometimes you run out of ammo in a fight. Or your piece jams. Or maybe you drop it, if you're an idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 训练。我喜欢我的枪，但有时在战斗中你会用光子弹。或者卡住。或者也许弄丢了它，如果你是个笨蛋的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, point is, can't just rely on my pistol. Gotta be able to fend for myself without it, so might as well get to work on machete training.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，关键是，不能只依赖我的手枪。必须得在没有它的时候照顾好自己，所以也要进行用刀的训练。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f91_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I'm good with that, maybe I'll move on to knuckle-dusters. Then maybe try some target practice with a sniper or something. {shrug}We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我能熟练掌握，也许我会转而训练指虎。然后试试狙击手打靶之类的。{shrug}等着看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danielle [0703F567] (mod) Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadaniellekhan_00041f91_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinFinishQuest
Oh? {amused}It seems she's savvier than I would have expected from a mining-camp hooker. I wonder if that will be a boon or a curse for us in the future?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？{amused}看起来作为一个矿场的妓女，她比我预计的还要聪明。我想知道这对我们以后是个好事还是一个诅咒？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinf_00041f96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose we'll find out in due time. I happen to have a fondness for clever and ambitious employees. {talking about yourself}They get up to some interesting business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们到时候会知道的。我碰巧喜欢聪明有抱负的员工。{talking about yourself}他们能做些有趣的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinf_00041f96_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, some money for your trouble. I'm sure Silas still has more work to be done, so I won't keep you any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着，这些钱给你。我相信塞格拉斯还有更多的工作要做，所以我就不挽留你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinf_00041f96_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaMollysHookerQuest 20 1 setstage aaaMollysHookerQuest 30 player.additem caps001 300
I delivered the terms to the girl in Sloan. She'll start work here... Once the building is finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把协议条款交给斯隆的那个女孩了。她会来这里工作...一旦建设完成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaIntro3
Ah-ah-ah, that's not how things work, friend! I may or {you do}may not have the chemical resources you, apparently, are so desperately in need of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊啊，事情不是这样的，朋友！我也许有{you do}但也许没有毒品给你，显然，你如此迫切地需要它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043db7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if I did have them, surely it wouldn't behoove me to just give them away, or to make suspect deals with strangers in dirty refugee camps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果我有的话，我肯定不能把它们就直接给出去，或者在肮脏的难民营里和陌生人做可疑的交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043db7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {aside, louder, speaking to listeners}Meaning no offense to you all, proud inhabitants of this filthy dumping ground for refugees and losers of all stripes!
ESP.TRADUIT: {aside, louder, speaking to listeners}我对你们大家都没有冒犯的意思，这个肮脏的垃圾场里的骄傲的居民们和所有赌场的输家们!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043db7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway. {cheerful}I'd be delighted to hammer out the terms of a deal with you. However, in the spirit of decorum, this is neither the time nor the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说。{cheerful}我很高兴跟你敲定交易的条件。不过，本着礼节的精神，不该在这里也不该在这个时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043db7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're interested in seeing such a bargain through, meet me right.... {fiddling with map}Here. Er, here. Yes, right there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有兴趣看到这样的交易达成，到这里来找我{fiddling with map}。呃，这儿。是的，就在这儿、
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043db7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly dismissive, still friendly}Now then, I really need to continue my sermon, so I trust if this matter, er... matters to you, we'll meet again soon at that spot. Until then!
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly dismissive, still friendly}那么现在，我真的需要继续我的布道，所以我相信如果这件事，呃...对你很重要，我们会很快在那个地方见面。直到那时候！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043db7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 105
Actually I need to work out a supply deal for a saloon in Primm. I hear you can provide chems?
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上我是想帮普瑞姆的一家会所谈一个供货协议。我听说你能供应毒品？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaIntro4
{cheerful}We're always ecstatic to welcome new members into our family of celestial truth-seekers!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}我们总是欣喜若狂地欢迎新成员加入我们天空真相追寻者的家庭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043de9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mildly irritated}First rule for new prospective seekers is that we don't call it a cult.
ESP.TRADUIT: {mildly irritated}对于新的可能的追寻者来说，第一条规则是我们不把它称为异教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043de9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful}If you truly seek celestial wisdom, it would be our honor to take you into the fold.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}如果你真的追寻天空的智慧，我们很荣幸带你加入我们的行列。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043de9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But not here and now, of course. I'm sort of in the middle of proselytizing to the good drunks and reprobates of this dirty refugee dumping ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当然不在此时此地。我正在向酒鬼和这个肮脏垃圾场里的堕落之人传教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043de9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {aside, louder, speaking to listeners}Meaning no offense to you all, proud inhabitants of this dirt-smeared sinkhole for refugees and losers, any and all!
ESP.TRADUIT: {aside, louder, speaking to listeners}我对你们大家都没有冒犯的意思，所有这个脏兮兮的难民坑里的骄傲的居民们和废物们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043de9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if you would, just meet me right... There. {fiddling with map}No, wait, hold on... There! Uh... Yes, right there, that spot on your map. I think. {beat}No. {beat}Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果你愿意，就到...这里来找我。{fiddling with map}不，等等，等一下...那儿！呃...是的，就在那儿，你地图上的那个地点。我想。{beat}不。{beat}哦是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043de9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly dismissive, still friendly}Now then, I really need to continue my sermon, so I trust if this matter, er... matters to you, we'll meet again soon at that spot. Until then!
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly dismissive, still friendly}那么现在，我真的需要继续我的布道，所以我相信如果这件事，呃...对你很重要，我们会很快在那个地方见面。直到那时候！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00043de9_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 105
Can I join your cult?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能加入你的异教吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaWhoYou
I am Ophelia, eternal seeker of celestial truths, astral theologian, and hobbyist chemist with a focus on organic psychedelics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫奥菲莉娅，永恒的天体真理探索者，星体神学家，专注于有机迷幻药的化学爱好者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00044b5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's my great honor to be the founder- {catching yourself}Uh, cofounder of our humble little spiritual movement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很荣幸能成为我们卑微的精神运动的创始人——{catching yourself}呃，共同创始人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00044b5f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to yourself}Anything else? Hmm...
ESP.TRADUIT: {to yourself}还有别的吗？嗯...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00044b5f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! I also paint and play the melodica! {beat}Not at the same time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！我也画画和吹口风琴！{beat}不过不是在同一时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00044b5f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说你自己吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaBackground
{a little embarrassed}Uh, well, that's kinda been my thing for most of my life. I just didn't really pick up on the secret truth of the universe at first, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little embarrassed}呃，这是我一生中最喜欢的东西。我只是一开始没有真正注意到宇宙的秘密真相。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One thing just kinda led to the next, y'know? Guess it probably started when I was a kid and found these funny little cactus out behind the shack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一件事导致了接下来的事情，知道吗？我想可能是从我小时候在棚屋后面找到这些有趣的小仙人掌开始的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I liked 'em. So, my schedule was kinda "oh, mom's yelling at me about something, guess I'll grab some peyote and wander out to stargaze."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢它们。于是，我的日常就是“噢，妈妈对我大喊大叫，我想要采些佩奥特仙人掌（致幻仙人掌）来漫游星空。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I started selling it to some neighbor folks, and eventually I had a little business going. And business leads to networking, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开始把它卖给邻居，终于我有了一个小生意。生意带来了销售网络，所以...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon enough, I was getting some weird mushrooms in trade, and then some datura plants... {aside}Woof, that stuff can mess you up if you're not careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快，我在交易中得到了一些奇怪的蘑菇，还有一些曼陀罗植物...{aside}呜，如果你不小心那东西会把你搞砸的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, one night, I went out to stargaze like usual, but I tried a new blend of cactus and datura and mushrooms... And the universe spoke to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，一天晚上，我像往常一样漫游星空，我试着混合了一些仙人掌、曼陀罗和蘑菇...然后宇宙向我说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was taken on a journey through time and space. I witnessed the simultaneous birth and death of the universe. Everything and nothing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被带上了穿越时空的旅程。我目睹了宇宙同时诞生和死亡。万物与虚无。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw the future as it will be, and I saw the paths we could walk to meet our promised fates. The world as it is, and the world as it could be!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了未来，我看到了我们可以走的路，去实现我们所承诺的命运。世界的本来面目，以及世界将来的面目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I walked the cosmos and came face-to-face with my own soul, and she showed me the path I must walk. {beat, thinking}Also, I think we might've banged somehow. Hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走过宇宙，然后跟我自己的灵魂面对面，它向我展示了我必须走的路。{beat, thinking}而且，我想我们可能是撞上了。嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045db9_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what was your life like before all the "astral blessings" and drug trips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，在“群星的祝福”和吸毒旅行之前，你的生活是什么样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaBackground1
It was! I wept for hours after I had returned to my body. I was inconsolable! My mother asked why I was weeping but I just didn't have the words!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错！当我回到自己身体后我哭了几个小时。我简直痛不欲生！我母亲问我为什么哭泣，我只是无法言语！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {you don't really care}She assumed that dad must've gotten drunk and touchy and she yelled at him and he yelled back and they fought all night, while I cried. {emph}And thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: {you don't really care}她以为是父亲喝醉了发了酒疯，她对他大喊大叫，他也大喊大叫，他们吵了一整夜， 我一直在哭。{emph}和思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought: This experience was too meaningful for it to be just a one-off. And it would be monstrously cruel of me to keep it to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想：这次经历太有意义了，它是绝无仅有的。如果这经历只留给自己的话是多么的残酷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I shared it with others! And you know what I found? Their experiences mirrored my own. I gave them no forewarning. It just happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我跟其他人分享了它！知道我发现什么了吗？他们的经历就像镜子一样投射出我自己的经历。我没有预先警告他们。但就那样发生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that doesn't happen, not with other mixes of things. And then I realized. The experience meant so much to me, and others had shared it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果使用其他东西混合，就不会发生这种体验。于是我认识到。这个体验对我意义重大，而其他人也能分享这种感觉...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There must be truth in what we experienced. Truth that could better the entire world. I must spread this knowledge to any who will listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们所经历的一定存在某种真理。这个真理能让整个世界变得更好。我必须把这些知识传播给任何愿意听的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbd_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds amazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来太棒了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaBackground2
And so I thought, too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是这么想的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the experience was so spectacular, I had to experience it again. And share it with others! And you know what I discovered?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这经历太壮观了，我不得不再一次体验它。然后向别的人分享！你知道我发现什么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their experiences mirrored my own. Each of us, separate individuals, took this same blend of substances, and each of us saw the same things!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的经历就像镜子一样投射出我自己的经历。我们每个人，独立的个体，用同样的混合物质，而且我们每个人都看到了同样的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We heard the same whispered truths. That doesn't happen with anything else. I knew then, that what I had discovered was something sacred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们听到了同样低语的真理。而用别的就不会发生。于是我知道，我发现了一些神圣的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been refining the mix for years now, and spreading it's wisdom to any and all that are willing to have their eyes opened to the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多年来我一直在改进这个组合，并且把它的智慧传播给任何希望打开天眼认识真理的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbc_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you were just tripping way too hard. What's the greater meaning in that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你只是吸了太多毒了。那有什么更重要的意义？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaVisions
I saw many futures. What can be, what will be... It's not for us to know on this plane of existence, unenlightened as we are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见了很多的未来。能做什么，未来会如何...而在我们目前存在的这个位面上，我们无法知道，我们是无知的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once, I saw the {distasteful}beige tide of {disgusted}government and bureaucracy sweeping over the Mojave, drowning us all in velvet-lined tyrannical oligarchy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次，我看见{distasteful}政府和官僚在莫哈维掀起的{disgusted}米黄色的潮水，把我们都淹死在专制的寡头政治家之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another time, I witnessed the great Dam crumbling into the river, fires spreading across the Mojave from the east, leaving nothing but ash and death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一次，我见证了大坝坍塌落进河中，烈火从莫哈维的东边蔓延到全境，只留下灰烬和死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps in time, I will be wise enough to tell the possible from the inevitable. But for now, I am merely a student of the stars, learning all I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许到那时，我会明智地区分可能和不可避免。但现在，我只是一个研究群星的学生，尽我所能地学习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00045dbf_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say you've seen the future in your visions? Don't suppose anything there is worth sharing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你在幻觉中看到了未来？有什么值得分享的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaDream1
aaaCommuneOpheliaDream2
aaaCommuneOpheliaDreamFuckOff
aaaCommuneOpheliaDream3
aaaCommuneOpheliaDream4
aaaCommuneOpheliaDream5
aaaCommuneOpheliaDreamSix
aaaCommuneOpheliaVisions2
{genuine}Oh, don't take this for me claiming to be some sort of soothsayer. I'm not yet nearly enlightened enough to speak on behalf of fate itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: {genuine}噢，别以为我是占卜师。我还没开悟到可以代表命运自身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000463ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I simply sought to illustrate that I am, in my own amateur and fumbling way, following the path to astral enlightenment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想寻求自我的存在，以我自己的业余和摸索的方式，追随群星启迪之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000463ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If understanding the truth of the universe came easy, surely the world would have so many fewer drooling morons clogging the gutters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果理解宇宙的真相很容易，世界上哪还会有那么多白痴堵塞着排水沟呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000463ef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am but a humble celestial scholar with much yet to learn. First one step, then the next, and soon enough I'll be running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是一个谦虚的天体学者，还有很多东西要学。先学着迈第一步，接着走好下一步，然后很快我就能跑起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000463ef_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's nothing. The Legion and NCR are at war in the Mojave right now. It doesn't take magic visions to know that one side or the other will win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那没意义。军团和NCR正在正在莫哈维打仗。无法用魔法的视野去预测哪一边会赢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaVisions3
{cheerful}That's what I thought!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}我也是这么想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000463f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有意思。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaWhereWeBe
Why, home, of course!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，当然是家啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000469f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it's a crater of some sort? I don't really know. But I do know that it's very defensible, with only one easy way in and out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是某种撞击坑？我不知道。但我知道它非常有防御性，只有一条进出的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000469f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even better, it's hard to notice unless you're looking for it. It gives us a quiet and safe place for us to contemplate the meaning of the stars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更好的是，除非你专程寻找，否则是很难注意到它的。它给我们提供了一个清净和安全的地方来参悟群星的意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000469f3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was the one who discovered it, some years ago. {beat, quickly adding this on}Oh, and, uh, the Prophet helped too. {lying through your teeth}Yes, he sure did. Couldn't have done it without his help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我发现这个地方的，就在几年前。{beat, quickly adding this on}噢，还有，呃，在先知的帮助下。{lying through your teeth}是的，他确实帮忙了。没有他的帮助没法做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000469f3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly changing the subject}The water pouring in is mostly snow-melt, so it's relatively clean. There's also a hot spring, but we don't drink that. Soil's good enough for crops.
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly changing the subject}这里流淌的水大多是雪融化而来，所以相当地干净。这里也有个温泉，但是我们不喝那里面的水。这里的土壤足够种庄稼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000469f3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {aside}Electricity was a little touch and go for a while there, but... {cheerful}Well, basically, we have no need to rely on outsiders to live happily.
ESP.TRADUIT: {aside}电力有一段时间内不太稳定，但是...{cheerful}呃，大体上来说，我们没有必要依靠外人过上幸福的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_000469f3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaAboutProphet
{feigning cheerfulness - you hate this topic}Ah, yes. Our wise and illustrious Prophet, who is so kind as to help guide us in our journey towards enlightenment.
ESP.TRADUIT: {feigning cheerfulness - you hate this topic}啊，好的。我们睿智而杰出的先知，他如此仁慈地帮助指引我们走向启迪的旅程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ff6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {choosing words carefully}Without his guidance, I'm sure we wouldn't even have half the members we do. Too few to call ourselves a community, surely.
ESP.TRADUIT: {choosing words carefully}没有他的引导，我敢肯定我们连一半的会员都没有。人太少了就不能称自己为社区，肯定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ff6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {changing the subject}If there's something specific you want to know, well, you should ask him. {under your breath}He's always happy to talk about himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: {changing the subject}如果你有什么特别的事情想知道，你应该去问他。{under your breath}他总是喜欢谈论自己的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ff6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaAboutProphet2
{confused} Yesssss...?
ESP.TRADUIT: {confused} 是——————的...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ff8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, are you feeling alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，你还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {oh shit}Uhh... Nonsense. {evasive}Why would describing the Prophet ever make me tense? {lying badly}If anything, surely his aura and wisdom would relax us all. Surely.
ESP.TRADUIT: {oh shit}呃...胡说。{evasive}为什么描述先知会让我紧张？{lying badly}如果有的话，他的气和智慧也会安抚我们所有人。肯定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ff9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seemed kind of tense when I asked you about the Prophet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我问你先知的事的时候，你看起来有点紧张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaAboutProphet3
[FAILED] {genuine}What? No. He's like twice my age. {beat}And bald.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {genuine}什么？不。他年龄有我两倍大。{beat}而且秃顶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ohh, I get it. You're in love with him, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我明白了。你爱他，对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {a little ashamed}No... No, that's not it at all. Ordinarily, I wouldn't discuss this but... {sigh}It seems I may have given the wrong impression.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {a little ashamed}不...不，完全不是这样。通常我不会讨论这个，但是...{sigh}看来我给人的印象不对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {genuine}He's not a danger to anybody except for those who would do harm to us. {under your breath}And maybe himself, with how he plays with guns while drinking.
ESP.TRADUIT: {genuine}他对其他人并不是威胁，除非有人想伤害我们。{under your breath}也许威胁的反而是他自己，他经常在喝酒的时候玩枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {struggling to articulate}It's just... I don't want to be rude... But he's... Look, I mean... I'm not ungrateful for his help, but... He just... I didn't... {deep breath}
ESP.TRADUIT: {struggling to articulate}只是...我不想说得这么粗鲁...但是他...我是说...我不是不感激他的帮助，但是...他只是...我不...{deep breath}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {blurting it out}He's a fucking charlatan, he gets all the credit for my ideas, and everyone loves him for it!
ESP.TRADUIT: {blurting it out}他是个该死的骗子，他把我的想法当做自己的功劳，然后每个人因此而喜欢他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quieter, sad}And... And I think I just have to suck it up and let him have what I deserve, otherwise this whole community might fall apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: {quieter, sad}而且...而且我只能把苦水咽回肚子里，然而他得到了本该是我的东西，否则整个社区就会分崩离析。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffc_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 50
Does he scare you that much? I can keep you safe, if you'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他把你吓成那样吗？我可以保证你的安全，如果你需要的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaAboutProphet4
Well, firstly, if you've spoken to him for more than five minutes, perhaps you noticed that he doesn't say anything about our actual beliefs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，首先，如果你跟他说话超过5分钟，你可能就会注意到他根本没提任何关于我们信仰的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing about trying to read the fates written in the stars, nothing about seeking enlightenment, or personal betterment, or anything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没提任何阅读群星上书写的命运，没提追寻启迪，或者是个人改善，以及任何相关的事情！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just an endless stream of: "I'm the Prophet, let's all get really high and have orgies! After that, let's all get drunk and have more orgies!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只是滔滔不绝地说：“我是先知，让我们所有人嗨起来，狂欢吧！之后，让我们喝个痛快然后继续狂欢！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffe_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd be one thing if his talk of getting high was just a crass way to refer to the out-of-body experience of my ritual stuff. But no. It's not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说嗨起来的时候，他只是无知地指我仪式用品的体外体验部分。但是不。那不是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffe_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {defensive}And, you know, I happen to approve of the whole free love concept. I don't see any of that as something taboo or shameful.
ESP.TRADUIT: {defensive}而且，知道吗，我正好赞成整个自由恋爱的观念。我不觉得这有禁忌和有害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffe_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I don't approve of is {derisive}John acting like his dick has magic powers, and his stupid weekly orgies are some kind of divine gift!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不赞成的是{derisive}约翰变现得好像是他的老二具有魔法能力，而且他那愚蠢的每周一次的狂欢是某种神圣的礼物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00046ffe_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaGoodbye
May the stars illuminate your path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿群星照亮你的道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047000_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaAboutProphet5
{bitter joke}Ah, now that is the question, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: {bitter joke}啊，这就是问题了，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047603_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {you really hate admitting this}John is... So much better at working people than I am. The vast majority of our community is here because of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: {you really hate admitting this}约翰他...比我更擅长鼓动人们。我们社区的绝大多数人都是因为他才来到这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047603_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He brings them in with promises of free drugs and sex and whatever else is written in that stupid ten-point manifesto of his. That's all they expect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他承诺给他们免费的毒品和性，把他们带到这里来，管他那个满分的傻逼宣言里还写了什么。那就是他们想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047603_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I can do is try and redirect them towards what actually matters after the fact. Few enough truly care. They see it as meaningless distraction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做的就是尝试引导他们走向事实背后真正重要的事情。很少有人真正关心。他们认为这是毫无意义的分心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047603_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Myself, I can count only Dash as a true adherent to my message of celestial enlightenment. {beat, aside}And maybe his daughter. I don't know. She's strange.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自己呢，我只能把达西算成是我天启信息的真正信徒。{beat, aside}也许他女儿也算。我不知道。她很奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047603_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beyond them... Everyone else is here because of John. Not me. Not my ideas. I fear this movement will not outlast me when I'm gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了他们...每个人都是因为约翰才来到这里的。而不是我。不是我的主意。我担心我走后这场运动不会持续多久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047603_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest.aaaOpheliaComesClean to aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest.aaaOpheliaComesClean + 1
If he's a fraud coasting off of your religion, why do you let him keep up the act?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他是一个偷取你信仰的骗子，你为什么还要让他继续表演？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaStartCoup
{weary smile}I suppose we ought to try.
ESP.TRADUIT: {weary smile}我想我们应该试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047605_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll say right up front, there can't be any violence. First off, I'm generally opposed to murder on principle, unless there's no other option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我话说在前面，不能用任何的暴力。首先，原则上我反对谋杀，除非没有别的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047605_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More importantly, this community is a family. An assault on one of us is an affront to us all. {under your breath}And if the one being hurt was the beloved Prophet...
ESP.TRADUIT: 更重要的是，这个社区是一个家庭。袭击我们中的任何一个人是对我们所有人的冒犯。{under your breath}何况如果受伤的是他们心爱的先知的话...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047605_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose... The first step would simply be to speak with John and see if you can convince him to step down. {beat, annoyed}He won't listen to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想...第一步首先要跟约翰交谈，看能不能说服他下台。{beat, annoyed}他不会听我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00047605_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 10
Is there any way I can help you oust the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么办法我能帮你把先知赶下台吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's... Kind of you to offer, but no. I appreciate your concern, but... You're not one of us. Not officially. You haven't undergone the rituals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...你人真是太好了，但是不。谢谢你的关心，但...你不是我们的人。没有正式加入。你还没有经历这些仪式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004be94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would be... Rather improper for someone in your position to play such a vital role in shifting our celestial paradigm. I'm sure you understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那会...使你这样的人很不合适在改变我们的天国模式中扮演如此重要的角色。我想你应该理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004be94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {not very subtle suggesting}If you were to undertake the ritual, though... Then I'd be delighted to accept your aid. So... Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: {not very subtle suggesting}但如果你要参加这个仪式...那我很乐意接受你的帮助。所以...是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004be94_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way I can help you oust the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么办法我能帮你把先知赶下台吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetDrugDeal
Oh, sure, that's no problem. We make a fuckload of pretty high-grade chems here, and shipping 'em out brings in plenty of cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好，那没问题。我们这里出产大量高等的毒品，然后用它们换取大量的现金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetdrugd_00047c2f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, well, there is a little problem, now that I think about it. {shrug}Supply lines are being buttfucked or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，那么有个小问题，我刚刚想起。{shrug}供应线路现在被人爆了菊花了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetdrugd_00047c2f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you hoofed your ass all the way here, so clearly you give a shit about this situation. Fix our supply issues, and we're in business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你一路颠着屁股跑来这里，很明显你对这种情况很在意。解决我们的供应问题，然后我们成交。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetdrugd_00047c2f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here on behalf of a saloon in Primm. They'd like for you to supply them with chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表普瑞姆的一个会所来到这里。他们希望你能供应毒品给他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaStolenDrugs
{you're very worried about this}Ah, yes, that was supremely... Unfortunate.
ESP.TRADUIT: {you're very worried about this}啊，是的，那真是超级的...不幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see the steel drums all over in here? Most of those are filled with the substance we use in our enlightenment rituals, to expand the mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到这里到处都是钢桶了吗？大多数都装着我们启迪仪式所用的物质，为了扩展我们的思维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048232_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {emph}That is what was stolen. And one of our own was murdered in the robbery, if there was any doubt regarding the moral character of the thief.
ESP.TRADUIT: {emph}那就是被偷走的那种东西。如果你对小偷的道德品质有任何怀疑的话，告诉你我们中的一个人在抢劫中被谋杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048232_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm truly worried, because the substance is not to be used for recreation. We use it to open our minds to the astral secrets of the universe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我真的很担心，因为这些物质不是用于娱乐消遣的。我们用它来打开我们的思想，去了解宇宙的星体秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048232_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is preparation and ceremony before a small dosage is administered in a safe and controlled environment. This? This isn't that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点小剂量都要管理在安全可控的环境中，使用之前要有准备和仪式。而被偷走的呢？那可不止这么一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048232_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some murderer has 50-odd gallons of a substance that he has no understanding of. And if he decided to try some for himself...
ESP.TRADUIT: 某个杀人凶手拥有50加仑他毫无所知的物质。如果他决定自己试一点的话...
