ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048232_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I truly don't know what would happen if someone ingested it without knowing what it was. Yes, it would open their mind, but to what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不知道如果有人在无知的情况下摄入它会发生什么。是的，它可以打开他们的思想，但是打开之后干嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048232_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing good will come of any of this, I promise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些都不会有什么好结果，我向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048232_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDLearnedAboutDrugs to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDLearnedAboutDrugs + 1
John mentioned some drugs got stolen, and said you knew the details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰提到有些毒品被偷了，而且说你知道细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaHowProphet
{little embarrassed}Uh, that was my mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: {little embarrassed}呃，那是我的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We met before there was a community here. I was only just starting my quest for celestial enlightenment, you see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在这里还没有社区的时候就认识了。我只是刚刚开始寻求天国的启示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I met this odd man, spinning wild tales about how he got lost in the desert, and survived on nothing but psychotropic cacti.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我遇到了这个怪人，说着他在沙漠中迷路时荒诞的故事，他说纯靠有精神作用的仙人掌活了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought to myself: "here is a man who could be open to my ideas." And so I spoke to him, and he seemed amenable to my views.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我心想：“这是一个可以接受我想法的人。” 于是我跟他交谈，他似乎很听从我的意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While he didn't seem to really get the search for astral knowledge, he took the rituals and seemed to appreciate the importance of my work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他似乎没有真正得到星体知识的探索，他接受了仪式，似乎很欣赏我工作的重要性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we ran into other people, and before long, he had all of them asking me about the rituals and celestial doctrines. Converts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们遇到了其他人，不久之后，他使他们都来问我关于仪式和天道的事。都成为了信徒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seemed to me that John was a masterful orator, and he would succeed in spreading my words where I had failed, so I granted him so many boons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，约翰是一位出色的演说家，他会成功地把我的话传播到我失败过的地方，所以我允许他得到这么多的好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {bitter}...And the next thing I knew, he was hosting drug-fueled orgies in the house I had built for him, and the converts all named him as a Prophet.
ESP.TRADUIT: {bitter}...接下来我才知道，他在我给他修的房子里主持毒品狂派派对，而且信徒们都称他为先知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I... I become nothing more than the Prophet's little chemist friend, dutifully brewing recreational drugs so the hedonism would never end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且我...我只不过是先知的小药剂师朋友，尽职地酿造娱乐药物，来维持享乐永不结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00048234_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did John end up as "the Prophet" in the first place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰起初是怎么当上“先知”的呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugManPirateParty
MY SHIP SAILS IN THE MORNING. I WONDER WHAT'S FOR DINNER?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的船早上开航。我想知道晚餐吃什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carlos the Debug Buddy [0703FB70] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaLizzyPirateQuest 10
I want to deal with the goofy pirate quest right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在要处理这个愚蠢的海盗任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyFinishQuest
{uproarious laughter}Ha! And so endeth anyone that fires rockets at my fucking boat. Did he cry? Did he beg? Ha, probably both, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: {uproarious laughter}哈！那么那些对我的船发射火箭的人也完蛋了。他哭了吗？他乞求饶命了吗？哈，还是说两者都有，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfin_0004944f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dealt with Hardmann. You won't have to worry about him again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我干掉了哈德曼。你不需要再担心他了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyFinishQuest2
{apparently thinking}I think... {suddenly lecherous}I think I'd like for the conquering hero to ravish the brave captain in celebration of their victory over the forces of {emph}fucking assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: {apparently thinking}我想...{suddenly lecherous}我想要不让咱们的征服者英雄来强暴我这个勇敢的船长，以庆祝他们对那些该死的杂种们的{emph}胜利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfin_00049453_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that dumb fucker out of my hair, I can get back to moving drugs up and down the Colorado like some kinda degenerate criminal Santa Claus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有那个白痴的干扰，我就可以像个堕落的圣诞老人一样，继续在科罗拉多州来回运送毒品了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfin_00049453_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, that means I'll have to be getting back to work once you're out of here. So, y'know, if you wanted to {euphemism}celebrate with me, now's the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悲哀的是，那就意味着当你离开这里的时候我就得回去工作了。所以，知道吗，如果你想{euphemism}跟我一起庆祝的话，现在就是时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfin_00049453_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaLizzyPirateQuest 35
So, that's it then? You don't need anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，就这样了？你没有什么别的需要了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. For the most part. {to self}Wouldn't mind having a second eye again... {suddenly cheerful}That was the big one, anyway!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。大多数情况下。{to self}我不介意再看一眼...{suddenly cheerful}不管怎么说，那是个大问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfin_00049452_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that dumb fucker out of my hair, I can get back to moving drugs up and down the Colorado like some kinda degenerate criminal Santa Claus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有那个白痴的干扰，我就可以像个堕落的圣诞老人一样，继续在科罗拉多州来回运送毒品了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfin_00049452_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Already late on some of these deliveries, so I'll be raising anchors pretty soon after you're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些货期已经迟了，所以你走后我很快就会发船。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyfin_00049452_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaLizzyPirateQuest 35
So, that's it then? You don't need anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，就这样了？你没有什么别的需要了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyWhatNext
Now I go about my business. Moving drugs from place to place, a bit of raiding here, a little pillaging there... Y'know, the usual shit for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我开始做我的事。到处运毒品，这里抢抢，那里夺夺...你知道的，我的老本行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzywha_00049455_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hardmann was the only obstacle I had. {aside}Well, I suppose there's that mesh pulled across the river over there. I can cut that, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈德曼是我唯一的障碍。{aside}我想他就是河里的那张网。而我没法割掉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzywha_00049455_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, for now, this is adios. But hey, maybe we'll meet again, eh? I do tend to move around a lot, y'know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，现在，这就再见了。但是嘿，也许我们会再见面的，哈？我确实经常搬家，你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzywha_00049455_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's next for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你下一步做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well darling, {fake confidence}this is the part where I abandon you before you can abandon me! {awkward laugh}
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，{fake confidence}这下我得在你抛弃我之前先抛弃你了！{awkward laugh}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzywha_00049456_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally I'd offer you a place onboard, but... This boat's kinda tiny, and I got a full roster already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常我会给你一个船上的位置，但是...这艘船太小了，而且我的人员也都满了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzywha_00049456_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, by my reckoning, this is adios for now. But hey, I move around a lot, so it ain't impossible I'll run into you again. Who the fuck knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，依我看，现在该再见了。但是嘿，我经常搬家，所以并不是不可能再碰到你。谁他妈知道呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzywha_00049456_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's next for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你下一步做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyAboutCult
{proud}Well, I provide a vital service for 'em, so they made me an honorary member.
ESP.TRADUIT: {proud}呃，我向他们提供重要的服务，所以他们让我成为荣誉会员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_00049458_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basically means I get my pick of their drugs for myself, and I got an all-access pass to the orgies if I happen to be in the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上意味着我可以自主选择他们的毒品，而且如果我碰巧在的话，可以完全参与他们的狂欢派对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_00049458_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good news for me is that {mocking}"the Prophet" encourages his lady-followers to be "open-minded" in the bedroom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说好消息是{mocking}“先知”鼓励他的女信徒们在卧室里“打开思想”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_00049458_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {grumbling}Bad news is that the old bastard keeps trying to sneak himself in. {angry response to nobody}Yes, John, it does ruin my experience if you're within five yards.
ESP.TRADUIT: {grumbling}坏消息是那个老混蛋一直想偷偷溜进去。{angry response to nobody}是的，就是约翰。如果在五码之内，那就会毁了我的体验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_00049458_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the relationship between you and the Commune?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和公社有什么关系？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCapnLizzyAboutCult2
Correct, yeah. No offense to Ophelia, she's a very nice lady with a very nice body, but... She's batshit insane. Endearing, sure. Compelling? Ah, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，没错。并非冒犯奥菲莉娅，她是个人很好身材也好的女人，但是...完全疯掉了。令人爱慕，是的。无法抗拒？啊，那不是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0004945a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, I gave 'em a fair shake. Even let Ophelia take me out into the desert and give me a dose of her special magical enlightenment ritual shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，我公平地对待他们。甚至奥菲莉娅带我到沙漠里，给我一剂她的特殊魔法启迪仪式物质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0004945a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I tripped balls harder than I ever have in my life, but I wouldn't exactly say it was a religious experience, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我从来没有这么嗨过，但我不能确切地说那是个宗教体验，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0004945a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, whole lot of 'em is insane, no question. {shrug}Still, they ain't scamming anyone out of their money or blood, so it's better'n most wasteland cults.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，所有的一切都很疯狂，毫无疑问。{shrug}但是他们并没有骗取任何人的钱或生命，所以他们比废土上的其他邪教好得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap'n Lizzy [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07018BD9]aaaLizzyPirateQuest) Cap'n Lizzy's Wild Ride EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaalizzypiratevoice\aaalizzypi_aaacapnlizzyabo_0004945a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you don't believe in all the "astral enlightenment" stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你并不相信什么“群星的启迪”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetDonePirateQuest
Oh, good. She kept sending unarmed Fiends to pound at my door all night, yelling about how she needed actual help from someone. Annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，很好。她整夜不停地派恶魔帮的人来敲我的门，大声说她需要别人的帮助。真烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetdonep_00049a5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I wanted to babysit her, I wouldn't've hired her to run drugs for us, you know. Fucking people 'round here, no goddamn initiative. No drive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我想照顾她的话，我才不会雇她帮我们贩毒的，知道吗。这周围他妈的人，没有一点积极性。没有驱动力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetdonep_00049a5d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If she handled it herself, I would've given her a bonus. Instead, you did it, so here you go, the cash is yours. Consider it a divine gift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果她自己处理的话，我可能会给她一点奖励的。但结果是你做到了，所以这给你，这些钱是你的了。就当做是一个神圣的礼物吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetdonep_00049a5d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaLizzyPirateQuest 35 1 setstage aaaLizzyPirateQuest 40
I finished helping Lizzy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经帮助了利姿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetFinishSaloon
Told you, I was good for that. Now that Lizzy is doing her fucking job again, we're in business. Literally and whatever else way, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你，我没问题。现在他妈的利姿可以继续干她的活了，我能就能做生意了。不管是表面上还是暗地里都可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_0004b287_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If your boss has anything else for you to do with that nonsense, you'd have to ask him. Why should I care about sex and drugs and booze in Primm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的老板还要你做些什么的话，你得去问他。我为什么要关心普瑞姆的毒品、酒还有色情生意呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_0004b287_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got all that good shit right here already!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里他妈的什么都有了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_0004b287_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {abrupt shift in tone}Hey, wanna officially join our little family? {slightly condescending}We have free drugs!
ESP.TRADUIT: {abrupt shift in tone}嘿，要不要正式加入我们的小家庭？{slightly condescending}我们有免费的毒品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_0004b287_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSilasSaloonQuest 140
And now that I've helped Lizzy, you'll supply the saloon with chems?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我帮助了利姿，那你同意给会所供应毒品了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetJoinCult
It's easy. You go in the basement, chat with O, tell her you're interested in {a little mocking}"seeking enlightenment" and that I gave you the thumbs up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单。你去地下室，找到“奥”，告诉他你有兴趣参加{a little mocking}“追寻启迪”，并且得到了我的同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetjoinc_0004cab3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She'll get all excited, start spewing all kinds of absolute nonsense, and you just gotta smile and nod.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她会很兴奋地跟你开始胡说八道，然后你只要微笑和点头就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetjoinc_0004cab3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She'll have you do some stuff, nothing that's been too much for any of the clowns around here to endure, and then you're in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她会让你做些事情，对这附近的小丑们来说都不算难事，然后你就可以加入了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetjoinc_0004cab3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and best to go it alone. If you were thinking of bringing some pals along, let 'em know the party's been canceled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，最好一个人去。如果你的朋友想一起去的话，就告诉他们派对已经取消了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetjoinc_0004cab3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have fun, or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你玩的高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetjoinc_0004cab3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest 10
What would I have to do to join your community?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果要加入你的社区我需要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetDeclineJoin
{shrug}Hey, whatever. Offer's open.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}嘿，随便吧。招募一直都开放着的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetdecli_0004cab5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm good, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没事，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaJoinCult
{excited}Really? Fantastic! The stars shall surely shine their astral blessings down upon you for your wisdom!
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}真的？太妙了！群星一定会为你的智慧降下他们的祝福！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, now, we can begin whenever you're ready, but there's a few things I need to warn you of, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，现在，当你准备好了我们随时可以开始，但是有几件事情我得先警告你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Firstly, I'm not really in the business of setting up group rituals, so... Please don't bring a bunch of friends along for the ride.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我真的不是在搞集体仪式，所以...请不要带一帮朋友过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's for your own good, mind you. Having uninvolved folks loitering around you while you attempt to reach enlightenment can cause... issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是为你好，我提醒你。当你试图启迪的时候，有一些无关的人在你身边闲逛，会导致...问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, we're going to be going out into the desert away from civilization. I'll bring some food and water along, of course, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，我们要去远离文明的沙漠。我当然会带一些水和食物，但...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, just make sure you're in good health before we head out. Deserts can be harsh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们出发前，请确保你身体健康。沙漠是严酷的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac0_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhhh... I thank that's everything! Let me know when you're ready to head out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我想就这些了！当你准备好的时候告诉我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac0_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Prophet told me to ask you about joining up here. He already gave me approval, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 先知要我来找你关于入会的事。他已经同意我了，所以...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm thrilled to hear that! {beat}But I can't really do any of the preparations standing here outside, so... Let me just get home first, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真高兴听到！{beat}但是在外面我真的做不了任何准备，所以...让我先回家去，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004f0cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Prophet told me to ask you about joining up here. He already gave me approval, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 先知要我来找你关于入会的事。他已经同意我了，所以...

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaStartRitual
Alright, you're sure you're ready? You're not going to drop dead of dehydration as soon as we head out? {sing song}Deserts are hot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你确定准备好了？我们一出去你不会就因为脱水而死的吧？{sing song}沙漠是很热的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you've told all your friends not to tag along? I mean it, bringing extra folks along for the ride can cause all sorts of issues!
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有你有没有告诉你的朋友们别跟过来？我是说真的，带别的人一起去会引起各种各样的问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure you're ready to head out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 确定你准备好出发了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004cac3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to start the enlightenment ritual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好开始启迪仪式了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaStartRitualReally
Excellent, then let us be off! {beat}You're going to need to wear a blindfold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，那我们出发吧！{beat}你得戴上眼罩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004d0dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest 20
I'm positive. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确定。我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugManDesertQuestTime
YEAH, AND I WANT PEOPLE TO STOP WORSHIPPING POLITICIANS, BUT ONLY ONE OF US IS GETTING WHAT WE WANT TODAY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我希望人们不要再崇拜政客了，但今天只有一个人能得到我们想要的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carlos the Debug Buddy [0703FB70] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest 10
I want to start Ophelia's wacky drug trip adventure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要开始奥菲莉娅那古怪的毒品冒险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetWhoYou
Well... I'm not really sure, truth be told.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我不是很肯定，说实话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, it started a couple years back. My ex was trying to kick my door down so she could rob me blind, claiming it was part of alimony. {grumbling to self}Fucking liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这始于几年前。我的前妻想要把我的门踢开抢走我的东西，声称这是扶养费的一部分。{grumbling to self}他妈的骗子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I grabbed all the chems and booze I could carry, and hopped out the back window. Probably should've opened it first, but live and learn!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带上了所有能拿走的毒品和酒，然后从后窗跳了出去。也许我该先把它给打开，我活了这么久才知道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I got really fucked up, so this is a bit fuzzy, but I ended up in the desert. Real far into the desert, and I didn't have food or water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我真的操蛋了，所以有点模糊不清了，但是我最后到了沙漠里面。在沙漠深处，而且我没有食物和水了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucky for me, I found some cactuses growing out there, and I survived off those. {beat}Turned out, they were pretty kickass hallucinogens, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走运的是，我发现了一些仙人掌，然后我依靠它们活了下来。{beat}我同时发现，它们相当容易引起幻觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, that's another drug-induced blank spot, but somehow I wandered back into civilization, where I bumped into some crazy chick, preaching to hobos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，这毒物使我断片了，但不知何故我又回到了文明社会，在那里我遇到了一个疯狂的女子，在对流浪汉说教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got to chatting, turned out she was trying to get people to join her in some crazy-ass drug-trip religion. She said I'd be perfect for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈了话，才知道她正在试图说服人们加入她那疯狂的毒品之旅教派。她说我很适合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both of us went along trying to recruit people. She was preaching about {weird}"astral magic" or something. {shrug}I just said there was drugs and sex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们俩一起去招人。她在说一些{古怪的}“天体魔法”什么的。{shrug}而我只是说那里有毒品有炮打。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recruited lots more people than her, and a bunch of 'em started saying I must be some kind of divinely-ordained prophet. Works for me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我招的人比她多，而且一帮人开始说我一定是某个神圣注定的先知。听起来还不错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetwhoyo_0004f089_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prophet, huh? How'd you con anybody into believing that nonsense?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先知，哈？你怎么能骗别人相信那些废话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetGoToHornyJail
Sorry, gotta be a full-on member of the religious revolution before you can drop trou with the best of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，只有成为宗教革命的正式成员才能脱了裤子跟我们一块玩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetgotoh_0004f08b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't used to be that way, but O was getting real tired of me importing hookers from Westside, and then not letting her preach at them. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过去没有这样要求，但是“奥”厌倦了我从西边招来妓女而又不让她对她们传教。随便吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetgotoh_0004f08b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you guys have orgies. Any room for me to get in on that action?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你们在狂欢。有没有房间让我参与一下？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, afraid not. Not right now anyway. Now, look, I'm going to be nice and not name any names here, Slicker, but the orgies are on hold right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，恐怕不行。至少现在不行。你看，我尽量和蔼可亲，不在这里指名道姓，那个叫浮油的家伙，但狂欢现在暂停了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetgotoh_0004f08c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, a recent addition to our little family, again, not naming names, Slicker, wasn't taking proper precautions before he stuck his dick in things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我们这个小家庭的新成员，再强调一次我不是指名道姓，浮油，他没有在老二插进去之前做好预防措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetgotoh_0004f08c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He keeps whining about how it burns when he takes a piss, and now all our orgies are on hold while we wait for his test results to come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他一直抱怨老二尿尿的时候火烧般的痛，在我们等待他的测试结果出来之前，所有的狂欢都暂停了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetgotoh_0004f08c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I'd rather we keep on keepin' on with the orgies and just keep {accusatory}the anonymous guilty party away unless we know he's clean, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我个人而言，我宁愿我们继续狂欢，只要把{accusatory}那个匿名犯罪者隔离开，直到我们证实他是干净的，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetgotoh_0004f08c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: O says that'd {quoting someone you don't like}"go against the astral principles of fairness and equity upon which this community was founded." Pfft.
ESP.TRADUIT: “奥”说那会{quoting someone you don't like}“违背群星的公平原则，公平是这个社区建立的基础。”噗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetgotoh_0004f08c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you guys have orgies. Any room for me to get in on that action now that I've reached astral enlightenment, or whatever?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你们在狂欢。既然我已经接受了星体的启迪，有没有房间让我参与一下？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetOpheliaName
{slightly annoyed}Eh, a better question would be "why the fuck did her parents name her that in the first place?".
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly annoyed}呃，更好的问法应该是“为什么他的父母要给她取这个名字？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0004f08e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Oh-fee-lee-uh" is way too many syllables for any kind of reasonable first name. I go by John, because making everyone say Jonathan would be {emph}evil.
ESP.TRADUIT: “嗷-吠-哩-呃”对于任何一个合理的名字来说，音节都太多了。我叫约翰，因为大家都觉得乔纳森是{emph}邪恶的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0004f08e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {grumbling to self}And that'd still be less syllables than she's got.
ESP.TRADUIT: {grumbling to self}但那样音节还是比她少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0004f08e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you ever call Ophelia by her full name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你从不叫奥菲莉娅的全名？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetNameIntCheck
{dull surprise}Oh. Huh. Her parents sure called that one, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dull surprise}噢，哈。那她父母肯定没取错名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetnamei_0004f090_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty sure it's a Shakespeare allusion. The Ophelia from the play was batshit insane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很确定这是莎士比亚的典故。戏里面的奥菲莉娅精神失常。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So is getting hit in the dick with a solid gold bar, but that doesn't necessarily make it a positive fucking concept.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是被金条砸到老二了，但即便是那样也不该让你觉得这是个好概念吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetnamei_0004f091_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like her name! It's fancy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢她的名字！真是很奇妙！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerWhoYou
I don't know. Am I "supposed" to be anything at all? This is your hallucination, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我“该”是什么吗？这是你的幻象，你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What... Who are you supposed to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么...你该是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerAstralWisdom
I mean, I doubt it. That's kinda the whole thing with "wisdom" isn't it? Nobody can give it to you, you have to give it to yourself. Or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，我怀疑。这就是“智慧”的全部？没有人能给你，你必须得自己给自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, Ophelia thinks that doing this enough times will open your mind to the secrets of the universe, and you can read your destiny in the stars...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，奥菲莉娅认为只要做足够多的次数，就可以打开你的思想面对宇宙的秘密，然后在群星上看到你的命运...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0a9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But she's fucking crazy, isn't she?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是她真他妈疯了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0a9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright... Don't suppose you could give me any astral wisdom, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...那你能给我任何星体智慧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerWisdom1
Then maybe you're crazy. Or, maybe, you two understand secrets the rest of the world can never hope to comprehend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么也许你疯了。或者，也许，你们俩知道了世界上的其他人永远不可能理解的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what would I know? I'm a skeleton with a fishbowl on my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我又怎么知道？我只是个头戴着鱼缸的骨架而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0ac_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think she's crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为她疯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerWisdom2
I suppose that's understandable...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是可以理解的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you did follow her out into the desert so you could drink her homebrewed hallucinogens. Says more about you than it does her, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你确实跟随她进了沙漠，喝了她家酿的致幻剂。我想你比她更疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0ad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Half the people I meet are crazy. It's kind of exhausting after awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我遇到过的一半人都是疯子。片刻就会让人很累。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerVisions
Oh, well, I can help you with that. Let's see...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我能帮你。让我们来看看...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, and everyone you know and love, will die...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，还有你认识和热爱的每个人，都会死...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Humanity can not and will not ever learn from their mistakes, and will keep shooting themselves in the foot until the world is rid of them forever...
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类不能也永远不会从他们的错误中吸取教训，他们会一直朝自己的脚开枪，直到世界永远摆脱他们...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0af_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, the winds will blow away any trace that we were ever here at all. All the remains to be seen is how fucked the earth is by then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，风会吹走我们在这里的任何痕迹。剩下要看的就是到那时地球会有多糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0af_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and if you don't wake up soon, you're going to wet yourself, and poor Ophelia won't have any clue what to do about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，如果你不尽快醒来，你就会弄湿自己，而可怜的奥菲莉娅会不知道该怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0af_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to see the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看到未来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerVisions2
No, that's nature. The one ascribing meaning to it is you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这就是自然。赋予它意义的人是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ask me, which you didn't, the important thing is to accept that we don't really control much of life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你问我的话，重要的是要接受这样一个事实：我们并不能真正控制生活。而你没有问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, that in mind, you just gotta carve out your own place for yourself, 'cause nobody else is gonna do it for you. Seize the day, and all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，在我心里，你只需要为自己开拓自己的地方，因为没人会替你做的。抓住这一天，以及这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0b1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's bleak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太暗淡了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerCharlie
Weird, a figment of your imagination is echoing things that you remember people saying to you? However could that be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪，你想象中的一个虚构的东西在呼应你曾听说过的话？那会是什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you sound like Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你听起来像查理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerUseless
Yeah, you might be on to something there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你可能发现了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, you know, right now your brain is melting in your skull on account of whatever it was that Ophelia gave you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你知道，现在你的大脑在你的头骨里融化，源于奥菲莉娅给你的那些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So right now might not be the best time to be expecting your subconscious to produce anything very helpful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以现在也许不是最好的时候来期待你的潜意识产生任何有用的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0b5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you can't give me any visions, or any astral wisdom? Kind of useless then, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你不能给我任何幻象，或者任何群星的智慧？那你就没用处了，是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerGoHome
Alright, if you say so. {beat}You sure?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，如果你这么说的话。{beat}你确定吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to wake up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要醒过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerReallyGoHome
Sure thing. Now, a good first step would be... Opening your eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。现在，第一步就是...睁开你的眼睛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest 70
I'm positive, I need to wake up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确定，我要醒过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDrugTripBonerNevermind
Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enlightened Astronaut [0704F0A2] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaacommune_aaadrugtripbone_0004f0ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, nevermind. I want to keep tripping balls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，没事。我想继续这个愉快的旅行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaWhatHappens
I can't really say in any detail. If the experience were uniform, it wouldn't really be very meaningful, would it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的说不出任何细节。如果体验是一致的, 它不会显得太重要，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliaw_0004f0bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expect there will be an astral theme to your visions, as that part seems to occur without fail. Beyond that? Who's to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你的幻象会有一个星体主题，因为出现了这一部分就不会出错。除此之外？谁又知道？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliaw_0004f0bf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahh, and I suppose I ought to give you fair warning regarding one... Uh, "mental hazard" of sorts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我想我应该给你一个合理的警告...呃，关于“心理危险因素”之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliaw_0004f0bf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you happen to come across any chasms, voids, fissures, and/or ravines... Do try not to fall in. Or jump in, as the case may be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你偶然发现任何深坑，空白，裂缝，或者深沟...千万别掉下去。无论如何别跳进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliaw_0004f0bf_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going to happen when I drink the ritual stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我喝了仪式上的东西会发生什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaChasms
Uhh... {uncertain, forced cheeriness}Possibly immediate and irreversible brain death, leaving you in a permanent vegetative state, if you don't just stop breathing entirely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...{uncertain, forced cheeriness}可能会立即和不可逆转的脑死亡，让你永远处于植物人的状态，如果你没有完全停止呼吸的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliac_0004f0c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly, forced cheer, trying to change the subject}But I'm sure that you'll be fine!
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly, forced cheer, trying to change the subject}但我肯定你会没事的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliac_0004f0c1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? What happens if I fall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？如果我掉下去会怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaHornyJail
{cheerful}I truly cannot think of a worse place for lovemaking and/or rutting like animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}我真的想不出还有比这里更糟的地方来做爱或者像动物一样发情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliah_0004f0c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dramatic stage whisper}Sand everywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dramatic stage whisper}到处都是沙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliah_0004f0c3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Admit it, you just wanted to be alone with me where nobody could interfere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 承认吧，你只想和我一个人呆在没人能干涉的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful}I truly cannot think of a worse place for lovemaking and/or rutting like animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}我真的想不出还有比这里更糟的地方来做爱或者像动物一样发情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliah_0004f0c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {dramatic stage whisper}Sand everywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dramatic stage whisper}到处都是沙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliah_0004f0c4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Admit it, you just wanted to be alone with me where nobody could interfere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 承认吧，你只想和我一个人呆在没人能干涉的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaBlindfold
If everyone knew the exact patch of empty desert wasteland I've designated as our sacred ritual spot, why... I might have to move elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我设计用来作为神圣仪式的地点，如果每个人都知道这个空旷的沙漠荒地的确切地点的话...我就得去别的地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliab_0004f0c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly over-the-top}I don't like having to change my routines!
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly over-the-top}我不喜欢改变我的习惯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliab_0004f0c6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why was it necessary to blindfold me the entire trek out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么来的时候必须要把我的眼睛蒙上？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaGetRoofied
{excited}Fantastic! Here you go, just drink this. {beat}Yes, I know how it smells. And tastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}非常好！给你，喝了这个。{beat}是的，我知道它很难闻。还有是什么味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliag_0004f0c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to begin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好开始了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaDelay
Of course! There's water and snacks on the table, if you'd like. Nobody ever said you have to seek the secrets of the universe on an empty stomach!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！如果你喜欢的话，桌子上有水和零食。没人说你得空着肚子去寻找宇宙的秘密！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliad_0004f0ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {suddenly serious, to self}...Did they?
ESP.TRADUIT: {suddenly serious, to self}...是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliad_0004f0ca_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, give me a minute to get ready, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，先给我一分钟时间准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaBoners
{pleasantly surprised}You saw the space-skeletons too? Truly, the stars have shined their blessings down upon you!
ESP.TRADUIT: {pleasantly surprised}你也看见太空骨架了？果然，群星把祝福降临在你身上了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliab_0004f0ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {excited}What else?
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}还有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliab_0004f0ce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's kind of a blur, but... There was a skeleton in a spacesuit that talked to me, I think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点迷迷糊糊的，但是...有个穿太空服的骨架跟我说话，好像是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaStarsAndShit
{nod}Yes, the recurring celestial doodads are always present. {conspiratorial}That's how you know the stars are offering glimpses of the truth to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {nod}是的，总是会有反复出现的天空装饰物。{conspiratorial}你知道这就是群星在让你窥视真相。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The underwater bit is new. Can't say I've ever experienced that... yet. So, not entirely sure what that bit means.
ESP.TRADUIT: 水下的部分倒是新的。我没有经历过那个...暂时还没有。所以，我不完全清楚那一点意味着什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're destined to travel the waves one day! {beat}Or maybe you had to piss. {shrug}Who can know the intricacies of the stars?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你注定有一天要乘风破浪！{beat}或者也许是你该撒尿了。{shrug}谁能知道群星的错综复杂之处？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {excited}Anyway! What else did you see?
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}那么！你还看见什么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... Lot of surreal junk. Kind of a space theme for most of it. And at one point I think I was underwater?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...很多离奇的东西。大多都是些太空主题的东西。有时候我觉得我是在水下？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaStarChurch
{excited}Yes! The church, glittering with stars! I didn't have much doubt before, but this officially proves it! You were meant to join this family!
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}是的！教堂，闪亮的星星！我之前并没有太多的疑问，但这个正式证明了这一点！你注定要加入这个家庭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... Unclear on the meaning of the bomb, but the church itself... Well, I couldn't've asked for a clearer sign, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...不清楚炸弹的含义，但是这个教堂...好吧，不可能还有更清晰的标志了，你不认为吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I first discovered the ceremony, it was that star-filled church that inspired me to create this movement. It really couldn't be any more blatant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我第一次发现仪式的时候，就是那个满是星星的教堂鼓励我创造出这项活动的。真的不可能再露骨了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Ophelia, you really need to make a spiritual movement to decipher the secrets of the universe!" That was how I read the constellations, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: “奥菲莉娅，你真的需要做一个精神运动来破译世界的秘密！” 我就是这样读懂星座的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even though every one of us has seen the starry church, I'm still always so pleased when someone new is blessed with such a celestial gift!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我们每个人都见过星光灿烂的教堂，但我仍然一直对新人收到这样的天体礼物的祝福而感到非常欣慰！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, now that we've established that you were meant to walk alongside us in our endless quest for astral truths... Shall we return home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我们已经确定你在对星体真理的无尽追求中，注定要与我们并肩而行...那我们可以回家了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustophelias_0004f0d2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Near the end, I was in some kind of church in outer space, and it was full of stars. And a nuke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快结束的时候，我在外太空的某个教堂里，里面全是星星。还有一枚核弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaGoHome
Of course! I was getting tired of shaking sand out of my boots, anyway. Oh, right, before I forget... Here's your blindfold again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了！我已经厌倦了抖掉靴子上的沙子。噢，对了，差点忘了...这是你的眼罩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliag_0004f0d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, let's depart before we're buried in sand! Lead on! {beat}Wait, no, you're blindfolded. Uh, I shall lead on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，让我们在被沙埋掉之前离开吧！带路吧！{beat}等一下，不，你戴着眼罩。呃，我来带路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliag_0004f0d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest 80
I'm ready to go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好回家了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaMemberPerks
{thinking}Uh... Well...
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinking}呃...这个...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004f6d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {this doesn't interest you}I suppose it's a pass to participate in the communal orgies. {beat}Wait, no, those are on hiatus for the moment. Uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: {this doesn't interest you}我想这是参加集体狂欢的通行证。{beat}等一下，不，这些暂时停止了。呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004f6d8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {making this up off the top of your head}Oh, wait, I know! You can have this... Uh, spiritually-significant... Uh... Fossil. Yes. An astral fossil.
ESP.TRADUIT: {making this up off the top of your head}噢，等等，我知道了！你可以拿着这个...呃，重大精神上的...呃...化石。是的。一块星体化石。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004f6d8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {still making shit up, more confident}Yes! As proof of your celestial accomplishments, I give unto you this extremely valuable and meaningful fossil thing! Use it with honor! {under your breath}Or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: {still making shit up, more confident}没错！作为你天国成就的证明，我赐给你这个极其珍贵和有意义的化石！光荣地使用它吧！{under your breath}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0004f6d8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem VMS01DinoSouvenir 1
So, now that I'm a member of your cul- uh, "spiritual movement", are there any perks besides the astral wisdom stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，既然我已经成为你的异——哦不是，是“精神运动”的成员，除了星体智慧之外还有什么额外的好处吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQNCROpinion
Good for business, bad for personal liberty and self-determination. Same as any old-world oligarchy- {blistering sarcasm}Oh wait, no, excuse me, "democratic republic".
ESP.TRADUIT: 有利于生意，但不利于个人自由和自决权。跟旧世界的寡头政治一样——{blistering sarcasm}哦等等，不，对不起，应该是“民主共和”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqn_0004f6da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a relatively successful, financially-viable, and {emph}moderately corrupt independent businessman, I'm the prototypical "winner" within their system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个比较成功的，财政上可行的，{emph}适度腐败的独立商人，在他们的制度里我是个典型的“成功人士”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqn_0004f6da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they succeed in their dubious goals of forcing themselves onto the Mojave, consent of the native inhabitants be damned, well, so fucking be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们成功实现了介入莫哈维这个不太靠得住的目标，让当地居民的意愿见鬼去，那么，就他妈这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqn_0004f6da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My business will likely boom, while the great unwashed masses will chafe and suffer under the boot heel of the wealthy policy makers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的生意可能会兴隆起来，而广大无知大众则会愤怒地在富有的政策制定者脚下受苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqn_0004f6da_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, in short, as with any system dictated by the whims of con-artists and cunts, it's all one great massive turd, finely polished to a mirror sheen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，总之，就像任何由骗子和王八蛋支配的制度一样，这不过是一坨大便，但是被精细地抛光成了镜面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqn_0004f6da_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得NCR怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerIntro1
{deflated}Oh. {whiny}Maybe... you could beg the Prophet to let you join? I don't want to be the bottom rung no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: {deflated}噢。{whiny}也许...你可以去求先知让你加入？我再也不想当最底层的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickeri_0004f6e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what do you want, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickeri_0004f6e1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a member of your silly astrology cult, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不当你那愚蠢的占星术邪教的会员，对不起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {grumbling}Oh, great. I was hoping the next newbie would be a Chadford-type idiot. Ugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: {grumbling}噢，太好了。我还以为下一个新人是查德福得那种类型的白痴呢。唔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickeri_0004f6e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ophelia didn't say shit about me answering to you, so I'm going to pretend that was just you giving me a friendly hello.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥菲莉娅他妈的没说我要听你的，所以我要假装你只是友好地打了个招呼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerIntro2
{whiny anger}Man, why does everybody always say that to me, goddamnit?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {whiny anger}伙计，为什么每个人都对我这么说，该死的？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickeri_0004f6e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sure, why don't you go fuck yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，你怎么不去操你自己呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerWhoYou
Well, actually, my name's Steve Dodson, but everyone here started calling me City-Slicker when I joined up. Just disrespectful, you know. No class.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，事实上，我的名字叫史蒂夫 多德森，但是我加入的时候每个人都叫我油嘴滑舌的城市人。只是不尊重而已，你知道的。没有阶级歧视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerw_0004f6e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {lying through your teeth}Back in Freeside, everybody gave me the respect I deserved, you know. I was the King's number-one guy, you dig?
ESP.TRADUIT: {lying through your teeth}在自由之城，每个人都给我应有的尊重，知道吗。我曾是猫王帮的头号人物，你懂了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerw_0004f6e4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why on earth does anyone call you Slicker? It have something to do with that oil spill in your hair?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么每个人都叫你浮油？跟你头发上溢出的油有关系吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerCallOut
{impotent whining}Fucking goddamnit! Why does everyone have to one-up me?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {impotent whining}操他妈的！为什么每个人都想要胜我一头？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0004f6e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No you weren't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不你不是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerBackground
{petulant}I wasn't ki- fuckin... Who told you-? I mean, I didn't... I was just... Listen here you- {incoherent pissy grumbling}
ESP.TRADUIT: {petulant}我不是被踢——操...谁跟你说的？我是说，我没...我只是...听着你这个——{incoherent pissy grumbling}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerb_0004f6e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {deeeep breath, fake calm}I wasn't kicked out of anything. I decided I was bored of Freeside, and so I came here as a vacation.
ESP.TRADUIT: {deeeep breath, fake calm}我没有被任何人踢出来。我只是对自由之城厌烦了，所以我到这里来相当于度假。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerb_0004f6e8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {lying}I'm here because I like drugs and partying. That's it. Nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: {lying}我来这里是因为我喜欢毒品和派对。就是这些。没别的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerb_0004f6e8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get kicked out of the Kings and end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么被猫王帮踢出来又来到这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerAboutProphet
Aw man, he's great, isn't he? All that shit about partying and doing drugs and shooting guns is, like, the best religion ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊伙计，他很不错，对吧？所有这些派对、吸毒、玩枪就是有史以来最好的宗教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickera_0004f6ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, the crazy chick is the Prophet now? That fuckin' blows, man. {petulant}I never voted for her, you just forced me to lie and say I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，那个疯婆娘现在是先知了？别他妈的吹牛，伙计。{petulant}我从来没给她投过票，你只是逼我撒谎说我愿意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickera_0004f6eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerWhatDo
{little embarrassed}Uh, mostly I help Jeff cook the meals for everyone. {defensive}It's one of my many talents.
ESP.TRADUIT: {little embarrassed}呃，基本上我帮助杰夫煮食物给大家。{defensive}这是我众多才能之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerw_0004f6ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm also working on- Uhh... A... personal thing. Don't worry about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同时工作在——呃...一个...这是私事。别担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerw_0004f6ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是干嘛的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerStartQuest
{defensive}F-fine! If you really want to help, take this package over to Daisy, in the bunkhouse! And don't take your sweet time, this is important!
ESP.TRADUIT: {defensive}好——好啊！如果你真的想帮忙，就把这个包裹交给黛西，就在工棚里！别浪费你的时间，这很重要！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickers_0004f6f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then hurry back and let me know what she says!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后赶紧回来告诉我她怎么说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickers_0004f6f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHippieLosersQuest 10
Personal issue, huh? Any chance I could help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 私事，哈？我能帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerAboutPackage
{nervous}T-that's none of your business. I j-just, figured, y'know, she might make a good lady for me, you dig? That's all!
ESP.TRADUIT: {nervous}那跟你没关。我只是，认为，她可能会成为我的好太太，懂了吗？就是这些！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickera_0004f6f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I figured I'd send a gift and some {poetry}poe- uhh, sexy pictures of me without a shirt on. {quickly}I'm extremely buff and attractive. Now get going!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我认为我应该送件礼物和一首{poetry}诗——呃，一张我没穿上衣的性感照片给她。{quickly}我超级健美和有吸引力。现在去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickera_0004f6f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this package?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个包裹是什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerSupportOphelia
What the hell? No way, dog! I'm all about that Prophet lifestyle, dig? Drugs and sex and drinking, hell yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么鬼？没门，狗腿子！我很喜欢先知式的生活方式，懂吗？毒品、性交和喝酒，真他妈爽！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickers_0004f6f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That chick is crazy, dude. Made me go into the desert and drink some nasty shit that gave me trippy nightmares. Fuck that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个婆娘疯了，老兄。把我带到沙漠，喝下恶心的东西，让我做迷迷糊糊的恶梦。去他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickers_0004f6f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to support Ophelia becoming the new Prophet here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你支持奥菲莉娅成为这里的新先知。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneWhoYou
Who cares? {annoyed}Ugh. Fine. I'm Daisy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁在乎？{annoyed}呃。好吧。我叫黛西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f6fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneWhatWrong
{bland shrug}Eh. Not especially.
ESP.TRADUIT: {bland shrug}呃。没什么特别的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f6f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is something wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么不对劲吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneName
{annoyed}Yeah, it also sounds too dainty for me to tell you to fuck yourself, but here we are, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}是的，对我来说，让你操你自己也太文雅了一点，但我们现在也算有缘相见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f6fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daisy? That seems a bit too cheerful for someone with your... attitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黛西？对你这种态度的人来说，这似乎有点太...高兴了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneName2
Eh. I guess. If you say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃。就算是吧。既然你这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f6fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to meet you, Daisy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你，黛西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneBackground
Ugh, come on. You don't really care about this stuff, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，拜托。你并不是真的关心这个，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f706_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的故事是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneWhatDo
{irritated}I lead the group campfire songs.
ESP.TRADUIT: {irritated}我是营火乐队的领队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f703_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do around here, Daisy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这附近干什么，黛西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneWhatDo2
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f702_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneWhatDo3
{dry amusement}Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dry amusement}谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f705_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有意思。
