ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneBackground2
{irritated}Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {irritated}好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f70a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is pretty out-of-the-way, but I'm sure you noticed it's not so far from Fiend territory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方相当的偏远，但我想你肯定注意到了它离恶魔帮的领地并不远？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f70a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I was. Well, I got myself gutshot by some NCR prick. Was blacking out on the side of the road, until Ophelia stumbled over my carcass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我曾经待的地方。我被某个NCR的鸟人给射中了。在路上昏迷过去，直到奥菲莉娅被我的身体给绊倒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f70a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess she dragged me back here, 'cause that's where I woke up. Kinda figured they'd give me shit for being a Fiend, but, nah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜是她把我拖回到这里来的，因为我就在这里醒了过来。我以为他们会因为我是恶魔帮的而揍我，但是，没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f70a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They just wanted me to chill out and do more chems with them, so fuck it, works for me. I get shot less this way, anyhow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们只是要我放松并且跟他们一起吸毒，去他妈的，这对我太有用了。无论如何这样我会少挨枪子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f70a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm genuinely interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneBackground3
{dry approval}That's the way to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dry approval}这样就对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f709_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, couldn't care less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我才不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyGivePackage
{skeptical}Okay...?
ESP.TRADUIT: {skeptical}好的...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisygivepac_0004f70d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pleasant surprise}Oh, look, there's a bunch of Med-X rolling around in the box. That's nice. And the letter...
ESP.TRADUIT: {pleasant surprise}噢，看啊，有一堆注射剂X在盒子里滚来滚去。真不错。这有封信...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisygivepac_0004f70d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {reading a letter an idiot wrote}"Dear Daisy, you are very pretty; and I like you a lot." {aside}That's not how semicolons work. {reading}"I want you to please be my girlfriend."
ESP.TRADUIT: {reading a letter an idiot wrote}“亲爱的黛西，你真漂亮；我非常喜欢你。”{aside}分号不是这样用的。{reading}“我想要你做我的女朋友。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisygivepac_0004f70d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {still reading}"If you will be my girlfriend say yes and we will be very happy together forever." {aside, sarcastic}That's fine, I don't like punctuation in my sentences, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: {still reading}“如果你愿意做我的女朋友就说好我们会永远幸福地在一起。”{aside, sarcastic}很好，我也不喜欢句子中有标点符号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisygivepac_0004f70d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {still reading}"I have included some Med-X because I heard you like Med-X a lot." {aside}Broken clock is right twice, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: {still reading}“我送了一些注射剂X给你因为我听说你很喜欢它。”{aside}我想就算是一个坏钟，每天也有两次准确显示时间的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisygivepac_0004f70d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {still reading}"Roses are red, violets are blue, please let me see your boobs." {aside}Rhythm is off, and that rhyme doesn't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: {still reading}“玫瑰是红色的，紫罗兰是蓝色的，请让我看看你的乳房。”{aside}节奏不对，而且这个押韵没起作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisygivepac_0004f70d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {mildly irritated}Well, your letter is incredibly stupid, and terrible, and you should probably never write anything ever again. {beat}But I do like Med-X, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: {mildly irritated}好了，你的信极端的愚蠢，还有可怕，你可能再也不应该写任何东西了。{beat}但是我确实喜欢注射剂X，所以...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisygivepac_0004f70d_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {comically bland}Wanna fuck?
ESP.TRADUIT: {comically bland}想要做爱吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisygivepac_0004f70d_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaKingCommuneMcGuffin 1
I have a package for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个包裹给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneFuckYes
Cool, I was getting pretty bored, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我正好觉得很无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f710_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaHippieLosersQuest.aaaBangedDaisy to aaaHippieLosersQuest.aaaBangedDaisy + 1
applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell setstage aaaHippieLosersQuest 20
Uh... Yes. Yes I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...是的。我要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneFuckNo
{disappointed}Oh. {irritated}This loser wrote a terrible love-letter and didn't even have the balls to deliver it himself?
ESP.TRADUIT: {disappointed}噢。{irritated}这个废物写了一封可怕的情书却又连自己送来的勇气都没有？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f711_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}Now I don't even want to fuck anymore. Tell that guy that he's a coward and a jackass, and I've never been more turned off in my entire life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}现在我再也不想做爱了。告诉那个家伙他是个懦夫和蠢货，我这辈子从来没有这么讨厌过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f711_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to self}I think I need to drink any memory of that trash out of my head. Ew.
ESP.TRADUIT: {to self}我想我应该把对那个垃圾的记忆从脑子里抽出来。恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0004f711_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaHippieLosersQuest.aaaDidntBangDaisy to aaaHippieLosersQuest.aaaDidntBangDaisy + 1
setstage aaaHippieLosersQuest 20
What? No, this isn't from me. That greaser guy in the mess hall wanted me to deliver it to you. I imagine he probably wrote it himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，这不是我的。食堂里那个油腻的家伙要我把它交给你。我想他可能是自己写的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerFinishQuest
{excited}Yeah? W-well, how'd she take it? Does she want me bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: {excited}是吗？那，她怎么说？她很想我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerf_0004f713_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I delivered that package for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我帮你送了包裹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerFinishQuest2
{confused}What? The hell is that supposed to...
ESP.TRADUIT: {confused}什么？他妈的这是怎么回事...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerf_0004f715_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh god fucking damn it! Why do I have to get fucking one-upped in everything?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢该死操！为什么我每件事都他妈要抢先一步呢？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerf_0004f715_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... I'm cool, damn it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我没事，该死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerf_0004f715_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaHippieLosersQuest 20 1 setstage aaaHippieLosersQuest 30
Uh... I'd say she "took it" very well. She should be all warmed up for you, buddy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我会说她“接受”得不错。她一定全身都热起来了，兄弟！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? N-no she didn't! ...Did she?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不她不会！...她是这么说的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerf_0004f716_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's... That's bullshit! I'm really cool, and I'm awesome, and... And... Fuck you, you probably gave her the wrong letter or something!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...那都是屁话！我真的很酷，我太棒了，还有...还有...操你妈，你可能给她拿错信了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerf_0004f716_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SHUT UP, I'M NOT CRYING!
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，我没哭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerf_0004f716_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHippieLosersQuest 30
Well, she liked the Med-X, but otherwise she said you're a coward and a jackass, and she's never been more turned off in her entire life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，她喜欢那些注射剂X，但是她说你是个懦夫和蠢货，还有她这辈子从来没有这么讨厌过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneAboutProphet
{you don't care}Whatever. {beat}Pretty fucking arrogant title to give yourself, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: {you don't care}随便。{beat}这是一个他妈的傲慢的头衔，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_00050f8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care. I'm here 'cause I got nowhere else to go, and I'm staying for the drugs and sex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎。我在这里是因为我没有其他地方可去，而且我留在这里还能享受毒品和性交。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_00050f8b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think she's batshit crazy. So was the last one. It's almost like you can't lead a stupid astrological drug-cult and not be a complete lunatic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想她完全疯了。上一个也是。就像你如果不是完全的疯子，就不能领导一个愚蠢的占星术毒品邪教一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0005fc08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneSupportOphelia
...Well, I suppose I like her more than the current {forced, this title is stupid}Prophet.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...呃，我想我更喜欢她，相比现在那个{forced, this title is stupid}先知来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_00050f8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {you don't care}I guess I owe her my life or something. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: {you don't care}我想我欠她一条命。随便吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_00050f8d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {devious}Tell you what... I'll give Ophelia my backing, with all the {deadpan}boundless enthusiasm that anybody could ever expect of me... For a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: {devious}跟你说...我会帮助奥菲莉娅，带着全部的{deadpan}冲天干劲，那是任何人在我身上从来没看到过的...当然要看价钱如何。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_00050f8d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do enjoy my opiates... Let's say... Half-dozen doses seems reasonable. Bring me the Med-X, and I'm good to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很享受我的麻醉剂...要么就...6支应该很合理。给我注射剂-X，那我就完全没问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_00050f8d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you agree to support Ophelia as the new Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会愿意支持奥菲莉娅成为新的先知吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaStartWindQuest
Absolutely! {beat}I mean, it's not really here precisely, but it is vital work that needs to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定啦！{beat}我是说，其实并不是在这里，但这是需要完成的重要工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00050f8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {beat}It's not vital at all. It'd just be really convenient.
ESP.TRADUIT: {beat}其实一点也不重要。只是真的很容易完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00050f8f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful}Anyway, our wind turbines could stand to be a bit less, uh... Awful. Problem is, we've yet to recruit any engineers into our ranks. Yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}我们的风力涡轮机可能少了点，呃...可怕。问题是，我们还没有招募任何工程师加入我们的队伍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00050f8f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {genuine}Seeing as how you seem to have a reputation for being some kind of globetrotting wasteland badass, I'm thinking you can help out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: {genuine}因为你看起来很有名气，像是一个在废土上旅行的厉害角色，我在想你能帮上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00050f8f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hoping that, perhaps, there are design schematics for a turbine that isn't made out of scrap garbage, somewhere out there. I need a copy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望，也许，有个不是用废弃垃圾做成的涡轮机的设计原理图，在外面的某个地方。我需要一份拷贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00050f8f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were I to hazard a guess, I'd say the old wind farm to the northeast of Novac would be a good place to start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我姑且猜测一下，我想说诺瓦克东北边的旧风力农场会是个着手的好地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00050f8f_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me know if you can find anything. In the meantime, I'll be rooting around through my boxes to find something adequate to reward you with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能找到什么就告诉我。与此同时，我会在我的箱子里找些足够奖励给你的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00050f8f_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 10
Is there any work around here you'd like me to take care of?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有什么工作需要我来处理吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaa188JunkManBucket
...Yes.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanbu_00051596_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {defensive}All the good spots have been salvaged already! I'll take anything I can get!
ESP.TRADUIT: {defensive}所有的好地方都被搜刮过了！我会拿上所有能拿的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanbu_00051596_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is a bucket seriously the best thing you have to sell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个桶真的是你卖的最好的东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaa188JunkManContQuest
...Oh, you have got to be fucking kidding me.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...噢，你他妈的一定是在耍我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanco_00051598_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some dude was here not that long ago, trying to sell some schematics like you want. He asked me, along with everyone else here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个家伙不久前在这里，想要卖你说的那种原理图。他问过我，然后还有这里的所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanco_00051598_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was saying there was crazy-high demand for the stuff, and that if I bought 'em, I could resell by the end of the day and double my money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说有人超级需要这个东西，而且如果我买下它们，我可以当天把价格翻一倍卖出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanco_00051598_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured him for a scammer, and told him to piss off. {beat, irritated}And now, here you are, before the end of the day, asking after the schematics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为他是个骗子，然后叫他滚蛋。{beat, irritated}现在你又来了，就在同一天，询问那些原理图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanco_00051598_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is someone around here selling some wind turbine schematics?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这附近有人在卖风力涡轮机的原理图吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaa188JunkManContQuest2
He went heading up towards Vegas. Maybe he tried to sell it again around that food/water/murder-for-hire stop up the road. Who knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他朝维加斯去了。也许他想去路旁那个美味休息站附近把它卖掉。谁知道呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanco_0005159a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, if you're not gonna buy this quality one-of-a-kind bucket, move along. I've got bills to pay and vices to indulge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，如果你不想买这个优质独一无二的桶的话，就走开。我有账单要付，还有欲望想要放纵一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanco_0005159a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 40
Where'd he go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他去哪儿了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He went heading up towards Vegas. Maybe he tried to sell it again around that food/water joint up the road. Who knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他向着维加斯去了。也许他想去路边的食物和水商店周围卖掉它。谁知道呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanco_0005159b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, if you're not gonna buy this quality one-of-a-kind bucket, move along. I've got bills to pay and vices to indulge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，如果你不想买这个优质独一无二的桶的话，就走开。我有账单要付，还有欲望想要放纵一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Salvager [07050F90] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaa188junkmanco_0005159b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 40
Where'd he go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他去哪儿了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRichCunt
Uhhh... {envious/humbled}I was... Joking. Yes. Just having a good laugh with, uh, my colleague in wealthiness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...{envious/humbled}我是...开玩笑的。是的。只是好好笑，呃，我富有的同行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickri_00051ba3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, out of curiosity, how'd you get so much money?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我只是出于好奇心问问，你是怎么得到这么多钱的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickri_00051ba3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peasant? Seriously? Do you not hear all these caps jangling in my pockets? Are you deaf, or just another unjustifiably arrogant idiot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 农民？认真的吗？你没听见我口袋里这些瓶盖叮当作响吗？你聋了吗，还是说只是一个无理傲慢的白痴？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGambleDickTerrifying
{pissing yourself}Uh... Teeth, please?
ESP.TRADUIT: {pissing yourself}呃...牙齿吧，可以吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickte_00051ba5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you rather keep the attitude, or all those nice teeth of yours? Because you can't have both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是想保持你的这种态度，还是你那些漂亮的牙齿？我看你得选一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGambleDickLuckCheck
That... That actually works? {beat}I knew that. I'm a very wealthy and successful gambler, myself. Yes I am. Very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...那真的有用？{beat}我就知道。我是一个非常富有和成功的赌徒。是的。非常富有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledicklu_00051baa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take about five minutes out of my schedule to play blackjack, and go home with every cap in the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我花了大约五分钟的时间玩21点，然后从赌场带走了一堆瓶盖回家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGambleDickCaesarRepCheck
Oh. Well. Yes. We... we wealthy colleagues have very innovative and effective ways of getting rich, yes we do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢。好吧。是的。我们...我们富有的同行拥有非常创新有效的致富方式呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickca_00051bab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I pissed off the Legion, and now every couple days, I get a delivery of expensive gear from their incompetent assassin squads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我惹恼了军团，现在每隔几天，我都能从他们不称职的刺客小队那里得到一批昂贵的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGambleDickFuckYouCheck
...Ha... That's... very funny, wealthy colleague. But... I don't need to work, because I'm... Extremely rich and successful already.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...哈...那...非常有趣，富有的同行。但是...我不需要公证，因为我...已经非常的富有和成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickfu_00051ba9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I work for a living. Maybe you should try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以工作为生。也许你该试试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGambleDickKilledCaesar
Uhh...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickki_00051bad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I call people "peasant" when I really, really like them. That's all. You're my favorite person I've ever met, and I'll name my firstborn after you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫别人“农民”是因为，因为我真的喜欢他们。就只是这样。你是我见过的最喜欢的人，而且我会用你的名字给我的第一个孩子起名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickki_00051bad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, look, it's a pompous jackass that thinks I won't kill him. That didn't work out too well for Caesar, but I'm sure you're much tougher than he was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，一个自大的混蛋以为我不会杀他。这对凯撒来说可不太好，但我相信你比他坚强多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGambleDickPerceptionCheck
I'm... In costume. For a very important... Rich-guy... Social thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我穿的是戏服。扮演一个非常重要的...有钱人...社交活动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickpe_00051bb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, wearing your extremely fancy rich-dude ratty overalls today, are we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你今天穿着十分华丽的有钱人的破烂工作服呢，是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGambleDick
Well, he wanted me to buy his silly schematics, but... I'm far too rich and important to listen to dirty peasants like him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，他想要我买下他的原理图，但是...因为我是如此的富有和重要，无法听像他这样肮脏的农民的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickco_00051bb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said he was heading for the Strip, but he went due west, so he could be anywhere. Still, it wasn't too long ago that he went off that way...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他要去赌城, 但他去了正西方向，所以他可能在任何地方。他走了应该还没有多久...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickco_00051bb2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe if you hurry you can catch him! {quietly}Please go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你快点的话可能可以追上他！{quietly}请走开吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Belmont [0705159E] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaophelia_aaagambledickco_00051bb2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 50
I'm looking for a guy with some wind turbine schematics. I know he came through this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个有风力涡轮机原理图的人。我知道他是从这条路过来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWindmillFiendAttitude
Wasn't planning on it. Why? Is there some reason I should try to kill you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没这个想法。为什么？有什么理由我一定要杀你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you're not going to try and kill me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你不杀我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWindmillFiendFiendFiendFiend
Oh. Well, those guys can be kinda dumb sometimes, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢。那些家伙有时候有点笨，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mama always said: "Boy you done best pick your battles" and I kinda get a vibe from you that you could turn me into a little red smear on the wall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈经常说：“ 孩子你要明智选择你的战场”，而我有种感觉你会把我变成墙上的一团红色稀泥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bbe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, it's a nice day! No need to be going around acting like violent barbarians, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，今天是个好日子！没必要像野蛮人一样到处乱跑，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bbe_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the other Fiends try to kill me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有其他的恶魔帮成员都想杀了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWindmillFiendContQuest
{awkward}Ah, funny story, that. See, that dude you was looking for did come here, but, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: {awkward}啊，那是个有趣的故事。你找的那个家伙确实来过这里，但是，呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, my buddy Skullfist didn't like that the windmill guy was asking ten G's for a scrap of blue paper, and he sorta lost his temper and, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我的朋友骨拳不喜欢那个家伙拿着张蓝色的废纸要价10000瓶盖，然后他发火了，呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he murdered the shit out of your friend. Sorry 'bout that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他杀了你的朋友。我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to yourself}Think his body might still be around here somewhere...
ESP.TRADUIT: {to yourself}他的尸体可能还在附近...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a guy with some wind turbine schematics. Seen anyone like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个有风力涡轮机原理图的人。你见过吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWindmillFiendContQuest2
Well, see, the windmill dude was saying how, if you built a big enough turbine, you could squeeze more juice out of it than Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个卖图的家伙说，如果能造个足够大的涡轮机，你就能得到比胡佛大坝更多的电力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, Skullfist got it in his head that if he built the biggest windmill the Mojave'd ever seen, he could become the king of the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，骨拳在他脑子里面琢磨，如果建造一个莫哈维最大的风车，他就能成为沙漠之王。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Him and some pals ran off to this old meat packing plant behind Vault 3. Place has kind of a weird rep, but that's where he went.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和几个兄弟去了3号避难所旁边的老肉食加工厂。那地方有非常古怪的传闻，但他就去了那儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking for those papers, that's where they'd probably be. Skullfist might get kinda mad if you try to take them, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要找那些图纸，那里应该是最有可能的地方。如果你想拿走的话骨拳可能会很生气，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shrug}You could probably whup his ass. I wouldn't worry too much about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}你也许能轻松地干掉他。我不会太担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fred [07051BB5] (mod) Quest : ([07036962]aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest) Dust in the Wind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaophelia_aaawindmillfien_00051bc2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaWindmillQuest 60
Great. Don't suppose the schematics are still stuffed in his pockets?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。原理图会不会还在他口袋里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugManUnlockOptions
OH MY GOD I THINK THE DEV IS FORCING HIS PERSONAL FETISHES INTO THE MOD, DISGUSTING. WHY ELSE WOULD YOU MENTION ORANGE JUICE, DEGENERATE?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢天啊，我想DEV将他的个人恋物癖强制塞进了这个MOD，真恶心。不然你为什么要提到橙汁，堕落的人？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carlos the Debug Buddy [0703FB70] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELSullivanKilled to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELSullivanKilled + 1 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieCommitted to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieCommitted + 1 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDBreckerDealtWith to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDBreckerDealtWith + 1 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDKilledGold to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDKilledGold + 1
Unlock those dialogue options that rely on the core ESM, and get me some orange juice, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解锁核心ESM文件支持的对话选项，然后给我些橙汁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPropjetContQuestOne
Good, good, one less annoying thing for the holy Prophet to have to waste his important time on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，很好，对神圣的先知来说，又少了一件浪费他重要的时间的烦人的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaapropjetcontq_00054605_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I promised you money? Yeah, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我承诺过给你钱？是的，给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaapropjetcontq_00054605_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next up... So, long story short, about a year ago, one of our more nomadic members stumbled across the aftermath of a Legion/NCR skirmish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一个...那么，长话短说，大约一年前，我们一个游牧的成员偶然发现了军团和NCR的小规模战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaapropjetcontq_00054605_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only survivor was this Legion kid. We've been trying to raise him as an upstanding member of my prestigious flock, but... No luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一的幸存者是这个军团的小孩。我们试图将他抚养成为我有威望的信众们中正直的一员，但是...运气不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaapropjetcontq_00054605_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little bastard is dedicated to Caesar, and our resident teacher is fed up. He says he's gotta go, so chat with him about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个小杂种还是死心塌地要跟从凯撒，我们的教师已经厌烦了。他说他要走人，所以去跟他谈谈吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaapropjetcontq_00054605_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's money in it for you! Now, get going!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这件事情会给你报酬的！现在，快去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaapropjetcontq_00054605_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 300
setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 50
I think I solved the family issue Dash was having.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我解决了达西的家庭问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetAboutGuns
Pfft. This ain't "a lot" of guns. This is a barely adequate amount of guns. If I had my way, I'd have rows of gun racks, floor to ceiling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噗。这不是“很多”枪。这是只是勉强足够数量的枪。如果按我自己的计划的话，我会有一排排的枪架，从地板到天花板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_0005460b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aside from just being fucking fun to shoot, personal armament is the only surefire method of ensuring peace and fucking equality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了他妈只是对射击感兴趣以外, 个人武器是确保和平与安全的唯一可靠方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_0005460b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a lot harder to be oppressed if you can shoot your oppressors in the face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能对施以压迫者开枪的话，那你就很难会被压迫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetabout_0005460b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a lot of guns in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这里有很多枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCannibalBroDecline
Such a shame, that. And it does put me in an awkward position. You see, I promised my friends a nice fried baby feast tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是羞愧。这确实让我陷入了尴尬的境地。你看，我答应了我朋友今晚吃一顿丰盛的煎炸小孩大餐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrod_0005461c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I respect your right to decline my offer, I really will be needing that child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重你拒绝我提议的权利，但我真的需要那个孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrod_0005461c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do hope you don't find this terribly rude of me, but I'm afraid I'll have to oversee your grisly murder now. Gentlemen! To battle!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的希望你不会觉得我很粗鲁，但恐怕我现在得监督你那可怕的谋杀了。先生们！战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrod_0005461c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaBabyEaterBattleSquadREF.enable
No. I want nothing to do with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。我不想和你有任何关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCannibalBroElaborate
Certainly! I represent a group of upstanding men and women with a {cannibal euphemism}taste for the delightful company of innocent children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！我代表一群正直的男女，他们喜欢和天真的孩子们{cannibal euphemism}在一起玩耍的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbroe_0005461d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're just so much {cannibal euphemism}sweeter than the average wastelander, and we delight in {cannibal euphemism}having them for dinner!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们相比普通的废土人是如此{cannibal euphemism}的甜美，而且我们很高兴{cannibal euphemism}有他们一起吃饭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbroe_0005461d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... Maybe you should explain why you want the kid, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...也许你应该先解释一下你为什么想要那孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCannibalBroAttack
Now that is a shame. It's been so long since we had a good baby steak. Ah well, I suppose it can't be helped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是惭愧。我们好久没有吃过一顿好的小孩烧烤了。我想，你帮不了我们这个忙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbroa_00054623_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on out, gentlemen! This meat needs tenderizing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 出来吧，先生们！现在这块肉需要给它松一松！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbroa_00054623_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaBabyEaterBattleSquadREF.enable
<Attack> The only thing you're going to be eating is hot lead, freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 你唯一能吃的就是滚烫的枪子，怪胎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCannibalBros4Lyfe
{pleasant surprise}Oh? How delightful to meet a fellow gourmet, even out here in this filthy refugee camp!
ESP.TRADUIT: {pleasant surprise}噢？见到一位美食家朋友真高兴，即使是在这样个肮脏的难民营里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbros_00054620_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I can trust you to deliver the boy to me, then? Us child-eaters must look out for one another!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我可以信任你把这个小孩交给我们了？我们这些小孩美食家需要互相照顾！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbros_00054620_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you and I both have refined tastes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你和我都有着高雅的品味！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCannibalBroProceed
Oh, was I being too euphemistic? My apologies! Allow me to rephrase! {clears throat}
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我是不是太含蓄了？抱歉！请允许我重新措辞！{clears throat}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrop_00054621_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slowly}I would like to consume the flesh of the child you're trying to get rid of. I will give you money in exchange for letting me eat this boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slowly}我打算把你想除掉的小孩的肉吃掉。我会给你钱来交换那个男孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrop_00054621_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you agree to allow me to take the child? {beat}So that me and my friends can eat him, because we enjoy the taste of children?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会同意让我带走那个小孩吗？{beat}这样我和我的朋友就可以吃掉他，因为我们非常喜欢小孩子的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrop_00054621_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...What?
That's precisely what I'm implying!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我的意思！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrop_00054622_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the honor to be spokesman and founder of the Southern Nevada Baby-Eaters Society, and I'm currently planning a luxurious Society banquet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很荣幸作为南内华达食婴者社团的代言人和创立者，而我正在计划一个豪华的社团宴会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrop_00054622_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you would just direct the child to me and my friends, rather than that poor overworked missionary, I'll see to it that you're paid very well!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能把孩子交给我和我的朋友，而不是那个可怜的劳累过度的传教士，我会确保你的报酬很高！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrop_00054622_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What say you, friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么说，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrop_00054622_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you implying you want to eat the kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在暗示你会吃掉那个小孩？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCannibalBroAccept
Wonderful! Tell the child's guardian to drop him off at the Basincreek Building. Once we've feasted, I shall send the 2000 caps with all due haste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太妙了！告诉小孩的守卫把他送到盆湖湾大楼。我们敬请享用之后，我们会立马奉上2000瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbroa_0005462b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How exciting! I'll tell my friends to sharpen their knives and prepare their most luxurious bibs. {sing song}I can scarcely wait!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是兴奋！我要告诉我的朋友们把刀磨利点，然后准备好他们最豪华的餐巾。{sing song}我等不及了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbroa_0005462b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you ever so much for your business, and good day to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢你，祝你有美好的一天！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbroa_0005462b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 80 showmessage aaaCannibalBroMessage aaaCannibalBroREF.disable
You have a deal. Where should I send the kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 成交。我要把小孩送到哪里去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCannibalBroWaffle
Of course! Take your time! The mind is a fickle thing, and oftentimes, we find ourselves reconsidering what we once thought to be concrete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！不着急！思想是一个易变的东西，我们常常会发现自己在重新考虑我们曾经认为是确定的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrow_0005462d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you decide you'd like to help the community by providing a gourmet meal to my friends and I, the 2000 caps are yours, with no catch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你决定要帮助我和我的朋友们提供这份美食，那么这2000瓶盖就是你的了，绝对划算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrow_0005462d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you need to do is direct the child's guardian to deliver him to the Basincreek Building, rather than this silly refugee camp. Easy as can be!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只需要告诉小孩的守卫把他送到盆湖湾大楼，而不是这个愚蠢的难民营。要多简单就有多简单！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrow_0005462d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do hope we can raise a toast in your honor tonight, before we begin our feast! Thank you ever so much for your time. Ta-ta!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们今晚在宴席开始之前能为你的荣耀而举杯！非常感谢你抽出时间。再会！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrow_0005462d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 80 showmessage aaaCannibalBroMessage aaaCannibalBroREF.disable
I'll need some time to decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要点时间来做决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneWhoYou
I'm Boles. I'm the teacher here, which is a funny joke because there're only two kids in the entire cult. {you don't care}Oh, wait, "family", excuse me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫博尔斯。我是这里的老师，可笑的是这里整个教会只有两个小孩。{you don't care}噢，等一下，是“家庭”，不好意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054630_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thankfully, Mandy turned 15 not too long ago, and she decided that's the age where she can stop attending. Thank Christ; she was obnoxious as hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢天谢地，曼迪不久前刚满15岁，她决定在这个年龄可以停止参加学习了。感谢上帝；她非常让人讨厌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054630_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if Peter ever decides to run off back to Caesar's loving embrace, maybe I can get back to day-drinking. Good lord.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果彼得决定重新投向凯撒那爱的拥抱的话，也许我就可以重新在白天喝酒了。上帝啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054630_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneName
{calmly irritated}It is... My name, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {calmly irritated}它是...我的名字，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054632_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of name is Boles, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 博尔斯那是个什么样的名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneAboutPeter
He's the leftovers from some battle between the NCR and Legion down to the southeast. One of our wandering members stumbled across the aftermath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是NCR与军团在东南边的一场战斗的幸存者。我们一个在外游荡的成员偶然发现了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054636_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think John and Ophelia were both hoping to pump his head full of an interest in hedonism or drug-assisted astrology, respectively.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想约翰和奥菲莉娅都分别希望给他脑子里塞满享乐主义或者借助毒品的占星术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054636_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, they both failed. Seems like the little bastard is pretty thoroughly indoctrinated into the Legion's set of values.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，他们都失败了。看起来军团很彻底地给这个小杂种灌输了他们的价值观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054636_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meaning, of course, that he's a little prick, and every minute I spend trying to deprogram him brings me one step closer to insanity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 意味着，他当然就是个小混蛋。每一次我尝试消除他被灌输的东西，都让我离发疯又近了一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054636_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the issue with Peter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneAboutMandy
Well I don't know, she insists her name is "Mandy Shadowdeath" so I can't imagine how she would be a problem student.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，她坚持她的名字叫“曼迪·影亡“，所以我无法想象她怎么会是个问题学生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054635_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that I can blame her too much. She's just copying her father, who is equally as insane as she is, if not more so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能责怪她太多，她只是在学她的父亲，他父亲没有更疯也至少跟她一样的疯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054635_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {blistering sarcasm}Sure, Dash! Go ahead and raise your daughter to think she's "the chosen one" or whatever! I'm sure she'll grow up to be normal and well-adjusted!
ESP.TRADUIT: {blistering sarcasm}是的，就是达西！继续把你的女儿当成”获选者“来培养吧！我相信她长大后会恢复正常和完全适应的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054635_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong with Mandy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 曼迪怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneBackground
{bitter}I was a teacher in Shady Sands. 12 goddamn years I work there, nobody has anything bad to say about me, no complaints at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: {bitter}我是一个沙荫市的教师。我在那里工作了该死的12年，没有人说我的坏话，也没有任何抱怨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054638_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But one time I show up to work drunk and fire a pistol into the ceiling, and suddenly {bitter mocking}I'm "a danger to society" and I need to be put away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是有一次我喝醉了去工作然后向着天花板开了一枪，然后突然{bitter mocking}我就变成了“社会危害分子”，我将要被扫地出门了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054638_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I left before that could happen. Hopped on the first caravan heading east, and I stuck around Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在被炒掉之前我就走了。跳上了第一辆向东的大篷车，然后被困在维加斯附近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054638_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent about a year living in the streets, and drinking. Then I run into John, and we get to talking, and he invites me to come with him here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我花了一年时间在街上生活，还有喝酒。然后我遇到了约翰，我们聊了起来，他邀请我跟他一起到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054638_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get to have my old job back, sort of, and nobody cares if I spend all day getting hammered at work. Bad news is, the student body here sucks ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找回了我以前的工作，也没人在乎我是否整天都在工作时候喝得烂醉。坏消息是，这里的学生很操蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00054638_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story? How'd you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么故事？你是怎么来这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneAboutProphet
Eh, he's fine. He supports me getting drunk all day, and lets me do my job however I want. But he ain't no magical religious prophet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，他人不错。他支持我整天喝醉，然后让我随便怎么完成自己的工作。但他并不是什么有法力的宗教先知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's just a charismatic guy that happens to advocate a life of instant gratification and hedonism, and surprise surprise, people find it compelling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只是一个有号召力的人，碰巧提倡即时满足和享乐主义的生活罢了，然而让人吃惊的是，人们觉得这很有吸引力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it weren't for Ophelia whispering in his ear, this would just be a friendlier-than-average druggie community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是奥菲莉娅一直在他耳边低语，这不过只会是个比通常瘾君子更友好点的社区罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But no, she's got him advocating some ridiculous made-up religion because she got too high one night and believed the sky was talking to her. Bah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是不，她让他鼓吹一些荒谬编造的宗教，因为她某天晚上吸得太嗨而相信天空对她说话了。呸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {you don't like Ophelia}Hell's bells, Ophelia is the one running the show now? What did we ever do to deserve this headache?
ESP.TRADUIT: {you don't like 奥菲莉娅}哎呀，奥菲莉娅现在是主持节目的人吗？我们到底做了什么才遭受到这头痛的事情？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, she avoids conflict in favor of some mystical hand-holding kumbaya bullshit, so it's not like she'll turn us into violent zealots or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，她为了手把手指导某个神秘的非洲狗屁圣歌而避免冲突，所以她不会把我们变成暴力狂热分子什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But come on now. Ophelia running things?! She's delusional! She drops so much of that trippy cactus water, it's a miracle her brain still works!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是现在。奥菲莉娅掌管一切？！她有妄想症！她喝了那么多致幻的仙人掌水。她的脑子还没坏真是奇迹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She puts datura in that homebrewed peyote water! Datura! Do you know how badly that stuff can fuck you up? It's poisonous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 她把曼陀罗放到私酿的佩奥特仙人掌汁里面！曼陀罗！你知道那玩意儿会把你搞砸吗？它是有毒的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于先知的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneMoreProphet
I'm not really much for praying in the first place, when we're talking about religions that have lasted for thousands of years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一开始就不太喜欢祈祷，而我们谈论的宗教已经延续了几千年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A religion based on tripping balls and misinterpreting stupid astrology nonsense? Come on, now. I'm an educator, goddamnit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种基于吸毒幻想和误解了占星术的宗教？得了吧。我可是个教育工作者，该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As to why I'm staying here... Hell, I got nowhere else to be. I get paid a bit to do my thing, and better yet, I can drink all day and nobody cares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我为什么要待在这里...操，我没地方可去了。我做我的事能得到一点报酬，更好的是，我可以整天喝酒而没人关心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't believe in the religion, why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不相信这个宗教，你又为什么来这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneStartQuest
Oh, thank god. I've been telling him that for the past six months.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，感谢上帝。我跟他讲了六个月了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Peter, the brat dressed like a Legionary? Yeah, I've tried all year to get him to stop with the Caesar worship, and nothing's worked. I give up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，彼得，那个穿着军团衣服的小混蛋？没错，我花了一整年时间来劝他停止对凯撒的崇拜，然而没有一点用。我放弃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the Followers of the Apocalypse are looking to take in some kids that've been left orphaned by the war. Peter fits, way I see it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道末日追随者会收留战争中的孤儿。在我看来彼得很合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, go see if one of their missionaries will be willing to take the kid off my hands. They shouldn't be too hard to find. Just check refugee places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，去看看他们的传教士是否愿意接纳这个孩子。他们应该不难找。只要去难民区找找看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, really. I'm sick of dealing with this kid. God damn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，真的。我受够了和这孩子打交道。该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005463f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 60
John told me there's an issue with one of your students?
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰告诉我你的一个学生有问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFOAMissionaryWhoYou
I'm not a doctor, if that's what you're wondering. I'm trying to give a second chance to some of the refugees here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是医生，如果你是这么以为的话。我想给这里的难民第二次机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054642_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: War orphans, primarily. With nowhere else to turn, and no remaining family to help them, they need somebody to step up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主要是战争孤儿。无处可去，没有剩下的家人来帮助他们，他们需要有人站出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054642_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, as it always goes, the Followers have to step in and fill that role to our own detriment, because nobody else will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，一如既往的，追随者不得不站出来填补这个角色，因为没人可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054642_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're stretched too thin, and taking on new mouths to feed is only hurting us in the long term.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们战线拉得太长，从长远来看，不断收留新的人只会对我们造成伤害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054642_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, that's life, isn't it? Unlike some of the groups ravaging the Mojave at the moment, the Followers prioritize human lives over hollow concepts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，这就是命，不是吗？不同于目前那些肆虐莫哈维的组织，追随者优先考虑人的生命而不是空洞的概念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054642_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFOAMissionaryTakeKid
Ah. A sad story, and one all too common in the region, these days. The boy was a Legionary in training? That's uncommon, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊。一个悲伤的故事，这年头在这个地区很常见。这个男孩是个军团的实习生？至少那很不寻常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, if you'd tell your friend to bring the boy here, I can arrange for one of our people to take him back west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，如果你告诉你朋友把这个男孩带过来，我可以安排一个人把他带回西部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054645_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only hope that we can get through to him. Caesar's people are brainwashed completely, and it starts from the moment they're born.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望他能够理解。凯撒的人民都被完全洗脑了，而且是从一出生就开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054645_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 70
There's a Legion-trainee kid that a friend of mine is looking after. Would the Followers be willing to take the kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我朋友在照顾一个被军团训练出来的小孩。追随者愿意收留他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFOAMissionaryDepths
Less than I'd hoped. Did you see that building with the big cross on the roof, directly across the street from the entry to Aerotech?
ESP.TRADUIT: 比我希望的要少。你看到屋顶上有个大十字架的那栋楼了吗，就在航空科技公司入口的街对面？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054644_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a religious institution that offered free education to locals who signed on with them. Not entirely dissimilar to the Followers, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个向当地加入他们的人提供免费教育的宗教机构。其实与追随者并没有完全的不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054644_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm unclear what happened, precisely, but there was some kind of massacre in there recently. Nobody really knows all the details, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 确切地说我不清楚到底发生了什么，但是最近那里发生了一场大屠杀。没有人真正知道所有的细节，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054644_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were no survivors. From the Reverend, to his security detail, to the employees, even the students. All dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有任何幸存者。牧师，保安，雇员，甚至学生。全都死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054644_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had hoped, perhaps, some survivors were hiding, but... Well, by now the church has just become another shelter for local squatters and addicts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们希望，也许有幸存者躲了起来，但是...到目前为止，这座教堂已经成为了当地流浪汉和瘾君子的庇护所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054644_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fear things in the Mojave will get far worse before they get better. If they get better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我担心莫哈维的情况在好转之前会变得更糟。当然如果情况还能变得更好的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Missionary [0705460E] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult03\aaaprophet_aaafoamissionar_00054644_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you helped many?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经帮过很多吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneProceedQuest
Thank. God. Where am I dropping the little bastard off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢上帝。我要把这个小杂种送到什么位置？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_0005585f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spoke with the Followers. They've agreed to take Peter from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟追随者谈过了。他们同意收留彼得了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneFOA
Alright. Good. Then, I'll get to dragging his ass off that way. You should go talk with John, I bet he'll be happy to hear the end of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。很好。那么，我要把他给弄过去。你应该去告诉约翰，我猜他会很高兴听到事情解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00055862_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 90 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetPeter to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetPeter + 1
There's a Followers missionary at the Aerotech Refugee Camp that will take him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个航空科技难民营的追随者传教士愿意收留他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBolesCommuneCannibalBro
Alright. Good. Then, I'll get to dragging his ass off that way. You should go talk with John, I bet he'll be happy to hear the end of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。很好。那么，我要把他给弄过去。你应该去告诉约翰，我猜他会很高兴听到事情解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boles [0702FFC0] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleghoul02\aaageneric_aaabolescommune_00055863_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 90 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetPeter to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDMetPeter + 2 rewardkarma -50
There's a, uhh, charitable organization that will take him. They're at the Basincreek Building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个，呃，慈善组织会收留他。他们在盆湖湾大楼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetContQuestTwo
Good, good. Keep making yourself useful around here, and I might just include an eleventh doctrine for everyone to throw money at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，很好。继续让发挥作用，我可能会增加个第十一条教义，让每个人都往你身上砸钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetcontq_00055e68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {genuine}I'm not doing that.
ESP.TRADUIT: {genuine}开玩笑我不会那么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetcontq_00055e68_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, did you know we have a hot spring here? If you've seen it, you also probably saw the loser sitting there, polluting the water with his ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你知道我们这里有个温泉吗？如果你看见它，那你一定能看见坐在旁边的那个废物在用屁股污染泉水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetcontq_00055e68_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's kind of like a direct mirror opposite of me, in that he's dumb as a bag of hammers, and also nobody likes him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就像是对着我的一面镜子，那里面他就像一袋锤子那么蠢，而且没有人喜欢他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetcontq_00055e68_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, he's been trying to get our local gardener guy to help him with... Some bullshit, which our {he's not}friendly greenhouse tender refuses to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他一直想让我们当地的园丁帮他...做些事，而我们{he's not}友好的温室园丁拒绝这样做.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetcontq_00055e68_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, go chat with the crop-babysitter, Nick, and see if you can convince him to do... The thing. Whatever it is. I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，去跟这个庄稼看护人聊聊，他叫尼克，看看你能不能说服他...做事。不管是什么，我都不关心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetcontq_00055e68_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah, right. Here's your cash for finally ridding us of the Legion kid. {under your breath}Hope he gets captured by cannibals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，对了。这是你的钱，感谢你让我们终于摆脱了那个军团小子。{under your breath}真希望他被食人族给抓过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetcontq_00055e68_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 100 player.additem caps001 500
You and Boles won't have to deal with Peter anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和博尔斯不用再和彼得打交道了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickStartQuest
Oh for the love of- Really?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看在上帝的份上——真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much you want to bet that the only reason he's taking that stance is because he doesn't actually know what Chadford's been asking from me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意赌多少？他这么做的唯一原因是因为他根本不知道查德福得要我干嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wants me to murder some guy that he owes money to. I deserted from the military because I was sick of all the killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他要我杀一个要他还钱的人。我离开军队是因为我厌倦了所有的杀戮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd have to be pretty fucking dire for me to arm up again, and Chadford is not going to be the one making it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我重新再拿起枪那他妈就太糟了，而查德福得不可能让我重操旧业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should chat with him. Maybe you can convince him to stop being a complete asshat. {beat}Probably not, but worth a shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你应该跟他谈谈。也许你可以说服他别再做个完全的混蛋。{beat}也许没用，但至少可以试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 110
John sent me to tell you to do... Whatever task that the idiot in the hot spring wants you to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰叫我来告诉你去做...那个温泉旁的白痴要你做的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickAboutProphet
John? Yeah, I'm not really very religious, so I'm not on board with all the "prophet" stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰？是的，我并不是很信教，所以我不会加入任何“先知”的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I do like what he says about how country is just a trick by old rich men to convince young idealists to die on their behalf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我喜欢他说的：关于国家不过是有钱的老家伙说服年轻的理想主义者为他们而死的一场骗局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even better, is that we can all be free of our pasts here. Whatever we used to be, or used to do, it doesn't matter now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更好的是我们都可以在这里摆脱过去。不管我们过去是谁，或者做了什么，现在都不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says that it's up to each of us to make our own place in the world, and this community gives a blank slate to do that.
