ESP.TRADUIT: 他说我们每个人都有权利在世界上建立自己的地位，而这个社区就提供了这样的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's worth trying for. {quiet}It has to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那值得一试。{quiet}必须的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ophelia's the "prophet" now, huh? Fine. I'll give her a chance. At least I know she has good intentions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥菲莉娅是现在的“先知”了吧，哈？很好。我会给她个机会。至少我知道她有好意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's just as into the whole self-determination thing as John is. I just hope that her... Eccentricities don't fracture things here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她和约翰一样热衷于自决权利。我只希望她的...怪癖不会破坏这里的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took her goofy desert ritual - we all did. But that was about where her influence stopped. Now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我参加过她愚蠢的沙漠仪式——我们都参加过。但那就是她能施加影响力的地方。现在呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I'm not sure how many people will be willing to give this place a chance, with her "astral destiny" crap taking center stage. I guess we'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我不确定有多少人会愿意给她这个机会，让她的“星体命运”来占据舞台中央。我想我们等着看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00055e6d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManWhoYou
I am Dragonfist. I wander the wastes, searching for worthy opponents who stand a fair chance of enduring my strength.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫龙拳。我在废土中漫步，寻找在公平情况下能承受我力量的有价值的对手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanwho_00056478_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when I find these worthy challengers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我找到这些有价值的挑战者之后呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanwho_00056478_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I punch them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就揍他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanwho_00056478_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManAboutProphet
{stern}Unless this prophet is gifted with divine strength, I have no interest in their affairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}除非这位先知天赋神力，我对他们的事情没有兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanabo_0005647a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对先知有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManBackground
{stern}The blonde woman's promises of metaphysical enlightenment. I had hoped I would meet a worthy challenge within the confines of my own mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}那个金发女人对玄学启迪的承诺。我希望我将在自己的思想范围内迎接一个有价值的挑战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanbac_0005647c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}I was left disappointed by the experience, but for now, this is an adequate spot to hone my skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}那次经历让我很失望，但现在，这是一个合适的地方来磨炼我的技巧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanbac_0005647c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brought you to the commune?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么把你带到公社来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManWhatDo
{stern}I am honing my skills. By punching rocks, my fists will learn, and gain the strength of the stone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}我在磨炼我的技巧。通过猛击石头，我的拳会学会和得到石头的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanwha_0005647e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}By training in this hot spring, while wearing leather, I shall expel all weakness from my body in the form of sweat.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}通过穿着皮草在温泉里训练，我会将所有的弱点通过汗从身体排出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanwha_0005647e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}By standing in the water, while wearing boots, I shall challenge and overcome trench foot.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}通过穿着鞋子站立在水中，我会挑战和克服壕沟足病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanwha_0005647e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}Soon, the ultimate challenge shall begin. But not until I have a sparring partner worthy of the title.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}很快，最终的挑战要开始了。但除非我有一个配得上这个头衔的拳击搭档。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanwha_0005647e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManStartQuest
{stern}No. Your fists are weak and soft. You have much training to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}不。你的拳头又软又弱。你还有很多训练要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansta_00056480_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}Return to me once you have learned how to punch like a dragon is living within your fist, and I shall accept your worth.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}当你学会如何像龙一样出拳的时候再回来，那时我会承认你的价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansta_00056480_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {considering}Hmm... Your fists seem mighty enough...
ESP.TRADUIT: {considering}嗯...你的拳头看起来足够有力...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansta_00056481_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}Very well! However, this challenge is not for the faint of heart, or else it would not be worthy of Dragonfist's dragon fists!
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}非常好！然而，这个挑战不适合胆小的人，否则将不值得挨我龙拳的拳头！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansta_00056481_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}I shall require your weapons, for this challenge would not be challenging if you could simply shoot our opponents.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}我要你交出武器，如果你简单一枪杀了对手就没有什么挑战一说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansta_00056481_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}And this is meant to hone our skills, so don't bring backup.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}这是为了磨练我们的技能，所以不要带后援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansta_00056481_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready to begin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好开始了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansta_00056481_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManAccept
{stern}Excellent! Then I shall take your weapons, and give you these knuckle dusters.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}非常好！那么我收走你的武器，然后给你这个指虎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanacc_00056485_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}Now, as for what this challenge entails... I have hired three elite mercenary teams to come here and kill us both.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}现在，基于这个挑战的需要...我雇佣了三个精英雇佣兵小队到这里来杀我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanacc_00056485_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}Instead, we shall kill them, using the strength of our mighty fists! Now, prepare yourself! They come!
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}而我们要杀掉他们，用我们自己拳头的力量！现在，准备好！他们来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanacc_00056485_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeallitems aaaHotspringGearBoxREF 1 1
setstage aaaHotspringKarateQuest 10
I am ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManDecline
{stern}Very well. Make your preparations, then speak with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}很好。去做你的准备，然后再告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemandec_00056484_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没准备好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManNextWave1
{stern}Good, just in time for the second group. Be ready!
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}好，刚好赶上第二组。准备好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemannex_000570ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateWaveOneREF.disable aaaKarateWaveTwoREF.enable
I think that's all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想就这些人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManNextWave2
{stern}Our power can only grow stronger from here. The final wave approaches. Ready yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}我们的力量只能从这里变得更枪。最后一波要开始了。准备好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemannex_000570ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateWaveTwoREF.disable aaaKarateWaveThreeREF.enable
I think we killed the last of that group.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们把那群人杀光了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManFinishQuest
{stern}Indeed. You have handled yourself well. I see that my appraisal of your fist-strength was accurate.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}没错。你做得很好。我对你拳头力量的评估是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanfin_000570b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}Whether you know it or not, you have become stronger through your training here today. As have I.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}不管你知不知道，通过今天的训练，你变得更强壮了。我也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanfin_000570b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}Here is the key to the box where I stowed your equipment. Although, I do not believe you need it. You have proven the might of your fists, alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}这是我存放你装备的箱子的钥匙。尽管我不觉得你还需要它们。你已经证明了你拳头的威力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemanfin_000570b1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaHotspringKarateQuest 10 1 setstage aaaHotspringKarateQuest 20
Is that the end of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样结束了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickWhatDo
{confused by a stupid question}I'm... working in the greenhouse. What do you think my job is?
ESP.TRADUIT: {confused by a stupid question}我...在温室工作。你以为我的工作是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00057cb6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是干嘛的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadAboutProphet
Oh, dude, he's really radical. Like, he's all about doing drugs, and getting high, and tripping balls, and... Like, being stoned. Yeah...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，伙计，他真的不同凡响。比如，他一直在制作毒品，吸毒，享受毒品幻觉，还有...飘飘欲仙。是的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadabout_00057cb8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like... Being stoned, dude. It's most excellent. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢...飘飘欲仙，伙计。那是最棒的。是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadabout_00057cb8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ophelia is prophet now? Bodacious!
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥菲莉娅现在是先知了？真棒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadabout_00057cb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's hot, and sometimes she comes in the hot spring to, like, wash, and stuff. And uhh, yeah, I've, like, seen her titties sometimes. Righteous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她很辣，有时候她到温泉来，呃，洗澡。呃，是的，我，呃，有时看见她的奶子。很正。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadabout_00057cb9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna give her my babies. Gnarly, dude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要跟她生孩子。那真是顶呱呱，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadabout_00057cb9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadContQuest

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...What?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_00057cbb_2.ogg
NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Nick is that tubular deserter guy, right? Yeah, I was hoping he could, like, go find the dude I'm in debt with, and like, shoot him a bunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！尼克就是那个管子一样的逃兵，对吧？是的，我希望他能，找到我欠钱的那个家伙，然后，射翻他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_00057cbb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, like, he's being such a bummer about it. Like, dude, it's not righteous to leave me hanging, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，他实在让人失望。伙计，让我心里一直悬着是不正直的，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_00057cbb_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, maybe you could murder that total butthole, right? Yeah, you look like a regular murder-machine, dude! Radical!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，也许你能杀掉那个王八蛋，对吧？对啊，你看起来就像个杀人机器，老兄！不同凡响的杀人机器！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_00057cbb_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it you're demanding Nick do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要求尼克为你做什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadContQuest2

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...What? Sorry, I zoned out there, dude. I was imagining that I was here in this hot spring, and then some bodacious babes with big boobs showed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...什么？对不起，我走神了，伙计。我刚刚在想象我在这个温泉里面，然后一些大胸的宝贝从里面现出来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_00057cbd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was radical! {loooong pause}...Anyway, what'd you say? You'd help deal with the loan shark? Gnarly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那真是牛逼啊！ {loooong pause}...呃，你刚刚说什么来着？你会帮忙对付那个放高利贷的？太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_00057cbd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's hanging out at, like, a farm in outer Vegas. Yeah. Thanks for agreeing to kill him for me, dude. While you do that, I'm going to sit here. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在，呃，维加斯外的一个农场游荡。是的。谢谢你同意帮我杀了他，老兄。我就在这里坐着等你。是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_00057cbd_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyways dude, I'm gonna try and imagine more babes that think I'm sexy. Righteous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老兄，我要试着想象出更多认为我性感的宝贝出来。正点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_00057cbd_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 120
Do it yourself, you lazy ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自己干吧，你这个懒虫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadContQuest3
Righteous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 正点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_000582c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, this dude is, like, operating out of a farm house in outer Vegas. I think he might be buddies with some Powder Gangers or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这个家伙，在外维加斯经营一个农场。我想他可能有一些炸药帮的朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_000582c2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you go and kill him, I'm gonna stay here and relax, 'cause this water is really warm and nice. Yeah...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去杀了他，我就待在这里放松放松，因为这里的水真的又温暖又舒服。是的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_000582c2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's kinda like peeing, only it's not gross. How gnarly is that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点像尿尿一样，只是不会恶心。是不是好的呱呱叫？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_000582c2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, have fun solving my problems for me, dude! Later!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你在解决我的问题过程中愉快，伙计！回头见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadcontq_000582c2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 120
Fine, goddamn it. Fine, I'll solve all your problems for you. Where am I going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，该死的。好吧，我会帮你解决所有的问题。我要去哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadFinishQuest
Radical! That dude was, like, totally bogus. Uhh... I don't think there's anything else I need... Oh! Unless you want to scrub my back for me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 牛逼！那个家伙，呃，完全是个骗子。呃...我不认为我还有什么需要...噢！除非你能帮我擦擦背！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadfinis_000582c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Wait, where are you going?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...等一下，你去哪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadfinis_000582c4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 140
I killed that mutant loan shark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了那个变种人高利贷主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetFinishQuest
Hold on, more important thing came up, gotta hash that out first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等下，更重要的事情出现了，得先把它解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {irritated}While you were gone, a package for you arrived. They told me to hand it to you when you came back.
ESP.TRADUIT: {irritated}你走了之后，有一个你的包裹到了。他们告诉你回来之后交给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588c9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the goddamn Prophet, not a glorified postal deposit box. Take this, and tell your buddies not to pull this shit again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是他妈的先知，不是一个好看的邮箱。拿着这个，然后告诉你的朋友别再寄过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588c9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, what were you talking about? Chadford?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，你刚刚在说什么？查德福得？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588c9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2000 player.additem StrangeMeatPie 1 player.additem aaaCannibalBroLetter 1
I finished helping Chadford.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经帮助了查德福得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chadford? The hell did he want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查德福得？他他妈到底要干嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I finished helping Chadford.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经帮助了查德福得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetFinishQuest2
Oh. {beat}Well, you should've told Chadford to fuck himself. That's how I always handle him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢。{beat}那，你应该告诉查德福得去操他自己。我一直就是这样对付他的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, if that's done... Then everything is done, I think. I got nothing else, so... Yeah, good job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢好吧，如果那解决了...那么我想一切都解决了。我没有别的事了，所以...对了，干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588cd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, as infinitely valuable as the gratitude of a holy Prophet is, you know what's even more valuable?
ESP.TRADUIT: 神圣先知的感激之情是非常珍贵的，而你知道什么更有价值吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588cd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Money! Here you go, have a thousand caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钱！给你，1000个瓶盖接着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetfinis_000588cd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 140 1 setstage aaaProphetJohnQuestOne 150 player.additem caps001 1000
You told me to solve the issue between Nick and Chadford, so I did. Problem solved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要我去解决尼克和查德福得之间的问题，我办到了。问题解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCannibalBroBabbyz
Well, the name is really more of a mission statement than any sort of ironclad societal stricture. In this case, the matter is merely semantics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个名字其实相比任何一种打不破的社会约束更像是一个使命宣言。既然是这样，需要关心的仅仅是语义而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrob_0005952d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While we do acknowledge babies as the developmental stage with the most ideal flavor, children in general are always priority barbecue material.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们知道婴儿是风味最理想的发育阶段，孩子们一般都是烧烤的首选材料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrob_0005952d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alas, nice as it would be, we simply are not in a position to be overly picky about our meals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，情况会变好的，我们只是不能对我们的饭菜过于挑剔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrob_0005952d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps one day, our society shall prosper to such a degree that we can feast exclusively upon babies. But for now, we make do with what we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有一天，我们的社会会繁荣到可以完全地享用婴儿这样的程度。但现在呢，我们只能尽我们所能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrob_0005952d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Believe me, when your most common nutritional option is Fiend, the notion of consuming a healthy child is truly a beautiful prospect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，当你最常见的营养选择是恶魔帮的话，享用一个健康孩子的信念真是一个美好的设想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Strange Man [07054611] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaaprophet_aaacannibalbrob_0005952d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Southern Nevada Baby-Eaters Society...? You know this kid isn't a baby, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 南内华达食婴者社团...？你知道那个小孩不是个婴儿，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetPlzRetireSenpai
That sounds like O's problem. As in, not mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那看起来是“奥”的问题。不是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetplzre_0005952f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure she wouldn't be dumb enough to try and force the issue. She does know who has all the big guns around here, yeah? Yeah, thought so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信她不会蠢到试图强行提出这个问题。她知道谁是这里的大人物，对吧？是的，我想是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetplzre_0005952f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, I seem to recall that I never made myself the Prophet. I was declared as such, by my loyal flock of crazies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，我好像记得我从来没有让自己成为先知。我是被我忠实的那群疯子们给推举的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetplzre_0005952f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should remind O who it is around here that has the backing of the common man, huh? Tell her to drop this, and forget it ever happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你应该提醒“奥”，是谁在这里得到了普通人的支持，哈？告诉她放弃吧，当做一切都没发生过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetplzre_0005952f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {genuine}Uh, I mean actually remind her. That wasn't a euphemism for violence or anything. Just... talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: {genuine}呃，我是说“提醒”她。那并不是暴力之类的含蓄说法。只是...告诉她就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetplzre_0005952f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 20
Ophelia isn't too happy with the direction you're taking things. She feels like she'd be a better prophet than you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥菲莉娅对你说话方面不太高兴。她觉得她会比你成为一个更好的先知。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaCoupProceed
Ah, that's hardly a surprise. {beat}It's not "hardly" a surprise at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，这很难感到惊奇。{beat}这基本就不是什么“很难”惊奇的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, the next step is easy enough. We just need to get a good majority of the people here supporting my ascendency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢好吧，接下来的一步很简单。我们只需要使这里大多数人们支持我的权力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really get much of a sense of strong preference from most of these nice people, so I'm of the opinion that they can be swayed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的没有从大多数好人那里感觉到强烈的偏好感，所以我认为他们是可以改变的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can skip Jeff and Boles, as they're both well known to be firm followers of John's way. Likewise, we can skip Dash, as he likes my way already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以忽略杰夫和博尔斯，因为他们总所周知是约翰的铁杆。同样的，我们也可以忽略达西，因为他是我的铁杆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, let's start with Nick in the greenhouse, then Jeff's assistant cook next, followed by Daisy in the communal bunkhouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我们先从温室的尼克开始，然后是杰夫的厨师助手，接着是集体工棚里的黛西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure that Dragonfist is capable of forming opinions on any subjects beyond punching and karate, but worth a shot, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定龙拳是否能够在拳击和空手道之外的领域形成意见，但是我想值得一试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And lastly, there's Chadford. I have a plan for Chadford. We'll speak to him when the time is right and we've won over the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后是查德福得。我有个针对查德福得的计划。我们赢得了其他人的支持后在恰当的时间再跟他谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, you probably pieced this together already but... You'll have to be my representative in speaking to these folks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你可能已经拼好了，但是...你得作为我的代表跟这些人讲话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I did it myself, it would likely look as if I was conspiring to gather supporters for some kind of coup, which could lead to violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我自己去做，那看起来就像我在密谋为某种政变聚集支持者，那将会导致暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no. We want to avoid bloodshed, so you'll have to speak on my behalf. I appreciate it, I really do. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不。我们要避免流血事件，所以你得代表我说话。我很感激，真的。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059533_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 30
John's not interested in giving up the Prophet thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰没兴趣放弃先知的身份。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaCoupBetray
{irritated}You're hardly the first person to have a five-minute conversation with John and come away from it thinking he has all the answers in the universe.
ESP.TRADUIT: {irritated}你不是第一个听了约翰5分钟演讲后，就认为他有宇宙中所有的答案的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059532_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spoke with John. I think he has the right idea, and you should let him keep running the show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟约翰谈过了。我想他的想法是对的，而你应该让他继续维持这场秀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaStandDown1
Then perhaps he ought to go join the Kings, who make a point of venerating "coolness" while paradoxically exuding an aura of overwhelming lameness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那他也许应该去加入猫王帮，他们崇尚“最酷”而又同时矛盾地流露出压倒性的跛脚气质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059539_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Being "cool" is not a qualification to guide a spiritual movement, especially one making great strides towards the betterment of all mankind.
ESP.TRADUIT: “酷”不是指导精神运动的资格，尤其是对一个正在向全人类的进步迈进的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059539_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {pouty}Besides, I can read the stars. What's cooler than that?
ESP.TRADUIT: {pouty}另外，我能读懂群星。那不是更酷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059539_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean... John is pretty cool, so you should give him a chance, shouldn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说...约翰很人很酷，你应该给他个机会，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {surprised}Pride? But, I don't... {beat}Nobody... has ever accused me of being prideful before. Huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: {surprised}自尊心？但是，我没有...{beat}没有人...指责过我以前骄傲自大。哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would call several things into question, wouldn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会引起对一些事情的质疑，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... Unsure if you're correct, but... It's not impossible. If you're right, then it seems I've a great deal of astral wisdom yet to process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...不确定你是否说的对，但是...也不是不可能。如果你是对的，那看来我还有很多星体智慧要继续领悟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {thinking}And if you're wrong, surely a proper rebuttal should have been immediately obvious to me. And yet, it isn't, which would mean...
ESP.TRADUIT: {thinking}如果你错了，一个恰当的反驳对我来说应该是显而易见的。但目前，还没有，也就是说...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, surely that would mean... I must still have a great deal of astral wisdom to absorb. {beat}Your game, fairly won, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，当然那就是说...我仍然必须有大量的星体智慧要去吸收。{beat}你赢了，我猜想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well! You can tell John that I'll allow the matter to settle... {emph}For now. It seems I'm not yet enlightened enough to guide this family. So be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好！你可以告诉约翰我会让这件事解决的...{emph}暂且。看来我还不够开悟到指导这个家庭。那就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 35
If the goal is to spread your philosophy, why does it matter why people initially join? You're letting your pride get the best of you..
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果目标是传播你的哲学，那人们最初为什么加入又有什么关系？你让你的自尊心占了上风...

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaStandDown2
[FAILED] {sad}But... This isn't a democracy, it's a transcendent spiritual movement, dedicated to the betterment of mankind.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {sad}但是...这不是民主运动，这是一场超凡的精神运动，致力于人类的进步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd kind of be like if you allowed a classroom to pick their own teacher. Our Prophet should be the wisest one here, not the most popular.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它就像是否你任由一个教室自己挑选老师一样。我们的先知应该是这里最聪明的，而不是最受欢迎的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: John may be a good people-person, but I assure you, he's nowhere near as experienced as I am in matters of grave celestial importance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰也许是个好人缘的人，但我向你保证，在一些非常重要的事情上他远没有我有经验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the vast majority of the people here want him in charge, is it right to go over their heads?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这里的绝大多数人都想让他掌权，那推翻他是对的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED]I mean... You're not wrong, exactly...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我的意思是...你说的没错，其实...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose... Hmm. Perhaps I have bought into John's own egocentric nonsense. {to self}There's a scary thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想...嗯。也许我已经接受了约翰以自我为中心的胡说八道。{to self}有个可怕的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, Dash and his daughter both declare themselves to be "the chosen one" and I've never been threatened by that bit of lunacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，达西和他的女儿都宣称他们自己是“获选者”，我从来没有被那种疯狂所威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps you are right. That John wants to latch onto this movement as a vehicle for his own hedonism is of little consequence to me, surely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的。约翰想要依附于这个运动，以此作为他自己享乐主义的载具，而这对我其实也没什么影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Petty bickering over hollow titles is anathema to the celestial wisdom that we seek, so I suppose I can be content with not doing that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为一个空洞的头衔而争吵，对我们所追求的天国智慧来说是可憎的，所以我想我可以不那样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. You can go and tell John that I concede the point. He can call himself Prophet until we're all dead and buried, for all I care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。你可以去告诉约翰我承认这一点。他可以继续称自己为先知，直到我们都死了埋了。我不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 80
setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 35
Prophet is just an empty title. Who says your philosophy can't coexist with John's?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先知只是个空头衔。谁说你的哲学和约翰的哲学不能共存？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaStandDown3
Uhh... Probably? We're not really financially motivated here, though. I didn't charge you for the astral ritual in the desert, now did I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...也许吧？然而我们这里没有真正的经济动机。我没有因为沙漠中的星体仪式而向你收费，现在我要钱了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly disappointed}You can do better than that, surely?
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly disappointed}你可以做得更好的吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But have you considered how much money you can score if John stays on top? You'd be rich!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你考虑过如果约翰继续掌权，你能赚多少钱吗？你会很富有！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... sounds unconscionably cynical... Not necessarily {emph}incorrect, just really scummy and dishonest. {slightly pointed}I hope {emph}you didn't come up with that notion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...听起来过于悲观...不一定{emph}不正确，只是有些下流和不诚实。{slightly pointed}我希望{emph}你没有得出那个观念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sigh}I suppose it was asking too much to hope for people to rise above their own natures as they arrived here, without prodding on my end.
ESP.TRADUIT: {sigh}我想当人们来到这里时，不在我的刺激下而超越自己的本性, 这显然要求太高了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slightly bitter}Fine. I can hope for people to be better than they are, and I can be wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly bitter}好吧。我希望人们比现在更好，可能我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like any of this, but so be it. Perhaps if people actually listen to the stars, they'll move past their baser instincts, eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这些，但就这样吧。如果人们真的听群星的话，他们最终会忘记自己不道德的天性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can go tell John that he's won this tilt. {pointed}No doubt he'll be delighted. {to yourself}He usually is, regarding things that make me feel ill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以去告诉约翰他赢得了这个头衔。{pointed}毫无疑问他会很高兴。{to yourself}他通常关心的是使我感到不舒服的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005953e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 35
You're looking at this wrong. If people want to party with John, the price is joining your religion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的看法是错误的。如果人们想和约翰聚会，代价就是加入你的宗教。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaNevermind
{slightly annoyed}Right. That's what I thought. I suppose you have three choices moving forward, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: {slightly annoyed}不错。我也这么想。那么我想你有三个选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059538_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 1. You can try your best to channel John's {slight mocking}awesome persuasive skills, so as to better convince me to let my religion be co-opted by a charlatan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 1. 你可以尽力支持约翰那{slight mocking}令人敬畏的说服技巧，以便说服我让我的教会由一个骗子来负责拉拢人员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059538_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 2. Go back to the original plan. {beat}You know, the one I suggested after you asked to help me take back my spiritual movement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 2. 回到最初的计划。{beat}你知道的，就是你答应帮我夺回宗教时我所建议进行的运动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059538_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, number 3! {beat, slowly}Go. Away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，3！{beat, slowly}滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059538_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {slight mocking}Your choice!
ESP.TRADUIT: {slight mocking}由你自己选！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_00059538_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... Nevermind, I got nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...别介意，没事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetOpheliaConcedes
Ha! I was only 50/50 on whether she'd see reason or not. Well now, looks like the party ain't stopping anytime soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！我只有一半的把握我她是否能明白其中原因。现在好了，看起来派对不会再暂停多久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_00059541_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, by my reckoning, you've earned some cash for helping out. Bet that's more than she'd give you, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 依我看，你为自己挣到了这些钱。估计比她能给你的多得多吧，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_00059541_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go. A good use of it would be... Drugs, liquor, and titties. {conspiratorial}At the same time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。使用它的最好方式就是...毒品，烈酒，还有奶子。{conspiratorial}全都一起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_00059541_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 3000 SetObjectiveCompleted aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 70 1 SetObjectiveCompleted aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 35 1 setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 80 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDSidedWithJohn to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDSidedWithJohn + 1
Ophelia gives up. She says you can keep up the Prophet thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥菲莉娅放弃了。她说你可以保留先知的头衔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetOpheliaWins
{grumbling}Oh, this ought to be good...
ESP.TRADUIT: {grumbling}噢，这应该很好...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {to self}So... Looks like she got the greaser on board, that's not special... Huh. Daisy, too? And Nick and the karate dude? The hell?
ESP.TRADUIT: {to self}那么...看起来她的船员都上船了，这并不特别...哈。还有黛西？还有尼克和空手道伙计？什么鬼？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, looks like I still got Boles and Jeff. And... {horrified}Chadford?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来我还是有博尔斯和杰夫的支持。还有...{horrified}查德福得？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {disturbed}You've got to be fucking kidding me! The question of O or John comes up, and everybody but fucking Chadford swings O's way?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {disturbed}你他妈是在玩我吗！在选“奥”还是约翰的问题上，除了他妈的查德福得以外所有人都倒向了“奥”？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Okay. I'm finished. If Chadford is the only neutral party around here that thinks I'm a good leader, I'm doing something seriously wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...好吧。我完蛋了。如果查德福得作为唯一的中立方认为我是一个好领袖的话，那我就犯了严重的错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {resigned}I suppose I can live with that. O says here that I can keep the house, I can keep the orgies and the partying... Just not the title. Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {resigned}我想我可以接受。“奥”说我可以继续保留房子，我可以保留狂欢和派对...只是不能用这个头衔。好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {convincing yourself}I don't need a title. I wrote my goddamn truths, and I stand by 'em. O can have her way, and I'll have my way, and that's fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {convincing yourself}我不需要头衔。我写下该死的真理，然后坚守它。“奥”有她的路，我也会有自己的路，那很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shrug}Hell, maybe this'll turn out for the best. Seems like I can keep doing what I've been doing, just without the responsibilities. I can live with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}操，也许这会是最好的结果。看来我可以继续做我一直在做的事情，只是没有了责任。我能接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Fine. Tell Ophelia that she can have her silly title. {defensive}I never wanted it anyway. Being just the recruiter is fine. {beat}Pays more, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。告诉奥菲莉娅她可以得到那愚蠢的头衔。{defensive}我从来没想要它。做一个招聘人员就好了。{beat}而且报酬还高些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, I'm sure she's waiting for you in the basement. {beat, grumbling to self}Fucking Chadford... The fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧，我相信她还在地下室等你。{beat, grumbling to self}操你妈的查德福得...操...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetophel_0005a173_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaOpheliaVoteTape 1
setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 70
Here, Ophelia wanted me to give this to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，奥菲莉娅要我把这个给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManSupportOphelia
{stern}Yes. You have proven the worth of your fists, and so I shall trust that they are guiding you along the path of righteousness.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}是的。你已经证明了你拳头的价值，而我相信它们会引导你走上正义之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansup_00059544_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaDragonfistVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaDragonfistVoted + 1
Will you agree to support Ophelia as the new Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会愿意支持奥菲莉娅成为新的先知吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {stern}This does not concern me. If she wishes to claim this title, she should earn it through the power of her fists.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}这与我无关。如果她想获得这个头衔，她应该用拳头的力量来赢得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansup_00059545_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you agree to support Ophelia as the new Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会愿意支持奥菲莉娅成为新的先知吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManSupportOphelia2
{stern, getting annoyed}If I agree, will you stop braying at me about this nonsense? It does not pertain to fists or karate, and so I have no use for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern, getting annoyed}如果我同意了，你能不能别再向我嘶叫？它不适用于拳头或空手道，所以我没有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansup_00059548_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you please reconsider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能重新考虑一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKarateManSupportOphelia3
{stern}Fine, fine. Dragonfist agrees. Now, go away, or I shall introduce you to my fists. They are very strong. {beat}You should feel honored by the offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: {stern}好吧，好吧。龙拳同意了。现在，走开，否则我就要让你尝尝我的拳头。它们非常强壮。{beat}你应该为这个提议感到荣幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dragonfist [0705646F] (mod) Quest : ([07056474]aaaHotspringKarateQuest) The Ultimate Karate Challenge EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaahotspri_aaakaratemansup_00059549_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaDragonfistVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaDragonfistVoted + 1
Agreed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickSupportOphelia
{all rhetorical}Ophelia? The crazy chemist lady? The one that makes everyone dose up on some kind of psychotropic before they can join this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: {all rhetorical}奥菲莉娅？那个疯狂化学师小姐？在每个人加入之前让他们都服用某种精神药物的那个人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, uh, you wanna go ahead and give me a reason to believe that the trippy astrology nut would make for a good leader?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，呃，你能不能给我个理由，好让我相信一个毒品占星术疯子能当一个好领袖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b4c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to support Ophelia as the next Prophet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你支持奥菲莉娅担任下一任先知。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickConvince1
Shit... Look, I like John, but... {irritated sigh}If the choice ever came down to his happiness, or all of ours, I don't know which way he'd swing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操...你看，我喜欢约翰，但是...{irritated sigh}如果他的选择最终取决于他的幸福，或是我们所有人的幸福，我不知道他会朝哪个方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're right. Ophelia's nuts, but I don't think she has a selfish bone in her body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的。奥菲莉娅是疯子，但我不认为她体内有自私的念头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Fine. I'll back her. I hope this ain't a mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。我会支持她。我希望这不是个错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b52_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaNickVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaNickVoted + 1
[NCR Rep] I know the NCR as well as you do, and if you want this place to be different, Ophelia is the leader you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR] 我跟你一样了解NCR，如果你想让这里与众不同，奥菲莉娅就是你想要的领袖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickConvince2
That's... {beat}That's not a bad point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...{beat}这一点不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: John does love his guns. And hunting. And if it came down to it, I don't get the sense that he'd be bothered pulling the trigger on a person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰确实喜欢他的枪。还有打猎。如果是这样的话，我想他不会因为对一个人扣动扳机而感到烦恼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that I think he'd ever get a taste for blood just for the hell of it, but if he ever felt like we were being threatened or something... Maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为他嗜血不仅仅是为了寻求刺激，而是他曾经觉得我们受到了威胁什么的...也许。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b53_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Maybe I have more in common with Ophelia than I thought. I'll give her a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。也许我跟奥菲莉娅的共同点比我以为的还要多。我会给她个机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b53_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaNickVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaNickVoted + 1
So between John and Ophelia, which one do you think would be more likely to call for violence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么在约翰和奥菲莉娅之间，你认为哪一个更可能会呼唤暴力？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that was my only criteria for leadership, I'd be throwing all my support behind Daisy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是我对领袖的唯一标准的话，我会全力支持黛西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But have you ever considered which one of them is more attractive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你有没有想过哪一个更迷人呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickConvince3
{exasperated}Fine, give it here. {beat}You're lucky I have to rely on freelance couriers to send letters to my family back west. Those guys are pricey.
ESP.TRADUIT: {exasperated}好吧，拿来吧。{beat}你很幸运，我只能依靠邮差来给我在西部的家人通信。而那些家伙要价很高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaNickVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaNickVoted + 1 player.removeitem caps001 500
Would you reconsider if I gave you 500 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我给你500瓶盖，你会再考虑一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {annoyed}...Seriously?
ESP.TRADUIT: {annoyed}...你是认真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I was going to offer you 500 caps, but I'm a little short. Uh, could I interest you in some pocket lint instead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算给你500瓶盖，但我手头有点紧。呃，能不能用一口袋绒毛来代替呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickNevermind
Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_00059b51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaisyCommuneOpiateBribe
{pleased}Well, how nice of you. I'll take those.
ESP.TRADUIT: {pleased}啊，你人真好。我收下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0005a15b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, well, I suppose while I'm drifting in and out of consciousness, I can probably mumble Ophelia's name rather than John's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想当我在意识中徘徊的时候，我也许念出奥菲莉娅的名字比约翰更多些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0005a15b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, go on, then. I've got very important self-medicating to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，去吧。我还有非常重要的自我治疗要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daisy [0704C496] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult06\aaahippiel_aaadaisycommune_0005a15b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem Morphine 6
set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaDaisyVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaDaisyVoted + 1
I got you the Med-X. Half-dozen syringes, like you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿来了你要的注射剂-X。6支注射器，按照你的要求。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerConvince1
{hopeful}Friends in Freeside...?
ESP.TRADUIT: {hopeful}自由之城的朋友...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a164_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, I clearly misspoke. What I meant was, I'd be thrilled to support Ophelia as the next Prophet!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我显然说错话了。我的意思是，我会很兴奋地支持奥菲莉娅担任下一个先知！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a164_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you... You'll tell your Freeside buddies about how cool I am, right? A-and, you'll tell 'em to let me come back without shooting me, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你...你会告诉你自由之城的兄弟们我有多酷，对吧？还有，你会告诉他们让我回去别开枪打我，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a164_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: N-not that they would ever shoot at me, 'cause I'm so popular... But, uh... You'll tell them anyway, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是说他们一定会开枪，当然我是如此受欢迎的...但是，呃...不管怎么样你会告诉他们的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a164_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway! Yeah! Ophelia! I've totally got her back, you got my word, buddy! For real! Now, uh... We're cool. Right? {beat}'Course we are!
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外！耶！奥菲莉娅！我完全支持她，我想你保证，兄弟！真的！现在，呃...我们没事了，对吧？{beat}当然没事啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a164_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaSlickerVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaSlickerVoted + 1
[Freeside Rep] I wonder what my friends in Freeside will think when I mention what a tool you are...
ESP.TRADUIT: [自由之城] 我在想当我提到你如何当个工具的时候，我自由之城的朋友们会怎么想...

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerConvince2
{scared}What? I never said that! I love Ophelia! She's the best, yes she is, I'm the president of the Ophelia fan club.
ESP.TRADUIT: {scared}什么？我没那么说过！我爱奥菲莉娅！她是最好的，是的，我是奥菲莉娅粉丝会的会长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a165_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, I'm such a fan of Ophelia, that I'm going to support her as the next Prophet right now! Yep, that's my plan!
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我是如此的迷奥菲莉娅，我要支持她担任下一任先知！是的，那就是我的意见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a165_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaSlickerVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaSlickerVoted + 1
I'm going to flick a match at your head and turn your hair into the world's biggest grease fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要给你脑袋上划根火柴，然后把你的头发变成世界上最大的油脂火灾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerConvince3
Dude, that's twice what my parents used to pay me. Get on top of that shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，那是以前我父母给我的零花钱的两倍。赶紧弄来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a166_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you 25 caps to change your mind... Just, uh, give me some time to actually get 25 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算给你25瓶盖来改变你的意见...只是，呃，给我点时间来凑够25瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {you think this is a great deal}Done!
ESP.TRADUIT: {you think this is a great deal}成交！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickerc_0005a167_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 25
set aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaSlickerVoted to aaaOpheliaProphetQuest.aaaSlickerVoted + 1
I'll give you 25 caps to support Ophelia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你支持奥菲莉娅，我会给你25瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKingSlickerNevermind
Oh, uh, okay. Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，呃，好吧。没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slicker [0704E2FE] (mod) Quest : ([0704F6DB]aaaHippieLosersQuest) Can't Help Falling In Love EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaahippiel_aaakingslickern_0005a163_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaGotVotes
May the stars shine ever upon you for your selfless assistance in this matter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿群星永远照耀着你，为你在这件事上的无私帮助！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a169_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {cheerful}Well, there is only one step left for us, and then I shall be ascended to the lofty rank of Prophet, to better share my astral wisdom with all.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}嗯，我们只剩一步了，然后我就会上升到先知这个高傲的阶位，能更好地与大家分享我的星体智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a169_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is yet one member of our community whose opinion could be easily swayed this way or that. Chadford, in the hot spring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们社会还剩一位成员，他的意见很容易被左右。他就是查德福得，在温泉边的那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a169_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must be convinced to support... John.
ESP.TRADUIT: 必须说服他支持...约翰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a169_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I convinced everybody you mentioned. They should all support you, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服了你提到的每一个人。现在他们应该都会支持你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaGotVotes2
{proud of yourself}Have you met Chadford? He is, without a doubt, the most useless idiot I have ever met in my entire life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {proud of yourself}你见过查德福得吗？他毫无疑问是我这辈子见过的最没用的白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a lazy, good-for-nothing moron. {beat}That's not me being judgmental, mind you. He is, objectively, a drooling imbecile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个懒惰，毫无用处的蠢材。{beat}我提醒你这不是我的主观判断。客观上他就是个流着口水的低能人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {devious}And if that drooling imbecile is one of the only voices reverently crying John's praises, why, I can think of nothing more demoralizing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {devious}而如果这个流口水的低等人是唯一一个喊出对约翰的赞美的人，我想不出比这更让人泄气的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've convinced dear Chadford to sucker himself quite firmly to John's ass, we should be ready to move forward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你说服查德福得把自己牢牢地贴在约翰的屁股上，我们就应该准备好继续下一步了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you luck, though I doubt you'll need it. You've proven yourself to be quite good at this, and I couldn't ask for a finer ally!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，虽然我怀疑你是否需要它。你已经证明你自己很擅长这个，没有比你更好的盟友了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 40
I don't follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRadChadSupportJohn
What? He needs me? Oh my god, that's never happened before! Bodacious!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？他需要我？噢上帝啊，以前从来没有发生过！太棒啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadsuppo_0005a16d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dude, you can tell the Prophet that Chadford's got his back. Radical, dude. I'm totally, like, hyped to help him. Righteous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，你可以告诉先知，查德福得会支持他。完全支持，伙计。我完全，大肆地帮助他。正点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadsuppo_0005a16d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From now on, Chadford will be the Prophet's most gnarly of allies, dude!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从现在开始，查德福得将会是先知最好的盟友，伙计！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chadford [0701EB50] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaacommuneoverseervoice\aaageneric_aaaradchadsuppo_0005a16d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 50
The Prophet's position is in danger, Chadford. He needs you to give him all your support.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先知的地位很危险，查德福得。他需要你给他全部的支持。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaFinishedChad
Excellent! I had every faith in you, even without the assurance of the stars that you were destined to succeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好！我完全信任你，即使没有群星的保证，你也注定会成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I hope you don't mind, but since you've joined us, I've been keeping an eye on the promises of the stars in regards to your astral destiny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，但既然你加入了我们，我希望你不介意，我一直在密切关注群星对你星体命运的承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They promise great hardships in your future, but many more great successes of impressive scale. I knew you had a bright aura when we first met!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们许诺你将来会有很大的困难，但还有许多更大的成功，其规模令人印象深刻。我们第一次相遇的时候我就知道你有光明特质！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16f_3.ogg
