ESP.ORIGINAL: {abrupt}Anyway! If you could just hand this to John, then we should be good to go, as far as important astral Prophet matters are concerned.
ESP.TRADUIT: {abrupt}不管怎么样！如果你能把这个给约翰，就这件重要的星体先知事件而言，我们就没问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry back once that's done, and my first act as Prophet shall be... Giving you stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 做完就赶紧回来，我作为先知的第一件事情就是...赐给你物品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a16f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 60 player.additem aaaOpheliaVoteTape 1
I convinced Chadford to support John.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服了查德福得支持约翰。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaWhatJohnDo
Huh? I'm not going to do anything with him, provided he doesn't take his demotion to a homicidally-poorly degree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？我不会对他做任何事，前提是他被降职后没有变到凶残杀人的地步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a172_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quickly, reassuring}That's not likely. It would be wildly out of character. {beat}Also, the stars never mention me getting shot by a deranged bald man in shades, so... Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: {quickly, reassuring}不太可能。这将是非常不正常的。{beat}而且，群星并没有提到我会被一个精神失常躲在暗处的秃子给枪杀，所以...是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a172_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I figured I'd just sorta... foist recruitment duties on him. He's always been better at that than me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我只是...把招聘的任务交给他。他在这方面总是比我强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a172_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the current recruiter, I get a weekly stipend to ease my travels in the Vegas area, which I would be happy to transfer to him in perpetuity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为当前的招聘人员，我每周领一笔津贴，以方便我在维加斯地区的旅行，我很乐意永远转给他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a172_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless he's grievously offended by our little soft coup, in which case I suppose he may deign to leave. {shrug}That's his prerogative. I'm no jailer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非他被我们的小阴谋严重冒犯了，那样的话我猜他会准备离开。{shrug}那是他的特权。我又不是监狱官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a172_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really see that happening either, though. I'm not inclined to bring the hammer down on the hedonistic stuff he valued so highly, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不认为会发生这种事。毕竟我不想制止他非常看重的享乐主义的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a172_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just won't have it held up as a key element of our community. {shrug}If he wants to host orgies in that nice big house I gave him, that's fine by me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是不想让它成为我们社区的一个关键因素。{shrug}如果他想在我给他的大房子里举办狂欢的话，我没意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a172_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do with John once you're Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你当上先知，你会怎么处理约翰？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaVictory
How gratifying! I knew he'd be reasonable, just as I knew that getting you to join the family would lead to good things all around!
ESP.TRADUIT: 多么令人欣慰啊！我知道他会讲道理的，就像我知道让你加入这个家庭会带来很多好处！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a776_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now, as my first act as astral Prophet, I call for the immediate and brutal executions of anyone who dared support John!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，作为我成为群星先知的第一件事，我呼吁立即残忍地处决任何胆敢支持约翰的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a776_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {beat}That was a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: {beat}开玩笑的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a776_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, anyway, I believe I promised to give you stuff if you supported my celestial ascendency, and so this stuff is now yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我记得我承诺过你，如果你支持我的天体支配地位的话，我会给你些东西，所以这些东西现在是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a776_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005a776_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetJohnREF.SetActorFullName aaaProphetNameThing SetCellFullName aaaCommuneProphetHut aaaProphetHomeNameThing aaaProphetSignREF.disable aaaOpheliaSignREF.enable

setstage aaaOpheliaProphetQuest 80 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDSidedWithOphelia to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHDSidedWithOphelia + 1 player.additem Ammo12GaMagnum 100 player.additem NVDLC05Ammo556mmMatchHandLoad 200 player.additem NVDLC05AmmoMicroFusionCellOptimized 100 player.additem VMS01DinoSouvenir 3 player.additem BookSkillScience 1 aaaProphetPASystemREF.say aaaProphetPASpeech
I spoke with John. He's conceded. Looks like you're the Prophet now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟约翰谈过了，他认输了。看起来你现在是先知了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetPASpeech

Uh, is this on? {beat}Yes? Uh, attention everyone, this is your holy Prophet speaking. {beat}Hello. Uh, right, so, I just got a divine mandate or something. Turns out, Ophelia is the new Prophet from now on. {beat}And Chadford is the new permanent toilet-scrubber.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，这开着吗？{beat}是的？呃，大家请注意，我是你们神圣的先知。{beat}大家好。呃，对了，那么，我刚得到神圣的任命。那就是，奥菲莉娅从现在起就是新的先知。{beat}而查德福得就永远负责刷马桶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : PA System [07047606] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophetpaspe_0005a778_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaHowsProphetLife
{cheerful}Quite well! Once I confirmed everybody's rights to continue with the drugs and drinking and irresponsible group sex, I've had no complaints.
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}相当不错！一旦我确认每个人都有权继续吸毒和酗酒以及群体乱交，我没收到任何抱怨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005ad81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've gone ahead and prioritized the constellation-reading bits, and I'm offering special prizes to any of our members that interpret the star-signs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我继续和划分了读星术的优先级，我将为我们的任何一位解释星象的会员提供特别的奖品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005ad81_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In all, everything is going very agreeably, thank you for asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，一切都很顺利，感谢你的问候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005ad81_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's life as the new Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当一名新的先知怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's not as if anything's really changed overmuch. Just trying to spend a bit more time to explain the importance of the stars to our converts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并没有什么东西有多大改变。只是想多花点时间来向我们的教众解释群星的重要性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005ad82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found that they're actually slightly more receptive when they're stoned out of their minds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现当他们思想飘飘欲仙的时候，他们实际上更容易接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005ad82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's life with John as Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰作为先知，你的生活怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaProphetHowsProphetLife
{shrug}Eh, I've had worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: {shrug}呃，这还不算太惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophethowsp_0005ad84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't get to laze around all day, getting drunk and shooting guns, but there are perks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我虽不能整天混日子, 喝醉酒和开枪，但也有额外津贴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophethowsp_0005ad84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Namely, getting to plow Vegas locals and hookers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是，在维加斯当地人和妓女中间开路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophethowsp_0005ad84_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's does being a recruiter stack up against being the Prophet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个招聘人员和先知有什么不同？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well it was pretty kickass before, and nothing's changed except we've locked in that it's gonna keep on keeping on, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前是相当的厉害，什么都没改变，但我们已经封锁了本来会一直保持下去的东西，所以...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophethowsp_0005ad85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, yeah. Things are fine, still got plenty of drink and chems and tits. What more could a holy Prophet want, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，是的。情况还不错，仍然有大量的酒、毒品和马子。一个神圣的先知还想要什么，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father John Turner [07009D86] (mod) Quest : ([070214AC]aaaProphetJohnQuestOne) Everybody Get Together EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaprophet_aaaprophethowsp_0005ad85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's life as the Prophet now that your title isn't in question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你的头衔没有问题了，作为先知的生活怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSaloonTongInventory
Check it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edgar Tong [07005892] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloontongin_0005b98b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Let me see what's in stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你的库存。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSaloonTongWhoYou
Haha, I run the bar! I'm Edgar! {beat}I'm also incredibly high, haha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，我经营酒吧！我叫艾德加！{beat}我也非常兴奋，哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edgar Tong [07005892] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloontongwh_0005b98d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSaloonTongEntertainment
I sell liquor and chems. {beat}The chems are great, I can definitely recommend those, ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我卖酒和毒品。{beat}毒品非常棒，我绝对强力推荐，哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edgar Tong [07005892] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloontongen_0005b98f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there's some whores upstairs, including my sister! You can plow her all night if you have the money, haha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 楼上还有一些妓女，包括我的姐姐！如果有钱的话你可以跟她干一整晚，哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edgar Tong [07005892] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloontongen_0005b98f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of entertainment do you guys offer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们提供什么样的娱乐？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSaloonTongSister
That's just because I'm allowed to get high on my own stock if I take it out of my paycheck, haha! I'm actually disgusted and ashamed of her!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只是因为如果毒品我从薪水中扣除的话，我可以拿自己的货去嗨，哈哈！我真的为她感到恶心和羞耻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edgar Tong [07005892] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloontongsi_0005b991_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {way too cheerful}But it's not like she can shame our family any better than I can! Haha, I'm a junkie!
ESP.TRADUIT: {way too cheerful}但她也比不上我，我更让我们家丢脸！哈哈，我是个瘾君子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Edgar Tong [07005892] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloontongsi_0005b991_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're okay with your sister prostituting herself? That seems kinda weird, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的姐姐卖淫你没事吧？这看起来有点奇怪，兄弟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSaloonChristineBackground
That's not really interesting. My brother and me are both burnout failures that embarrassed our parents until they finally gave us the boot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是很特别有趣。我弟弟和我都是他们精疲力尽之后的失败品，使我们的父母感到难堪，直到他们最后把我们踢出去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine Tong [07006C71] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloonchrist_0005b996_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, we took work here, 'cause they were hiring. Not really classy work, but whatever. If I had some issue selling my ass, I'd just leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我们在这里工作，因为他们在招人。不是很好的工作，但又有什么所谓。如果我卖屁股有问题的话，我宁愿离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine Tong [07006C71] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloonchrist_0005b996_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSaloonChristineHire
500 caps, same price you'd pay for any employee here that isn't an annoying bloodthirsty pervert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 500瓶盖，所有不是让人讨厌的暴力性变态员工都是一个价格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine Tong [07006C71] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloonchrist_0005b999_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does it take to hire you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 点你的钟要多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSaloonChristineFuckTime
You know, you don't have to tell me you're poor. You can just, y'know, not bring it up in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，你不必告诉我你很穷。你只要，一开始就不提。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine Tong [07006C71] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloonchrist_0005b99a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I'm short a few caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我钱不够。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh boy, looks like I get to work today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢亲爱的，看起来我今天要工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine Tong [07006C71] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloonchrist_0005b99b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell player.removeitem caps001 500
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWWRocketJesusBark
Stealing from a church? Too bad for you, I'm the son of God, you son of a bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从教堂偷东西？对你来说太糟糕了，我是上帝之子，你这狗娘养的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rocket Jesus [0705B9B1] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult04\aaaeliyoun_aaawwrocketjesu_0005b9b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaVictory2
{cheerful}You could shoot it at empty bottles, if you'd prefer!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}你可以对着空瓶子开枪，如果你喜欢的话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005bfc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's quite a lot of ammo. I thought you were all about nonviolence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是相当多的弹药。我以为你是不使用暴力的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaVictory3
{cheerful}Wouldn't it be obnoxious if I just said "No, no, thank you" right back?
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}如果我说“不，不，是我谢谢你” 的话，会不会很讨厌？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005bfc4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {beat}Anyway, come back any time!
ESP.TRADUIT: {beat}好吧，欢迎随时回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005bfc4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCommuneOpheliaVictory4
{cheerful}And I bet I'm all the happier for it!
ESP.TRADUIT: {cheerful}我打赌我会为此而高兴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [07001FE9] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaacommuneophel_0005bfc5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hahaha you're all completely insane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈，你们全都疯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungStartQuest
Matter of fact, there sure is. So, between the casino across the street, and our own specialities, there's a demand for full pockets around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，确实是有。那么，在街对面的赌场，与我们的专业之间，会有装满钱包的需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I've been enabling that sorta debauchery, at a profit, by doing a bit of moneylending on the side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我在有利可图的情况下使那些沉迷酒色的行为成为可能，进行放贷的生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a few people that've gotten the bright idea in their heads to take the cash and run. Too bad for them, that's a tired old play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有几个人想的好主意是拿着我的钱就跑。那对他们来说可太糟糕了，那是一出老掉牙的戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, I went ahead and added some little tracking beacons inside the money cases I've lent out. Won't be too hard to track 'em down this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我接着在我借出去的钱箱里加了一些跟踪发射器。不太费工夫就能追踪到他们的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I've got duties here, keeping troublemakers from doing anything stupid. So, if you could hunt down my missing loans, that'd be real nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我在这里有职责，阻止捣乱者做蠢事。所以，如果你能找到我丢失的贷款，那就太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get 'em all back, and I'll throw some cash your way. {beat}As your fee, not as a loan. And, there's another bonus in it for us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它们都拿回来，然后我会给你一些现金。{beat}作为你的费用，不是贷款。而且，还有一个我们都有的奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a ghoul that wants to open up a little arms business here in Primm. Problem is, he lacks the capital to get it started on his own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个尸鬼想在普瑞姆这里做点军火生意。问题是，他没有资金自己开业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I lack the capital to spot him, at least right now, with three substantial debtors going AWOL on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有足够的资金去放给他，至少现在是，有三个重要的债务人擅自跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, get me my money back, and everyone wins. Shouldn't be too hard, especially with the first case being fairly close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，把我的钱拿回来，然后大家都有好处。不会太难，尤其是第一个箱子已经很接近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beacon says it's along the road leading to Nipton from Primm and the Mojave Outpost. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发射器显示它在从普瑞姆和莫哈维前哨站去尼普顿的路上。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungstar_0005c5ca_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaEliYoungDebtQuest 10
I don't suppose you have any work for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有工作给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungContQuest
Yeah? Great. That's one down, two to go. Keep up the good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？太好了。搞定一个，还有两个。继续好好干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The next one... {beat}Huh. Yeah, this guy might not have ripped me off. He might've just gotten killed before he could pay me back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一个是...{beat}哈。是的，这家伙可能没骗过我。他可能还没来得及还我钱就被杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beacon says the money is in Searchlight, and Searchlight... Well, I'm sure you know what a deathtrap that place is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发射器显示钱在探照灯营地里，而探照灯营地...好吧，我想你肯定知道那个地方简直就是个死亡陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stock up on radiation supplies before heading out, I guess. {beat}Unless you don't want to, of course. Your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出发前储备好防辐射物资。{beat}当然除非你根本不需要。你自己选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cb_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaEliYoungDebtQuest 30
I got one of your loans back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我收回了你的一笔贷款。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungFinishQuest
Well hey, there we go. That should be the last of 'em, so looks like you're done. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我们有三个了。那应该就是最后一个了，看起来你都搞定了。干得漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungfini_0005c5ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad I sprang for the waterproof cases, otherwise I'm not sure the tracking beacon for this one would've worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴我买的是防水的箱子，否则我不确定这个的跟踪发射器会不会起作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungfini_0005c5ce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, seems to me I promised to pay you for the return of all my money, so by my reckoning, this is yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，我答应把所有钱找回来之后付给你酬劳，依我看，这是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungfini_0005c5ce_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, that ghoul I mentioned earlier should be done setting up his kiosk. Hit him up if you need some ordnance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，我之前提到过的那个尸鬼应该已经建好他的售卖亭了。如果你需要武器就找他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungfini_0005c5ce_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungfini_0005c5ce_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaEliYoungDebtQuest 60 1
setstage aaaEliYoungDebtQuest 70
I got the third loan back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我收回了第三笔贷款。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungContQuest2
Nice work, I'll take that back. {beat}Maybe pop some iodine before I crack open the case this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，我收下这个。{beat}也许我这次打开箱子之前应该先放点碘酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, thanks. That leaves one case left, and this one is... Annoyingly distant. Just about as southeast as you can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，谢谢。只剩一个箱子了，而这个箱子...实在是遥远。就在最东南的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like it's somewhere on the banks of the Colorado. I know Lakelurks nest in that region, so lock and load, I guess. Up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像在科罗拉多河的岸边。我知道那个区域有湖沼蟹的巢穴，所以准备好装备，子弹上膛。你来决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just be careful. Those things will eat your ass alive if you let them. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要小心。如果你放任它们，那些东西会活活吃掉你。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungcont_0005c5cd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaEliYoungDebtQuest 50
I retrieved the case from Searchlight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从探照灯营地拿回了箱子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungWhatDo
What, aside from doing like 90% of the work on actually getting this building refurbished? Mostly I'm on security detail, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，除了在整修这栋楼中间做了90%的工作以外吗？现在我基本上负责安保。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungwhat_0005e3d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also do a bit of moneylending with customers that don't strike me as scheming turds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也给客户放点贷款，他们不会认为我是个诡计多端的混蛋.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungwhat_0005e3d8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I also convinced Silas not to put a jukebox in here, so you can thank me for that any moment, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我还说服塞格拉斯别在这里放自动点唱机，所以你随时都可以感谢我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungwhat_0005e3d8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungBackground
{sigh}Man, who cares?
ESP.TRADUIT: {sigh}老兄，谁在乎？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungback_0005e3da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Fine. I'm from New Canaan, if you believe it. Yeah, I was raised with all that good book religious stuff being drilled into my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...好吧。我从新迦南来，如果你相信的话。是的，我被那些从小灌输在我脑子里宗教东西养大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungback_0005e3da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I just felt like being a {self-deprecating}badass rebel without a cause, so I basically shunned anything and everything they taught me. {self-deprecating, wistful}So cool...
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉我只是个 {self-deprecating}无理由叛逆的牛人，所以我基本上回避了他们教我的任何东西。{self-deprecating, wistful}真酷...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungback_0005e3da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, New Canaan's got this tradition where, you hit a certain age, off you go into the wastes to do missionary work, AKA brainwashing tribals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新迦南人有这个传统，你到了一定的年龄就得到废土里去传教，也叫作洗脑部落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungback_0005e3da_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I took that to mean I was free, so I skipped the desert preaching and just kept on walking 'til I hit civilization. {under your breath}Or whatever passes for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为那意味着我自由了，于是我跳过沙漠布道，继续走直到到达文明社会。{under your breath}或者随便什么地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungback_0005e3da_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的故事是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungRadioSucks
What, don't you have a radio on that goofy wristwatch of yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你那个愚蠢的腕表上不是有个收音机吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungradi_0005e3d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's only two or three stations, and across the lot of 'em, there's only a couple dozen songs that they all play. Over. And over. And over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有两三个台，他们放来放去只有几十首歌。一遍，又一遍，然后又一遍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungradi_0005e3d9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And for some reason, the only tracks that anyone seems to find out there are old copies of grandpa's sex music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出于某种原因，所有人都能找到的唯一一首歌是爷爷的性感音乐的拷贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungradi_0005e3d9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, the nukes dropped in 2077, yeah? So why are all the music tapes from the early 1900's? What the hell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，核弹在2077年才落下来，对吧？那为什么所有的音乐卡带录的都是1900年左右的歌？什么鬼啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungradi_0005e3d9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would you be proud of banning a jukebox?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你会为禁止点唱机而自豪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungSilas
Fairly recent state of affairs, that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是最近才开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungsila_0005e3dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basically, he put out a call before he arrived in Primm, saying he needs some whores and some muscle for this saloon venture of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大体上，他到达普瑞姆之前发起了召唤，说他的会所需要一些妓女和打手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungsila_0005e3dc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that first bit isn't my forte, but sure, I figured I could work as a bouncer. {beat}Clever bastard left out the bit about literal heavy lifting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然第一项不是我的专长，但是我认为我可以当个保安。{beat}但那个聪明的混蛋故意漏掉了一点关于搬举重物的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungsila_0005e3dc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, that bit's done. Now I can sit back, sip my beer, and barely have to do anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，那个事也做完了。现在我可以坐下来，喝我的啤酒，几乎什么都不用做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungsila_0005e3dc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most folk don't want to cause trouble where a man with a fully-loaded .45 SMG has good sightlines on 'em, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个人拿着上满.45子弹的冲锋枪站在最佳视角上，大多数人都不想惹麻烦，你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungsila_0005e3dc_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you start working for Silas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么开始为塞拉斯工作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQManWhores
Because, generally speaking, that's a very niche market, and paying to keep a stable of manwhores would lose more money than it would ever earn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为，通常来说，那是个非常利基的市场，养一个男妓要花的钱会比他能赚到的更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0005e3de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, in layman's terms, it would be deleterious to the continued penile tumescence of the vast majority of my clientele
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，用外行的话来说，这对我的绝大多数客户老二的持续勃起是有害的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0005e3de_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you have more male prostitutes here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不在这里多招些男妓？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because, generally speaking, that's a very niche market, and paying to keep a stable of manwhores would lose more money than it would ever earn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为，通常来说，那是个非常利基的市场，养一个男妓要花的钱会比他能赚到的更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0005e3df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, in layman's terms, it would be deleterious to the continued penile tumescence of the vast majority of my clientele
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，用外行的话来说，这对我的绝大多数客户老二的持续勃起是有害的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqm_0005e3df_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you have more male prostitutes here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不在这里多招些男妓？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQNevermind
Alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqn_0005e3e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQAboutMolly
If you're implying a suspicion that myself and Miss Martin had, or are currently having, some sort of love affair, I categorically deny the notion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是在暗示怀疑我和马丁小姐之间曾经，或者现在，存在某种爱情故事的话，我只能否认这个观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to imply we haven't been intimately entangled, {aside}or, to rephrase in the parlance of our times, fucking like animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是说我们没有亲密的关系，{aside}或者，用我们这个时代的话说，像动物一样操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We met when I was a young thug in Reno, and she was an even younger whore. Both of us were employed by the Bishops, in some form or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相遇的时候我还是新里诺的一个混混，而她是个年轻的妓女。我们都以某种形式替彼希家族做事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the time, I was quite fucking smitten, as red hair and a demure sensibility have never failed to arouse my amorous attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时候，我一下就被他妈的迷住了，因为红发和端庄一直都能激起我的性欲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed, she received a good deal of my money back in those days. But, in a pleasant rarity for her profession, young Molly had greater ambitions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确，那时候她收了我的一大笔钱。但是，对她的职业来说是一件难得的事，年轻的莫莉有更大的野心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, we parted ways with the Bishop family, as well as with each other, and that was the end of the story for many years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，我们都离开了彼希家族，我们也一样分开了，这就是多年来故事的结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I resolved to own and operate my own den of iniquity, I knew I would need someone to manage the whores. Who better than my dear old friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我决定拥有和经营我自己的会所，我知道我需要有人来管理妓女们。还有谁能比我的老朋友做得更好呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our relationship is platonic and professional these days, however. As I age, I find my standards ever tightening and polishing themselves, you see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过现在我们的关系是柏拉图式和专业的。随着年龄的增长，我发现我的标准越来越严格，越来越完善了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These days, the notion of settling down with a woman that sold her own body is increasingly repulsive. But, such is life. We all have our burdens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近，跟一个出卖自己身体的女人安定下来的感觉越来越令人厌恶。但是，这就是生活。我们都有自己的负担。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e5_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your relationship with Molly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟莫莉是什么关系？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebQAboutEli
Eh, it's not as if we have some sort of close professional history. He's just a hired gun I brought on board early in this enterprise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我们没有什么密切的职业历史。他只是我在这家公司早期雇来的枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew I'd need a capable bouncer if I wanted to operate an establishment catering to drunks, junkies, and other such reprobates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道如果我想经营一家纵酒，吸毒，堕落的会所，我需要一名能干的保安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also knew I'd need somebody that isn't wearing a suit to deal with the minutiae of renovating the building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也知道我需要一个不穿制服的人来处理整修大楼的细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {devious}I left that part off the application, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: {devious}然而我把那部分忘记写在招聘申请书上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebqa_0005e3e4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Eli?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我伊莱的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinQNCROpinion
{dry amusement}Well, I'm an adult, so I don't hate them for levying taxes from their citizens, which does seem to put me above most of the people around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: {dry amusement}我是个成年人，所以我不恨他们向公民征税，这似乎让我超过了这里的大多数人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. They have their good points and their bad. I suppose it mostly varies depending on the current administration, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。他们有优点也有缺点。我想这主要取决于现任政府，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That being the case, I would be inclined to believe they've reached their moral nadir under the command of that swaggering buffoon, Kimball.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然如此，我倾向于相信他们在那个大摇大摆的小丑金博尔的指挥下，已经到了道德的最低点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just a touch dubious of any sort of saber-rattling jingoistic imperialism-disguised-as-patriotism style of politician, as a general rule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般说来，我只是有点怀疑各种类型的政客，他们各种战争叫嚣，沙文主义，用爱国主义粉饰帝国主义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I {emph}ought to be impressed that the man can even {emph}see new lands to grab up, from so deep within the pockets of the industrialists and magnates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我{emph}应该对他的某一点感到印象深刻，这个人甚至可以{emph}看到新的土地去抢占，从实业家和巨头这么深的口袋里爬出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand that things were better under President Tandi. {skeptical}I suppose, perhaps, a new administration could mean a better NCR. Maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道在坦蒂总统的领导下情况更好。{skeptical}我想，也许，一个新政府可能意味着一个更好NCR。也许吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's how republics go, isn't it? They have their good leaders and their bad. But every bad one brings in a little more rot than the last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但共和国就是这样，不是吗？他们有好的领导，也有坏的领导。但是每一个坏的都比上一个更腐败一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The good ones clean up as best they can, but soon enough, they're on the out, and another corrupt demagogue is slithering his way back inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的会尽可能地清理干净，但很快，他们就下台了，然后另一个腐败的政客又溜了进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On and on the cycle goes, until, inevitably, the rot consumes the foundations of the system, and it all collapses in on itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个接一个的循环，直到，不可避免的，腐败侵蚀了体系的根基，一切都会自行崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It happened in Rome, it happened in the United States, it'll come for the NCR too. History is just one great endless circle, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在罗马发生过，在美国发生过，现在又轮到NCR了。历史就是一个大的无限循环，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0005e3e7_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得NCR怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinYSoSmert
{genuine}That's a good observation, not an insult. It would only be an insult if I were some cringing hypocrite, ashamed of a past I know to be true.
ESP.TRADUIT: {genuine}这是一个不错的观察，而不是侮辱。如果说我是个卑躬屈膝的伪君子，那才是一种侮辱，为过去感到羞耻我知道这是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing Comment (NAM2) : oh shit it's the theme of the mod, what do we do guys? EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartiny_0005e3e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I did sell my body back then, because that was the path that was open to me. I was an orphaned teenager with no home and no prospects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我那时确实出卖过自己的身体，因为那是一条向我敞开的道路。我是个孤儿，没有家，没有前途。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing Comment (NAM2) : oh shit it's the theme of the mod, what do we do guys? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartiny_0005e3e9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used the money I earned to better myself. I bought myself a home. I traded my services to one man in exchange for lessons in reading and writing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我用挣来的钱来让自己过得更好。我给自己买了个家。我用我的服务跟一个男人交换，以换取阅读和写作的课程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing Comment (NAM2) : oh shit it's the theme of the mod, what do we do guys? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartiny_0005e3e9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the girls would accept drugs in lieu of payment. I started accepting books and educational holotapes instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些女孩愿意接受毒品作为代付款。而我开始接受书籍和教学卡带作为替代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing Comment (NAM2) : oh shit it's the theme of the mod, what do we do guys? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartiny_0005e3e9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had ambitions of prosperity and happiness, you see. I'm hardly alone in that regard, but I went ahead and made my dreams a reality, didn't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有追求繁荣和幸福的野心。我很难在这方面孤军奋战，但我继续努力，实现了我的梦想，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing Comment (NAM2) : oh shit it's the theme of the mod, what do we do guys? EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartiny_0005e3e9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That being the case, it strikes me as ridiculous to start cringing at my past and pretending it didn't happen. It did, and I came out on top.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然这样，我开始觉得为我的过去而哭泣以及装作没发生过的行为很可笑。确实可笑，而我现在战胜了它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing Comment (NAM2) : oh shit it's the theme of the mod, what do we do guys? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartiny_0005e3e9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As near as I can tell, carving out your own place in the world is as close to "winning" in life as any of us are ever liable to achieve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，在世界上开创属于你自己的地方，就会尽量接近我们任何人都有可能做到的“成功”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing Comment (NAM2) : oh shit it's the theme of the mod, what do we do guys? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartiny_0005e3e9_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't mind my saying so, you seem pretty well educated for an ex-prostitute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意我这么说的话，作为一个前妓女，你看起来受的教育不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungTimeToWork
Alright, see you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungtime_0005e3ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can handle them, don't worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能对付他们，别担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungLiveFastEatAss
{reacting to a terrible pun}...Get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: {reacting to a terrible pun}...滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyounglive_0005e3ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well then, joke's on them, because I like getting my ass eaten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，玩笑开在他们身上，因为我喜欢被人吃掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDanielleOrphanGoodbye2
Alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0703DCEE]aaaFreesideMendozaQuest) Family EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaadaniellegirlvoice\aaafreesid_aaadanielleorph_0005e9f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungAboutMolly
We've met, sure. I'll freely admit that I don't really have much experience with the sex trade, so I'll take her at her word that she's competent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们见过，是的。我坦率承认我没有多少性交易的经验，所以我相信她的话，她是足以胜任的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungabou_0005f5ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems to have a decent head on her shoulders, and none of her employees seem to have any complaints, so whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她似乎有个正派的头脑，她的员工似乎都没有抱怨，所以随便吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungabou_0005f5ff_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know Molly at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识莫莉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungAboutMiles
{you don't like this guy}I know of him. He's the bouncer posted closer to the second floor, so in theory, it's his job to deal with rough customers up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {you don't like this guy}我认识他。他是靠近二楼的保安，所以在理论上，他的工作就是对付楼上那些粗暴的顾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungabou_0005f5fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In practice... Seems to me he's too busy making stupid sex puns out of everything he says to do any work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上...我认为他在忙着进行各种愚蠢的性暗示，目的是想做点别的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungabou_0005f5fe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know that other bouncer in the corner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识角落里的另一个保安吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEliYoungNewCanaan
{Not your favorite topic}Yeah, I got word.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Not your favorite topic}是的，我听说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungnewc_0005f601_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I never even met Graham, but everywhere I go, people hear I'm from New Canaan, and all their questions are about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，我从来没见过格拉汉姆，但是不管我去哪里，人们只要听说我来自新迦南，就都会问关于他的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungnewc_0005f601_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured he was just an old ghost story, but no, guess he was feeling well enough to come home and bring the target on his back with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为他只是个老鬼故事，但是不，他在感觉很好之后回了家，把目标背在了自己背上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungnewc_0005f601_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {bitter joke}Guess I got out at the right time, huh? Hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: {bitter joke}我想我走的真是时候，哈？操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli Young [07005283] (mod) Quest : ([0701429C]aaaEliYoungDebtQuest) Cash Grab EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult09\aaaeliyoun_aaaeliyoungnewc_0005f601_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know that New Canaan was destroyed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道新迦南已经毁了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeserterNickSecondThoughts
Hey, you convinced me to give her a shot. Nobody said anything about me actually being optimistic about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你只是说服了我给她一个机会。没人说过我很乐观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nick Saunders [0700CBD6] (mod) Quest : ([0700CBD7]aaaGenericCommuneDialogue) 0700CBD7 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\maleadult05\aaageneric_aaadeserternick_0005f605_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, having second thoughts about Ophelia? I seem to recall convincing you to back her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，还要再考虑一下奥菲莉娅? 我好像记得已经说服了你支持她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSaloonChristineBrother
{your brother is annoying}Mhm. He's behind the bar downstairs, making an ass out of himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: {your brother is annoying}嗯。他在楼下的吧台后面，在那里出洋相。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine Tong [07006C71] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloonchrist_0006142d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {resigned}I expect he'll be bartender for life here, since he's allowed to get stoned on his own inventory in lieu of proper payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: {resigned}我想他会成为这里的终身酒保，自从他被允许可以拿自己的货物吸毒，而前提扣除自己的工资来偿还毒资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine Tong [07006C71] (mod) Quest : ([070235AF]aaaGenericGreebSaloonDialogue) 070235AF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult01default\aaageneric_aaasaloonchrist_0006142d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brother?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的弟弟？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebHowsBusiness
Entirely adequate at present. Not that I would expect to be buried in an avalanche of currency this soon after opening, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前完全足够。当然并非我希望在开张后不久被雪崩一样的金钱埋掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebho_00061431_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I must say, for a newly-established venture, the fact that we're doing as well as we are is surely a sign of good fucking fortunes to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我必须说，对一个新企业来说，事实上我们做得很好，这肯定是他妈的好运气要到来的标志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebho_00061431_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the risk of publicly outing myself as fucking proud, I'd even go so far as to say that my initial appraisement of this location was dead-on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冒着被公众说我太他妈骄傲的危险, 我甚至会说，我对这个地方的初始评价是完全正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebho_00061431_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 生意如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSilasGreebNewEmployees
Of course. I know you went on a little hooker-hiring run for Molly, but you were scarcely my only foray into gaining new employees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我知道你帮莫莉干了一些妓女招聘工作，但是在招募新雇员方面你几乎是我唯一的尝试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebne_00061432_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The barman and his whore sister were the first new arrivals. {you approve}The sister is quite indifferent to the moral conundrum of sucking cock for cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 酒吧招待和他的妓女姐姐是最先到的新人。{you approve}姐姐对吃鸡巴换现金的道德问题一点也不关心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebne_00061432_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, the barman himself struck me as dead fucking weight, but his sister refused to work here if I threw her deadbeat brother out on his ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，酒吧招待给我的印象是真他妈是个负担，但他姐姐拒绝在这里工作，如果我把她那那个二流子弟弟扔出去的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebne_00061432_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, as he's content to take his weekly pay in the form of free hits from our drug supply, he's not even an investment. So fuck it, he can stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，他满足于拿我们的毒品当做自己的周薪，他甚至连一项投资都算不上。所以操他妈的，他可以留下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebne_00061432_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Miles fellow, now he's a fucking perverted lunatic, and an absolutely insufferable conversational partner, and I don't at all care for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个迈尔斯，现在他是个变态的疯子，一个令人无法忍受的谈话对象，我一点也不在乎他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebne_00061432_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, he serves as an adequate secondary bouncer, and even better, he's such a dick-driven freak that he asked to pull double-duty as a manwhore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，他是个合格的二楼保安，甚至更好，他是一个被老二驱动的怪胎，他要求作为男妓的双重工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebne_00061432_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and there's Estelle. She's new to you, no doubt, but I used to know her as the toilet-scrubber at this shitty Reno club I used to frequent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，还有埃斯特尔。毫无疑问你不认识她，但是在我以前经常去的新里诺俱乐部里，她是刷马桶的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebne_00061432_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {amused with yourself}I figured, even 81-year-olds need something to do, so I figured she could scrub the toilets here, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: {amused with yourself}我认为，即使81岁的老人也需要有事情可做，所以我让她打扫这里的卫生间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Silas Greeb [070025E2] (mod) Quest : ([07006637]aaaSilasSaloonQuest) Such a Lovely Place EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaasilasgreebvoicetype\aaasilassa_aaasilasgreebne_00061432_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I notice you have some new employees here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我注意到你这里又有了新的雇员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinAboutHookers
Aside from the one you directed our way, yes, there's the new girl that Silas hired on recently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了你帮我们招过来的那个，是的，最近塞格拉斯招了新的女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartina_0006265b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She came as some sort of packaged deal with her brother, the embarrassment serving drinks at the bar downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她来是因为和她弟弟达成了某种协议，就是楼下的酒吧里那个出洋相的服务生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartina_0006265b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those two are actually my only employees at the moment. There is a third worker here offering himself to interested parties, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这两个实际上是我目前唯一的雇员。这里有第三个人主动请缨，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartina_0006265b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's his own side gig. His official position is just security, so he answers to Silas. Suits me fine, I'd rather not deal with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是他的第二职业。他正式的岗位是保安，所以他听塞格拉斯的。很适合我，我宁愿不跟他打交道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartina_0006265b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He seems to be suffering under the delusion that turning everything into a juvenile sexual euphemism is the peak of clever commentary. Ugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他似乎错误地认为，把一切都变成不成熟性行为的含蓄说法真是绝妙的评论。呃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartina_0006265b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you have some new employees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你这里又有了新的雇员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinQBusiness
Entirely adequate, at the moment. We've had exactly as much attention as I expected, and everything seems to be accounted for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前完全足够。我们得到了和我预期的一样多的关注，一切似乎都有了交代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0006265d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assuming the status quo in the Mojave continues, we should be steadily doing better and better as word of mouth spreads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假设莫哈维的现状还在继续，随着口碑的传播，我们应该稳步地做得越来越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0006265d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the NCR wins out, we may have to put a lid on the chem sales, but what we lose to taxation, we'll make back up with increased customer traffic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果NCR胜出，我们可能要停止毒品生意，但我们在税金上的损失，我们将用增加的客户流量来弥补。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0006265d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if the Legion wins, why, I expect that we'll be too busy being brutally tortured and executed to waste much thought towards financial viability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团胜出，我想我们会陷于被残忍地折磨而且要浪费太多心思在资金生存能力上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0006265d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 生意如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMollyMartinQGoodbye
Until next time, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，下次再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Martin [07007885] (mod) Quest : ([070381A1]aaaMollysHookerQuest) Womanizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\femaleadult11\aaamollysh_aaamollymartinq_0006265f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDustOpheliaGetRoofiedTwo
{increasingly distorted}Now you simply shut your eyes and begin your journey for astral enlightenment. I wish you good fortune on your quest!
ESP.TRADUIT: {increasingly distorted}现在你只要闭上眼睛然后开始你的星体启迪之旅。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ophelia [0704CABD] (mod) Quest : ([07030612]aaaCommuneOpheliaQuest) The High Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\thehighdesert.esp\aaaopheliacommunevoicetype\aaacommune_aaadustopheliag_00066e84_1.ogg

Alright, here goes nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，豁出去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugManBaitForCunts
THE ENCLAVE SUCK SO MUCH DICK THEY HAVE A PERMANENT IMPRINT OF A BELL-END AT THE BACK OF THEIR THROAT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷干了这么多坏事，所以在他们的喉咙后面的老二上有个永久的印记！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carlos the Debug Buddy [0703FB70] (mod) Quest : ([070247D7]aaaManwhoreMilesQuest) Thirsty For Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please let me RP as a big sexy Enclave man, daddy the0verseer, please oh please!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请让我重生为一个高大性感的英克雷军人，监督者爸爸，我要我要！

ESP.TRADUIT: 风中之尘

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cautiously looking past the door, you see a forest of dead trees with a small town in the center. A poorly-dressed woman with a squalling baby in her arms is pleading with the townsfolk to allow her entry, but beg as she might, she and her child are denied over and over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心地从门口看过去。你看到一片枯树林，中间有一个小镇。一个穿着破烂的妇人怀里抱着一个啼哭的婴儿，正在恳求市民允许她进入，尽管她不断地乞求，她和她的孩子却一次又一次地被拒绝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: John Turner
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·特纳

ESP.ORIGINAL: John's Home
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰的家

ESP.ORIGINAL:
What is this, a fucking joke? We renovate this fucking building, pay these laborers to completely reconstruct the interior, new walls, new floors, new lighting, new fucking plumbing, everything. And they did a spectacular goddamn job, I must say. Minus the cum stains on some of the sheets (which Estelle needs to deal with ASAP), this place looks fucking immaculate...
Except for the mirror. Where the fuck is the FUNCTIONING mirror I ordered? Why the fuck did, in the absence of the functioning fucking mirror, somebody hang up a broken piece of shit? What fucking purpose is a shattered mirror frame supposed to serve? It just makes my newly-built bathroom look like a hobo's personal shit-pit. You should all be ashamed of yourselves.
-Silas Greeb
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是什么，一个他妈的玩笑？我们要翻修这该死的大楼，付钱给这些工人，让他们完全重建内部，新墙壁，新地板，新灯具，新管道，所有的。我必须说他们做了一件了他妈不起的工作。除了床单上有污渍(埃斯特尔需要尽快处理掉)，这地方看起来他妈的完美无缺... ... 除了镜子。我订购的镜子他妈的在哪？为什么在没有他妈镜子的情况下, 有人挂一块破东西上去？一个破碎的镜框有他妈什么用？它让我新修的浴室看起来像个流浪汉的茅坑。你们都应该为自己感到羞耻。
-塞格拉斯·格里布

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously?
ESP.TRADUIT: 认真的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You quickly stick the advertisement holotape in with the rest of this completed footage and then close it up tight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你快速地将广告卡带贴进了这些已完成的片段中然后紧紧关上了盖子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You recall Silas telling you not to kill any of the security in this storage area. It would likely behoove you to leave your companions, if you brought any, outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想起塞拉斯告诉你不要杀掉任何仓库里的保安。所以最好离开你的同伴，如果你带着他们，把他们留在外面。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Oh boy, I'm going to get some brilliant fucking comments after this one, aren't I?
"Excuse me Mr. The0verseer, but I was playing your mod and I ignored all of the primary quest-giver's instructions in lieu of going on a homicidal rampage, and for some mysterious reason, I can't complete the quest anymore! This is clearly a bug, drop everything you're doing and fix it right now!"
Allow me a preemptive retort: No. Thanks for downloading, and I hope you hated it! <3 <3 <3
ESP.TRADUIT:
噢，在这之后我会得到一些他妈的精彩的评论，对吗？
”不好意思监督者先生，但是我在玩你做的MOD，然后我略过了所有的主线 - 取而代之的是一路狂暴杀人，然后由于一些神秘的原因，我无法再完成任务了！这明显是个BUG，放下你所有的事情然后赶紧修复这个BUG！“
请允许我先发制人地反驳：不。感谢下载，然后我希望你讨厌它！ <3 <3 <3

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! You've failed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝贺你！你失败了！

我，阿曼达·血影，把这可怜的灵魂献给伟大的死神，&PCName;. 愿这血祭在星体位面上到达你并且补充你无限的黑暗能量。并且，作为命运之神，充满了我祖先的黑暗和被禁止的血统，我愿谦恭地成为你永远的灵魂伴侣，请你考虑让我跟随你，这样我们可以永远在一起，我们穿着黑暗配饰，我们会超级相爱，被命运和其他东西绑在一起。 <3 <3 <3
— 我所有(黑暗)的爱 阿曼达·血影，&PCName;谦恭的仆人(以及未来的星体女友)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please don't bother the Peyote, they need their beauty sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要打扰佩奥特仙人掌，他们需要好好睡觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Winners don't use console commands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 成功者从不使用控制台命令。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you can begin this quest, you will need to resolve the issues surrounding Roy Sullivan's business in Eliza.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你开始这个任务之前，你需要先解决罗伊·苏利文生意上的问题（在作者另一个MOD Elisa里面，没有玩过这个MOD的就无法触发）。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This bloodstain isn't fresh - but it's also not old enough to have dried up either. Whoever lost this blood couldn't have be too far. A pair of deactivated slave collars lie in the dirt nearby, indicating that this likely has something to do with the slaver you're hunting. The blood trail continues up the hill towards Wolfhorn Ranch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个血迹并不新鲜 —— 但它也不足以完全干掉。不管是谁流的血都不会太远。附近的泥土里躺着一对失效的奴隶项圈，说明这可能和你追踪的奴隶贩子有关。血迹一直向山上延伸向着狼角农庄去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Danielle and her friends don't waste any time. As soon as she finishes speaking to you, the lot of them head out the gate and into the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹妮尔和她的朋友没浪费任何时间。当她跟你说完话之后，他们一大群人走出大门，走进废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woodey's men quickly evacuate the area, leaving him to face you alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伍迪的手下迅速撤离了该地区，留下他独自面对你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woodey and his men quickly evacuate the area, leaving you to your own devices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伍迪和他的手下迅速撤离了该地区，留下你一个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know that crabs can fly across spacetime by rotating?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道螃蟹可以通过旋转来穿越时空吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cool Space Facts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 超酷的空间事实！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This holotape explains, in exhaustive detail, precisely how the meat cloning process works. It also gives enough detail for you to extrapolate how and why it's still running 200+ years after the apocalypse, as well as why it's now spawning cloned Brahmin instead of ordinary cows.
It all makes perfect sense and you have absolutely no questions whatsoever.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这个卡带详尽无遗地解释了克隆肉类的过程是如何工作的。它也给了你足够的细节来推断如何以及为什么在末日的200多年后还能维持运转，也解释了为什么现在它不停地克隆出双头牛而不是普通的奶牛。
这一切都很有道理，而你也完全没有问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The strange man tips his top hat at you, and then casually leaves the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个陌生的男人向你抬了抬帽子，然后离开了这个区域。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peering beyond the door, you see a smirking young woman and a cautious-looking man with red hair, viciously fighting each other, as they scavenge and tear at the corpse of an old man with a knife in his back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注视门背后，你看见一个自鸣得意的年轻女人和一个看起来拘谨的红头发的男人，正在不怀好意地争斗，在一个背上插着刀的老人的尸体上搜寻和撕扯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You take a peak inside the door, and see a dark-haired man with a cruel smile and dead eyes, reclining on a great throne comprised of thousands of bloody corpses, the entire world burning around him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你注视门里面，看见一个深色头发带着残酷的微笑和死神的眼睛的男人，躺在由数千具血淋淋的尸体组成的巨大宝座上，整个世界都在他周围燃烧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You crack the door and peer inside, where you see a trio of giant men, each bigger than the last, each one swaying from a noose. All three corpses are branded with the golden bull of the Legion. Even in death, they stare down at you with sad eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打开门往里面看，你看见三个巨人，一个比一个大，每个都挥舞着绳套。三具尸体上都印着军团的金牛。即使已经死亡，他们仍然用悲伤的眼神盯着你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beyond the door is a high-tech bunker of some sort. A bearded man is feverishly working at a medical station, blind to the viscous black tendrils oozing out of the data archives, destroying everything they touch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门背后是某种高科技地堡。一个留胡子的男人在一个医疗站狂热地工作，对从数据档案中渗出的粘稠的黑色卷须物视而不见，那物质正在破坏它们接触到的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peering past the door, you see a sad little girl with dirty blonde hair standing over a dead man. In her hands is a long knife, dripping with blood. Her eyes are as flat and lifeless as the corpse lying before her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从门那边窥视，你看到一个悲伤的金发小女孩站在一个死人旁边。她手里拿着一把长刀，正在滴着血。她的眼睛像躺在她面前的尸体一样平淡，毫无生气。
